<item>

<item>

<tib>gshin po'i rjes su 'dzin pa'i thabs lho sgo'i cho ga thar lam gsal sgron zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@015a * (zhes gshin po rjes su 'dzin pa'i thabs lho sgo'i cho ga thar lam gsal sgron zhes bya ba 'di ni yul byang phyogs kyi mthar skyes pa'i gyi na ba ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang po zhes bya bas rje 'dul ba 'dzin pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi ngan song sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyud don gsal ba gzhir byas kun rig tik chen dang dam pa gzhan gyi man ngag gis brgyan te lag tu blang bde bar rang nyid kyi rjed byang dang rang dang skal ba mnyam pa gzhan la'ang phan par 'dod pas dben gnas byang chub gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bkra shis rgyal mtshan no 'dis kyang 'khor ba rang dang song gi rgyun chad cing rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che spyi dang rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa yab sras kyi bstan pa rin po che phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  'gro ba thams cad la dge bar gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5002</vol>
<tib>gter bum sbas tshul dang la brtse brtsegs tshul gyi lag len 'dod dgu'i dpal 'byor 'byung ba'i gter chen zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-39a</p>
<col>@039a * (zhes gter bum dang la brtse brtseg tshul gyi bshad pa 'dod dgu'i dpal 'byor 'byung ba'i gter chen zhes bya ba 'di ni sems dus pa dang dbang po nye bar zhi ba chos la blo mi rgyas pa gu shr'i chos rje blo bzang rnam rgyal dang rnam dpyod dang ldan pa aer te ni chos rje blo bzang rgyal mtshan nyid kyis gzhan don du blang bde ba 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes gsung gi bskul ba la brten nas gong rtsis 'phrul gyi rgyal po dang slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas nyid kyis mdzad pa'i la brtse brtsegs tshul dang sa mkhan mi'u thung gis mdzad pa'i sa'i cho ga dang jo bo aa ti shas mdzad pa'i gter bum sgrub tshul rnams kyis gzhir bays nas rang gi gang dpogs kyi legs chas kha bskang te lha'i btsun pa su ma ti ma ni pradznyas rab byung zhes pa me mo yos lo'i rgyas rgyas zla ba'i dga' ba dang po la sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni chos la blo mig rgyas pa khur tsha pi lig thu ye shes grags pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bde legs phun sum tshogs pa dang sems can thams cad rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang myur du thob par gyur cig  bkra shis</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5002</vol>
<tib>mgon po yid bzhin nor bu la gser skyems ni"</tib>
<p>12a-12b</p>
<col>@012b (ces pa 'di ni sh'akya'i dge slong rnal 'byor gshin rje'i gshed kyis sbyar ba'o bkra shis</col>

<item>

<vol>5002</vol>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5002</vol>
<tib>mnga' dbang rin chen 'bar ba bskur tshul gyi cho ga dbang phyug 'phrul mdzod ces bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-13b</p>
<col>@013a * (de ltar rgyal po la dbang bskur ba'i cho ga mnga' dbang rin @013b chen 'bar ba'i gsal byed dbang phyug 'phrul mdzod ces bya ba 'di ni rgyal khams chos bzhin du skyong ba'i mi dbang chos kyi rgyal po rnams kyi rten 'brel legs par 'grig pa'i ched du brtson pa'i pad+ma'i gsung sras rnams kyi ched du rig pa 'dzin pa bzhad pa'i rdo rjes gangs ljongs dang sham bha la'i mi dbang rnam gnyis khrid 'khod nas lo ngo brgyad kyi thog tu son pa shing mo yos kyi lo rgyus skar gyi bdag po smin drug gi dga' ma dang dga' ma gur spyod pa'i dus su dpal bde ba chen po'i nags khrod sde brgyad 'du ba'i pho brang dbang drag rol pa'i gur lding zung 'jug rnam rol gyi snying po a'om shr'i'i mdun du spel ba'i yi ge pa ni dar rgyas khang gsar ba rdo rje kun gsal te mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba kun la mdzad pa med pa'i bde legs 'byin pa'i rgyur gyur cig  siddhi siddham</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5002</vol>
<tib>na mo gu ru bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi zhal shes kyi mang ngag tshig brgyud 'ga' zhig ni"</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (zhes yongs 'dzin rin po che ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi gsung rgyun ltar yin lags</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5002</vol>
<tib>rgyas pa'i sbyin bsreg ltar bya ba'i tshul ni"</tib>
<p>2a-2b</p>
<col>@002b (tshul 'di chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po'i rgyud pa grwa tshang gi 'don rgyun gnyer bya te sh'akya'i btsun pa blo bzang ye shes kyis dam pa gong ma rnams kyis mdzad pa'i gsang bde 'jigs gsum gyi sbyin sreg sogs sbyin sreg mang po la legs par brtags pa nas zhus dag bgyis pa'o bkra shis par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5002</vol>
<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la bsangs mchod 'bul tshul bde chen 'od 'bar zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (zhes rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la bsangs mchod 'bul tshul bde chen 'od 'bar zhes bya ba 'di ni ^ sh'akya'i dge slong mi bskyod dgyes bzhad rdo rjes rang nyid phan thogs pa'i zhing gi phul du gyur zhing yi dam lha 'di nyid la mi phyed pa'i dad pa ldan pa aer khe no yon lags kyi nyams len rgyun 'khyer du sug bris su bgyis pa 'di nyid kyi gnyer kha gnyan mgon stobs 'phrog nag po las mdzod cig sa ma ya rgya rgya rgya</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5002</vol>
<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la bstod cing gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dngos grub myur du 'gug pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col>@004a * (ces @004b rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la mngon rtogs kyi dag pa dang mthun par bstod cing 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba 'debs pa'i rab tu phye ba dngos grub myur du 'gug pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba 'di ni  lam 'di la mos pa brtan bo thob pa'i ku s'a li dharma badzra gyis lcags kyu rgun zla ra ba'i tshes bcu'i nyin dgos pa khyad par can la bsam nas dge sbyor gyi thun mtshams su sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni blo gros dang ldan pa ngag dbang bstan 'phel gyis bgyis pa 'dis kyang rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor mas myur ba nyid du rjes su 'dzin par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5002</vol>
<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod kyi bsnyen yig pad+ma r'a ga'i 'phreng mdzes zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * (ces rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod kyi bsnyen pa bya tshul pad+ma r'a ga'i phreng mdzes zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam ga-yengs kyi khol por gyi nar 'khyams pa'i btsun gzugs dharm'a badzra ra ma blo bzang chos kyi nyi ma zhes bgyi bas ha cang spros pa ngor nas don gyi ngo bo tsam go bde bar dben pa'i ri sul bde chen chos gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge tshul rgyal mtshan grags pa'o 'dis kyang bdag gzhan sems can thams cad he ru ka yab yum gyis rjes su 'dzin par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5002</vol>

<col>@004b (ces rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod kyi thun mtshams kyi man ngag nyer mkho rim pa lnga pa ces bya ba 'di ni blo bzang chos kyi nyi mas rang gzhan la phan pa'i bsam pas chos sde chen po dgon lung byams pa gling gi gzim chung mkha' spyod yang rtser sbyar ba dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5002</vol>
<tib>thun drug gi rnal 'byor yang gsang rgyud kyis man ngag bdud rtsi'i snying po</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (ces pa 'di ni rang gi slob ma sde snod 'dzin pa du mas bskul ba dang khyad par nyin zhag phrugs re la thun drug tu 'di lta bu'i nyams len gyi sdoms chen po nyams su len pa byung na bod kyi gser chos su grags pa'i zab zab mo rnams kyis tsha tsam du'ang bskrun du med pa'i rgyal ba dgyes pa'i bka' srol du rje yab sras rnams kyis bsngags shing rgyud sde dang mthun pa'i nyams len du chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i blos rtogs pa'i nyer len gyis bskul ba la brten nas rig pa 'dzin chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5004</vol>
<tib>mkha' 'gro'i brda glu</tib>
<p>1a-1b</p>
<col>@001b (ces pa 'di sha ba 'bum pa'i gnas skor gyi tshe mkha' 'gro'i rdo rar mar ngo'i tshes bcu bgyis te tshogs dang bcas pa gsol btab pa'i nub rmi lam du bud med zhig gis 'di dag yi ge la bris nas gdangs dang bcas pa gar dbyung ba gzhi ma rang sor bzhag tshig phrad mi bde ba rnams 'bri bsnon cung zad kyis re bris pa 'di yang ^ sngags smyong mkha' rdos sbyar yi ge'i 'du byed pa ni 'jam dbyangs bstan 'dzin no</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5006</vol>
<tib>rdo rje theg pa'i myur lam thabs lam snying bcud zhes bya ba bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-72a</p>
<col>@070b (ces thabs lam gyi gnad 'ga' zhig gsal bar byed pa'i man ngag thabs lam snying bcud ces bya ba 'di ni rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa'i btsas su bsams te byang phyogs kyi rgyud las dbu ru zangs ri gsang sngags gling gi ri sul du skyes pa'i rnal 'byor pa phyir ba byung gi cha byad mgo bo che la gzugs chung ba @071a * nang sngags spyod khyim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rdo rje dang bsod nams tshe bo gsang ba rjes chags kyi bde ba chen po ste che ba bzhi ldan gyis khyad par du byas pa'i dge lugs pa'i rnying ma ba rnying ma'i dge lugs pa yang na rab dang yang na tha ma ste 'bring por ma gnas pa'i skyes bu kun dang mi mthun pa'i spyod lam gyi brdul zhugs mdo phugs dang ga-yo sgyu med pa'i drang por spyod pa'i pha mas med du btags pa dgos dgos te ring pan chen thams cad mkhyen pas btsas pa'i lo rtsal ba mgon po se tshe brtan rab byung bsgrubs pa'i tshe rtsal pa blo bzang 'phrin las thams cad mkhyen pa drug pa chen pos stsal ba'i ming blo bzang bstan pa grub pa'i rgyal mtshan rnam 'dren bdun pa chen pos brtsal ba blo bzang 'phrin las dbang po gsang bde 'jigs gsum gyi dkyil 'khor du smin par bgyis pa'i gsang mtshan pad+ma bzhad pa'i rdo rje ma tshogs t'a ki'i gtso mos ming du btags pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro dga' ba'i @071b lang tsho sogs ming gi rnam grangs du ma'i sgo nas  la las mchog tu bstod cing la las kun tu smon pa gang gis bde mchog nyung du'i rgyud dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro sdom 'byung la sogs pa'i rgyud sde ring po che rnams dang khams gsum 'gro ba'i bla ma btsong kha pa chen po yab sras rnams kyis gsung gi gsang ba gsang ba rnams kyang khong du chud par bgyis dus gsum mkhyen pa rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bo pad+ma k'a ra'i zhal snga nas kyi gsung gi gsang du ma yang rtogs par bgyis te rang lo so lnga par son pa'i lcags mo phag gi lo 'ol dga' cha las rnam grol gling gi sgom khang zung 'jug rnam rol tu shar mar spel ba'i yi ge pa ni tshe rabs du mar las kyis 'brel ba'i skal ldan gyi skyes bu rdo rjes gzhis sug bris su spel ba 'di zab mo'i gdams pa 'di dag bag med 'chol bar spyod pa dang man ngag gi gnad ma rig par gya tshoms su zhugs te dug gsum rang ga ma'i spyod pa'i grogs su khyer ba byung na rig pa'i lha mo gdong dmar ma khyod kyis @072a * de'i snying khrag 'thung la tshar gcod cig lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dge bas tshul 'di dag la rjes su zhugs te 'dzin skyong spel ba'i bya ba la brtson pa rnams rtag tu srungs shig skyobs shig ces gdams so sa ma ya rgya rgya rgya</col>
</item>

<tib>rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la mchod gtor 'bul ba'i rim pa dngos grub kyi dbang mdzod ces bya ba</tib>

<col>@017b (ces rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la mchod gtor 'bul ba'i rim pa la lag tu blang bde bar brjod pa 'di ni gnas brtan sdom brtson dam pa blo gros rgya mtshos bskul ba'i ngor chos smra ba dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i dpal gyis @018a * bu ston thams cad mkhyen pa'i yig cha gzhir byas med mi rung rnams kha bkang ste chos 'khor rgyal gyi gtsug lag khang gi bka' gdams pho brang du nye bar sbyar ba 'dis kyang skye 'gro thams cad dbul phongs kyi sdug bsngal las thar par gyur cig  </col>

<tib>n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i sgrub thabs smon lam dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * (ces n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i sgrub thabs rim gnyis kyi man ngag bla brgyud smon lam dang bcas pa cha tshang ba 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes yongs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i mchog grwa ba'i slob dpon dka' chen blo bzang 'jam dbyangs dang nor bu'i dga' ldan pa dga' chen dge legs rgyal mtshan gyis ns bskul ba ltar ^ sh'akya'i dge slong bstan 'dzin ming can gyis sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5008</vol>
<tib>n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i tshogs mchod dang 'brel ba'i tshes bcu mchod pa mkha' spyod grub pa'i myur lam zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@011b (ces pa 'di ni nye 'khor ba drung ram pa blo bzang chos 'phel gyis rgyun par nyams len la sbyor @012a * ba'i phyir bskul ltar lugs 'di'i dbang dang rim gnyis kyi khrid sogs cha tshang ba thob pa pakshe bla ma no min han blo bzang bstan 'dzin kyis dben gnas dga' ldan chos gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni shes bya rig pa'i gnas lnga la rnal 'byor gyi 'jug pa mi dman pa spel khang rje drung 'jam dpal bstan 'dzin gyis 'dis kyang rje rgyal ba gnyis pa'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par byed nuas par gyur cig  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod kyi rim gnyis zab mo'i nyams len beed'ura zhun ma'i them skas zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-61a</p>
<col>@060a * ces rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod kyi rim gniys zab mo'i nyams len beed'ura zhun ma'i them skas 'di yang nam sa'i dbang phyugs 'jam dbyangs gong ma bdag po chen po'i rigs kyi bdag po'i cod pan rgya bod hor sogs @060b ris med pa'i 'gro ba dang bstan pa bstan 'dzin dang bcas pa'i phan bde'i rtsa lag dam pa yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag thams cad mkhyen pa t'a koo shrwi lcang skya mchog sprul rin po che'i bka' las 'di rang re'i rim gnyis kyi lam gyi 'gros dang mthun pa zhig byung na legs 'dug pas bla ma'i gsung bzhin yi ger thob zhig ces dka'i gnang ba spyi bor phebs pa dang deng dus bde mchog gi lam la mos pa byed pa mang zhing de mtshungs 'di mos pa byed mkhan rang phyogs nas kyang mang par snang bas la la'i spyan zur ga-yo ba byung na de dag lang phan bde'i lha bsam gyis rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi khyab bdag 'jam dpal dbyangs dngos bde ba'i rdo rje'i zhabs drung du 'di'i nyams 'khrid lan du mar mnos pa'i snyoms las pa blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis lha ldan sprul pa'i gtsug lag khang gi nye 'dabs su 'god pa'i yi ge'i grogs ldan rab 'byams pa blo gros chos ldan gyis bgyis pa 'dis kyang 'gro kun @061a * mkha' spyod chen pos gp 'phangs thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig  sarba mangga lam bkra shis dpal 'bar gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5008</vol>
<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod kyi sindhu ra'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub cing mchod pa dang bdag nyid 'jug cing dbang blang ba'i cho ga mkha' spyod bsgrub pa'i nye lam bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-14b</p>
<col>@014b (de lta rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod kyi mngon dkyil 'kkhor las dang po la rnams kyis tshes bcu sogs kyi skabs su nye bar mkho ba ngag 'don lag len nag po 'gro shes kyi tshul gyi bkod pa 'di ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi rtsa ba lta bu phag mo zhal gnyis ma'i dkyil chog rje btsun chen pos mdzad pa la gtso bor brten 'phags pa rin po che'i bdag 'jug dang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gsung sgros chos rje sangs rgyas dpal bzang pa'i sgrub dkyil las byung ba ltar rje bla ma'i gsung gis bdud rtsi'i cung zad kyang kha rgyan nas rje btsun rdo rje 'chang rnga rings kun spangs pa chen po'i zhabs kyi padmo spyi bos mchod pa'i rnal 'byor pa blo gsal gyis 'u yug grub pa'i gnas kyi gtsug lag khang du bkod pa 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  yi ge pa ni rje btsun bla ma de nyid kyi bran du gyur ba'i btsun pa mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis bgyis pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5008</vol>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5008</vol>
<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod kyis brgyud 'debs kyi 'dod gsol dang smon lam gyis don 'grel snyan rgyud bdud rtsi'i snying khu bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-10a </p>
<col>@009b (ces pa 'di yang thub bstan rnam par rgyal ba'i dge bshes del bu chos 'khor gnas kyis chos 'chad pa'i slob dpon kun @010a * spangs rab 'byams pa dpal bzang gis na tur chen pos bskul ba la brten nas thub bstan rdo rje brug gis chos smra ba dge slong bya bral ba pad+ma 'phrin las kyis yi ge pa ni dge slong sman mchog gis bgyis pa dza yantu 'di'i lung thob pa'i brgyud pa ni rtsom pa po rmod chen rdo rje 'chang kun dga' lhun grub bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan des bdag bsod nams rbang phyug la'o yang na rtsom pa nas rdo rje gdan pa blo gros dbang phyug 'khor lo sdom pa ngag dbang tshul khrims bzang po des bdag la'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5008</vol>
<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod ma la brten pa'i las bzhi'i sbyin sreg bklags pas don 'grub ces bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col>@007a * (ces pa 'di yang gcig tu chos la thugs rgyud gzhol ba dpal ra chos mdzad ngag dbang 'jam dpal gyis gser gyi me tog dang bcas bskul ba gnang ba'i bzhed pa skong phyir drin can rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab byams pa ngag dbang lhun grub kyi zhabs brdul yun ring du brten pa'i bk'a 'bangs kyi tha chung ngag dbang kun dga' lhun grub kyis bgrangs bzhi bcu phrag bdun dang nyag ma gcig tu slebs pa khro mo'i lo khrum zla ba'i dkar phyogs dge bar dpal ldan smad kyi rang gi bsam gtan khang bur sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni @007b kun dga' dbang phyug gis bgyis pa 'dis kyang tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa phyogs bcu rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig  bikshu kun dga' tshul khrims kyis dpe'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5008</vol>
<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs mchog gi padmo bshad pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces 'phags yul pan grub kun gyis gtsug gi nor bu jo no n'a ro ta pa mngon sum du rjes bzung ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod du grags pa'i bla ma brgyud pa la gsol ba 'debs pa lam gyi rim pa'i smon lam dangn bcas pa mchog gi padmo bzhad pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje btsun mo'i zhabs kyis rings nas bskyangs pa'i rnal 'byor pa blo gsal gyi stong lung pa ra'i gzim khang gis yang thog me mtshams kyi ba gam bzhi bar rakta bzhad pa'i phyogs kyi tshes la sbyar ba dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5008</vol>
<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i bsnyen pa bya tshul dngos grub myur du 'gugs pa'i pho nya zhes bya ba'i dbu phyogs lags so "</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@005b (ces rje btsun n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i bsnyen pa bya tshul gsal bar bkod pa dngos grub myur du 'gugs pa'i pho nya zhes bya ba 'di yang pha bla ma mkhyen rab rdo rje 'chang chen po ^ zhabs rdul yun ring @006a * du bsnyen cing gsung gis bdud rtsis skal ba bzang por gyur ba'i bka' 'bangs kyis tha chung lhun grub kyis rang dang skal ba mnyam pa rnams la phan pa'i phyir du thub bstan rwa ba smad kyis chos grwa sug bris su bgyis pa dge zhing bkra shis par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5008</vol>
<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i chos skor phyogs gcig tu sdebs pa man ngag rin po che'i gter zhes bya ba sngags 'chang gzungs kyi dpal bas bsgrigs pa bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-24a</p>
<col>@023b (rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i chos skor bla ma gong ma rnams kyis thor bur gnas pa las phyogs gcig tu rdogs sla ba'i phyir man ngag rin po che'i gter zhes bya ba 'di mdo khams kyi sa @024a * sa yi cha tsha 'phrad pa rin chen bzang pos yang yang bskul ba'i ngor rig pa 'dzin pa gzungs kyi dpal bzang pos lug gi lo sa ga zla ba'i tshes bcu'i 'i na dpal sa skyar sbyar ba'o dge legs su gyur cig  'dis kyang 'gro ba dpag tu med pa la phan thogs par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5008</vol>
<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga mkha' spyod grub pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12b</p>
<col>@012b (zhes pa'i bka' rtsom ji ltar bar las dang po pa rnams 'jug pa bde zhing cho ga mi 'khrug pa dpe mang du tshol mi dgos par phan khyad kyi lhag bsam dang khyad par gtsang stod smad thang gi lcam yum blo gsal kun dga' chos kyi sgron me mkha' spyod ljags snyan sbyin sreg gnang dus kyi gzigs dper bklag cho ga nag po 'gro shes kho nar bkod pa 'di ni dus gsum rgyal ba'i spyi gzugs rmor chen rdo rje 'chang chen po'i zhabs rdul spyi bos mchod pa'i bka' dbangs lha rigs bzhi'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa slob bshad 'dzin pa ngag dbang kun dga' legs pa'i 'byung gnas kyis mngar bstod grangs chen rdo rje pho brang du sgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni rig pa 'dzin pa rnam rgyal 'gyur med kyis dad brtson sprod pa'i sgo nas legs par grub pa'o sarba dza ga tam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5008</vol>
<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga mkha' spyod sgrub pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba rdo rje 'chang dbang phyur rab brtan gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@005b (de ltar rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sbyin sreg gi yi ge rje sa chen yab sras sogs kyis mdzad pa'i yig rnying dang kun mkhyen go bo rin po ches mdzad pa dang gtso bor rje sangs rgyas dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i yi ge gzhir bzhag der mi gsal ba rnams bde kye'i zhi ba'i sbyin @006a * sreg nas kha 'gengs par gsungs pa bzhin kha bkang bla ma yab sras kyi gsung rgyun dang phyag len gyis rim pa go bder byas don la rang bzo'i dri mas bslad par sbyar ba 'di ni tshul 'di la mos pa'i don gnyer gyis bskul ba'i ngor rgyal khams pa kyi bya bral ba dbang phyug rab brtan gyis yul dbus kyi sa'i sman ljongs rdo rje 'chang tshar ba chos rje'i sras kyi mthu bo rdo rje btsun mo nyid kyis rings nas bskyangs pa'i gnyan ston mchog gi sprul pa'i zlos gar rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa gzhon nu blo gros kyis zhal snga 'debs par mdzad pa'i bkra shis dang dge mtshan du mas phyug pa'i chos sde snyan rgyud zab mo'i chos sgra rgyun mi 'chad par sgrogs pa'i gnas rje btsun de nyid kyi byin gyis rlabs shing gdan chags pa'i gzims chung du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang slob bshad zab mo'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  dge'o</col>

<item>

<p>1a-16b</p>
<col>@016a * (ces rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod du grags pa'i bsnyen sgrub kyi rim pa gsal bar bshad pa gsang chen bcud kyi thig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni bstan pa'i gsal byed dam pa thu'u bkwan sprul sku rin po che ^ blo bzang chos kyi nyi ma dpal bzang pos gser gyi mandal dang bcas yang yang nan tan du bskul ba don yod par bya ba'i phyir du rdo rje 'chang dang mi gnyis pa'i bla ma dam pa du ma'i zhabs la gdugs pa'i bka' drin gyis mdo rgyud mtha' dag go don la rigs pa'i rdo rjes stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba ^ 'jam dbyangs gong ma chen po'i pho brang gi nye 'dabs bka' dang bstan bcos 'gyur ro cog gi tshal dgon gnas bkra shis rab rgyas kyi rang bshag bde chen gan mdzod du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rang gi nye gnas dad brtson rnam dpyod mchog tu yangs shing la ma 'di la mos pa lhur len pa dge slong dge legs nam mkhas bgyis pa @016b 'dis kyang blo bzang rgyal ba spyi dang khyad par gsang chen thig pa'i lam bzang phyogs dus thams cad du rgyas par gyur cig  dpe 'di snod min la shin tu gsang bar bya ba kho na yin pas gar thod du mi ston par thugs la bangn 'tshal dge'o</col>

<item>

<item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5008</vol>
<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs mchod zab don nying khu zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@012b ces pa 'di ni sa dge sogs ris med bstan pa rin po cher mtshungs med chos kyi spyan ldan zhi ba lha sprul pa'i sku 'phags pa dge legs rgyal mtshan nas gsung bris gnang rten bzang po dang bcas rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs mchod kha'u brag rdzong ma'i bzhed srol bzhin la 'bul tshig sogs rgyas pa yod pa zhig dang rdo rje'i glu bod skad du sdebs pa zhig dgos zhes bkas bskul yang rnam ga-yeng le lo'i dbang gis lo zla du mar chams skyur lta bur lus mdo slar @013a * dam pa rnams kyi thugs bzhed rnam dkar la ji snyam du yang mi sems par lus na rang nyid ngan 'gro'i rgyu las ma 'das pas de sogs nyes pa mtha' dag bshags pa'i phyir dus skya pa ngag dbang kun dga' blo gros sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dam pa mang pos mdzad pa'i tshogs mchod yi ge rnams lhan cig tu bkod pa 'dila nyes med snyam yang skyes spyang gi blo gros dman pa'i khar rnam ga-yeng le los bab col mchis na skyabs gnas dam pa rnams kyi bzod par mang nas dge des 'gro kun mkha' spyod bsgrod pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>

<item>

<tib>chos bsrung gi bzlog bsgyur</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * (ces pa 'di ni sa mtha'i gyi na ba zhig gis gang dran cal col shar mar smras pa'i yi ge pa ni dpyod yangs chos kyi sbyan dang ldan pa spobs pa rab myur ye shes blo ldan gyis bgyis pa sarba siddhi dza yantu mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>5013</vol>

<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@006b (ces pa 'di ni pe'i ye 'chi med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i mnga' 'bangs chos la blo mig dbye ba slob dpon pha er khe dar han tho yon blo bzang shes rab zhes bgyi ba rang gi dpe cha rnying pa @007a * shin tu bsdus pa yod pa'i steng bsnan te 'di las cung rgyas nas byed pa bsnyam pa nan tan gyis bskul ba'i ngo srung ba'i ched du byang phyogs bstan pa'i gsal byed dza ya pandi ta blo bzang snyan grags dge legs rnam rgyal dpal bzang po'i slob ma rnams kyis tha shal ba nyon mongs kyi phral du khol blo bzang dpal mgon ming can gyis sug gis bris pa'i yig cha 'di la brten nas bgyid pa kun la phan par gyur cig  bkra shis dpal bar 'dzam gling gyur cig  mangga lam</col>

<item>

<tib>mthun pa bzhi'i rtogs brjod</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5013</vol>
<tib>nor bdag rgyal chen rnam sras kyi bzlog bsgyur ga-yang nyams la dgos pa'i cho ga</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@006a * (ces pa 'di ni snyigs ma'i dus 'dir mi rnams la nor phyugs rnams kyi ga-yang nyams nas god kha dang dbul 'phongs rnams shin tu mang zhing de nyid zhi ba'i phyir du byams pa bshad sgrub nyi mas nan tan chen pos bskul ba'i ngor grub chen dharma rdo rjes bshad pa'i rgyal chen rnam thos sras bzlog bsgyur mdor bsdus bris pa'i dge ba phan yon ji ltar bzhin phyi nang nang gdon thams cad zhi ba dang ga-yang nyams gso ba dang god kha byad kha phur kha 'khor lo bzlog par byed pa la sogs gnod sbyin be'u 'bum nas gsungs pa ltar phan yon che'o sa ma ya dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5013</vol>
<tib>'phags pa gnam sa snang brgyad kyi bzlog bsgyur</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces gnam sa sems pa'i sras chen brgyad kyi bzlog gtor 'di ni dad gus dang ldan pa so'u shri dge slong blo bzang don grub kyi bskul ngor chos smras pa bskal bzang rgya mtsho'i gsungs pa'o)"</col>
</item>

<item>

<p>1a-5b</p>
<col>@005b (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas mo 'dre'i kha bsgyur bya tshul 'di ni pad+ma rdo rjes sug bris so bkra shis)"</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>sdig sgrib kun sel gyi bzlog bsgyur</tib>

<item>

<col>@005a * (ces 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed kyi bka' sdod dam can chos kyi rgyal po bzlog bsgyur rkyen ngan sel byed zhes bya ba 'di ni kha cig gis 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed kyi bzlog bsgyur zer ba de la chos rgyal gyi bzlog bsgyur zhes ming btags nas tshig mi mthun pa gcig byas mang po yod po dang chos rgyal gyi blzog bsgyur yig snying rnyed pa dang snga mo nas don gnyer can 'ga' bsgrub zhing slar yang smon pa blo bzang bkra shis kyis sbyin bdag gi rim gror dgos pa ched zhes bskul ba'i ngo ma mchog par rang dang skal mnyam gzhan la phan pa ae srid snyam pas slob gnyer ma byas pa'i blun po snying khams can chos kyi blo bzang 'phrin las ming can gyis bla ma gong ma rnams kyis gsung rgyun la rten nas sug bris su bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig dge legs 'phel sarba mangga lam</col>

<tib>rta ga-yang 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@005b (ces rta ga-yang 'gugs cho ga 'di ni yul mi rnams ga-yang shin tu nyams nas nyam thag la byams pa'i sems kun nas bslangs te tha shal smyon pa'i spyod yul na su ma ti karma ming can gyis slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi ga-yang khug sogs la gzhi byas nas 'phral du bris pa'o 'di la nor 'khrul byung na mkhas pa rnams la chags so bdag la sgribs la mi 'byung bar mdzod du gsol legs cha cung zad yod na dge ba'i 'gro kun 'bul ba'i sdug bsngal dang 'bral nas myur du dag pa'i zhing khams su skyes pa'i rgyur gyur cig 'di bris dge bas bdag gzhan 'gro ba kun dbul ba'i sdug bngal dang 'bral sangs rgyas shog </col>

<item>

<vol>5015</vol>

<col>@007a * (dngos grub kun 'byung skya rengs dkar po zhes bya ba 'di mched grogs aem che bka' bcu pa dang ngag dbang bstan 'dzin gyis gzhan la phan bsam gyis sog yul 'di gar me lha mchod cing ga-yang blang ba'i bkra shis 'byung 'dug kyang lha bskyed pa mchod pa byin rlabs sogs migs pa'i yig tshig lhad cing gyi lugs 'dzin 'ga' snang mod rang ril bskyed pa'i me mchod zhig byed dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngo ma mchog par sbyin bsregs @007b gi thab bskyed dang slob dpon pad+ma'i mdzad pa'i ga-yang 'gugs chen po'i ga-yang 'gugs byed kyi tshig 'ga' zhig bsdus nas rab 'byams pa ngag dbang bsod nams kyis mdzad pa'i steng du nyer spyod lnga spel tshig dang lug gi brang dang mar khu dang chad mchod bcas 'bul ba sogs ni nom chi ko'u shri chos rje blo bzang dpal mgon ming can gyis sug bris so ) 'di ltar bgyis pa'i nongs pa ci mchis na bla ma lha la bshags shing bzod par gsol legs cha cung zad mchis pas gang thob dgos 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i rgyur gyur cig bkra shis bde legs 'phel bar gyur cig  "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5015</vol>
<tib>'phags pa gtsug tor dkar mo'i bzlog bsgyur mi mthun ga-yul las rnam rgyal zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-8b</p>
<col>@008a * (ces 'phags ma gtsug tor dkar mo'i bzlog bsgyur mi mthun ga-yul las rnam rgyal zhes bya ba 'di ni bla ma dkon mchog gsum la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa dge slong ngag dbang sbyin pas bskul ba'i ngo bsrung ba'i ched du kha bzlog bsgyur cho ga rdo rje mtshon cha 'di rdo rje 'chang dbang snyigs ma'i @008b dus su ngur smrig 'dzin pas zlos gar bsgyur ba rje btsun rdo rje 'chang dza ya pandi ta zhes bya ba mtshan yongs su grags pa re nyid kyi zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos len pa bka' drin gyis cung zad mnos pa byang phyogs sog pa'i yul 'dir 'khyams pa'i phyogs med blo zhi ming can gyis sngon gyi mkhas pas gsung rgyun la rten nas bgyis pas 'dis kyang bdag sogs sems can thams cad kyis mi mthun ga-yul las rnam par rgyal gyur cig  bkra shis par gyur cig</col>

<item>

<vol>5016</vol>

<vol>5017</vol>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5017</vol>
<tib>gsang ba ye shes mkha' 'gro rdo rje sder mo'i bskang bshags bstod bskul dgra bgegs gshed dmar brlag pa'i mtshon cha zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5017</vol>
<tib>lha chen tshangs pa zhi drag gi rjes gnang bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@004b (lha chen tshangs pa zhi drag gi rjes gnang gi rim pa sngon chad ma dar ba 'di phyis su skyabs mgon rdo rje 'chang chen po yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag bdag gi mkhan rin po che rje btsun @005a * blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i zhal snga nas gser gyi bka' lung gi bdag dge slong rdo rje ming can la mo lcog tu lha chen tshangs pa'i drung du lha 'di'i rjes gnang zhu bar gtong ba gnang dus lha chen tshangs pa'i chen po phran bdag la rjes gnang gi rim pa ji ltar mdzad kyi phyag len bzhin du zhes hor bkra shis lhun por yi ger bris pa'o gong smos dge slong rdo rje ming can gyis bgyis pa'o kurbantu sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5017</vol>
<tib>lha mo 'od zer can ma la brten nas bzlog bsgyur bya tshul mi mthun ga-yul las rgyal ba'i mtshon cha zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@012a * (ces rgyal ba kun gyi ye shes las rnam par sprul pa'i lha mo 'od zer can ma la brten nas dgra jag chom rkun lce spyang sogs kyi gnod 'tshe dang mi nad dang phyugs kyi god @012b kha zhi ba'i ched du bzlog bsgyur bya tshul mi mthun ga-yul las rgyal ba'i mtshon cha zhes bya ba 'di ni sa mtha'i blun rmongs kyis rang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir du bsgrigs pa 'dis kyang 'gro kun mi mthun ga-yul las rgyal zhing bkra shis bde legs phun sum tshogs par gyur cig</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5017</vol>
<tib>nor gyi dbang phyug 'phags pa dzambha la ser po gtso rkyang dang gzungs las byung ba'i nor rgyun ma ser mo'i bum sgrub so sor bya tshul 'dod rgu'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@011a * (ces nor gyi dbang phyug 'phags pa dzambha la ser po gtso rkyang dang gzungs las byung ba'i nor rgyun ma ser mo'i bum sgrub so sor bya tshul 'dod rgu'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba 'di ni chos sde chen po dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi pho brang sde pa lugs bzang gzigs pa'i mkhyen pa'i spyan dkyus pad+ma 'dab ltar yangs pa sku zhabs dge slong bstan pa sangs rgyas mchos nas 'di lta bu cha tshang ba zhig dgos zhes gnang rten dang bcas gsung shog gi lam nas snga phyir bskul ma mdzad ngor thams cad mkhyen pa dharma bha dra dpal bzang po'i man ngag gi bdud rtsi snying gi yol gor bsten pa'i ban rgan dbyangs can grub pa'i rdo rjer 'bod pas rang lo re dgur son pa dbang phyug gi lo'i snron zla ba'i dmar phyogs rgyal ba gnyis par gtsang stong ga-yas ru bzhad kyi yul gru'i nang tshan dngul chu ri khrod dga' ldan rtse'i rnam sras gzims chung du bris pa sarba tiksha ya ba pushtantu dge legs 'phel lo</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5017</vol>
<tib>rdo rje sder mo'i gzungs mdo dang 'brel zhing yi dam bsrung ma'i 'phrin las kyi sgo nas phyir bzlog byed tshul phas rgol 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba bzhugs  "</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col>@007a * (ces rdo rje sder mo'i gzungs mdo dang 'brel zhing yi dam bsrung ma'i 'phrin las kyi sgo nas phyir bzlog byed tshul phas rgol 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya 'di ni hal ha ga-yon du phyogs ta'i ching dza sag mgon dkar skyabs kyi bla ma mkhyen pa'i dpyod ldan aa chi thu blo bzang brtson 'grus dang dad ldan aus dzing thas ji 'chi med rnams gnyis kyis bskul zhing lhag par bstan pa'i sbyin bdag mi rje dam pa aer te ni aa has dza sag rnam rgyal rdo rje'i rim gror nyer mkho'i bskul ma bskul zhing 'di 'dra'i lag len yod med mthong thos su ma gyur cing gdugs dkar gzungs mdo'i sgo nas bzlog bsgyur byed tshul yig rnying dang gsar brtsom mang du bzhugs pa de bzhin 'dir yang de'i rigs 'dra sbyor rung @007b ba ma snyams 'on kyang gzungs mdo kho na la brten nas byar rung mi rung the tshom mchis kyang rang gi yi dam chos skyong gi 'phrin las kyi sgo nas gzungs mdo dang bstun pa'i rigs 'dra'i sbyor rung bar sems shing mo bya mkhan gyi lung bstan du 'khrul ba'i don gnyer can mang du mchis kyang lag len rnam dag byed mkhan su yang ma mthong 'jam dpal rdo rje mdzad ces kha ga-yar ba'i rdo rje sder mo'i bzlog bsgyur du grags pa de ni mdos glud kyi ngag 'don la bzlog tshig khung med sna tshogs shig bris 'dug pa mdos gtor gyi rnam dbye mi shes pa'i rang las ma 'das pas gzungs mdo rang gi zhung don dang mthun zhing dpyad bzod pa'i khul du byas te rang gzhan la phan sems kyis kun nas blangs te aa chi thu aer te ni mir ging mkhan po chos rje sngags 'chang dge 'dun sengge ces ming don ya bral gyi na pas sdebs pa'o sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5017</vol>
<tib>rdo rje sems dpa' bla med lugs kyi sgrub thabs dang rje gnang</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (de ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i bla med kyi lugs kyi rjes gnang byed tshul gyi tho yig 'di yang bstan pa'i gsal byed aer ti ni pandi ta no min han aer ti ni mkhan po rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang chos 'phel gyis bskul ba dang nye char yongs su 'dzin pa chen po pandi ta zhabs drung blo bzang rgyal mtshan gyi zhal snga nas kyi gsung gis bskul ba la brten nas ^lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rjes bla ma'i phyag bzhes bzhin sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan zhabs drung bskal bzang bstan 'dzin gyis bgyis pa'o sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<tib>rta mgrin dang lha so so'i rjes gnang gi sa bcad</tib>

<col>@006b (ces rje btsun sgrol ma la brten nas bu'i ga-yang 'gugs bya tshul rin chen lcags kyu zhes bya ba ni dza ha chen gung thogs thu ba dngul gyi mandal kha btags dang bcas pas 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor bu 'dod pa ni bu thob gyur zhing zhes pa gzhung yod pa'i phyir ^ae aal gog sang hu thug thu mer gen con long pandi tas sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aer te ni nom chi tho'i ku shri slob dpon blo bzang rgyal mchog pa'o 'dir kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas pa dang 'gro ba rnams kyis gnas skabs su dgos 'dod grub cing mthar thugs sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang myur du thob par gyur cig  bkra shis par gyur cig </col>

<item>

<vol>5019</vol>
<tib>ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sengge'i gdong ma can gyi gtor tshogs bskang gso bstod pa sogs</tib>

<vol>5020</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rje btsun tsong kha pa chen po nyid kyi rnam par thar pa mdo tsam zhig brjod pa'i sgo nas gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhugs "</tib>

<item>

<col>@003b (ces bstan pa'i gsal byed dza ya pandi ta blo bzang snyan grags dge legs rnam rgyal gyi 'khrungs rabs gsol 'debs brtan bzhugs dang bcas pa 'di ni phyag mdzod pa blo bzang dbang rgyal tshog thu'i ching no yon sbyin pa aer le nang so bstan 'dzin nom che dge bsgos 'jam dbyangs thon ka lag pi lig thu bstan pa tshe ring hor tsha bi lig thu rnams kyis mdzod btags che ba sman rnying yug mdzod gos ser po yug bsod btags lnga bcas bstabs te khal kha do lu'u kho sho'u gi sbyin bdag grwa rigs tsha mig ngag 'don bgyis chog pa 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ngor sh'akya'i dge slong snyoms las pa blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos @004a * pho brang po ta la'i gzims chung nyi 'od 'khyil bar sbyar ba'o</col>

<tib>gsol 'debs thugs rje myur 'jug ma</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (zhes pa ltar gyi rang la lung rtogs kyi yon tan gang yang med bzhin du rang la bstod pa ni mkhas pa rnams khrel ba'i rgyur 'dug kyang rang gi slob ma med ken chos rje aer te ni chos rje gnyis dang aa ri lugs na yo ga tsa ri dad pa dang gtong ba'i rgyan gyis mdzes pa'i aer te ni yel ded hong tha'i ji dang dpon mo no mon dhar tshe dbang rdo rje rnams kyis nged rnams kyis rgyun du kha ton byas chog pa'i chog pa'i gsol 'debs zhig cis kyang dgos zhes nan tan chen pos bskul ba'i ngo ma chog par byin rlabs kyi khyad kyis tshigs bcad dang po dang mjug gi sho lo ka gsum rgyal dbang mchog gis mdzad pa rnams bcug cing gzhan sho lo ka bcu bdun gsar rtsom gyi tshul du tshig sbyor spangs te go bde bar rab 'byams smra ba sku skye blo bzang 'phrin las ming gzhan rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa chen po'i bka' lung gis dza ya pandi ta khu thug thu zhes 'bod pas dza sbyor gcig gi yun la sbyar ba'i dge bas bdag gzhan sems can thams cad myur du sangs rgyas thob par gyur cig  dge'o</col>

<item>

<vol>5020</vol>
<tib>rje btsun t'a ra n'a tha'i 'khrungs rabs gsol 'debs smon lam dang bcas pa</tib>

<col>@006b (ces rje btsun t'a ra n'a tha'i 'khrungs rabs gsol 'debs smon lam dang bcas pa 'di ni rang gi slob ma rigs dang chos kyi spun bu bkra shis chos 'phel gyi snga mo nas bskul ba dang nye lam bde thang ba aer te ni mer gen khu thug thu blo bzang tshul khrims rnam rgyal bas mos gus kyi gsol 'debs 'di lta bu zhig dgos ces nan cher bgyis pa'i rkyen gyis dam pa de rnams kyi mtshan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i snyoms las kyi rnal 'byor pa blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan rang byung gi ming dzny'a na badzra zhes bya bas rje btsun t'a ra n'a tha'i rang nyid kyi gsang ba'i rnam thar du ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin tshig dam du bcad pas bkod cing thog ma'i tshigs bcad dang 'bar ba'i gtso bo nas smon lam sho lo ka'i bar byin rlabs che ba'i khyad par gyis rje btsun bla ma blo bzang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gsung rtsom gzhir bzhag pas dbus brgyan te bgyis pa'i yi ge pa ni sku skyes ngag dbang bstan 'dzin gyis bgyis pa dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<col>@002b (ces pa 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa legs pa rgyal mtshan gyis nan cher bskul ba la brten nas blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis shangs mdo rgod tshang gi ri khrod du sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5020</vol>
<tib>ston pa dus kyi 'khor lo rje rin po che sogs bla ma rnams la gsol ba 'debs shing 'dod bya'i don la smon pa dgos 'dod kun 'byung dngos grub dpal ster ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5b</p>
<col>@004b (dus kyi 'khor lo rje rin po che @005a * sogs bla ma rnams la gsol ba 'debs shing 'dod bya'i don la smon pa dgos 'dod kun 'byung dngos grub dpal ster ces bya ba 'di ni 'o yug 'o bran dpal gyi dbang phyug gi gdung rus khal kha rje btsun dam pa'i gsol dpon t'a bla ma aa chi thu dar han thon blo bzang dkon mchog nas ston pa dus kyi 'khor lo rje rin po che rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa yab sras skyabs mgon rje btsun dam pa lcang skya rin po che rgyal sras rdo rje 'chang chen po snyoms las pa ded sogs bla ma rnams la gsol ba 'debs shing ^rgyal sras rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bka' drin dran pa'i gso ba 'debs zhabs brtan rjes 'dzin smon lam dang 'brel ba dang gzhan yang lam thun mongs pa dang thun mongs ma yin la ^dus kyi 'khor lo'i rim gnyis kyi gsol 'debs 'brel ldan rnams tshe 'dir chos mthun tshe dpal rgyas shing phyi ma shambha la yi zhing du skye ba khyad par rigs ldan drag po'i 'khor lo can gyi 'khor gyi thog mar skyes te rang gzhan gyi don lhun gyi 'grub pa dang sangs rgyas bstan pa dar zhing rgyas pa sogs gong smos don tshang ba'i @005b 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes rgyal sras rdo rje 'chang chen pos ljags rtsom bskul ma zhus par der rtsam na legs pa'i bka' phebs tshul dad bcas pa mandal dang lha rdzas dri bral gyi rten dang bcas 'phrin yig gi lam nas bskul ma mdzad pa ltar bka' drin gsum ldan rgyal sras rdo rje 'chang chen po sogs dam pa rnams kyi zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa'i ^sh'akya'i dge slong snyoms las pa blo bzang chos kyi dbang gis rang gi bsam gtan gyi bsti gnas dge 'phel byang chub gling du smon lam mtshams sbyor bzang pos bris pa dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5020</vol>

<tib>` rje btsun rnam par rgyal ma'i rgyud 'debs su chod phrong smon lam dang bcas pa</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5025</vol>
<tib>dgra lha'i bskang gso dkar po rgyal byed</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * (ces dgra lha'i bskang gso dkar po rgyal gyed ces bya ba 'di ni rang gi mched grogs rdo rje zhes pa'i 'di lta bu zhig gyis zhes yang na yod pa'i yig cha bskang gso ma mthong bas gu ru'i gter ma dgr lha dbang bstod gzhi byas nas bkod pa'i 'di ni sngags 'chang smon lam lhun grub kyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rig gnas skar rtsi ba'i sogs mang la mkhas pa'i rnam dpyod can blo bzang dbang phyug go</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5027</vol>
<tib>rje btsun sgrol ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sprul gzhi seng ldeng nags sgrol la brten pa'i myung bar gnas pa'i cho ga bya tshul</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (ces 'di'i dge slong ngag dbang rgya mtshos bskul ba'i ngor ^sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan bstan pa'i nyin phyogs las ram rgyal dpal bzang pos bkra shis chu skyed tshal du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni nye 'khor ba gsol dpon rjes drung blo bzang dpal 'byor ro 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs kun tu 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig bkra shis par gyur cig dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5027</vol>
<tib>rje btsun sgrol ma tshogs 'khor 'bul tshul</tib>

<tib>no title [@024b swa sti rab 'byams lha yi lam kun yongs gang ba'i 'phags mchog thugs rje chen po'i lha yi tshogs me tog char 'bebs bkra shis gdangs snyan sgrog mtha' dag bgegs dpung 'joms pa'i 'phrin las kyis ]"</tib>
<p>24b-25a</p>

<p>1a-28b</p>
<col>@028b (ces dpal ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sengge'i gdong pa can gtso 'khor gsum gyis bdag mdun bskang bshags bstod bskul bsgral las gtor bzlog dang bcas pa'i rnam bzhag mkha' 'gro'i dgongs rgyan zhes bya ba 'di ni snga sor gzhung lugs du ma la sgrobs pa mchog tu dge ba rab 'byams smra ba ngag dbang shes rab kyis bskul te har chen thu med kyis char gsar rtsom gyis pa zhig long kyang der bsgral las kyi rim pa ma tshang brten phyis su mdzod dge ston nas don gnyer ba 'ga' zhig gis cha tshang dgos zhes bskul ngor snga ma la bsgyur 'gong 'phran bu dang la sbyor dbye ba'i skor yang kha bskang ste btsun pa dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang pos ga-yar khral du sbyar ba dge bar gyur cig bkra shis par gyur cig mangga lam dge'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5030</vol>
<tib>` ngo mtshar rmad du 'byung ba'i shug glu shin tu gsang ba'i mgur dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5031</vol>

<col>@006b (zhes pa 'di ni dras chen wang gi rab 'phel tas ching gi mnga' 'bangs blo gros rig pa shes rab mdze par gyur ba'i pi leg thu tho yon ye shes dkon mchog ces bya ba 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes yang yang nan tan chen pos bskul ba'i ngo ma ldog par byang phyogs bstan pa'i gsal byed dza ya pandi ta mtshan gzhan blo bzang snyan grags dge legs rnam rgyal bzang po'i slob ma blo bzang dpal mgon ming can gyis bris pa'i dge ba 'di yis rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa rin po che'i dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig bkra shis par gyur cig</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5031</vol>
<tib>chos skyong chen po hang ka'i la gsol mchod bya tshul re bskong bum bzang bzhugs so  * chos skyong chen po hangka'i rgyal po'i gsol mchod kyi mchod gtor sogs bzo tshul mthong brgyud ltar dang 'don cha'i go rim kha bskong dang bcas rags tsam bzhugs so  * chos skyong chen po hang kha'i la gsol mchod bya tshul re bskong bum bzang ni"</tib>

<item>

<vol>5031</vol>
<tib>chos skyong chen po hang ka'i rgyal po 'khor lo bcas kyi gsol mchod dgos 'dod kun 'byung dpag bsam 'khri shing zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-14b</p>
<col>@014b (zhes pa de yang chos skyong chen po dgra lha hangk'a rgyal po 'khor bcas la mchod gtor 'bul ba'i rim pa dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i mnga' bral dpag bsam 'khri shing zhes bya ba 'di ni gu ru s'a m'a d'a rje btsun rnal 'byor ma de nyid kyi 'khor mtha' gtam nas dben pa'i bka' drin chen lci ba'i drin chen gyis kho bo cig gzigs snang la snga mo nas chos skyong chen po 'khor bcas kyis yang dang yang du gsal le bar 'byung te thub bstan rin po che dang khyad par khyod bstan pa'i bsrung ma'i ded tsho de par rang yin zhes bka' spyi bor 'bebs pa dang bla ma rje btsun mas khyod kyis de nyid kyi rim pa rnams 'di bzhin du bris shig ces bka' zlog tu med pa yang dag par 'phebs pa la brten nas rig 'dzin ho dzwa badzras yig rnying gang la'ang ma stos par rang rkang 'dzugs te rang bzos pa bslad par rje btsun ma'i drin gyis sbyar ba'o bkra shis 'bar gyur cig</col>

<tib>` gshin rje'i gshed kyi sgo nas chos rgyal gyi bzlog bsgyur byed pa'i tshul</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@010b (ces pa 'di ni gshegs rjes ngan sngags le'u gnyis pa'i bzlog bsgyur byed pa'i lugs shin tu dka' ba'i phyir cung zad rgyas par bgyis dgos zhes jang jung chen po ching khang gi tshogs chen gyi bla ma blo rigs yon tan ldan pa pi leg thu chos rje don grub rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba nan tan chen po'i gsung gis bskul ba'i ngo khral du skyabs gnas dam pa dza ya pandi ta blo bzang snyan grags dge legs rnam rgyal dpal bzang po'i slob ma rnams kyi tha shal ba blo bzang dpal mgon ming can gyis bgyis nyes pa'i tshogs ci mchis pa rnams bla ma yi dam lha dang chos rgyal @011a * yab yum 'khor bzhi bcas pa bzod cing yangs par mdzad du gsol ngo tsha khrel yod 'jigs rtog med pa'i sems kyi 'bras bu rang gzhan la phan bde 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur cig dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5037</vol>
<tib>bum gter bzhugs pa'i tshul ni "</tib>
<p>3b-10b</p>
<col>@010b (bum gter bzhugs pa'i tshul 'di na dam pa gong ma rnams kyi yig chas dgongs pa dang mthun par btsan gzugs can snyoms las pa ngag dbang chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bgyi bas gzhan la phan 'dod kyi bsam pa'i 'khyer bde gsar sgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba ngag dbang dar rgyas so sbyin pa'i bdag po phun sum tshogs tshe ring nad med bde skyid 'gyur bkra shis 'bar gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5037</vol>
<tib>bum gter cho ga bzhugs "</tib>
<p>14a-20b</p>
<col>@020b yang gsang bla med kyi las mtha' nor gyi rim pa bca' lugs rig 'dzin ratna'i mtshan can gyis bgyis pa skye 'gro kun tu dge bar gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>

</item>

<tib>chos skyong lcam sring gi mdo glud 'bul ba bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@008b (chos skyong lcam sring 'khor bcas la mdos glud 'bul tshul 'di ni byang phyogs bstan pa'i gsal byed dza ya pandi ta'i sku gzhig grwa tshang phan bde gsang sngags gling gi bstan srid kyi blo rigs dang ldan pa'i dim che air te ni tsas san bskal bzang dge legs jang jong ching wang gi mnga' 'bangs gso rtsis kyi blo rigs pas rgyan pa'i dim che blo bzang ngag dbang zhes bya ba gnyis ka nan tan chen pos 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngo khral du byang phyogs bstan pa'i gsal byed dza ya pandi ta'i mtshan @009a * gzhan blo bzang snyan grags dge legs rnam rgyal dpal bzang po'i slob ma'i tha shal nyon mongs bran du gyur ba blo bzang dpal mgon zhes bya bas sbyar 'di yis gnas skabs mthar thug gi 'gal rkyen bar gcod kun sel zhing rgyal ba'i go 'phang thob pa'i rgyu ru bsngo mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib># rta ga-yang 'gugs cho ga zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@008a * (ces rta ga-yang 'gugs cho ga 'di ni yul mi rnams rta'i ga-yang shin tu nyams nas nyam thag pa la byams pa'i sems kun nas slangs ste tha shal smyon pa'i spyod yul na su ma ti karma ming can gyi slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis ga-yang khug sogs la gzhi byas @008b nas 'phral du bris pa'o 'di la nor 'khrul byung na mkhas pa rnams la chags so bdag la sgrib pa mi 'byung bar mdzad du gsol legs cha cung zad yod na dge bas 'gro kun dbul pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral nas myur du dag pa'i zhing khams su skyes pa'i rgyur gyur cig bkra shis</col>

<tib>dam can gyi ga-yang 'bod</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@004b (ces pa 'di ni dad brtson ldan pa rgyud pa'i spyi gnyer 'jam dbyangs don grub kyis spyi khang nas bsangs mchod kyi skabs de dang 'brel ba'i ga-yang 'bod byed @005a * tshul zhig dgos zhes zer yang grong gi ga-yang 'bod dang mi 'dra bar grwa tshang gi gzhung don gtso bo yin stabs brjod don yang de'i dbang du byas te ^btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes bris pa'o sarba mangga lam dge'o</col>

<item>

<tib>satstsha 'debs pa'i gsal byed legs tshogs lhun grub bzhugs "</tib>

<item>

<vol>5049</vol>
<tib>sgrol ma 'chi bslu ni "</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col>@003a * (zhes rje btsun sgrol ma mngon @003b rtog 'di pi chi yi dge mdun rgya mtshos bskul ba'i ngor pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po gsung ji lta ba bzhin du lha 'di'i gnang dang lung rnam par dan pa thob pa'i ^dge slong blo bzang ming chang bas sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni drung yig pa blo bzang rnam rgyal lo mangga lam</col>

<item>

<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@010b (ces rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol mar thugs rje bskul ba'i cho ga brjod bya'i @011a * don ma lus par tshang zhing mdor bsdus tshogs 'don du byas chog pa zhig dgos zhes rdo rje slob dpon rab 'byams pa tshul khrims 'od zer byang 'dren rab 'byams pa byams pa rgya mtsho dge bskos rab 'byams pa thub bstan phyogs glang bcas nas bskul ma byung ba ltar dam pa gong ma rnams kyi phyag srol nyams pa med par rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gyi tshul du rgyal sras bskal bzang thub bstan 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis kun la phan pa'i bsam pas dang du blangs te bris pa'i yi ge pa ni rab brtan ming can gyis bgyis pa'o bkra shis dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5049</vol>
<tib>sgrol ma'i mandal bzhi pa'i sgo nas dge mtshan phywa ga-yang spel ba'i cho ga bya tshul dus ngan 'tsho ba'i lag cha zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11b</p>

<col>@007b (zhes pa 'di ni 'bras yul skyil tshal @008a * mkhan zur sum pa pandi ta ye shes dang la 'byor ba'i legs bshad sher snying gi sgrub thabs las sbyor dang bcas pa mun sel sgron me zhes bya ba las khol du phyung ba yin zhing mnga' ris pa zla rgyal gyi slob ma zhang dbu dkar ba'i phyag srol ltar gyi 'di'i bdud bzlog gi cho ga rgyas pa zhib ^pan chen dpal ldan ye shes kyi slob ma bkra shis lhun bka' chen zhig gis mdzad pa zhig kyang snang mod kyang 'di ni 'byor dman la'ang bya sla tshegs chung don che ba'i legs bshad snang la gong gi mgron gzugs bzo tshul ni nyer mkho zur gsal rin chen sgron bu las btus zer ba zhig las byung ba ltar bkod pa ste de gang gi mdzad ma 'chal kyang de'i nang du gdon bgegs so so'i byed pa bshad tshul sogs ni gzhung chen mo rnams dang de tsam mi 'gal zhing lhag du der 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi zhes pa rgyal chen bzhi la byed pa ma'i zad cing dga' rab dbang phyug gi 'khor gtso 'gro ba la 'grab ga-yeng 'du shes log pa lhag par chags pa byed pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi la ngos bzung dgos tshul smos pa mun sel sgron me nyid dang shin tu mthun tshabs che bar yod pa la dpags na de ma pan chen rang gis mdzad pa'am yang na de'i gsung rgyun ltar bkod pa'i gzhung zhig yin shas che lham ste re zhig de la tshad mar byas pa lags so sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5053</vol>
<tib>sna tshogs yum gyi mandal bzhi pa dang 'brum nad sogs rims nad zhi zhing yang pa'i phyir sna tshogs yum gyi bsgom mchod bzlas gdung sem chu 'dzin zhes bya ba</tib>

<tib>rgya gar yul gyi rnga sgra'i rgyal po de la sras 'jig rten dbang phyug bya ba des gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po la zhu len las jo bo thugs rje chen po'i dar lcog gi phan yon zhus don mdor bsdus</tib>
<p>1a-13b</p>
<col>@013b (ces pa'i gzungs dang smon lam rnams: cher mang 'bris nas ri rab rtse chu lung 'dus pa dang: mgron khang ka ni chong dus bzhi bzhi mdo sogs: de ru dar cog gtsug pa ni: rlung dang gril las bskyod tshad rnams: nga kheg par the tshom med: de nas rdo dkar rdo nag po'i rigs byed la: tshal gyi yi ge bcu la smon lam ces par bris: la chu brgya yi lan gsum gsol: rdo 'di cha mgo chu zhab dang : chu chen kun la skyal bar bya'o: chu 'thung sems can ma lus pa: thugs rje chen po'i zhing khams thob par gyur ro: bsnyen bsgrub ma thar phyin par rnal 'byor 'phrin las la sbyar bar bgyi'o: zhes gsungs so: sarba mangga lam dge'o</col>

<item>

<p>1a-16a</p>
<col>@015b (ces rje btsun sgrol ma la mandal bzhi mchod kyi sgo nas gsol ba gdab tshul gyi cho ga gsal bar bkod pa 'dod don kun 'grub ces bya ba 'di ni rang gzhan gyi don du sgrol cho ga yang yang lag tu bstar skabs cho ga sgrigs 'khyer bde ba zhig dgos tshul @016a * byung bar brten mchims kyi rtsa tshig gzhir bzhags snar thang ba'i man ngag brgya rtsa dam 'dus pa ri bga' gdams gong ba'i yi ge rnying khungs mthus gzhan 'ga' zhig las kyang lag len gyi zhib cha cung zad blangs shing dam pa so sos mdzad pa'i cho ga sgrigs du ma la yang gzhi las rna 'jug bde bklags chog pa'i tshul du mkhas shing grub pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin kho nas 'tsho ba'i rgyal khams pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes dpal ri'i dgon gyi nye 'ang las kyi dben gnas su rgyal zla ba'i tshes brgyad gyi nyin sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge bsgos dge slong d'i rgy'a yu badzra gyis bgys pa'o 'dis kyang bstan [???] phan thogs par gyur cig dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>

<vol>5058</vol>
<tib>shes rab snying po'i sgo nas bdud bzlog dang glud rdzong bya tshul</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@014a * (zhes pa 'di ni 'bras yul skyil tshal mkhan zur sum pa pandi ta ye shes dang la 'byor ba'i legs bshad sher snying gi sgrub thabs las sbyor dang bcas pa mun sel sgron me zhes bya ba las khol du phyung ba yin zhing mnga' ris pa zla rgyal slob ma zhang dbu dkar pa'i phyag srol ltar gyi 'di'i bdud bzlog gi cho ga rgyas pa zhig ^pan chen dpal ldan ye shes kyi slob ma bkras lhun bka' chen zhig gis mdzad pa zhig kyang snang mod kyang 'di ni 'byor dman la'ang @014b bya sla tshogs chung don che ba'i legs bshad du snang la gong gi mgron gzugs bzo tshul ni nyer mkho zur gsang rin chen sgron bu las btus zer ba zhig las byung ba ltar bkod pa ste de gang gis mdzad ma 'chal kyang de'i nang du gdon bgegs so so'i byed pa bshad tshul sogs ni gzhung chen mo rnams dang de tsam mi 'gal zhing lhag du der 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi zhes pa rgyal chen bzhe la byed pa mi 'thad cing dga' rab dbang phyug gi 'khor gtso 'gro ba la 'thab ga-yeng 'du shes log pa lhag par chags pa byed pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi la ngos bzung dgos tshul smos pa mun sel sgron me nyid dang shin tu mthun tshabs che bar yod pa la dpags na @015a * de ma pan chen rang gis mdzad pa'am yang na de'i gsung rgyun ltar bkod pa'i gzhung zhig yin shas che snyas ste re zhig de la tshad mar byas pa lags so sarba mangga lam</col>

<tib>mkha' 'gro'i sgo nas srog glud dang 'brel ba'i 'chi bslu tshe srog rdo rje'i go cha zhes bya ba</tib>

<tib>chos skyong chen po dregs pa lcam sring la brten nas gtor sgrub bya tshul 'phrin las lhun grub zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-52a</p>
<col>@050a * (ces chos skyong chen po dregs pa lcam sring la brten nas zhi rgyas dbang gsum gyi gtor sgrub bya tshul 'don sgrigs dang bcas pa gsal bar bkod pa 'phrin las lhun grub zhes bya ba 'di yang dad brtson rnam dpyod @050b logs rnam mang yon tan gyis rgyud phyugs ci rigs rus phun sum tshogs pa'i aem che thos 'in dge slong tshe ring rdo rje nas lha rdzas dang khyad tshar dngos cha bcas gsung ba'i ngo ldog ma nus par ^pan chen bstan pa'i mnga' bdag skyabs mgon rdo rje 'chang ^pan chen thams cad mkhyen gzigs chen po rje btsun blo bzang dpal ldan bstan pa'i nyi ma phyogs las rnam rgyal dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i chos skyong 'di nyid kyi gtor sgrub bya tshul dang de'i nang bzhin rang gi rtsa ba'i bla ma mkhas grub chen po dpal mang rin po che rje dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i gtor sgrub 'don grigs dang bcas pa la gzhi byas nas der mi gsal ba 'ga' zhig ni rje @051a * gung thang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'i lcam sring bsnyen bsgrub las las bzhi lhun grub dang rwa sgreng no min han gyi mgon po'i gtor grub ji ltar bya tshul dngos grub 'dab stong 'dzum pa'i pad dkar dang rang gi rtsa ba'i bla ma mkhan chen rdo rje 'chang rje ngag dbang mkhas grub kyi chos rgyal nang sgrub kyi gtor sgrub don yod 'phrul gyi zhags pa dang bstan pa'i gsal byed lcam lung pandi ta'i lha mo'i gtor sgrub dngos grub gangg'a'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba rnams la zhi ba du blta rtog byas shing gcig la gsal kha ma byung @051b ba rnams gcig shos las kha bskong ste gangs can bstan 'gro'i gtsug nor ^skyabs mgon rgyal dbang yab sras dang byang phyogs 'gro 'dren lha skal rje btsun dam pa mchog gi sku 'phreng snga phyi gnyis zhwa ser bstan pa'i mnga' bdag khri chen rdo rje 'chang rnams gnyis sogs mtha' dbus kyi mkhas grub dam pa du ma'i zhabs dul nye bar bsten pa'i btsun gzugs kyi na ba @052a * 'bras rams pa'i char gtogs ngag gi dbang po zhes bya ba khu re chen mo'i bsti gnas dga' ldan theg chen gling gi rang shug du bsgrigs pa 'dis kyang bstan 'gro yongs la phan thogs par gyur cig sarba dza ga tam bkra shis par gyur cig</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5091</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub bka' sdod dang bcas pa mchod cing bskang bshags bzlog pa bya ba'i chog dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-32a</p>
<col>@031b (ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mchog rol pa'i gsang sgrub bka' sdod dang bcas pa mchod cing bskang bshags bzlog pa bya'i cho ga dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i bka' srol dri ma med las nye bar 'ong ba'i yi dam bsrung ma'i @032a * mchod cho ga rnams kyis 'gros dang bstun te ^ dharma badzra gyis rang bzhin la phan pa'i bsam pas dge byed zhes pa chu pho stag gi lo sgrub pa'i gnas mchog de ni chen po'i chos gling sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson dang ldan pa bha kshu su ma ti aananta bgyis pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5091</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi chos skor las rang gzhan la dge mtshan spel ba'i cho ga dge legs rgya mtsho char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-25a</p>
<col>@025a * (ces bcom ldan 'das dpal khro bo rgyal po rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyis rnal 'byor pa bdag gi rang dang sbyin pa'i bdag po la sogs pa brka shis dge mtshan spel ba'i cho ga dge legs rgya mtsho char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni tshul 'di lta bu nye bar mkho ba'i bskabs dum zhig mthong zhing lha de nyid chos skor yongs su rdzogs grub pa'i mtha' brgyan par bya ba'i mched du ku s'a li ^ dharma badzra gyis mdzes pa byed lo sa ga zla ba'i tshes bzang por skyid tshal yid dga' chos 'phel du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aor du su dge slong blo bzang kun dga' bgyis pa 'jig rten na nyi zla ltar gyur cig  ) dge'o legs so mangga lam bkra shis par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5091</vol>

<col>@034a * (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi mnga' gsol lha rgyal snyan pa'i rnga bsang zhes bya ba 'di ni zhwa dmar sngags la pa gu ru bkra shis kyis lo du mar yang yang nan gyis bskul lo ngor ^ dharma badzra gyis yi ge pa ni rigs smra ba'i dka' bcu dkon mchog nyi ma'o dge'o legs so bkra shis pa dang dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>5091</vol>
<tib>` rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi smon lam theg chen lam gyi gzhon pa zhes bya ba dang shis brjod ga-yas 'khyil dung gi rang sgra zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>34b-37a</p>
<col>@037a * (smras pa theg chen lam du bzhugs pa'i bskal ldan rnams rig 'dzin grong du bde legs bgrod 'dod na yang dag smon pa'i khyung mchog 'di zhon ces ^ chos kyi rdo rjes smras pa dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>5092</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa'i sgo nas rus chog sogs byed tshul sdig sgrib rnam sbyongs dag byed bdud rtsi zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col>@007a * (ces dang gzhan @007b gyi sgra dang so dang len mo dang tshe 'das kyi rus pa sogs la sbyangs pa byas te sdig sgrib sbyong tshul gyi cho ga dang lag len bya tshul gsal bar bkod pa dag byed bdud rtsi'i zhes bya ba 'di ni na bza' chos kyi rgyal po dang ma hi pan chen sogs kyis yig cha lag gzhi bya te sbrang btsun snyom las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis don gnyer can du mas bskul ba'i ngor rang gzhan phan 'dod kyi bsam pas rgyal khab chen po pe'i cing gi byams chen chos rje'i lha khang du grags par sug bris bgyi ba'i dge ba'i sems can thams cad sgrib gnyis sbyang tshogs gnyis rdzogs te myur du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig  dge'o mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@023a * (ces pa 'di yang sh'akya'i btsun pa grags pa bshad sgrub ces bya bas re gnyis la phan 'dod ki bsam pas co ne'i dgon nyid du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni t'a yi la lung blo bzang don grub po mangga lam bkra shis</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5092</vol>
<tib>chos skyong dregs pa lcam sring gis zhi ba'i rgyas dbang gis drag po 'phrin las bcol lo'i zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5093</vol>
<tib>no title [@001b hr'i rang bzhin lhun grub chos dbyings ngang nyid nas spyan ras gzigs dbang spyan chab las 'khrungs pa'i rnam dag gangs ri'i mdangs ldan dza lha mgon]"</tib>
<p>1b-3a</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5105</vol>
<tib>slob dpon chen po pad+ma k'a ra'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i 'bum bsangs beed'urya'i sngon mo bkra shis 'dod pa'i re skong ma  zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-38a</p>
<col>@035b (ces 'bum bsangs beed'urya'i sngon mo @036a * bkra shis 'dod pa'i re skongs 'di ni rje khri srong lde'u btsan rgyal po'i skabs su slob dpon chen pad+ma k'a ra'i zhabs kyis dpal bsam yas kyi gtsug lag khang bzhengs pa'i tshe lha srin lde brgyad la sogs pa nag phyogs pa rnams kyi 'dul ba'i ched du mdzad pa de'i rjes su gangs can bod kyi sa la nad rims dang dal yams sad ser btsa' mu ge than pa la sogs pa byung ba'i dus su de dag thams kyi zhi bar byed pa'i thabs 'di shin tu mchog go zer sngags 'chang pad dkar 'dzin pas gong bzhin mdzad pa de'i rjes su snyigs ma lnga bdo'i dus su lha 'dre mi gsum 'khon 'dzin 'thab rtsod kyis sa phyogs yul khams thams cad la char chu @036b dus su mi 'bab pa dang lo phyogs ma legs pa dang rtsa shing chu gsum 'dzom med pa dang nad dang rims tshad la sogs pa ltas ngan pa mtshan ma gyur ba la btsun pa 'jam dbyangs dga' ba'i blo gros kyi lar klungs kyi stod la 'di dag gis zhi bar byed pa'i thabs 'di mchog go snyam pa'i lhan thabs su mdzad pa'i cho ga bzhin du phyogs phyogs su 'bum bsangs 'di btang ma thag tu bkra shis pa'i dge ltas mang du byung ba la mi la sogs pa 'gro ba rnams kyi dbul phongs kyi sdug bsngal sel ba dang phan pa rgya chen po'i bde skyid ldan tshe srog dbang thang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ro smras pa 'jam dbyangs mgrin 'khyud mkhas pa'i dbang @037a * brtse chen phyag na bad dkar tshul mthu stobs gsang bdag nus pa yis rigs gsum kun 'dus drin can rje mtshungs med slob bzang grags pa la 'bral med rtag tu spyi bos mchod bskal bar bsdus pa dge chung zad tshe 'di'i rnam par ma 'bad na tshe rabs grangs pa'i lan chags ni nag phyogs gdon bgegs 'byung po rnams lha srin sde brgyad 'tshe ba las skyabs gcig bla ma yi dam lha dkon mchog rin chen rnam gsum nges khyad par myur du brts don grub bstan bsrung chos skyong 'khor tshogs yin mi phyed dad pa'i mos @037b gus bya phun tshogs dus bzang zla re la yar ngo'i nyin 'phrod gza' skar dag lha yi 'bum bsangs 'di dag gi rgyun du byas par phan yon ni nad dang gdon rnams thams cad dag rims tshad dal yams med pa yi dgra dang chom rkun ci spyang sogs stobs kyis 'phrog rnams bzlog par 'gyur tshe ring nad med bde skyid ldan chos srid rgyun du 'grub pa dang nor dang longs spyod 'phel ba yin bkra shis dge mtshan rgyas par 'gyur spel mi bar gyi sbyin bdag ni bya rigs dbang phyug gis thub bstan lang tsho bdo pa'i thang chos grwa dbyangs chen dag tu sgrub yi ge'i rig byed la mkhas pa sgra @038a * rigs dbang phyugs grags pas bris brkos mkhan rnam dpyod rgyas pa ni sum pa bstan 'dzin zhes bya bas sor mos zlos gar bsgyur las sgrub dge 'dis 'jig rten khams kun tu phan bde'i lo bdab rgyas pa dang bdag dang mkha' mnyam sems can gyi mi mthun phyogs rnams rgyal gyur cig  (aom swa sti phan bde'i 'byung gnas rgyal bstan yongs 'du'i ljon rab rgyas 'gro kun thar mchog 'bras bzang la spyod phyir sgrol ma'i gandho'i la ru zhugs chos sbyin mdzad med dpal 'gro'i rgyun 'di spel sarba dza ga tam</col>

<tib>gto nag mgo gsum ma</tib>

<col>@018b (gto nag mgo gsum gyi bcos thabs 'jig pa ni sla nga nang du khru gang tsam gyis mi nag gcig byas ste dbus su mgo ni glang gi mgo ga-yas su rna ba'i 'og tu stag gi mgo ga-yon gyi rna ba'i 'og tu phag gi mgo mgo gsum gyi lce dang mche gtsigs 'jigs gzugs bya ste lag ga-yas su ral gri bsnams dang rkang ba ga-yon pa'i ster mo lcags kyis byed de'i mtha' sgor du lo skor bcu gniys la gtor ma bcu gnyis dan gsme ba dgu la gtor ma dgu chang bu dgu gtor ma dgu mdung pa dgu ral gri dgu dgra sta dgu shing stag pa gdogn mo gdong byas pho phrag ga-yas su dang mo ga-yon la bzhag nam mkha' @019a * lding gi 'dab chags byas dgu dang sa la spyod 'gro ba dgu rdzas sna dgu sbyin pa'i bdag po lo grangs chang bu srog lus dbang thang nye ba 'dir la gtong na ba shi pa dur zhugs dang bdun zur dab smras ltas ngan pa dang dus mi yin nang 'chi ba dang bag ma gtong ba'i nyin nor ba dang shi ba'i yams rims nad dang ngan pa kun la byas na bzang ngo bkra shis par gyur cig </col>

<col>@012b (zhes lo glud du grags pa'i lo du dmigs nas 'jigs rten pa'i sde brgyad chen po spyi la dmigs nas mchod tshul 'di ni ga-yo sa'i sngags 'chang @013a * tshe dbang rab brtan sogs gzhan 'ga' zhig gis bskul ba'i ngor sh'akya'i btsun pa bshad sgrub ming can gyis dpe snga ma gsum tsam mthong yang ma 'brel ba dang ma tshang ba che 'dug pas dpal mgon 'di dag mdo sngags kyi phyogs gnyis ka nas 'byung zhing grags che bar ma zad gzhan ban bon rnams kyis kyang bkur zhing mchod 'dug pas khyad che bar bsags nas tso ni'i dgon nyid du sbyar ba ste par gyi yi ge pa ni t'a yi la lung blo bzang don grub pa'o bkra shis par gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5111</vol>
<tib>mkhas grub 'byung po'i lug myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po'i sgo nas gtang rul bya tshul lag len dang bcas pa</tib>

<col>@003b (skam la 'dugs dus mtsho zhes pa rnams la sprags 'di la zhes ltar gyur gnyer gtad 'di thams cad mkhyen pa ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtshos mdzad pa'o de rjes ye dharma phyogs bcu ma'i brtan bzhugs yi dam chos skyong gi gtang rag 'dod gsol ci rigs shis brjod bka' rgya ma sogs brjod bkra shis</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@006b (ces rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che nas phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la nyam thag pa'i gnas tshul gyis glu dbyangs phul zhing gsol ba btab pas khong rnams kyis kyang myur ba myur bar phyogs thams cad nas 'phel bar mdzad pas ^ rgyal bstan rin po che shin tu dga' ste rdzogs ldan bzhin du slar rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes byang phyogs kyi sa mthar skyes pa'i ban chung mkhas grub zer bas skye 'gro'i spyod tshul dang bstan pa'i gnas tshul gyi nyams dang sbyar te bris pa rang nyid bya rog dkar por sgrub ste 'dzam bu gling pa rnams dang 'gras @007a * 'dod pa min gyi skal mnyam 'ga' zhig la'ang phan pa'i skabs srid dam snyam pa yin pas khyed 'ga' zhig gi thugs la phog tshe bzod pa'i phan yon dran par zhu zhu 'dis gyad rgyal bstan rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<col>@020a * (ces pa 'di ni thos bsam gling gi spyi gnyer dang brtson ldan pa rab 'byams blo bzang dpal ldan gyis grwa tshang gi lam don dang 'brel ba'i ga-yang 'brel bya tshul rgyal gsol gyis mjug tu 'don rgyu zhig dgos tshul zer bar dge 'dun spyi'i @020b ga-yang 'bod tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang sgo su mtshan nyid grwa tshang gi ga-yang 'bod bka' bor lnga'i 'chang nyan sngags grwa rnams kyi ga-yang 'bod rgyud don rim gnyis kyi bshad sgrub 'don phyag len sogs yin gyi ga-yang mgron po 'bong ba bzhin byed dka' na'ang rang rang gi rgyu bsgrubs pa'i thog tu rkyen bsrung ma'i thugs brgyud bskul na phan par bsams te ^btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes bris pa'o</col>

<col>@004b (ces drang srong chen po gza' mchog r'a hu la yi mnga' gsol rdo rje'i phreng ba 'di nyid pad+ma nor bus bskul ngor rdo blas @005a * smras bzhin 'jigs med bsod nams mchog ldan gyis yi ger bris pa yongs su dge bar gyur cig dge'o dge'o dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>lhan skyes 'go ba'i lha lnga'i sgo nas bzlog bsgyur bya tshul</tib>

<col>@015a * (ces lhan cig skyes pa'i 'go ba'i lha lnga'i sgo nas bzlog bsgyur bya tshul 'di ni rang phyogs su ba na'ang dus nas 'go ba'i lha lnga mchod mkhan mang bar brten gsol mchod kyi cho ga dar po che yang bzlog bsgyur gyi cho ga bla ma gong ma rnams kyis mdzad pa mi 'dug la rang bzhin gyi rkyen sel rim gror sgrub dgos pa'i tshe ci byed ma shis par mun @015b 'thoms su gnas pa'i skabs su chos dang rigs kyis 'brel thogs pa'i grogs mched 'ga' zhig gis cis kyang 'di lta bu zhig 'dri dgos zhes zer ba la brten nas cho ga'i chings gong smos mkhan chen chos rje de nyid kyis mdzad pa'i dgra lha bcu gsum gyi sgo nas bzlog bsgyur bya ba'i cho ga nag po'i ga-yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i ru mtshon ji lta ba bzhin la dam pa gong ma rnams kyi gsung rgyun la gzhir byas te gtor zlog gi cho ga spyi'i srol dang mthun par 'gal med 'khyer bde ba'i lugs su gyi na ba bikshu dznya na badzra ming can gyis chu mo phag lo nag pa zla ba'i drang srong zla ba skar ma skag dang dgyes dgur rol pa lang tsho sbyor ba'i nyin dge bar ga-yar khral tsam du bris pa'o 'di kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas pa dang 'gro ba kun la phan bde rgya chen po 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur cig bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling rgyan du shog </col>
</item>

<item>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5133</vol>
<tib>thog mtha' bar dge ba'i smon lam</tib>
<p>1a-5b</p>
<col>@005b (ces thog ma dang bar dang tha mar dge ba'i smon lam 'di ni mang du thos pa'i rgyas rgyal khams pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis gzho stong dpal gyi 'bri khung thel du sbyar ba'o sarba mangga lam bha wantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5133</vol>
<tib>zhabs brtan gsol 'debs dge legs kun 'byung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003a * (ces pa 'di ni dza sag thu han aas mag rgyal khang rtsi'i dgon pa rab brtan phun tshogs gling gi mchog sprul aer rte ni bandi ta ho thog thu rta mgrin badzra gyi zhabs brtan gsol 'debs 'di lta bu @003b zhig dgos zhes aer te ni phyag mdzad pa no yon han aa k'o la'i chi k'o la kang ni t'a wang 'od zer badzra rgyal khang rtse ho thog thu'i phyag mdzod pa grags pa rdo rje gsol dpon dkon mchog rgyal mtshan wang gi khams tshan gyi bla ma dge bskos dge 'phel sogs thu sa la ho thu she mel sna tshogs rten 'brel me'i ring dzang gi thus thas sogs ser skya thun mong nas mandal sku gsung thugs rten dang bcas bskul ma mdzad pa'i ngor khu ral mkhan po no mon han shing thung aer te ni au han pandi ta dgon sar skye ming 'dzin pa bka' chen blo bzang dpal ldan chos 'phel la ma ming gzhan byang chub don yod rgyal mtshan gyis rab gus dwang ba chen pos sbyar ba'o mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5133</vol>
<tib>zhabs brtan gsol 'debs drang srong bden tshig yid kyi re bskongs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces khal kha rje btsun dam pa'i yang srid mchog sprul dwangs gsal nges rnyed byung 'phral khu ral t'a bla ma blo bzang ye shes gsol dpon karma skyabs dza'i sing tshe ring don grub bcas gang gi zhabs 'brangs pa rnams nas brtan bzhugs gsol 'debs smon tshig dgos zhes bskul ba dang rang nyid kyang mos pa'i mtshams sbyar te ^sh'akya'i ring lugs 'dzin pa ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan mkhyen rab 'phrin las rgya mtsho sde ming gzhan ta la'i bla ma badzra rta dar 'bod pas sbyar ba'o mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5134</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i las byang snying po nyer bsags zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-18a</p>
<col>@017b (ces bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i las byang snying po nyer bsags ces bya ba 'di yang 'di ga'i zhabs tog bsgrub pa la lhag bsam rma med pa'i rang gi rdo rje slob ma sngags rams pa ngag dbang blo bzang nas gal che ba'i dmigs rnam yid la @018a * bya tshul dang phyag len gyi rim pa phyogs gcig tu bkod pa 'di lta bu zhig ci nas kyang gsar bsgrigs dgos zhes au tshugs nan tan mthar skyel byas pa la brten nas rigs brgya'i bdag po pha bong kha pa rje btsun rgya mtsho mtha' yas dpal bzang po'i zhabs drung nas yi dam 'di nyid kyi dbang dang rdzong chung tshe dbang bka' sdod rnams kyi srog gtad rta bong beg tse'i be bum dang lung legs par thob pa'i btsun pa ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan nam pad+ma dgyes pa rtsal du 'bod pas bsod nams kun sdud gling gi bla brang du bsgrigs pa 'dis kyang rgyal bstan rin po che dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>'dul ba rgya mtsho snying po bsdus pa zhes bya</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@005b (ces so sor thar pa'i sdom pa gtan la phab pa 'dul ba rgya mtsho snying po @006a * bsdus pa zhes bya ba 'di ni yul gangs can gyi mthar skyes pa'i snyan dngags mkhan shar tsong kha pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis sbyar ba'o bstan pa rin phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  legs so mangga lam dge'o</col>

<col>@018a * (ces 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po bklag pa'i chog dge legs spel ba'i nyi ma zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs rus phun sum tshogs shing dad stobs dang ldan pa thu she ye gung ta la'i ching bsod nams dbang phyug ces bya bas dam pa rnams kyi lung bstan la brten nas gser 'od mang du 'don dgos pa'i tshe 'dul gyi mandal kha btags dang bcas 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bka' stsal ba dang du rlabs te dam pa rnams kyi zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa'i btsun gzugs ^ye shes don gnyis lhun grub kyis rang lo nyer dgu'i thog do ni lugs dang mthun par sbyar nas phyis brtsom byang bod de rdzogs par bgyis pa'i yi ge pa ni don gnyer dge slong blo bzang bstan 'dzin dang nye gnas dge slong chos brtson 'grus dpal gyis bris pa @018b 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa dang sbyin pa'i bdag po rnams kyis gtso byas rang gzhan sems can thams cad la phan bde rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig  mangga lam</col>

<tib>` dkon mchog gsum dang lha srin sde brgyad rnams la mchod gtor dang ba blang gi 'o ma'i 'bras mchod 'bul tshul ga-yang nye bar rgyas zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col>@004b (ces pa 'di ni aa chi thu dar han chos rje blo bzang rnam rgyal zhes bya bas 'gro mang po'i dbul 'phongs pa'i phyir 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor gsung bzhin du blo bzang rnam rgyal ming can gyis sug bris. sbyar ba'i 'gro ba mang po'i phan par byed pa'i dge legs 'phel bar gyur cig </col>

<item>

<tib>dpal ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sengge'i gdong pa can gtso 'khor gsum gyi bzlog pa'i cho ga phas rgol ga-yul las rgyal ba'i ru mtshon zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col>@007a * (ces dpal ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sengge'i gdong pa @007b can gtso 'khor gsum gyi bzlog pa'i cho ga phas rgol ga-yul las rgyal ba'i ru mtshon zhes bya ba 'di ni dga' ldan chos mdzad gling gi sngags gra'i slob dpon dge ba'i bshes gnyen sngag rams pa 'jigs med chos 'phel gyis bskul ba bzhin du rigs mthun gyi yig cha gzhan las btus te 'gal med dpyad du zod pa'i khul du btsun pa ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis gong ma chen mos gser gyi dka' lung gis bsod nams kun sdud gling zhes sngags pa'i gtsug lag khang gi gzims chung rab zhi bde ldan dga' tshal du bris pa dge'o legs so</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi bsnyen yig dbang chen zhal bzang blta ba'i me long zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@019a * (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi bsnyen yig dbang @019b chen zhal bzang blta ba'i me long ces bya ba 'di yang lha 'di'i bsnyen pa byed 'dod pa'i las dang po pa rnams la phan pa'i ched du ku s'a li dharma badzra gyis zil gnon gyi lo chen po hor gyi yul gru myul skabs ao'u han thool gw'ai su me brtse ba rgyas byed gling du grub par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni pikshu wa kindra sha sa na wa rta'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>5143</vol>
<tib>dam can chos kyi rgyal po gsang sgrub la brten pa'i gtor sgrub bya tshul khams gsum brtan pa 'phrog byed don yod 'phrul gyi lcags kyu zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-83a</p>
<col>@081a * (ces dam can chos kyi rgyal po la gsang sgrub la brten pa'i gtor sgrub bya tshul khams gsum brtan pa 'phrog byed don yod 'phrul gyi lcags kyu zhes bya ba 'di ni bstan 'gro'i dpal mgon chen po mkhan po no mong hang rin po che ratna badzra mchog nas de'i cho ga sgrigs chad la lag tu blang bde ba zhig gyis gsungs pa'i ngo ldog mi nus shing dam ldan gzhan gyis kyang bskul ba la brten nas skyabs mgon chen po rwa sgreng rdo rje 'chang blo bzang ye shes bstan pa rab rgyas dpal bzang po'i @081b zhal snga nas dang ^byang rtse mkhan chen rdo rje 'chang mthu stobs rgya mtsho'i zhal snga nas dang ^rgyal ba gnyis pa'i rgyal tshab khri chen rdo rje 'chang dge 'dun tshul khrims pa'i zhal snga nas dang rgyud smad mkhan chen ngag dbang chos 'phel pa'i zhal snga nas dang skun spangs chen po ngag dbang legs bshad pa'i zhal snga nas dang rdo rje 'chang khyab bdag bde ba'i rdo rje'i zhal snga nas sogs tshad ldan gyi dam pa du ma'i zhabs drung nas yi dam chos bsrung 'di ba'i dbang dang rjes su gnang ba'i rim pa rnams dang man ngag phal mo che thob pa'i sa mtha'i btsun pa ^rje'i bstan pa la @082a * cung zad shes nas dad pa thob pa'i phyogs gtogs wa g'indra pa tu sidhis zhwa dpe lham la 'gebs pa'i bsre slad dang rang bzo'i nyes pas ma gos par bla ma dam pa rnams kyi man ngag bzhin du mdor bas rigs gnas kyi tshul hu re chen por sbyar ba 'dis kyang 'jam mgon bstan pa'i snying po dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig</col>

<item>

<vol>5143</vol>
<tib>ma h'a p'a la mchod pa zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>

<p>1a-7b inc [*missing page from 3a-3b*]</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5147</vol>
<tib>gshin gson dbul 'phongs kun la nyer mkho phan bde'i bdud rtsi dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@016b (ces pa 'di ni ^rig 'dzin dpal mgon bzhad pa'i rdo rje ming can gyis tshad ldan dam pa rnams kyi gsung rgyun las byung ba ltar bris pa la lha shes zhes su grags @017a * pa'i rtsis mkhan dang mkhas pa rnam dpyod can gzu bor gnas pa rnams kyis gzigs na thugs kyis mi khrel zhu'o yi ge pa ni bsod nams dbang phyug gis bgyis pa 'dis kyang 'zo ba mang po la phan thogs par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5147</vol>
<tib>gshin po'i dur 'debs kyi sa bslang ba sogs ji ltar bya tshul gyi cho ga mdor bsdus gzhan phan snying po zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-20a</p>
<col>@020a * (zhes pa 'di ni gshin rtsis kyi gzhung las bshad chog ltar bcos rim sogs mi grub dbul zhing dma' ba'i gshed 'gro ba mang po la lhag bsam gyis kun nas bslangs te rtsis gzhung dang bla ma dam pa rnams kyi man ngag la brten nas skyabs mgon rje btsun bla ma dam pa'i bka' 'bangs rig 'dzin dpal mgon bzhad pa'i rdo rje ming can gyis soo mya shing mo bya lo yi dpyid zla 'bring po'i dmar phyogs kyi dga' ba gnyis par aer te ni jo bo'i gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bsod nams dbang phyug gis bgyis pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5147</vol>
<tib>khyab bdag 'khor lo'i mgon po ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtshos 'khrungs rab gsol 'debs</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b (ces pa 'di ni yongs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po gling smad zhabs drung rin po ches bka' stsal ba dang du blangs te phyogs myul gyi rgyal khams pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dpal ldan  'bras spungs kyi gzims chung nyi 'od kyi 'khyil bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge tshul blo bzang phun tshogs so</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5147</vol>
<tib>lam rim gsol 'debs lam mchog sgo 'byed bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@008a * (byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i brgyud pa rnams la gsol ba 'debs pa'i rim pa lam mchog sgo 'byed ces bya ba 'di ni 'dod 'dun can du mas bskul ba'i don du sems dpa' chen po du mas byin gyis brlabs pa'i grub gnas byang rwa sgreng rgyal ba'i dben gnas kyi dgon par ? gong du dpal ldan aa ti sha'i sku dngos dang khyad par ma mchis pa'i sku 'dra dbu yon ma che bar grags pa'i spyan sngar yun ring du gsol ba btab nas sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sh'akya blo bzang gis bgyis pa'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<tib>myur byon gsol 'debs re 'bras lhun grub ma zhes bya ba</tib>

<tib>spar kha brgyad kyi 'grel pa</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
