<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5148</vol>
<tib>tshe mthar nye bar mkho ba'i man ngag bde lam rab gsal sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-43a</p>
<col>@042a * zhes pa 'di ni mgron gnyer sbyin pa bstan dar bas bskul ba'i ngor bka' gdams pha chos dang pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan lcang skya @042b thams cad mkhyen pa rol pa'i rdo rje rje 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang po rje tho'u bkwan dharma badzra rnams kyi gsung byin rlabs can rnams ji lta ba bzhin du ^lha'i rigs kyi btsun pa aartha siddha badzra gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rgyal ba'i gsung rab @043a * la blo mig yangs pa gzims dpon dge slong sbyin pa dkon mchog gis so 'dis kyang bstan 'gro yongs la phan thogs par gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5148</vol>
<tib>` dgra lha mched dgu mchod gtor 'bul tshul bskang bshags bstod bskul dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * (ces dgra lha'i bskang gso dkar po rgyal byed ces bya ba 'di ni rang gi mched grog rdo rje zhes pas 'di lta bu dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor zhig gyis snga mos nas yod pa'i yig cha bskang gso ma mthon pas gu ru'i mu tig gtor ma dgra lha'i dbang bstod zhig la gzhi byas nas bkod pa 'di ni sngags 'chang smon lam lhun grub kyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rigs gnas skad gnyis sogs du ma la mkhas pa'i rnam dpyod can blo bzang phyug go 'dis kyang 'gro rnams dge zhing bde bar gyur cig sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<tib>` 'dir gzhi bdag gtor ma gtong bar 'dod pas</tib>

<item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5149</vol>

<vol>5173</vol>
<tib># bum gter gyi cho ga dge legs char 'bebs</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006a * (ces cho ga rnams lhag chad med cing mos pa drag por brjod de khang gzhi dang gzhi bdag khyad par @006b can gnas pa'i ri sogs su sa 'dom gang lhag tsam brkos te bzhugs gnam sa snang brgyad dag pa gser gyi mdo thig sdom brgyan bkra shis brtsegs pa rnams 'don gzhan yang bsangs dang brgya rtsa klu gtor sogs gang rgyas gtong zhing mjug bkra shis kyis brgyan par bya'o bum gter bzhug pa'i tshul 'di ni dam pa gong ma rnams kyi yig cha'i dgongs pa dang mthun par btsun gzugs snyoms las pa ngag dbang chos rgya mtsho zhes bgyi bas gzhan la phan 'dod kyi bsam pas 'khyer 'dir bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba ngag dbang dar rgyas so dge legs 'phel dge'o</col>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5173</vol>
<tib>rgyal yum dpal ldan lha mo'i bsnyen sgrub las gsum gyi rnam bzhag t'a ki ma'i thugs kyi ze'u 'bru dbye bar byed pa'i man ngag gnad don gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-42a</p>
<col>@041b lung dang rtogs pa'i yon tan gyis mngon par mtho ba yongs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen blo bzang bsam gtan gyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba la brten nas ^khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid yongs 'dzin dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bor yun ring du bsten cing gsung gi bdud rtsi myong ba dga' ldan bstan pa'i gsal byed pandi ta'i ming 'dzin btsun pa ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan nam rig sngags 'chang ba'i gzugs brnyan dam tshig rdo rjes chen po hor gyi yul gru'i nang tshan aa pa ka nar pe'i ze'i dgon chen gyi nye 'dabs jo bo mah'a bodhi'i gandhol bsod nams kun sdud gling gi bla brang bkra shis bsam @042a * gtan pho brang du rab myos zhes pa lcags pho rta lo'i dka' thub zla ba'i mar ngo'i tshes dge bar bris pa'i yi ge'i 'du byed las smon gyis 'brel ba gsol dpon gu shwi ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bgyis pa 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa dang chos bsgrub pa'i bar chad zhi zhing mthun rkyen bsam don yid bzhin grub par 'gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5173</vol>
<tib>rje btsun sgrol ma mandal bzhi mchod kyi sgo nas gsol ba gdab tshul gyi cho ga gsal bar bkod pa 'dod don kun 'grub ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@008b ces rje btsun sgrol ma mandal bzhi mchod kyi sgo nas gsol ba gda' tshul gyi cho ga gsal bar bkod pa 'dod don kun 'grub ces bya ba 'di ni` rang gzhan gyi don du sgrol chog yang yang lag tu bstan skabs chog sgrigs 'khyer bde ba zhig dgos tshul byung bar brten mchims kyi rtsa tshig gzhad bzhag snang thad pa'i man ngag brgya rtsar ma dus pa'i bka' gdams gong ma'i yig rnying khung thub gzhan 'ga' zhig las kyang lag len gyi zhi ba cha cung zad blangs shing dam pa so sos mdzad pa'i cho ga sgregs du ma la yang @009a * gzhigs nas 'jug bde bklags chog ma'i tshul du mkhas shing grub pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' dren kho nas 'tsho ba'i rgyal khams ^dam tshig rdo rje dpal ri'i dgon gyi nya 'dabs kyi dben gnas su rgyal zla ba'i tshes brgyad kyi nyen sbyang ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge bshes dge slong d'uirgh'a yu badzra gyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang bstan 'gro yongs la phan thogs par gyur cig bkra shis dge legs 'phel "</col>

<item>

<vol>5174</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub chog bla brgyud gsol 'debs bum chog bdag 'jug dang bcas pa bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-31a</p>
<col>@031a * (ces dpal 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub cing mchod de bdag 'jug blang ba'i tshul las bsgrub mchod bya ba'i tshul yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag rdo rje 'chang ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po shar tsong kha pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis mdzad pa'i dkyil chog rin chen 'prheng ba nas bshad pa bzhin za ma tog gi lhan thabs sung gsung ba ltar dang bum chog kyang dkyil chog de nyid nas bshad pa ji lta ba bzhin rab gnas bla bkra shis snye ma'i lhan thabs su gsung ba ltar la bdag 'jug gi ngag 'don phan chen chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung bzhin 'jug pa bde ba'i phyir phyogs gcig tu` bsgrigs shing gal che ba'i dmig pa rnams mtshan gyis gsal bar byas pa 'di nyid gsung rab kyi tshig don la blo gros kyi 'jug pa yangs shing nyams len dang rnam par dkar ba'i phyogs la brtson pa'i lhag bsam dge ba can t'a bla ma ngag dbang bsam gtan gyi dar rgyas kyi nan gyis bskul ba la brten nas` btsun gzugs snyoms las pa ngag dbang chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bgyi bas 'jam dbyangs gong ma chen mo'i rgyal khab pe'i cing gi tsan dan jo bo'i lha khang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dka' bcu ngag dbang chos 'byor ro 'dis kyang 'jam mgon chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig sarba mangga lam bha wantu shu bham</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5174</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bka' sdod chos rgyal la brten pa'i las bzhi'i gtor ma drug cu pa gtong tshul man ngag dang bcas pa bdud rtsi'i mchod sprin zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@016b (ce dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bka' sdod chos rgyal la brten pa'i las bzhi'i gtor ma drug cu pa gtor tshul man ngag dang bcas pa bdud rtsi'i mchod sprin zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma dang bstan 'dzin dam pa rnams kyi zhabs brtan dang bstan pa'i sbyin bdag rnams kyi rim gror zhi rgyas kyi gtor ma drug cu pa lan grangs mar por bsgrub dgos pa'i skabs du mar lag len 'khyer bde 'di lta bu zhig byung na legs 'dug snyam pas sngar nas 'bris 'dun yod pa'i thog don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis kyang las bzhi so so'i mchod gtor sogs dang kha bsgyur tshul mi 'dra ba'i khyad par rnams gsal bar bkod pa zhig dgos zhes bskul ma 'byung bar brten ^skyabs mgon rje btsun dam pa yab sras dang nges par grub pa brnyes pa'i bla ma dam pa du ma'i zhal snga nas yi dam chos skyong 'di'i dbang rjes gnang man ngag mang du thos pa'i bka' 'bangs kyi tha shal pa ^btsun gzugs blo bzang dpal ldan gyis dben gnas ri khrod theg chen chos 'phel gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson dge slong gdugs dkar @017a * skyabs kyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa tsong kha pa chen po'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa'i rgyur gyur cig dge legs 'phel dbang ma thob pa dang dam tshig mi bsrung ba rnams la gsang ba gal che'o</col>

<tib>gnod sbyin chen po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi bskang gso'i rim pa bar chad kun sel zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006a * (ces @006b gnod sbyin chen po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi bskang gso'i rim pa bar chad kun sel zhes bya ba 'di yang rigs rus mchog tu dge zhing dad pa dang rnam dpyod phun sum tshogs pa rig gnas mtha' dag la mkhyen pa'i spyan yangs ga-yo ba'i sde pa rnam sras dza ma la zhes bya bas bskul ba'i ngor mdo rgyud dam pa'i man ngag 'dzin pa sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis 'di'i sgrub thabs slob dpon pad+mas mdzad par grags pa dang grwa pa mngon shes kyis mdzad zer ba'i yig rnying 'ga' zhig 'dug kyang snga mo nas brgyud pas bris nor mngon che zhing phal tshig ring thung yang mi snyoms pa yid brtan dka' ba dang gzhan ma khungs btsun pa'i gtor chog gtsang ma zhig ma mthong yang 'di'i rjes gnang las tshogs rags rim dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i zhabs drung du thob pa'i gdams pa la gzhi byas sngar gyi yig rnying de dag gi legs cha rnams kyis kyang kha bskangs te chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po'i gtsug lag khang du sug bris su byas pa las slar yi ge pa ni rab 'byams smra ba'i lotstsha ba dge 'dun dpal 'bar ro 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che mi nus pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cig </col>

<col>@003b (ces chos skyong dregs pa lcam sring la bsten nas drag po gtor ma'i las kyi @004a * bstan dgra 'dul bar byed pa dug mtshon khrag gi ser ba zhes bya ba 'di ni hal ha ga-yon ru'i shog tas chen ja sag bkra shis don 'grub kyi ho sho nas rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rang gi slob ma hur tsha rbi lig thu blo bzang lcam sring skegs pa'i rdo rjes dmod pa'i drag bskul gyi sgo nas las sbyor byed tshul dgos tshul nan gyis mol zhing 'gyur med dad pa'i blo ldan ldan pa dge slong thub bstan rgya mtshos kyang thun gtor gyi rnam bzhag cig dgos tshul yang yang mol ba'i ngo ma lcog par chos skyong 'dis 'phrin las kyi tsha zer phog pa'i padmo gzhon nu ^rig 'dzin rnam snang rdo rjes las byang 'phrin las lhun 'grub las legs cha bsdus dam pa'i man ngag gis zur brgyan te gcig mthus kyis phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa'o yi ge pa ni sam gha ku nas bris pa dge legs 'phel mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5181</vol>
<tib># dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi zab lam rim pa gnyis pa rdzogs rim sku gsum them skas zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-58a</p>
<col>@057b zhes dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi zab lam rim pa rdzogs rim sku gsum them skas zhes bya ba 'di ni bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin gyis lugs 'dir thos bsam gyis blo cung zad 'dris shing bsgos pa ltar zlos pa gu shri chos rjes blo bzang lhun grub dang mng gzhan sgog pa'i rdo rje zhes bya bas dben dam pa rgyal ba blo bzang don grub kyis mdzad pa'i rdzogs rim dang rje lha btsun rin chen rgya mtsho blo gros dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i rdzogs rim dang pan chen blo bzang chos rgyan gyis mdzad pa'i rdzogs rim dang mkhas mchog blo ldan dbang pos mdzad pa'i rdzogs rim dang rjes 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa rin po ches mdzad pa'i rdzogs rim dang thang sag la dngos grub rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i rdzogs rim dang lcang skya rin po che ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis mdzad pa'i rdzogs rim dang mkhas mchog dharm'a ka rtis mdzad pa'i rdzogs rim dang mkhas dbang legs pa don grub kyis mdzad pa'i rdzogs @058a * rim dang rjes ngag dbang byams pas mdzad pa'i rdzogs rim dang bla ma rin po ches lam mchog blo bzang bstan 'dzin gyis mdzad pa'i rdzogs rim dang mkhas pa ye shes bskal bzang gis mdzad pa'i rdzogs rim dang` gzhan yang mkhas grub rin po che'i yig chung nyer gcig dang pan chen rin po che'i rim lnga'i rnam bshad dang rdo rje 'chang sum pa mkhan chen gyis mdzad pa'i rgyud ste rgya mtsho'i gru gzings dang mkham mchog bsod grags kyis 'dzug pa'i 'dus pa'i rdzogs rim dang mkhas pa thang sag pa rin po ches mdzad pa'i 'dus pa'i rdzogs rim dang re khrod pa ngag dbang byams pas mdzad pa'i bde mchog rdzogs rim sogs la blta rtog zhib par byas te rigs pas kyang yang yang dpyad pa la brten nas blo gros kyi snang ba cung zheg rnyeng tshe rje 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa rin po che'i rdzogs rim la gzhir byas shing gong du smos pa'i legs bshad de dag gis legs par brgyan te sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni chos la blo mig rgyas pa gu shr'i chos rgya mtsho dang rnam dpyod shin tu yangs pa'i gu shri ngag dbang dar rgyas gnyis so 'dis kyang rgyal ba tsong kha pa'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig dza yantu sarba mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<tib>'dus pa 'phags lugs lha so gnyis pa'i lam rim dang po'i khrid dmigs kyi brjed byang mi bskyod mgon po'i zhal lung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-121a</p>
<col>@120b (ces 'dus pa'i lam rim pa dang po'i brjed byad mi bskyod mgon po'i zhal lung zhes bya ba 'di yang dus gsum gyi rgyal ba thams cad las kyang nges par thugs rje dang bka' drin mtshungs zla ma mchis pa snyan rgyud rgya mtsho'i mda' bdag dpal ldan bla ma dam pa mtshan brjod par dka' ba ^rje btsun dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i bka' drin las rim gnyis kyi khrid mnos pa'i skabs brjed tho cung zad bris pa de bzhin yi ger 'khod pa dgos pa'i bskul ma 'debs mkhan mang du byung yang bdag 'dra thun mong pa'i lam gyi sna zin tsam la yang blo sbyangs ma song ba'i gang zag gis snyan rgyud kyi gdams pa 'di 'dra 'god pa la skrag pas bzhag @121a * kyang nye char thugs rje bdag nyid bla ma yab sras rnams kyis bris chog pa'i bka'i gnad pa stsal ba mi bskyod mgon po rang gi gsung dang dbyer ma mchis pa'i byin rlabs kho na la brten nas dge slong shes rab rgya mtshos zin tho snga phyi phyogs bsde bas su byas pa la rang nyid sbyangs bzhan pa'i blo skyon gyis sbags pa dang zhal shes kyi rigs gsal bar bris pa sogs nongs ba mtha' dag bla ma lhag pa'i lha bka' sdod dang bcas pa la snying nas 'chags shing dge bas tshe rabs thams cad du bla ma lhas rjes su bzung ste tshad lam nor ba'i lam bzang po 'di spyod pa'i snod ldan du gyur nas phyogs bcu'i zhing khams rab 'byams su rgyal ba kun gyi dam chos ma lus brgyal ba'i dgongs pa bzhin du 'dzin nus par gyur cig</col>

<tib>dpal ga-yul las rnam par rgyal ba ces pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dbyangs 'char ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa legs par bshad pa'i 'jug ngogs mchog tu dga' ba'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>

<vol>5187</vol>
<tib>dbu ma la 'jug pa'i bsdus don</tib>

<col>@059a * dbu ma la 'jug pa'i bsdus @059b pa'i don 'di ni mkhyen rab dang thugs rje gzhan dang mtshungs pa med pas mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba la bden pa gnyis kyi de kho na nyid phyin ci ma log pa'i lam du bgrod pa'i dmigs phur gyur zhing khyad par du phyi nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams snang dus nyid nas mig 'phrul lta bur thugs su chud pa'i bla ma rje btsun chen po skyes mchog reng 'da' ba'i zhal snga nas dang sde snod gsum dang rgyud sde bzhi'i dgongs pa'i don mtha' dag rten gyi gang zag gcig 'tshang rgya ba'i lam gyi yan lag tu 'gyur ba la ma rtogs pa dang log par rtog pa dang the tshom gyi dri ma sbangs nas tshad ma'i lam las legs par drangs pa'i sgo nas lam gyi cha yongs su rdzogs pa la rang nyid sgrub pa thugs nyams su bzhes shing de nyid brtsa ba'i sgo nas dag tshig dri ma med pas gdul bya rnams la legs par 'doms pa'i sko nas rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa'i chos ma lus pa rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzin par smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i sems dpa' chen po bla ma rje btsun blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyi zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin las bden pa gnyis kyi rnam par bzhag pa la blo gros kyi snang ba cung zad thob par rigs pa smra ba'i dge slong dar ma rin chen gyis rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i sde 'brog ri bo che dge ldan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dka' bzhi pa kun @060a * dga' legs pa'i dpal lo de yang rgyal tshab thams cad mkhyen pas mdzad pa'i dbu ma la 'jug pa'i sbyor t'i kra 'di nyid bkra shis 'khyil du par du bkod 'dug rung chad lhag gis skyong mang tsam mchis par 'di kar ^skyabs mgon dam pa mi nyag rin po che'i phyag dpe khungs thub zhig yod pa ma phyis byas te par du bsgrubs pa'o "</col>

<item>

<vol>5187</vol>

<item>

<item>

<vol>5188</vol>

<col>@018b (ces pa 'di yang nang so mgon po tshe 'phel ba'i gsung gis bskul nas dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i dpal gyis chos 'khor rgyal gyi gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5188</vol>
<tib>dus kyi 'khor lo'i lugs kyi rtsa ba dang yan lag gi ltung ba gtan la dbab pa zla shel 'phreng ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-18a</p>
<col>@018a * ces pa 'di ni dad ldan slob bu 'jam dpal rdo rjes bskul ngor rje yab sras kyi gsung rab las btus te bsgrigs pa po ni dge slong chos smra ba ^'jam dbyangs thub bstan nyi ma'o par 'di kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs  bzhad pa'i sde'i gdan sa chen po bkra shis 'khyil gling nas thub dbang bstan pa'i nyi ma stong phrag gi gndho la ru lhag bsam dag pas bsgrubs "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5188</vol>
<tib>gtor bshad skal ldan spyi nor zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@014b ces pa 'di'ang rang gi nye 'khor ba blo bzang tshe ring gis bskul ba'i ngor ^sh'akya'i dge slong @015a * pakshi no mon han bstan 'dzin ming can gyis bskul ba po'i dbang po'i rim pa dang bstun nas sbyar ba 'dis kyang rgyal ba gnyis pa'i ring lugs spyi dang khyad par phyin drug gi nyams len phyogs bcur rgyas par byed nus par gyur cig mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5188</vol>
<tib>mdo sngags lam gyi lus yongs rdzogs tshang la ma nor ba smon lam gyi tshul du gdams pa byin brlabs sbungs zhu mar grags pa'i rnam bshad skal bzang rna ba'i bcud len zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-24a</p>
<col>@024a * (ces pa 'di ni khams mu li nas gsol dpon ngag dbang dpal ldan gyis bskul ba'i ngor sbong ba pa dge bshes tshul khrims rnam rgyal gyis dben gnas gangs stag lung brag tu 'phral mar bar bsgrigs pa'i yi ger bkod pa po ser smad kong bo dge bshes ngag dbang tshul khrims kyis bgyis pa dge legs 'phel 'dis kyang rgyal bstan rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5188</vol>
<tib>rje'i bstod pa rtsa 'grel gyi bshad lung gi brjed byang thor bu nor bu'i the tshom zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-39a</p>
<col>@038b ces 'jam mgon bla ma chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po de nyid slar yang gsum ldan dur smrig 'chang ba'i rnam par rol ba khri chen gung thang 'jam pa'i dbyangs 'di pam mtshan can gyis mdzad pa'i legs bshad zla med pa rje'i bston pa don ldan rtsa 'grel gyi bshad lung smra ba'i dbang phyug 'jam dbyangs bla ma khri chen rdo rje 'chang dkon mchog rgyal mtshan ba'i drung nas legs par mnos pa'i tshe brjod byang cung zad bkod pa la slar yang phri bsnan dang gsang bdag sde khri rin po che 'jam dbyangs thub bstan nyi ma smon lam gyi gsung chos ls bstod 'grel gyi bshad pa gnang ba'i skabs kyi zhal gdams rnams kyis kyang zur brgyan te btsun gzugs shes rab rgya mtshos sug bris su bgyas pa 'di yang tshe rabs thams cad du 'jam mgon bla ma'i @039a * lugs bzang bshad sgrub gnyis kyi sgo nas rang gzhan gyi rgyud la 'phel zhing rgyas pa'i rgyu kho nar gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5188</vol>
<tib>tshig gsal stong mthun gyi tshad ma'i rnam bshad zab rgyas kun gsal tshad ma'i 'od brgya 'bar ba skal bzang snying gi mun sel zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-63a</p>
<col>@062b ces tshig gsal stong thun gyi tshad ma'i rnam bshad zab rgyas kun gsal tshad ma'i 'od brgya 'bar bskal bzang snying gi mun sel zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyal ba'i dbang po chen po'i zhabs drung nas sdom gsum sogs chos kyi bgo skal thob cing 'jam dbyangs bla ma khri ri po che yab sras sogs bshes gnyen du ma'i zhabs sen spyi bor bsten cing sbyangs pas rang dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mthang rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu son cing khyad par du mdo sngags rab 'byams kyi dga' ba'i gnad gsang la mi 'tshugs pa'i blo mig thob @063a * pa sh'akya'i dge slong 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rjes mkha' 'gro 'du gnas dpal ri bo dge 'phel gyi ring gar 'dug theg mchog gter mdzod mkha' spyod gur khang bde ldan nyi 'od 'khyil bar sbyar ba 'dis skye dgu mtha' dag mtha' gnyis sbangs ba'i zab lam dbu ma la spyod cing rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa phyogs dus kun tu rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5191</vol>
<tib># * bslab bya mdor bsdus 'chal ba'i klung rgyun bzlog byed kyi chu lon zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10b</p>
<col>@010b zhes ri bo dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling gi 'dus tshogs pa mchog dman 'bring rnams kyis blang dor ji ltar byas pa'i bslab bya mdor bsdus 'chal ba'i klung rgyun bzlog byed kyi chu lon zhes bya ba 'di ni rab byung bco lnga pa'i grangs bya so bdun pa chu mo yos lor ^dam pa'i ming can gyis sbyar ba 'dis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dri ma med pa dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa'i rgyur gyur cig  mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5191</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das dpal gsang ba'i bdag po 'khor lo chen po'i dbang gi bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs rdo rje lhun po brtsegs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba zur brgyan bcas bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (de ltar dpal gsang ba'i bdag po 'khor lo chen po'i dbang gi bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs 'di ni da mo'i slob dpon rab 'byams pa blo bzang dpal ldan gyis snga thog nas bskul ma yod khar aa'i lugs na aer ti ni no mon han ngag dbang lhun grub dar rgyas kyis phrin yig gis bskul ma byung ba'i ngor sh'akya'i dge slong rig pa 'dzin pa blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5191</vol>
<tib>bdag bskyed ni "</tib>
<p>1b-23b</p>
<col>@023b (dpal gsang bdag 'khor lo chen po'i sgrub thabs khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje'i lhun po brtsegs pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rje 'dul ba 'dzin pa chen pos mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs mkha' 'gengs dkos pa du ma shig yod tshul rje sher 'byung ba sogs rang re'i mkhas grub god ma mang po'i gzhung las byung ba la zhib tu dpyad de chos 'di hams su len par 'dod pa'i rang gzhan du ma la phan pa'i bsam pas kun nas bslangs te rgyal khams myul sde snod 'dzin pa t'a koo shr'i lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rjes lha ldan sprul ba'i gtsug lag khang gi nye 'dabs su sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni  rnam dpyod dang ldan pa'i au rang zhabs drung bskal bzang bstan 'dzin gyis bgyis pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5191</vol>
<tib>bla ma bsten tshul gyi gzhung skor las btus pa'i yig chung</tib>
<p>1a-19a</p>
<col>@018b ces pa 'di ni bshes gnyen bsten pa'i cha skyen 'gyur ram snyam pa'i rebs ^rgyal khang rtser 'bod pas bsgrigs pa la bla ma bsten tshul gyi zhung thor bu rnams yas btus bam gtogs kho pos gzhung chen mo mthod pa ni ma yin no yi ge pa ni blo bzang tshe ring skyabs so 'di la dkar cha yod na bshes gnyen dam pas 'bral ba med par rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig   aom swasti 'di yang rgyal khang rtse ba rin po che'i thugs rje la brten te la ker mu reng gi dga' ldan dar rgyas gling gi chos grwa ru t'a ching dza sag tshe ldan rdo rje yis phyag rdor rnam 'phrul nyid kyi zhabs brtan dang dge ldan bstan pa dar ba'i cha rkyen du dmigs te dpar du bsgrubs pa'i dge ba 'dis 'brel thogs ltos bcas ji snyad mchis pa kun bdag sogs deng nas byang chub snying po'i bar 'bral @019a * med rjes bzung khyad par sha ma bha lar rdzogs ldan gsar ba'i dga' ston shar ba'i tshe 'khor gyi thog ma nyid du skyes par shog ces pa 'di ni dpar du bsgrubs tshe spar byad dgos tshul ltar gyi na ba zhig gis bris pa dge legs 'phel bla ma bsten tshul gyi man ngag yig chung 'di ni ho tho rko te twa las gung bsod nams dbang phyug shog gi chos grwa dga' ldan bstan rgyas gling gi gzhung gsar 'og gi grwa rig mgon po srung sogs kyis spar du bskrun ba'i dge bas tshe rabs kun du bla ma dam pas rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5191</vol>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5192</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i bskyed rim gyi 'khrid yig sku gsum rin chen 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-59a</p>
<col>@059a * (ces dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i bskyed rim gyi khrid yig sku gsum rin chen 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba 'di ni bslab pa gsum gyi rgyud phyug cing mang thos yon tan gyis mngon par mtho ba na'i man panti t'a chos rje ko'u shr'i blo bzang rgyal mtshan dang nged kyi gsol dpon dge tshul blo bzang stobs ldan gnyis kyis yang yang bskul ba'i ngor khyab bdag 'khor lo'i mgon po rdo rje 'chang bka' drin gsum ldan dpal ldan bla ma dam pa ngag dbang blo bzang bkra shis dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas dang 'jam dpal mi'i rnam rol rdo rje 'chang 'jam dbyangs blo gros dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas dang rigs kun bdag po kun sbangs bka' drin mnyam med dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje 'chang ngag dbang chos skyong rgya mtsho dpal bzang po rnams kyi zhabs rdul spyi bor blangs pa'i mthu las chos 'di skor gyi dbang lung 'khrid sogs mang du thos pa'i ^blo bzang bstan pa'i nyi mas mtsho bdun gyi dgon par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa yang gsol dpon de nyid kyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal bstan spyi dang khyad par 'jam mgon bla ma'i mdo snggags kyi bstan pa phyogs bcar rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>

<tib>rgyal ba byams mgon kyi dang po thugs bskyed pa nas bzungs lam rim par bgrod de mngon par byang chub pa'i tshul las brtsams shing ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgyas lnga pa'i mdzad pa ji ltar ston tshul gsal bar brjod pa'i sgo nas bstod cing gsol ba 'debs pa'i rab tu byed pa byams mgon zhal bzang lta ba'i dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5194</vol>
<tib>zab lam bla ma'i rnal 'byor dang 'brel bar gshin po'i sbyang chog lag tu len tshul mdor bsdus su bkod pa gzhan phan sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-16a</p>
<col>@016a * ces zab lam bla ma'i rnal 'byor dang 'brel bar gshin po'i sbyang chog lag tu len tshul mdor bsdus su bkod pa gzhon phan sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis kyang nan tan tu bskul zhing rang gzhan mang po la'ang phan par bsam ste snyan rgyud kyi gdams pa rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag ^rdo rje 'chang rje btsun blo bzang chos kyi nyi ma dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i lam rim sngon 'gro bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi zhal shes kun mkhyen lam bzang dang 'khrid kyi gsung bshad kyi dgongs don gzhir bzhag mkhas grub dam pa so sos mdzad pa'i sbyang chog tu ma la gzhigs nas gnad tshang don 'dus bklag chog tshul du ^btsun gzugs snyoms las pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang 'gro ba mang po la phan thogs par gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>zab lam bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi sgo nas byang chub lam rim nyams len bya tshul rab gsal sgron me las ngag 'don zur bkol bde lam snying po zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5195</vol>
<tib>ma ha tsi na'i byang mtha' rgyal khab chen po p'e kying gtso bor gyur ba'i byang phyogs kyi yul 'khor la 'os pa'i dus sbyor gyi rnam bzhag dus sbyor padmo'i tshal rab 'byed pa'i nyi ma gzhon nu zhes bya ba lags dge legs 'phel "</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@009a * (ces pa 'di ni rgyal ba gnyis pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid la mnga' bsgyur ba'i rgyal tshab dam pa khri chen mchog gi sprul ba'i sku rin po che'i gcung rgya chen rigs pa'i gnas kyi do shal 'dzin pa'i mkhas pa chen po pandi ta mkhan rin po che'i gsung gis bskul ba ltar rje btsun bla ma chos kyi spyan ldan du ma'i zhabs padm yun ring du bsten pa'i mang thos kyi btsun pa aaky'a blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dus kyi 'khor lo dang dbyangs 'char gyi rgyud 'grel dang spyi don sogs sngon rabs kyi gzhung che ba du ma dang rtsis phran gyi yi ge 'ga' zhig gi dgongs pa brtags ste sbyar ba dge legs su gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5195</vol>
<tib>rtsis gzhung nyin byed snang ba'i lag len bu yig ngo mtshar 'phreng ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-35a</p>
<col>@035a * (ces pa 'di yang shar phyogs kod yul nas rigs gzugs dpal 'byor gyis mngon par mtho ba'i rgyal skor sde ba ao rgy'an tshe brtan phun tshogs kyis dad pa dang gtong ba chen pos skar rtsis nyin byed snang ba'i gzhung bar du brko ba'i bdag rkyen mdzad pa legs par grub rjes de'i cha lag tu bu yig gi shog khra bltas chog ma 'di lta bu zhig 'phral du rtsom dgos zhes nan tan chen po'i gsung gis yang yang bskul ba'i ngor rje bla ma dam pa gter chen chos kyi rgyal po yab sras rigs bdag tu thob pa'i rtsis pa rgan po dharma shr'is sug las su spel ba dge legs su gyur cig </col>

<item>

<vol>5197</vol>
<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i 'khrid gzhung 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhal lung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-154a</p>
<col>@153a * byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i 'khrid gzhung 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhal lung zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyal ba'i gsung @153b rab mtha' dag la gzhan dring mi 'jog pa'i rtsod dus kyi kun mkhyen chen po 'kho na ston chos kyi rgyal po'i zhal lung dri ma med pa 'jam dbyangs bla ma'i drin las legs par thos shing smra mkhas dag gi dbang phyug btsun bla ma dkon cog chos 'phel ba'i drung du lam gyi rim pa chen mo chig gcig kyang ma lus pa'i bzabs bshad lan gnyis kyi bar du mnos pa'i bka' drinlas chos tshul 'di nyid smra ba ba la sbobs pa'i mgrin pa cung zad 'degs nus pa'i skal ba can du gyur ba'i za hor gyi bande ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho 'jigs mdog tshe thub bstan lang tsho'i sde ming gzhan 'jam dbyangs dga' ba'i bshes gnyen du 'bod pas 'phags pa'i yul du bhi lambha zhes phyogs 'dir rnam 'phyad du 'bod cing` `'jam dbyangs gong ma'i rgyal khab tu lbu zil zhes pas po khyi'i lo legs sbyar gyi skad du shrab nar grags pa bya wlba'i zla ba rgya nag pa ch'i yol zhes hor zla bdun pa dus 'khor ba'i mun pa'i pa bsal ba 'bring po'i dga' ba yon tan gyi dbyangs aa lnga gsal byed byi @154a * dbyangs 'char ba'i dmar phyogs kyi dga' ba gnyis pa dbyangs aa gsal byed bha na tshod byis pa khams sa 'dod yon dri nyim me pa zhi'i 'grub sbyor gyi tatkal sengge'i dus sbyor la bka' dang bstan bcos 'gyur ro cog gi tshal chen po dpal ldan 'bras spungs chos kyi sde chen por sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni grong smad pa 'phrin las rgya mtshos bris pa sudh'i sh'a sa n'a n'am ba sante sh'a da yantu mangga lam bha wantu "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5198</vol>
<tib>de la 'dir gsung rab dgongs 'grel dang bcas pa thams cad kyi snying po'i don byang chub lam gyi rim pa la blo sbyong phyir chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen pos mdzad pa'i lam rim bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs lam gyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa la smon lam du bya ba'i tshul dang bcas pa byin rlabs kyi gter chen po 'di nyid nyams su len pa'i tshul ni "</tib>
<p>1b-7a</p>
<col>@006b zhes chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen pos mdzad pa'i byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i bla ma brgyud pa la gsol 'debs shing lam gyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa la smon lam du bya ba'i tshul byin rlabs kyi gter chen po 'di'i don gsal bar ston pa'i man ngag dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni czang lung pandi ta'i phyag mdzod dar han dpon po blo bzang dar rgyas kyis bskul ba la brten nas byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i man ngag 'dzin pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis mdo sngags ting 'dzin legs par 'phel ba'i gnas @007a * mchog bkra shis bsam gtan gling dam ^'jam dbyangs gong ma ri lung gis tshe mchog gling du bsngags pa'i gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba'o rgyal pa'i bstan pa'i snying po mthar thug pa 'di phyogs kun du 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5198</vol>

<col>@025b zhes gshin po rjes su 'dzin pa'i thabs lho sgo'i cho ga thar lam gsal @026a * sgron zhes bya ba 'di ni yul byang phyogs kyi mthar skyes pa'i gyi na ba ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang po zhes bya bas rje 'dul ba 'dzin pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi ngan song sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyud dong gsal ba gzhir byas kun rig tika chen dang dam pa gzhan gyi man ngag gis brgyan te lag tu blang bde bar rang nyid kyi rjed byang dang rang dang skal ba mnyam pa gzhan la'ang phan par 'dod pas dben gnas byang chub gling du sbyar bas yi ge pa ni bkra shis rgyal mtshan no 'dis kyang 'khor ba dang ngan song gi rgyun chad cing rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che spyi dang rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa yab sras kyi bstan pa rin po che phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig mangga lam "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5199</vol>
<tib>dpal ye shes yon tan bzang po'i bstod pa rnam par bshad pa mkhas pa dga' bskyed tambu ra'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@006b (ces dpal ye shes yon tan bzang po'i bstod pa rnam par bshad pa mkhas pa dga' bskyed tambu ra'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di ni mdo rgyud man ngag mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams pa ^lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rjes shing sprul lor sprul ba'i gnas mchog ri bo rtse lnga'i dben gnas kun tu bde ba'i tshal gyi grub khang ae wam dga' @007a * 'khyil du lam rim pa gnyis kyi rnal 'byor la brtson pa'i thun mtshams su rje btsun nyid la gsol ba btab ste sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson rnam dpyod phun sum tshogs shing theg pa mchog gi lam la mos pa brtan pa'i nye gnas ja sag bla ma dge legs nam mkhas bgyis pa 'dis kyang rang gzhan thams cad kyi rgyud la rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi byin rlabs myur du 'jug par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5199</vol>
<tib>gangs can 'gro ba'i mgon po thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga'i rnam bzhag rgyas par bshad pa tshig don gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-88a</p>
<col>@087a * ces gangs can 'gro ba'i mgon po thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga'i rnam bzhag rgyas par bshad pa tshig don gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni snga mo nas dad brtson rnam dpyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i bya btang bde ba'i 'byung gnas dang rigs pas smra ba 'phrin las dang blo bzang rgya mtsho sogs rang gi slob ma'i mang po zhig dang khyad par du ri khrod 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dka' bcu pa skal ldan nyi shar dang bde legs rgya mtsho khu dpoon dang bkra shis dar rgyas sogs kyis yang yang bskul bar byas kyang sngon chad phyogs 'dir cho ga 'di'i bshad pa mthong thos gang yang med pa'i dbang gis dam pa'i man ngag med par rang bzo'i tshul du gyur na mi rung snyam du dogs nas re zhig btang snyoms su bzhag kyang phyis su mdo smad lho phyogs kyi yul gyi bstan 'gro'i dpung gnyen dam pa khom thog sku skyes rin po che blo bzang dge legs dang sde snod 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dka' bcu rab 'byams du ma dad dang ldan gyi dge @087b slong spobs pa pa mang re ba zhig gis nan tshig gis bskul ba'i tshe chos 'di la mchog tu dad pa'i snga phyi'i bskul ba po de rnams kyi gsung bcag ma phod pa dang rang yang chos 'di la dad pa'i kun nas blangs te mdo rgyud mkhas grub dam pa rnams kyi gsung dag dri ma med pa la brten nas rang gi go tshod tsam zhig srin po zhes pa shing mo yos lo'i sgrub ldan gyi zla ba'i dkar phyogs rgyal ba dang po'i tshes la re ba gong stod kyi dpe zha ba'i gnas mchog dar zhing bde 'dzom gyi dga' ba'i tshal du dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i rje btsun bla ma dam pa de nyid la cho ga 'di'i bshad lung sogs legs par khus pa'i bka' 'bangs kyi tha shal du gtogs pa yul re ba gong gi ma ni pa bsam gtan rgya mtsho ming gzhan yi rog ces bya bas legs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson dang ldan pa'i dge tshul don grub rgya mtsho'o 'dis kyang 'gro kun theg pa mchog gi bshes gnyen dam pas rjes su 'dzin par gyur cig 'di la 'bri 'don byed par 'dod pa'i blo chen rnams la zhu ci 'tshal blo dman bdag 'dra rnams @088a * kyis ni tshig bsdebs shing tu dag ngos nas mtshal skag gur gum la sogs pa'i na bza' 'dzom zhing dbul bzhed na rtsa bshad sa bcad lung khungs mtshan rnam par dbye phyir zhib mo'i blos mtshan dang 'gyur phyag tsam ma gtogs dpe 'di'i 'og mjug thams cad du skag can sa bcad lung khungs ni mtshal can rtsa ba'i 'don cha ni ser chung rtsa ba'i lung dang mtshan ser chen bshad pa'i rgyab rten lung snag brkyang gzhung don bshad pa ru shes par bgyis la lag len mdzod dpe 'di ni snod min dang dbang ma thob pa rnams la bstan pa mi bya'o dge legs 'phel bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling brgyan du shog  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5199</vol>

<item>

<item>

<vol>5200</vol>
<tib>lag len gces rim bsdus pa sman kun bcud du bsgrub pa'i las kyi cho ga kun gsal snang mdzod zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>

<col>@069a * (ces pa 'di yang gsang chen rnying ma'i gter chen dang ba'i sras mchog mkhyen pa'i spyan yangs pa zab mchog gi sprul sku pad+ma dbang rgyal gyi bka' gnang bskur phan pa'i gsung len dus mtha' sman pa'i tha chung bstan 'dzin phun tshogs kyis sbyar ba'i dge bas lus can nyon mongs dug rang sar dag pa'i rgyur cig yi ge pa ni rang bzhin ngos la dharma pha la wadha pushta zhes pa'o sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>

<vol>5200</vol>
<tib>rtsa ba'i brgyud la sdong po dgu nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi bshes par bya ste zhes bya ba bzhugs  "</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col></col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5200</vol>
<tib>smin grol chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i man ngag rin chen 'byung gnas las sbyor sde 'ga' zhig gi tshad gsal bar brjod pa gnad don sgo brgya 'byed pa'i lde mig ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-102a</p>
<col>@101a * ces smin grol chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i man ngag rin chen 'byung gnas las sbyor sde 'ga' zhig gi tshad gsal bar brjod pa gnad don sgo brgya 'byed pa'i lde mig ces bya ba 'di ni rigs rus dang brtson phun sum tshogs pa aa ba nar pe'i le'i nu bo gzhung lugs smra ba'i dbang po lha btsun do rams pa bskal bzang bstan dar gyis bskul ba'i thugs bzhed ltar ^dam pa'i bka' lung gis hur tsha pi lig thu goo shr'i chos rjes 'bod pa 'jam dpal ming can gyis dam pa gong ma'i bzhed srol dang mthun par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge slong 'jam dbyangs 'od zer dang dge tshul blo bzang tshul khrims gnyis so dge'o legs so mangga lam aom swasti rgyal ba gnyis pa 'jam dpal gnying po yi mdo sngags chos kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa la zla bral 'phrin las bzang po'i dpal mnga' ba smin grol chos @102a * nad med bde dga' rgyas chos mthun smon pa'i gnas kun yid bzhin 'grub skye 'phreng kun tu dam pa'i mgon gyis zin sa lam rab rdzogs sku gsum myur thob shog ces mkhas dbang gu shr'i 'jam dpal brtson grus nas gsar rtsom gnang ba'i man ngag rin chen 'byung gnas las sbyor sde 'ga' zhig gi tshad gsal bar brjod pa gnad don sgo brgya 'byed pa'i lde mig ces bya ba 'di nyid dka' bcu ye shes tshe 'phel ma tho yon chos rje aer te ni t'a'i chen ngag dbang ral gri` dga' ldan dar rgyas gling gi dge bskos blo bzang don grub dge slong rig grol dza khi rag chi shu kher du shes mel mgon po skyabs bu sna tshogs pad zlar ho sogs kyis mthun rkyen bsgrubs te par tu sgrub pa'i tshe par byang smon tshig 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes khod rnam pas bskul ba'i ngor w'a gintra bi dzny'as sbyar ba'o "</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib># rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgrub thabs dregs pa kun 'dul zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006b (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgrub thabs tshig nyung la don cha tshang ba tshigs cad du sdebs pa 'di 'dra zhig dgos zhes dkon mchog bla mar 'dzin cing dad pa gtong ba la sogs pa dam pas bsngags pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa bdur bed wang phun tshogs bsam grub kyi dpon mo nor bu r'a gas nan gyis bskul ngor ku s'a li ^dharma badzra gyis aor du su wang gi ho ro'i spar thog du thun gcig la mgyogs par sbyar ba'o` `legs so dge'o sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<col>@016b (ces rang gi bsten pa'i yi dam chos bsrung gi bzlas bstod sogs bsham du 'di ltar lan gsum sogs brjod nas thal mo brdab na bar chad zhi zhing bzlog par dam pa ngag gis gsungs bzhin tshig 'di rnams mkhas pa'i gsung rgyun las byung ba ltar bzhad rdor ming can gyis phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa'o</col>

<tib>no title [@001b na mo gu ru manydzu shr'i ya 'dir gnas rling bshig pa dang gsar 'debs byed pa'i skabs dang zhing 'debs pa'i skabs la sogs par sa bdag rnams la gtor ril gser skyems 'bul bar 'dod na ]"</tib>

<tib>nam mkha'i rnal 'byor pad+ma shwa ra yi dag snang rol bar shar ba'i zab chos las rje btsun seng ldeng nags sgrol la brten pa'i char 'bebs bya tshul bdud rtsi'i bum bzang bzhugs dam med log lta'i bang mdzod can dag la ston par mi bya dam tshig rdo rje'i rgya "</tib>

<item>

<vol>5282</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan dmag zor ma'i rno mthong sgrub tshul 'bras bshad dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>1a-35a</p>
<col>@034a * (ces dpal ldan lha mo dmag zor rgyal mo'i sgo nas rno mthong sgrub tshul de'i 'bras bshad dang bcas pa 'di ni gam du bcad pa'i chos 'khor mkhan tshab gzhung lugs rgya mtshor rab @034b 'byams smras pa ngag dbang dngos grub nas thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i sho mo shin tu bsdus pas dpyad dka' ba dang bla ma gong mas mdzad pa 'ga' zhig kha 'thor zhing theng gsum bor dgos pas ngos 'dzin dka' bar 'dug pas theng gcig bor bas chog pa gsal ba zhig dgos zhes nan gyis bskul ma byung bar brten 'di rigs gsar rtsom la rang bzo'i neys pa yod nyen che na'ang spyir gtang brtags dril sogs byed skabs skyang don bzang ngan gyi skabs 'byed pa'i tshig ci shis bris nas dkon mchog la gsol btab kyi dmod bcol byas te bsgril bas chog pa dang gzhan yang dpe mo 'debs pa lta bus mtshon rang gi brtag bya'i don bzang ngan sogs kyi brda' chad dam tha snyad blos brtags byas pa'i steng bden pa brdar ba'i gang babs byas chog 'dug pa bzhin dang der ma zad skabs su babs min dpal ldan lha mor gsol btab kyis rmis ltas brtags pa yang legs pa'i mtshan ma byung ba bcas thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtshos mdzad pa dang gzhan yang sho so rgyas bsdus sna tshogs zhig 'dug pa nas kha gsal ba rnams kyis gzhi byas god ma'i zhal rgyan gyis brgyan cing mo thams cad gcig gis mo bab gang yin bltas chog pa 'di lta bu'i kha @035a * gsal bar bkod pa 'di ni ^sh'akya'i dge slong lcags rwa chos rje ngag dbang dpal ldan thub bstan chos 'khor gling gi bla brang du sbyar bas 'gro kun blang rdor nyi ma gsal bas bde skyid ky padmo rnam par bzhad pa'i rgyur gyur cig bkra shis shog</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5294</vol>
<tib>slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis mdzad pa'i 'bum bsangs beed'urya'i sngon mo bkra shis 'dod pa'i re bskong</tib>
<p>1a-40b</p>
<col>@038a * (ces 'bum bsangs beed'ura sngon mo @038b bkra shis 'dod pa'i re skong 'di ni rje khri srong lde'u btsan rgyal po'i skabs su slob dpon chen po pad+ma k'a ra'i zhabs kyis dpal bsam yas kyi gtsug lag khang bzhengs pa'i tshe lha srin sde brgyad la sogs pa nag phyogs pa rnams kyi 'dul ba'i ched du mdzad pa de'i rjes su gangs can bod kyi sa la nad rims dang dal yams sad ser btsa' mu ge than pa la sogs pa byung ba'i dus su de dag thams kyi zhi bar byed pa'i thabs 'di shin tu mchog go zer sngags 'chang pad dkar 'dzin pas gong bzhin mdzad pa de'i rjes su snyigs ma lnga bdo'i dus su lha 'dre mi gsum 'khon @039a * 'dzin 'thab rtsod kyis sa phyogs yul khams thams cad la char chu dus su mi 'bab pa dang lo phyogs ma legs pa dang rtsa shing chu gsum 'dzom med pa dang nad dang rims tshad la sogs pa ltas ngan pa mtshan ma gyur ba la btsun pa 'jam dbyangs dga' ba'i blo gros kyi lar klungs kyi stod la 'di dag gis zhi bar byed pa'i thabs 'di mchog go snyam pa'i lhan thabs su mdzad pa'i cho ga bzhin du phyogs phyogs su 'bum bsangs 'di btang ma thag tu bkra shis pa'i dge ltas mang du byung ba la mi la sogs pa 'gro ba rnams kyi dbul phongs kyi sdug bsngal sel ba dang phan pa rgya chen po'i bde skyid ldan pas @039b tshe srog dbang thang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ro smras pa 'jam dbyangs mgrin 'khyud mkhas pa'i dbang brtse chen phyag na bad dkar tshul mthu stobs gsang bdag nus pa yis rigs gsum kun 'dus drin can rje mtshungs med slob bzang grags pa la 'bral med rtag tu spyi bos mchod bskal bar bsdus pa dge chung zad tshe 'di'i rnam par ma 'bad na tshe rabs grangs pa'i lan chags ni nag phyogs gdon bgegs 'byung po rnams lha srin sde brgyad 'tshe ba las skyabs gcig bla ma yi dam lha dkon mchog rin chen rnam gsum nges khyad par myur du brts don grub bstan bsrung chos skyong 'khor tshogs yin @040a * mi phyed dad pa'i mos gus bya phun tshogs dus bzang zla re la yar ngo'i nyin 'phrod gza' skar dag lha yi 'bum bsangs 'di dag gi rgyun du byas par phan yon ni nad dang gdon rnams thams cad dag rims tshad dal yams med pa yi dgra dang chom rkun ci spyang sogs stobs kyis 'phrog rnams bzlog par 'gyur tshe ring nad med bde skyid ldan chos srid rgyun du 'grub pa dang nor dang longs spyod 'phel ba yin bkra shis dge mtshan rgyas par 'gyur spel mi bar gyi sbyin bdag ni bya rigs dbang phyug gis thub bstan lang tsho bdo pa'i thang chos grwa dbyangs chen dag tu sgrub yi ge'i rig byed la mkhas @040b pa gra rigs dbang phyugs grags pas bris</col>
</item>

<col>@002b (ces pa 'di yang gong gsal rgyu sbyor nas par byang smon tshig dgos tshul byung ba ltar rgyal sras yongs 'dzin d'a na'i ming can gyis sbyar ba dge legs 'phel</col>

<tib>dharm'a rakshi tas aa ti sha la gnang ba'i blo sbyong mtshon cha'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba mchan dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>1a-10b</p>
<col>@010a * (de ltar blo skyong mtshon cha'i 'khor lo'i mchan 'grel 'di la mdzad byang mi 'dug kyang mkhas pa tshad ldan gyi gsung du snang bas sngon gung thang rin po la hal ha'i grwa pa zhig gis blo sbyong 'di la @010b 'grel pa rtsom du bcu gnas ma dpe 'khyer bzhin song ba de bla brang phyogs nas snga phyir rtsar gcod bgyid mur yod pa ni 'di 'dra ae yin min na 'grel pa de da lta 'ja' lus su song las che snyam mo mchan 'grel 'di nyi aar hor chen sbar ma'i blo sbyong brgya rtsa'i gras su bzhugs yod kyang 'jug mtshams dgugs shing yig nor gyi phung por bsgrubs gshis mkhas blun su la yang phan thogs mi nus par song ba la bdag gi bla ma bkras 'khyil rdo rams pa zhig gis nged kyis lung nod skabs bla ma'i zhal nas mchan 'grel 'di la zhus dag phyer ba gcig byung na bstan pa la bya ba khyad par can gcig byas par 'gyur rgyu yin zhes bka' phebs byung bas khyod rang nas ae thub ltos dang zhes phyag dpe gnang bar brten kho bos nyin mtshan kha shas su rang blos gang spobs kyis zhu gtugs zhib smin gyis dag par sgrubs te phul bas bla ma nyid nas dgyes tshor dpe med kyis lung bshad stsal zhing ded kyis bkras 'khyil du phyin tshe bla ma la spyan 'bebs zhu rgyu yin zhes phyag dpe bsnams te phebs so rgyu des dpe rgyun dang 'phrin las spel ba'i phyir spar du bzhengs par bya ba'i bsam pas phyag dpe nas zhal bshus kyis blangs pa 'di lags so</col>

<col>@009b (ces pa 'di ni rnam dpyod kyis mngon par mtho ba'i grogs bzang 'ga' zhig gi thugs bzhed bskang ba'i rkyen byung bar rten ^blo bzang @010a * rgyal ba'i mkha' lding dbang pos rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sku gsung thugs kyi nam mkha' la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bdag gshog gis 'dod dgur rol pa'i rjes su rgyud 'dzin chen po ^gung thang dad pa'i rgyal pos 'phags mchog 'jam dpal bkar po'i gsang gsum gyi lha lam yangs por gnan drid mi 'jog pa'i mkhyen rab kyi gshog bzang dal gyis bskyod pa la kha mig yar bltas kyi tshul du byi'u'i gshog rtsal gyis nam 'phang chod mi nus kyang nus tshad dang bstun pa'i 'phur lding gis rang gi don sgrub pa la 'gal ba med pas gzhan gyis 'phyas 'dags pa'i don med cing rang nyid kyang lhag pa'i lha mor ngag gi 'brel ba bzang po zhig 'jog tu re bas kun nas bslangs te sa mtha'i btsun gras wagindra pa tu siddhas ^ri bo dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bcu drug cha shas longs su rdzogs pa'i zhal bzang la rgyal phur 'dzom te dga' bas bsu ba byed pa'i 'grub sbyor gyi rin nor bstod pa gong ma gnyis kyi tshig zur ma brkus par don 'grel du bsdebs pa 'di'ang gzhung lugs rgya mtsho'i tshig don la gtugs pa med par 'jug pa'i ngag dang shes rab kyi snang ba rang gzhan gyi rgyud la 'jug pa'i rgyur gyur cig sarba dza yantu</col>

<item>

<tib>mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu'i gter bum sogs ji ltar bya tshul dngos grub 'dod pa 'jo ba'i bum bzang zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@015a * (ces rgyal kun thugs rje'i spyi gzugs 'phags mchog 'jig rten dbang phyug ma rungs 'dul phyin drag po'i skur bzhengs pa myur mdzad mgon po yid bzhin nor bu'i bum sgrub sogs ji ltar bya tshul go d'i zhing rgyas pa zhig dgos zhes dang stobs lhag bsam gyis phyug cing gcig tu dge la 'dun pa'i rnam rgyal grwa tshang gi grwa bgres dge slong bzod pa rgya mtsho nas nan gyis bskul ngor don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te bdag mkhan rin po che thub dbang rdo rje 'chang dngos rje btsun blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa'i mgon dkar bka' rgya ma gzhir bzhag dam pa gong ma gzhan gyi yig rnyig sogs kyi 'ang legs cha blangs te gsar bcos dgos pa rnams gsar bris dang tshig bsgyur 'os rnams bsgyur ba'i mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu'i gter bum sogs ji ltar bya tshul dngos grub 'dod pa 'jo ba'i bum bzang zhes bya ba 'di ni rje btsun dam pa du ma'i bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba zhwa ser bstan pa'i gsal byed aa chi thu no mon han du 'bod pa sh'akya'i dge slong rig pa 'dzin pa blo bzang ye shes bstan pa rab rgyas kyis byang rwa sgreng rgyal ba'i dben gnas kyi rang shag zung 'jug pho brang du sbyar ba 'dis kyang rgyal bstan yun ring du gnas shing rang gzhan thams cad bla ma mgon pos rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>

</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5306</vol>
<tib>skyabs mgon rje btsun dam pa blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtsho dpal bzang po'i mdzad pa'i cha shas brjod bya bar byas pa'i gtam gyi 'phreng ba rnam thar rgyas pa'i snying po mdor bsdus te bkod pa smra 'dod bur ba'i glu dbyangs</tib>
<p>1a-43a</p>
<col>@042b ces skyabs mgon rje btsun dma pa blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtsho dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa smra 'dod bung ba'i glu dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba la spobs pa mchog tu dge ba chos rje bla ma ngag dbang blo bzang dang dad ldan dge slong mgon po bkra shis sogs skal mnyam gyi grwa rigs mang pos ^ skyabs mgon bka' drin can gyi rnam thar rgyas pa ^skyabs mgon pan chen thams cad mkhyen gzigs chen pos stsal 'dug pa yin na'ang dpe rgyun dkon pas grwa rkyang rnams kyis grub dka' bar ma zad gal srid dpe rnyed kyang rgya che bklog mi thub pa'i dad ldan le lo can dang klog na'ang tshig rgya che ba la mgo 'khor ste snying por don rnyed mi nus pa'i blo dman mang du yod pa bcas khyod kyis rnam thar rgyas pa de'i don bsdu lta bu zhig bris na gong gi de rnams dang rang cag rnams la'ang dad pa'i gsos su 'gyur nges pas cis kyang bris zhig pa'i au tshugs rna ba @043a * sun sun du byed par brten rang la yon tan gang yang med pas khur blangs bgyis pa'i 'os ma yin yang gdul bya gcig gis kyang ^ skyabs mgon chen po rjes su dran pa'i rkyen du gyur na bla ma la brten pa'i stobs kyis phan yon chen po yong shas che snyam pas dang du blangs te rnam thar rgyas pa'i snying po khu bsdus kyi thog tu rang gis cung zad mthong zhing yid ches pa'i ngag nas thos pa re gnyis kyis kyang kha bskangs te nges pa don gyi skyes bu dam pa chen po byang phyogs 'gro ba rnams kyi lha skal gcig pu ^ skyabs mgon rdo rje 'chang bka' drin mtshungs zla ma mchis pa de nyid kyi zhabs kyi padmo dri ma med pa la nye bar gtugs pa'i grwa rkyang bla ma'i cho lo phog pa mkhas pa'i ming can zhig gis mkhas pa'i mdun sar ngo tsha khrel yod kyi shun pa bshus nas bris pa lags pas khyed rnam kyis gzigs nas ^ skyabs mgon dam pa la dad gus mdzad pa'am phran bdag la bzhad mo mdzad pa gang rung 'di dag gi bka' drin skyangs par zhu 'dis kyang rgyal bstan rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa dang tshe rabs thams cad du skyabs mgon dam pa la rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5306</vol>
<tib>sman chog dang 'brel ba'i gshin po rjes 'dzin gyi cho gnyam thag 'dren byed sdig sbyong 'od kyi zhags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so"</tib>
<p>1a-28a</p>
<col>@028a * (ces sman chog dang 'brel ba'i gshin po rjes 'dzin gyi cho ga nyam thag 'dren byed sdig sbyong 'od kyi zhags pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rje gung thang pas mdzad pa'i sbyang chog bsdus pa la gzhi byas te blo dman rnams la 'jug pa bde ba'i slad du 'don cha phal cher sbyang cho gzhan nas kha bskang zhing gsar bri dgos pa rnams kyang bris te bsgrigs pa 'dis kyang bdag 'dra'i blo dman rnams dang rgyus med 'jigs rung lam du 'byams 'gyur gyi 'gro ba rnams la phan 'dogs shing byed pa po mkhas grub ming can bdag ldan grol yon tan gyi cha tsam yang med bzhin du gshin po'i zas nor la bag med spyod pa'i dkor grib kyi phung po chen pos rnam par gnon pa'i lan chags phra rags byang shing dag pa'i rgyur gyur cig  dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5307</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo bde mchog l'u ai pa'i lugs kyi bskyed rim</tib>
<p>1a-32b</p>
<col>@032b (ces dpal 'khor lo bde mchog l'u ai pa'i lugs kyi bskyed rim 'di yang chos smra ba'i btsun pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis dben sachos kyi pho brang du sbyar ba'o mangga lam </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5307</vol>
<tib>mgon po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i rim pa lnga'i rnam par bshad pa zung 'jug nor bu'i bang mdzod ces bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-67a</p>
<col>@066b ces mgon po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i rim pa lnga'i rnam par bshad pa zung 'jug nor bu'i bang mdzod ces bya ba 'di ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'ga' zhig gis snga mo nas bskul yang btang snyoms su lus pa slar mdo sngags rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang bstan pa dar rgyas kyis mam cher yang yang bskul ba la brten nas dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po'i gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni ri khrod 'dzin pa'i dka' bcu pa snying stobs rgya mtsho'o 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  'di'i rtsa ba rnams 'gyur rnying yin la 'bru cung zad mi gcig pa ni 'gyur gsar gyis bskyed pa ton pa yin no 'di ni snga phyi'i skye bo 'ga' deng dus 'dus pa'i rgya mtsho cher @067a * thos bsam dal ba bsten rnams kyang mgon po sangs rgyas gnyis pa yi gzhung mchog rim lnga'i chi gdon las brtsams te 'bal ba'i gtam bgyis te dgun dus khu byug tshul 'dzin ces bsting tshig smra ba'i klang cen gyi myos bum 'dral phyod gdong lnga'o zhes pa yang rtsom pa po rang nyid kyis smras pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5307</vol>
<tib>mtshon bya don gyi dge 'dun gyi rnam bzhag</tib>
<p>1a-23b</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5308</vol>
<tib>dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i lam rim pa gnyis ji ltar nyams su len pa'i tshul bde ba chen po'i lam du myur du 'jug pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so  "</tib>
<p>1a-61a</p>
<col>@059b dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i lam rim pa gnyis ji ltar nyams su len pa'i tshul bde ba chen po'i lam du myur du 'jug pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'gro ba du ma'i 'dren pa mkhas pa'i dbang po sems dpa' chen po kun bzang pas snga mo nas bskul ba dang mang du thos pa'i sdom brtson sde snod 'dzin pa zha lu cog bu pa legs pa rgyal mtshan gyis yang dang yang du bskul zhing thub pa'i bstan pa rgyas pa'i bur gyis mi bab pa'i sde snod 'dzin pa @060a * chen po ldan ma bla ma yon tan dpal ba dang gung ru bla ma ye byang bas sa thag ring po nas bskul ba dang gzhan yang sde snod 'dzin pa du mas bskul ba la brten nas dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rje btsun chen po dus gsum gyis sangs rgyas kun gyi 'phrin las gcig tu bsdus pa mdo sngags kyi bstan pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i smon lam legs par grub pa tha lam gyi sku'i bkod pa bzung nas gdul bya rnams smin grol la 'god par mdzad dang snyigs dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa rje rin po che blo bzang grags pa dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyi zhabs kyi rdul rnyog pa med pa'i ze'u 'bru lo bcu phrag gnyis las lhag par gus pa chen pos bsten ns sde snod gsum dang rgyud sde bzhi'i bka' drin mnos pa rigs pa smra ba'i dge slong dar ma rin chen gyis 'brog ri bo che dga' ldan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sde snod 'dzin pa'i rin chen chos rgyal lo 'dis mdo sngags kyis bsdus pa'i bstan pa sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi bshad pa man ngag dang bcas pa'i brgyud pa ni sangs rgyas zla bzang lha dbang gzi brjid can zla bas byin lha'i dbang phyug sna tshogs gzugs lha'i dbang ldan 'jam dbyangs @060b grags pa pad+ma dkar po 'jam dbyangs sprul pa ci lu a'a tsarya pandi ta a'a tsa rya dus zhabs pa che chung manydzu kirti sa manta shr'i rwa chos rab rwa ye shes sengge rwa 'bum seng rgwo lo sher seng dpal ldan sengge yagn shad seng la 'phags 'od des dpe med mtsho nas thar pa lo tstsha'i bar du brgyud pa sogs gdams pa mi 'dra ba bcu bdun mnga' ba'i kun mkhyen bu ston rin chen thub la des gong gsum sde chen pa 'jam dbyangs chos kyi dpal la des bdag gi bla ma dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo rje rin po che ba la des bdag la'o yang pad dkar yang chad 'dra ba la bzang po rnam rgyal bshes gnyen bzang po phyag mar khyab 'jug spas pa nyi ma grags shin tu bzang rgya mtsho rnam rgyal rgyal dka' nyi ma sna tshogs gzugs zla ba'i 'od mtha' yas sa skyong dpal skyong dus zhabs che chung kha che zla mgon 'bro shes rab grags lha rje sgom pa dkon mchog bsrungs sgro ston yu mo dharme shwa ra grub thob nam mkha' 'od se mo cheb nam mkha' rgyal mtshan 'jam gsar shes rab 'od zer de nas grwa lo man chad sngar dagn 'dra'o yang se mo che ba la bo dong rin chen rtse mo stag sde ba sengge rgyal mtshan shod blo brtan lo tstsha ba mchog ldan dpal ldan sengge ba yang 'jam gsar la chos 'od 'phags 'od dpal ldan @061a * sengge pa dang 'phags 'od kyis bu ston de man chad 'dra'o yang chos 'od kun spangs 'phags 'od do nye brgyud ni rdo rje 'chang sha ba ri bi bh'a ti ko brag pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan go lung ba gzhon nu dpal thar pa lo tstsha ba thams cad mkhyen pa bi ston kha che bla ma 'dis rwa 'broo gnyis dang dpe med mtsho dang bi bhu ti dang man lung pa dang aa mo gha badzras mdzad pa dang tsa mi'i dang pan chen sh'akya shr'i'i dang rgwa lo zhad mtshal ba gyi co sreg ba lung ba pha rgyud gsang 'dus ma rgyud kyi rdo rje sogs pa'i sbyor drug rnams 'phags 'od la gsan nas de rnams kyi don gcig tu dril ba'i khrid yig ngo sprod dang bcas pa mdzad de sde chen pa la gnang de la bdag gi bla ma tsong kha pas gsan des bdag dge slong dar ma rin chen la gnang ngo myur lam zab mo myur du rgyud la skye bar gyur cig  aom swa sti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri bsung can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir kun dga' chos gling gi chos sde che nas chos sbyin char 'di spel sarba mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@013a * sde snod 'dzin pa du mas bskul nas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bor gyur pa rje rin po che thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyi gsung gi cha la dar ma rin chen gyis brjed byang du bkod pa'o 'dis kyang mdo sngags kyis bsdus pa'i thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  aom swa sti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri bsung can  bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir sku 'bum byams pa gling chos sde che nas chos sbyin char 'di spel sarba mangga lam "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5310</vol>
<tib>shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-88a</p>
<col>@087b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba rje btsun byams pa mgon pos mdzad pa rdzogs so rgya gar gyi pandi ta go mi 'chi med dang lo tstsha ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te legs par gtan la phab pa'o aom swa sti chos sku nam mkhar mkhyen brtse'i sprin 'khrigs te zab rgyas chos kyi 'brug sgra bsgrags pa las skal bzang mdongs mtha' can la dge bcu'i mngal bskrun mdzad zas gtsang sras por gus pas 'dud rgyal yum sbas don mngon rtogs rim pa kun rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ji bzhin gsal mdzad pa'i rgyal tshab mi pham mgon dang 'jam dpal dbyangs rgyal sras thogs med seng bzang sogs la 'dud mkhyon gsum rin chen 'byung gnas glong dkyil du sbyorbzhi rin chen bong rim khor yug can sku bzhi rin chen rang bzhin lhun po la 'phrin las rin chen gser ris 'khyud pa @088a * gang rab 'byams rgyal ba'i yab gcig mkhyen pa'i gter rab mdzes gzugs sku gdul bya 'bul gyi ngor ram dom bshad sgrub 'byung gnas byams gling du rab yid shing mo sprul gyi zla tshes la mngon 'dod bag chags bzang po r'a ma na sa lhag bsam dag pa'i nyag pran rab 'phangs pas 'dod sred lang ga'i bdag po'i mgrin bcad de chos sbyin 'phrin las s'i ta thob pa'i dges rnam gsum ngur smrig gos 'chang bung ba'i tshogs thub bstan pad+ma'i tshal 'dir rab zhugs nas lung dang rigs pa'i 'dab gshog zung brkyangs te bshad sgrub sbrang rtsi'i ro yis tshim par shog nam zhig mi pham mgon khyod mig dha ra mchog gi sprul sku'i mdzad pa ston pa'i tshe sras kyi thu bo nyiddu bdag gyur te byang chub mchog tu lung bstan thob par shog ring nas srid mtshor byin pa'i lus can kun srid dang zhi ba'i 'ching ba las grol te mi gnas myang na 'das pa'i grong khyer du kun mkhyen yid bzhin nor la dbang 'byor shog  mdor na bstan 'dzin dam pa'i zhabs pad brtan dge 'dun sde rnams thugs mthun 'chad nyan 'phel gong ma'i chab srid ri dbang ltar brtan cing 'gro rnams sde bzhi'i dpal la longs spyod shog ces gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba'i dbang po bzang po 'phrin las kyis legs bshad 'di par du bskrun pa'i smon tshig tu dbyangs can bzhad pa'i blo gros kyis bris pa dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5312</vol>
<tib>me bya lo khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo ^ pan chen chos kyi rgyal pos ^ gangs can lha gcig phyag na padmo ngur smrig gar gyis rnam par rol pa rgyal ba'i dbang po thams cad mkhyen gzigs chen por byang chub bde lam gyi khrid lung lung rigs kyi mtha' dpyod dang bcas te rgyas par stsal skabs gzhung gi tshig zin la mi gsal ba'i gsung bshad phal mo che'i zin bris bde lam yang gsal sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-22b</p>
<col>@022a * (^rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi khyab bdag rdo rje @022b 'chang kun gzigs ^pan chen chos kyi rgyal pos bde lam gyi zab khrid sku drin bskyangs skabs dngos gzhi'i dmigs skor rnams tshig sna ring thung gi khyad tsam ma gtogs bde lam rtsa ba nang bzhin stsal ba'i zin bris ma dgos shing mtha' dpyod kyi gsung bshad shin tu rgyal pa lung rigs kyis brgyan te mdzad pa rnams las rags pa tho re long de zhig rang blor gsal ba las phal cher gsung ji bzhin dang 'ga' zhig tshig sna cung zad bsdus de dag gi shes byed la sngon kyi skyes rabs dang rtogs brjod dang gtam rgyud sbyar ba rnams las nyung ba rnams gang gsung ltar dang mang ba rnams 'ga' zhig phyogs tsam dang 'ga' zhig ming smos tsam byas gzhan ma 'di'i shes byed la 'di ltar gsungs zer ba lta bu'i mtshams sbyor gyi tshig rnams ma gtogs bsam bzhin du rang bzo byas pa ni gtan nas med ma rtogs log rtog the tshom gyi dri ma'i skyon gyis gos pa ni los yong gang ltar rang gi brjed tho dang zhar la bla ma'i gsung la gces spras byed pa 'ga' re la phan bsams nas ^rgyal dbang mchog gi ^bka' 'bangs kyi tha shal 'du gsum pa mi thung sku skye'i ming can gyis zin bris byas pa yin lo 'dod dang grags 'dod byed dgos med shes rab yon na ni gsung rab kyi tshig don mang po zhig la rtog dpyod 'jug pa'i thabs su yod la) swa sti phan bde'i 'byung gnas rgyal bstan yongs 'du'i ljon rab rgyas 'gro kun thar mchog 'bras bzang la spyod phyir bkra shis lhun grub chos grwa cher chos sbyin 'dzad med dal 'gro'i rgyun 'di spel mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5312</vol>
<tib>mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu'i gter bum sogs ji ltar bya tshul dngos grub 'dod pa 'jo ba'i bum bzang zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@015a * (ces rgyal kun thugs rje'i spyi gzugs 'phags mchog 'jig rten dbang phyug ma rungs 'dul phyin drag po'i skur bzhengs pa myur mdzad mgon po yid bzhin nor bu'i bum sgrub sogs ji ltar bya tshul go d'i zhing rgyas pa zhig dgos zhes dang stobs lhag bsam gyis phyug cing gcig tu dge la 'dun pa'i rnam rgyal grwa tshang gi grwa bgres dge slong bzod pa rgya mtsho nas nan gyis bskul ngor don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te bdag mkhan rin po che thub dbang rdo rje 'chang dngos rje btsun blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa'i mgon dkar bka' rgya ma gzhir bzhag dam pa gong ma gzhan gyi yig rnyig sogs kyi 'ang legs cha blangs te gsar bcos dgos pa rnams gsar bris dang tshig bsgyur 'os rnams bsgyur ba'i mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu'i gter bum sogs ji ltar bya tshul dngos grub 'dod pa 'jo ba'i bum bzang zhes bya ba 'di ni rje btsun dam pa du ma'i bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba zhwa ser bstan pa'i gsal byed aa chi thu no mon han du 'bod pa sh'akya'i dge slong rig pa 'dzin pa blo bzang ye shes bstan pa rab rgyas kyis byang rwa sgreng rgyal ba'i dben gnas kyi rang shag zung 'jug pho brang du sbyar ba 'dis kyang rgyal bstan yun ring du gnas shing rang gzhan thams cad bla ma mgon pos rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>

<item>

<tib>skyer sgang lugs kyi rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgrub thabs pad+ma r'a ga'i phreng ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006b de'ang snga thog phyogs 'di la 'dris pa chung dus drung yig ngag dbang dge legs dang sngags rams pa blo bzang don grub gnyis kyis bskul ma byung tshe brag sna chos rjes g-yas zhal dkar ba dang gshog pa yod pa sogs 'grig 'grig mang po gleng ba tshang mar bzung ba'i g-yar khral zhig bgyis pa dpyod ldan rnams khral 'das kyi rgyu las ma mchis nye lam sgrub thabs pad+ma r'a ga'i phreng ba zhes pa 'di ni drung yig dar rgyas bkra shis kyis gser gyi mandal dang bcas bskul zhing dge slong yon tan dpal bzang dang sngags rams pa blo bzang chos ldan dgon pa ba blo bzang don ldan rnams kyis dgos tshul rim par byung ba dang ging chen tshangs pa'i sku khog dbang 'dus rgyal pos gser srang gang sogs kyi skyes dang bcas bskul ba ltar dpyad shin tu bzod pa'i lugs su byas pa mon pa gro ba'i rdor gcod du 'gro shas che'ang theg dgu'i rnam bzhag mkhyen pa rnams kyis mi 'phya ba rgyu mtshan du byas te yongs 'dzin dam pa chos bzhin du spyod pa du ma'i bka' drin las chos tshul 'di la blo mig yangs pa za hor gyi sngags btsun che mchog 'dus pa rtsal gyis me 'brug chu stod kyis nya ba bden pa bzhi'i chos 'khor bskor ba'i dus chen gyi nyin sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gnas brtan 'jam grags pa'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5314</vol>
<tib>ta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa la sogs pa'i skabs su gdon bgegs kyi bar chad sel ba'i man ngag bdud dpung 'jom pa'i mtshon cha zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8b</p>
<col>@008b (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa la sogs pa'i skabs su gdon bgegs kyi bar chad sel ba'i man ngag bdud dpung 'joms pa'i mtshon cha zhes bya ba 'di ni lhag pa'i lha 'di nyid kyi rnal 'byor la gzhol ba'i sngags pa pad+ma rgyal pos sgrub sri gnon tshul dang gzhan yang gdon bgegs kyi bar chad byung na sel tshul bcas lag tu blang bde bar bkod pa zhig gyis zhes lo snga phyir yang yang nan tan du bskul kyang sa bcad bkod pa bzhin bgegs sel gyi yi ge rgyas pa zhig byed 'dun gyis rim 'gyangs su lus pa nye char bskul pa po lha 'di nyid kyi bsnyen pa mo 'tshams zhig byed rgyud phral du grub pa dgos tshul gyi bskul ma yang sbyar byung bar dus kyis gtugs pas rgyas pa 'bri long ma byung bas 'di tsam zhig rigs mthun gyi yig cha 'ga' nas btus te dharma badzra gyis bris pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5314</vol>
<tib>no title [@006a * rta mgrin cin rigs pa'i dbang len pa dang bskur bar 'dod pas]"</tib>
<p>6a-6b</p>
<col>@006b (yig cha 'di nang bzhin rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi dbang bskur ba'i rgyun dben sa pa la yod [???] pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa dpal ldan ye shes gsung pa ^ dharma badzra gyis thos so</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5315</vol>
<tib>bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi brjod bya dngos brgyad don bdun cu nges par 'byed pa'i thabs dam pa rje btsun chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi gsung rgyun dri ma med pa</tib>
<p>1a-18a</p>
<col>@018a * (aom swa sti sher phyin mdo dang dgongs 'grel blta ba'i mig dngos brgyad don bzang bdun bcu'i rnam bzhag 'di sman pa dge slong nyi mas par du bsgrubs dge des 'jam mgon bstan pa 'bar gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5315</vol>
<tib>byang chub lam rim gyi sngon 'gro'i skor mdor bsdus bya tshul sogs</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>

<item>

<vol>5315</vol>
<tib>dbu ma rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa shes rab ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-23a</p>
<col>@023a * dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa shes rab ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i chos mngon par rnam par bzhag pa don dam pa'i de kho na yang dag par ston pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gsal bar byed pa slob dpon bdag nyid chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rjer ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa bla na med pa'i tshul rab tu 'byed pa rab tu dga' ba'i sa bsgrubs nas bde ba can gyi zhing du gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams dang ba'i 'od ces bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas 'od ces bya bar 'gyur bas mdzad pa rdzogs so dbang phyug chen mo'i mnga' bdag rgyal po chen po dpal lha btsan po'i bka' lung gis rgya gar gyi mkhan po theg pa chen po dbu ma pa dzny'a na garbha dang zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa 'di la rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa bdun shloo ka ni bzhi brgya bzhi bcu rtsa dgu yod bam po ni phyed dang gnyis su byas so slad kyi grong khyer dpe med kyi pandi ta bi dya ha su ma ti'i zhal snga nas dang bod kyi lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma grags kyis 'grel pa dang bstun nas shin tu legs par bcos so  (zhes pa 'di ni bkra shis chos spel grwa tshang gi par du bsgrubs pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5315</vol>
<tib>gcig tu bral gyi yig cha'i dga' gnas kha skang dang bcas pa gsal bar bshad pa'i rnam bzhag blo gsar dga' skyed beedurya'i mgul rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-19a</p>
<col>@017b (ces pa 'di ni ^rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs rje rin po che @018a * la zhal gzigs te man ngag gnang skabs he ru ka lhun po'i rtse mor dngos su zhugs te 'dzam gling spyan sngan 'dug pas byin rlabs ha cang myur du 'jug pa'i dbang gis rgya gar na he ru ka'i rnal 'byor pas yi rdul ltar mang du byung zhes gsung ba'i he ru ka de nyid dpal ldan chos grags la zhal gzigs te ci 'dod gsung bar phyogs las rnam rgyal zhus pas ha ha he zhes gsung byin pa tsam gyis chos grags nyid phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams mu me dpar btsal kyang rnyed rgyu med pa rigs pa smra ba'i seng ge'i ngar skad sgrog pas phas rgol gyi ri dwags ngan pa yod tshad kyi thod bum dral byed kyi 'gran zla med pa'i pan chen zhig tu gyur ba sogs dran pa tsam gyis byin rlabs mchog stsol zhing sgrub 'brel med par dngos grub mchog stsol ba'i yi dam gyi lha'i gtso bo de nyid bsam bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshul bzung ste byang phyogs khal khar byon zhes snang mtha'i pan chen gyis dngos su lung bstan pa'i skyes chen dam pa mtshan brjod par dka' ba don gi slad du mtshan nas smos te^ rje btsun blo bzang tshul khrims 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes rgya bod hor gsum na yongs su grags pa'i bdan dkar po rnam par bsgreng ba bde nyid ri bo dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling ci rigs su lo bcu phrag gnyis tsam zhal zhugs pa'i ring la mdo sngags zung 'brel dang thun mong gi rigs gnas rgya bod hor gsum na yod tshad dang bod na yang nub la khad pa'i sgra rigs par mkhas pa'i blo gsal mkhas mang klong brdol du byung zhing rje nyid kyi byin rlabs kyis 'chad rtsod rtson gsum gyi bya bame ltar 'bar ba'i sgo nas dpal @018b ldan 'bras spungs bkra shis sgo mang gnyis par song ba'i chos grwa chen po dga' ldan theg chen gling pa'i rigs smra'i cha gtogs shes brgya zhes pas gcig tu bral gyi dka' gnas skong la snga nas sems la 'phral phral du byung ba'i mos mno'i tho re ba rnams lung rigs kyis brgyan te bsan kyin yod skabs dpyid chos phyi ma'i dmad ma bcar khad nye ba'i tshe gzhung gser gong 'og gi grwa rigs rigs smra'i ser phrug rnams la phan snyams pas rkyen byas te shog bur bris pa 'di yang ^bla ma he ru ka de nyid rmad byung bas kyang rmad byung ngo mtshar bas kyang ngo mtshar ba'i gser zhal bskal brgyad zhugs te sa mtha'i 'gro ba kun gyi ma rig mun pa sel bar mdzad pa'i rgyur 'gyur cig  lung rigs smra ba'i ngag la dbang bsgyur cing lung don mkhyen pa'i blo gros rab rgyas pas lung rtogs yon tan don gnyis lhun grub pa'i lung rigs dbang phyug pa shes gnyen mchog des skyongs gang de'i mkhyen dpyod bi shwa karma yis legs par bzo ba'i bee t'ura mgul rgyan 'di tshogs dbus smra ba'i khyu mchog don gnyer ba'i blo gsal rnams kyis mgul rgyan don du longs rin chen rgyan 'di nam mkha' ji srid du nor 'dzin khyab brdal spel slad par du bsgrubs zer sgros rdzu 'phreng 'ching bu lhang 'tsher la snying por 'dzin rnams 'di la mig stos shig 'dir 'bad legs byas legs bshad par chen 'di skal bzang rna ba'i lam nas bder son te blo ldan rnams la rigs lam spel ba'i @019a * gtam chad med sgrog pas kun dga' skyed gyur cig  phan bde 'byung gnas rgyal bstan yid bzhin nor mchog dman 'gro ba'i re bskong bzhin par phyogs mtha' kun tu khyab brdal rgyas gyur te srid zhi'i rgud pa mtha' dag sel gyur cig  tshul 'dir 'bad byung rnam dkar sbrang cha rdul rgyal sras smon lam gangg'a dang 'grogs te rgyal ba'i smon lam rgya mtshor yongs 'khyil bas phan bde rin chen 'gro la stobs gyur cig  (ces par byang smon tshig 'di ni bkra shis chos 'phel grwa tshang gi gzhung gsar 'og gi 'dzin grwa'i grwa slob rnams kyis gcig tu bral gyi rnam bzhag bee d'urya'i mgul rgyan khu re chen mor par du bsgrubs pa'i tshe dad brtson rnam dpyod dang ldan pa'i dge slong chos srung gis par byang 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor dka' bcu pa bshad sgrub bstan dar gyis sug bris su bgyis pa'o mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>5317</vol>
<tib>ma cig mkha' 'gro snyan brgyud kyi gcod lam zab rgyun gyi rnal 'byor shin tu 'khyer bde bkod pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@010b ces ma cig mkha' 'gro snyan brgyud kyi lam zab rgyun gyi rnal 'byor shing tu 'khyer bde bar bkod pa 'di ni yongs 'dzin dam pa byams pa 'phrin las dar rgyas kyi zhabs rdul spyi bor len pa sh'akya'i dge slong chos med snyoms las can byams pa lha dbang rig 'dzin gyis rang nyid kha kha don du bya ba'i ched @011a * du shin tu myar bar sbyar ba'o rgyun gyi nyams len la dkar 'gyed thor 'bul ma byas rjes kha 'gyed dmar 'gyed bzhag nas stong gsum nam mkha' khyab pa'i 'jig rten na zhes pa man chad byas kyang chog lags lam zab rgyun gyi rnal 'byor 'di nyid kyi lung 'khrid gzhung khungs rnams rje bla ma byams pa lha dbang rig 'dzin gyi mdzad pas gzhir bzhag la phat kyi dmigs rim rnams zhal shes su bstsal ba bkod cing mthing rtags kya phye ba rnams cung zad spos zab do snyan brgyud zab lam chen mo sogs gcod gzhung nas kha skangs ldan thabs kyi tshul du gnyan khrod pa ngag dbang phun tshogs kyis bkod pa dge legs su gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>tshad ma rnam 'grel legs par bshad pa zhes bya ba thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun grub kyis mdzad pa las tshad ma grub pa'i le'u'i rnam bshad</tib>

<tib>bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan 'grel pa dang bcas pa'i rnam bshad rin chen gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba las sbyor lam gyi skor</tib>
<p>1a-34b</p>
<col></col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5324</vol>
<tib>dngos po brgyad don bdun cu'i rnam bzhag legs par bshad pa mi pham bla ma'i zhal lung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-31a</p>
<col>@030a * dngos brgyad bdun cu'i don kun ches gsal ba'i legs bshad mi pham bla ma'i zhal lung 'di thub bstan phyogs bcur rgyas pa'i ched bskrun pas 'gro ba'i lam bzang snang ba 'bar gyur cig de skad smras pa mang thos 'jam dbyangs zhal bzhad pa rab rgyas 'jigs med rdo rje yis dga' ba brgya ldan bshad sgrub dar rgyas gling bkra shis kun nas 'khyil bar sbyar ba dge  aom swa sti pra dzny'a bhya: rnam dpyod chu gter gting mtha' bral ba'i dogs 'jam dbyangs gdengs can rtse dgas rol pa las legs bshad ralbs phreng bzhad pa'i dpal yon can 'dzam gling bstan pa'i gnyen gcig de la 'dud lung rigs 'od stong @030b 'bad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis thub bstan sa chen khor yug gsal byed cing lung chos pad+ma'i dga' tshal rgyas byad pa smra ba'i nyi ma gnyis pa gzhan yod min dpal ldan mkhas pa'i deng dpon gang gi tshig blo gsal yid mtsho rgyas byed kunda'i gnyen 'khor 'das rang bzhin gsal ston nyi ma ste lung rigs 'dod 'jo nor bu'i gter kyang yin de phyir mkhas pa'i skye bo mtha' dag la legs bshad bdud rtsi'i dga' ston spro ba'i phyir dad ldan dar han chos rjes rkyen sbyar te mi pham zhal lung 'di nyid par du sgrub tshul 'dar dad pas 'brel ba thogs pa kun gnas skangs tshe ring nad med longs spyod 'phel mthar thug sgrib gnyis bag chags las grol te rnam 'dren rgyal ba'i go 'phang myur thob shog (ces gangs can mkhas grub kun gyi gtsug rgyan kun mkhyen chen po 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rje phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i sdes mdzad pa'i bdun cu'i mtha' dpyod nor bu'i phreng mdzes mkhas pa'i mgul rgyan zhes bya ba 'di'ang dad ldan dar han chos rjes gang rtsi'i mthun rkyen sbyar te zhus dag pa dka' bcu dkon mchog rgya  mtsho dang dka' bcu rab brtan rgya mtsho gnyis @031a * dang dam pa rje rigs thu rab 'byams pa blo bzang bstan 'phel dang rab 'byams pa kun dga' bstan 'dzin gnyis dang yig mkhan ngag dbang chos 'byor dang brkos mkhan ngag dbang phyag rdor 'jam dbyangs shes rab bsod nams rnams kyis bgyis te dpar sgrub pa'i dang ra byang du sh'akya'i dge slong zhwa ser cod pan 'dzin pa dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang pos sbyar ba'o ) * kun mkhyen mkhyen rab ser mo'i 'du byed kyis sher phyin spas don lam gyi lha yi nor bu glegs bam srad bur brgyus pa'i legs bshad 'di phar phyin nang shog bdun cu lhag tsam bcas dad sogs kyis mtho dge slong ye shes kyis rkyen sbyar chos sbyin spel byed spar du bsgurbs dge bas 'brel thogs gtso byas 'gro ba kun gzhung mchog 'dis bstan lam bzang mthar phyin shog  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5324</vol>
<tib>rgyas pa'i bstan bcos tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi tshig le'ur byas pa</tib>
<p>1a-79a</p>
<col>@078a * tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi tshig le'ur byas pa 'di ni yul lho phyogs kyi rgyud du byung ba gzhung lugs ngan pa thams cad ches shin tu 'khrul bar 'jug pa snyan pa'i grags pas sa'i steng ma lus par khyab pa 'gran zla med pa'i mkhas pa chen po dpal chos kyi grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so  ` rgya gar gyi mkhan po su bhu ti shr'i shan ti dang bod kyi lo tstsha ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur dpal ldan dam pa'i las la mngon dges pa smad med che ba'i bdag can rgyal po mchog dge ba'i thugs mnga' des pas skyong ba mi yi bdag po dbang sde'i bkas bskul nas brtson ldan lhag par dpyod ldan 'chang po dang nyan po rgol dang phyir rgol don nges dang 'bel gtam dga' ston rgya chen myong ba'i phyir 'dzam gling mkhas pa'i rgyan gyur rgyan 'di bsgyur lta ngan kun sel gnyis su med pa yi don dam rnam dpyod lhur len bstan bcos 'di gzhung mang don dka' bsgrub par @078b dka' na yang 'bras bu che phyir 'bad par rigs pa yin log pa'i rgyun phyogs rjes su gzhol gyur ba lta ba chu bo bzlog par dka' mod kyi yang dag rigs pas legs par brda sprod na 'ga' yi yid la ci ste 'bab mi 'gyur sgra don gnyis ka nyams su bder lon te mun sprul gyis ni ma bslad legs bsgyur ba sngon gyi sgyur byed dam pa de dag gi dri tsam bro ba da lta kho bor zad dpal ldan kha che'i rigs pa pa'i gtsug gi nor bu skal ldan ni rgyal po zhes bya la thos nas blo ldan bzang pos 'di bsgyur ro grong khyer chen po dpe med kyi shar phyogs na yul 'khor lo 'dzin pa zhes bya ba grub pa'i gnas su grags pa'i 'dabs rnam par rgyal ba'i zhing zhes bya bar kha che'i pandi ta chen po skal ldan rgyal po dang bod kyi lo tstsha ba chen po dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o dus phyis sa'i steng na 'gran zla thams cad dang bral ba'i mkhas pa bsod snyamos pa chen po sh'akya shr'i bha tra la sogs pa rnams dang sh'akya'i dge slong kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o chos kyi grags pa'i gsung rab dri ma med rigs pa'i mthar thug tshad ma rnam 'grel 'di sgra don ji bzhin blo yis legs rtogs nas ston pa gangs can 'di na kho bo tsam mangga lam "</col>
</item>
