<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5326</vol>
<tib>grub pa'i dbang phyug chos nyid rang grol nas brgyud pa'i mkha' 'gro snyan brgyud lugs kyi khros ma nag mo lha lnga'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg</tib>
<p>1a-22a</p>
<col>@022a * (ces ma cig khros ma nag mo'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg bya tshul ye shes me 'od ces bya ba 'di ni gnyan khrod pa ngag dbang phun tshogs kyis mdzad pa'i khros ma nag mo'i sbyin bsreg rab dkar bdud rtsi bum bzang dang gnyan khrod pa bsam 'phel ming can gyis mdzad pa'i m cig khros ma nag mo'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg ye shes me 'od dang gnyan khrod pa dge slong bi tyas mdzad pa'i khros nag lha lnga'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg shes rab rgya mtsho'i mdzad pa khros nag lha lnga'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg dam tshig rdo rjes mdzad pa'i bunte shr'i'i lugs kyi khros nag lha lnga'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg tsha khar dge bshes blo bzang tshul khrims kyi 'jigs byed dpa' bo gcig pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg sogs kyis gzhir byas nas gcig la mi gsal ba rnams cig shos la kha skang te gungs bsgrigs nas sangs rgyas dngos 'dra'i bshes gnyen mang po'i drung nas sbyin bsreg gi khrid lan gnyis thob cing dam pa de rnams kyi zhabs rdul spyi bos reg pa skal pa cung zad thob pas rgyal khams nyul ba'i gnas bskor ba ^dzny'a na pra ni dh'a nas zin bris su bgyis pa 'di la dbang ma thob pa dang dam tshig gi sel ba can rnams kyi lhas na bka' bsrung mkha' 'gro'i bka' chad 'ong ba yod pas su rung rung la ma ston legs so</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5326</vol>
<tib>lam zab rgyun gyi rnal 'byor gyi 'don cha'i zur 'debs bdud gcod ral gri zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-18a</p>
<col>@017b gcod kyi 'don cha 'di yang don gnyer can mang po'i 'dod mos ltar kun mkhyen mchog gi sprul pa'i sku rin po che blo bzang thub bstan 'jigs med rgya mtsho dbus nas mdo smad du 'byon pa'i phobs pa sur phyin pa'i lam bar gyi gnas des dag tu thor bu yid la gang dran gyi tshul du bris shing bde mo thang dga' ldan chos 'khor gling du mjug grub par bgyis pa'o  `  kho bo ratna dhwa dza blo gros dman sbyangs ba chung zhing nyams len med pa'i skyon gang 'dir 'gal zlos ma 'brel la sogs pas spags srid mkhas pa'i @18a * tshogs kyis bzod par gsol mkhas rnams dgyes pa bskyed par mi nus kyang rang mnyam blo dman dag la phan slad du bod 'dir ma cig ye shes mkha' 'gro mas btse bas gzigs la dngos grub char du snyil 'di yang kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i sde'i thugs rje la brten bkra shis 'khyil gling gi lho rgyud mdo sngags chos gra sgrogs pa'i tshal dga' ldan chos 'khor gling du legs par grub sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5326</vol>
<tib>ma cig khros ma lha lnga'i dkyil 'khor du bdag nyid 'jug cing dbang blang ba'i cho ga byin rlabs bdud rtsi'i dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-20a</p>
<col>@019b (ces pa ma cig khros ma lha lnga'i bdag 'jug gi cho ga go bde bklag chog tu bkod pa 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes su nyid ga-yon ru'i dgon dga' ldan bde chen gling gi ri khrod bla ma rnams dang wang gi sras mo tshe 'dzin dpal mos snga mo nas yang yang bskul zhing nye char lam 'di la mchog tu mos pa'i rab 'byams pa dam pa dge bshes blo bzang rdo rje gnyis kyis phyogs 'dir 'jam mgon rgyal ba'i bstan pa spel ba la thugs bskyed @020a * smon lam gyi mthu grub pa sprul pa'i sku rin po che byams pa rgya mtsho la 'phrin gyi sgo nas dngul gyi me tog lha rdzad bcas nan cher bskul bcug pa'i ngor ^kun mkhyen chen po 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i slob brgyud kyi zhabs rdul la spyi bos reg pa'i bka' drin las zab mo gcod kyi bka' brgyud bzhi'i smin byed cha lag dang bcas pa thob pa'i btsun gzugs ngag dbang thub bstan rgya mtshos rje 'jam dbyangs mgon po'i dbang chog dang de'i lhan thabs mkhan chen chos rnam rgyal mkhas pa ngag dbang phun tshogs rje dam tshig rdo rje sogs kyis mdzad pa dang chos 'di'i bka' babs grub pa'i dbang phyug bsod nams grags pa sku snga phyi yab sras rnams kyi zhal gyi bdud rtsi la brten nas sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang 'jam mgon rgyal ba'i lugs bzang nam yang mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cig </col>

<item>

<item>

<tib>man ngag bdud kyi gcod yul zab don thugs snying zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>

<vol>5326</vol>
<tib>zhi ba lam zab kyi don 'grel dmigs khrid kyi tshul du bkod pa gnad don kun gsal zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@010b (ces ma cig mkha' 'gro snyan rgyud kyi lus sbyin zhi ba lam zab kyi don 'grel dmigs khrid kyi tshul du bkod pa gnad don kun gsal zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam dpyod mchog tu yangs pa dge slong bsod nams bkra shis dang dge slong 'jam dbyangs rgya mtsho gnyis kyis lo snga phyir nan tan chen pos bskul ngor rigs kun 'dus pa'i bdag nyid kun mkhyen bla ma yab sras rnams kyi zhabs rdul spyi bor brten pa'i bran gyi yang bran ^@011a * sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtshos bshad sgrub bstan pa'i 'byung gnas dmu dge brka shis 'khor lo'i dgon du rdzogs par sbyar ba dge legs 'phel 'di yang kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i sde'i thugs rje la brten bkra shis 'khyil gling gi lho rgyud mdo sngags chos sgra sgros pa'i tshal dga' ldan chos 'khor gling du legs par grub) mangga la bha wantu "</col>

<tib>dgongs skyod ma</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5327</vol>
<tib>ma cig khros ma nag mo lha lnga'i sgrub thabs kyi tshig don rnam par bshad pa mkha' 'gro'i dgongs rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-39a</p>
<col>@039a * (ces ma gcig khros ma nag mo lha lnga'i sgrub thabs kyi tshig don rnam par bshad pa mkha' 'gro'i dgongs rgyan ces bya ba 'di ni gso ba rig pa'i gnas la rnam dpyod kyi 'jug pa mchog tu yangs pa h'al ha sman rams pa bstan 'dzin rgya mtshos 'phags pa thugs rje chen po bcu gcig zhal gyi snang brnyan khyad 'phags lha rdzas dang bcas te lo snga phyir nan tan du bskul te mgo brtsams kyang ga-yeng ba'i dbang gis rim 'gyangs su lus pa las nye char gzhung brgya smra ba'i dbang po rdo rams pa gnas brtan rgya mtshos mjug rdzogs par grub pa zhig cis kyang byed dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor ^sangs rgyas kun 'dus kyi ngo bo bla ma rdo rje 'chang yab sras rnams kyi bka' drin la brten nas lugs 'di'i smin byed cha lag dang bcas pa rdzogs par thob pa'i btsun gzugs blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtshos sbyar ba'i dge ba'i mthu la brten nas blo bzang 'jam dpal snying po'i ring lugs mdo sngags zung 'brel gyi bstan pa rin chen mi nus pa'i rgyal mtshan srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du bsgrengs te skye dgu mtha' dag don gnyis lhun gyis grub pa'i dga' ston la 'dod dgur longs spyod par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5327</vol>
<tib>ma cig mkha' 'gro snyan brgyud kyi zhal gdams rdo rje tshig rkang 'grel pa dang bcas pa'i gzhung 'khrid ri khrod pa bsod nams dbang phyug gis mkha' 'gro'i bka' rgya yod na 'di grol nas zin bris su bkod pa</tib>
<p>1a-30a</p>
<col>@029a * ma cig mkha' 'gro'i snyan brgyud kyi zhal gdams rdo rje tshig rkang gi 'grel pa dang bcas pa'i zhal gdams sgron me skor gsum gyi snying po yid bzhin nor bu lta bu 'di gzhung 'khrid ri khrod pa bsod nams dbang phyug gis mdzad pa'i khyad chos za 'og gi ras ma rdzogs so "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5327</vol>
<tib>ma gcig khros ma nag mo lha lnga'i mdun bskyed kyi cho ga mkha' 'gro mnyes byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@012b (ces ma gcig khros ma nag mo lha lnga'i mdun bskyed kyi cho ga mkha' 'gro mnyes byed ces bya ba 'di ni don gnyer can mang pos lo du ma'i bar du nan tan chen pos bskul ba la brten nas mongs 'dzin dam pa tshes bzhin du spyod pa rnams kyi bka' drin las khros ma nag mo'i dbang dang gdams ngag brgyud pa mi 'dra ba du ma thos pa'i ku s'a li ^dharma badzra gyis dge byed kyi lo hor zla gnyis @013a * pa'i tshes bcu la dben gnas chos bzang gi sgrub sde bde chen chos gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bikshu su ma ti aananta'o 'di brtsom par 'dod nas bskal bzang mos pa'i rdzing bu ji snyed par zhes pa'i tshig de bris pa dang dus mtshungs su grwa ba zhig gis gcod kyi dpe cha po ti gnyis khyer byung ba lag tu blang ba'i de ma thag lo 'di'i thog ma'i 'brug skad grags cing kha char 'dres ma zhig gis ri lung thams cad dkar 'jam yug gcig tu song bas chos 'dis gzhan la phan thogs pa'i rten 'brel phun sum tshogs pa 'grigs so</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5327</vol>
<tib>ma gcig khros ma nag mo'i sbyin bsreg rab dkar bdud rtsi'i bum bzang</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@006a * (ces snyan brgyud rdo rje tshig rkang las me gzer bu zhes pa gson shi'i sbyin bsreg rab dkar bdud rtsi bum bzang gzhan las kyang cung zad kha bskang te gnyan khrod pa ngag dbang phun tshogs dpal bzang pos bkod pa'o 'di'i lung brgyud ni mdzad pa po nges ge ri lha btsun skal bzang tshogs gnyis rdo rje 'chang 'jigs med ye shes nges bdag la gnang ba'o</col>
</item>

<tib>ma gcig mkha' 'gro snyan brgyud kyi gdams ngag zhung 'khrid ri khrod pas mdzad pa</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5327</vol>
<tib>ma gcig mkha' 'gro'i snyan rgyud khros ma nag mo lha lnga'i bdag mdun gyi cho ga dang bum pa bsgrub tshul dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>1a-19a</p>
<col>@019a * (ces dpal ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma ma gcig khos ma nag mo lha lnga'i bdag mdun bum pa bsgrub tshul 'di ni ^ge re ngag dbang phun tshogs kyis mngon dkyil cho ga'i bdag mdun dang bum sgrub ni 'di'i mdzad pa'i dbang cho ga ltar yi ge gsal nas bla ma rnams kyi man ngag ltar sh'akya'i dge slon dzny'a na pra ni dhwa nas bsgrigs pa'o bla ma'i man ngag chad lhag gi nyes pa byung na bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro rnams kyis bzod par mdzod</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5327</vol>
<tib>rdo rje tshig rkang zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>30a-30b</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5328</vol>
<tib>gnas brtan phyag mchod dang 'brel ba'i ga-yang 'bod bsam 'phel dbang rgyal zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b (zhes gnas brtan phyag mchod dang 'brel ba'i ga-yang 'bod bsam 'phel dbang rgyal zhes bya ba 'di ni ^drin can bla ma yongs 'dzin mi 'gyur mtshan can gyi zhal snga nas gnas brtan ba ku la'i mchod chog bris nag yang 'bod re dgos pa'i gsung mching stsal bar brten ^sh'akya'i btsun gzugs 'jam dbyangs dgyes pa'i bshes gnyen gyis rab tshes me stag zla tshes dge bar rang gi bsti gnas su sbyar ba dge legs 'phel mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5328</vol>
<tib>grub mtha'i rnam bzhag gces btus dran thor bkod pa gzhung lugs rgya mtshor bgrod pa'i lam yig ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-33b</p>
<col>@033a * ces phyi nang gi grub mtha'i rnam bzhag gces btus dran thob bkod pa gzhung lugs rgya mtshor bgrod pa'i lam yig ces bya ba 'di ni yig cha'i khas len dang mthun pa'i grub mtha'i rnam bzhag mdor bsdus shing gnad tshang ba 'di lta bu zhig 'bri na rang dang skal mnyam gzhan la'ang phan thogs par 'gyur ram snyam pa'i 'dun pa snga mo nas yod thog gzur gnas chos kyi spyan ldan gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po 'ga' zhig nas kyang 'bri na legs tshul gyi rting bskul byung zhing nye char rang gi slob ma 'ga' zung gis cis kyang 'bri dgos pa'i mthun 'gyur byed pa rnams la brten nas ^rgyal ba'i lung gis zin pa'i chos sde chen po dga' ldan theg chen gling gi rig smra yongs kyi tha shal du gtogs pa blo bzang rta dbyangs ming pas gzhung gi byings blo gling yig cha'i khas len gyi ryun la @033b gzhir bzung zhing khas len phyogs mthun gzhan rnams grub mtha'i yig cha tshad thub rnams kyi tshig zin sgra sor bzhag tu bkod pas legs par brgyan te sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni chos kyi mig can gyi zhabs drung 'phags pa skyabs kyis bgyis pa dge legs 'phel 'dis kyang kun mkhyen sh'akya'i sras kyi ring lugs dri ma med pa de nyid sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas shing mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig dza yantu "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5328</vol>
<tib>gzur gnas dpyod ldan rnams la phul ba'i springs yig skye ba lnga pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-23a</p>
<col>@023a * (ces gzur gnas dpyod ldan rnams la phul ba'i springs yig skye ba lnga pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di ni phyi gtsang nang gtsang padmo'i spubs lta bu'i bka' gdams gsar rnying gi ring lugs 'dzin skyong spel ba'i grwa sa chen po dga' ldan theg chen gling gi rigs smra'i tha shal du gtogs pa'i btsun gzugs (rtsa ba rta mgrin) zhig gis 'phral gyi rkyen dbang gis bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni rang gi slob ma dpyod ldan dge slong blo bzang chos 'phel lo 'dis kyang 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa rin po che sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam ` aom swa sti skyabs mgon bzhi pa'i thugs rje'i 'od stong gis dus mthar rgyal bstan 'dab brgya bzhad pa'i tshal chos grwa bkra shis chos 'byor gling mchog nas spar gyi chos sbyin sbrang rtsi'i dga' ston spel sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5328</vol>
<tib>gzur gnas dpyod ldan rnams la phul ba'i springs yig skye ba lnga pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-23a</p>
<col>@023a * (ces gzur gnas dpyod ldan rnams la phul ba'i springs yig skye ba lnga pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di ni phyi gtsang nang gtsang padmo'i spubs lta bu'i bka' gdams gsar rnying gi ring lugs 'dzin skyong spel ba'i grwa sa chen po dga' ldan theg chen gling gi rigs smra'i tha shal du gtogs pa'i btsun gzugs  zhig gis 'phral gyi rkyen dbang gis bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni rang gi slob ma dpyod ldan dge slong blo bzang chos 'phel lo 'dis kyang 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa rin po che sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam ` aom swa sti skyabs mgon bzhi pa'i thugs rje'i 'od stong gis dus mthar rgyal bstan 'dab brgya bzhad pa'i tshal chos grwa bkra shis chos 'byor gling mchog nas spar gyi chos sbyin sbrang rtsi'i dga' ston spel sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5328</vol>
<tib>'jam mgon bla ma yab sras chos rgyal rigs ldan rnams dang bcas pa'i phyag mchod chog 'khyer bde gnad tshang btson 'don cang shes zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@011a * (ces 'jam mgon bla ma yab sras chos rgyal rigs ldan rnams dang bcas pa'i phyag mchod cho ga 'khyer bde gnad tshang btson 'don cang shes zhes bya ba 'di ni dad gus rnam dpyod can gyi bu slob rtsis rams pa ngag dbang brtson 'grus dang dge slong aa ba ri dza ta gnyis kyis so so nas rab dkar lha rdzas dang rten 'brel 'grigs pa'i dngos 'bul dang bcas te nan tan du bskul ba bzhin ^sh'akya'i btsun gzugs 'jam dbyangs dgyes pa'i bshes gnyen gyis dpal gdong lo'i skar ma smin drug gis nya ba'i nyin dge bar chos sde chos dbyings 'od gsal gling gi nye 'dabs kyi bsti gnas brag ser khrod du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang yul dang dus mtha'i bstan 'gro yongs la rgya cher phan thogs par gyur cig  ` aom swa sti skyabs mgon bzhi pa'i thugs rje'i 'od stong gis dus mthar rgyal bstan 'dab brgya bzhad pa'i tshal chos grwa bkra shis chos 'byor gling mchog nas spar gyi chos sbyin sbrang rtsi'i dga' ston spel sarba mangga lam)"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5328</vol>
<tib>'phags pa ba ku las thog drangs pa'i gnas brtan phyag mchod kyi cho ga nam mkha' mdzod kyi sgo 'byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8b</p>
<col>@008b (zhes 'phags pa ba ku las thog drangs pa'i gnas brtan phyag mchod kyi cho ga nam mkha' mdzod kyi sgo 'byed es bya ba 'di ni aaul'an 'e reg gi chos sde dga' ldan rab rgyas gling dang sang gii ta la'i chos sde'i bde mchog grwa tshang gi bla ma las sde rnam pas spyi so'i bogs 'don du mchod cho ka 'khyer bde gnang tshang 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes kha btags dang dngul tam gyi rten dang bcas te nan tan du bskul bar brten ^sh'akya'i btsun gzugs mkhan ming 'jam dbyangs dgyes pa'i bshes gnyen gyis rab tshes me stag zla tshe de ge bar rang gi bsti gnas su sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang mtha' dbus kun tu rgyal bstan rin po che'i zhabs 'degs yun ring byed bus par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5328</vol>
<tib>rje btsun sgrol ma bka' bsrung dang bcas pa la brten pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor 'phrin las sgo 'byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@003b (zhes rje btsun @004a * sgrol ma bka' bsrung dang bcas pa la brten pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor 'phrin las sgo 'byed ces bya ba 'di ni rang gzhan gyi lag len du mkho khyad che bar mthong ste ^th'u kwan yongs 'dzin gyi gsung la dgos dbang gis bris snon cung zad bgyis ngos ^bla ma lha bsrung gi thugs rjes nye bar 'tsho ba'i btsun gzugs blo bzang rta dbyangs kyis yi ge'i lam du gshar mar spel ba dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5328</vol>
<tib>rje btsun sgrol ma dang dpal ldan lha mo sbrags sgrub kyi ga-yang 'gugs nor bu dga' 'khyil zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (ces rje btsun sgrol ma dang dpal ldan lha mo sbrags sgrub kyi ga-yang 'gugs nor bu dga' 'khyil zhes bya ba 'di ni dad ldan slob ma 'ga' zhig gi 'dod mos ltar ^thu bkwan yongs 'dzin gyi sgrol ma'i ga-yang 'gugs la 'khor gnyis dang lha mo'i ga-yang 'bod gsang du bcug ste dka' bcu pa blo bzang rta dbyangs kyis sug bris su bgyis pa dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5328</vol>
<tib>rje btsun sgrol ma zhi ba chen mo bka' bsrung zhi ba'i lha mo dang bcas pa la brten nas mi phyugs kyi nad rims sel zhing bsrung ba'i bum pa sgrub tshul kun phan bdud rtsi sprin bcud ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@009a * (ces grub pa'i slob dpon chen po nyi ma swas pa'i lugs kyi rje btsun sgrol ma zhi ba chen mo bka' bsrung zhi ba'i lha mo dang bcas pa la brten nas mi phyugs kyi nad rims sel bsrung ba'i bum pa sgrub tshul kun phan bdud rtsi'i sprin bcud ces bya ba 'di ni yul dang dus kyi mtha' 'dir rang gzhan gyi nyams len du dgos gal che bar mthong nas mkhas grub tshad ldan rnams kyi man ngag bzhin du btsun gzugs aa shwa gho shas yi ge'i lam du spel ba dge legs 'phel sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5328</vol>
<tib>rje btsun sgrol ma zhi ba chen mo bka' bsrung zhi ba'i lha mo dang bcas pa la brten nas mi phyugs kyi nad rims sel zhing bsrung ba'i bum pa sgrub tshul kun phan bdud rtsi sprin bcud ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@009a * (ces grub pa'i slob dpon chen po nyi ma swas pa'i lugs kyi rje btsun sgrol ma zhi ba chen mo bka' bsrung zhi ba'i lha mo dang bcas pa la brten nas mi phyugs kyi nad rims sel bsrung ba'i bum pa sgrub tshul kun phan bdud rtsi'i sprin bcud ces bya ba 'di ni yul dang dus kyi mtha' 'dir rang gzhan gyi nyams len du dgos gal che bar mthong nas mkhas grub tshad ldan rnams kyi man ngag bzhin du btsun gzugs aa shwa gho shas yi ge'i lam du spel ba dge legs 'phel sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5328</vol>
<tib>rnam sras mdung dmar can la spyi stabs bya tshul rgyal chen dgyes byed mchod sprin rgya mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (zhes pa 'di ni rnam sras mdung dmar can lo spyi stabs dgos skabs 'di skor gyi gtor ma'i las rim sogs ma mthong bas ji ltar byed mi shes kyang khu re che ma so'i rnam sras spyi stabs kyi lag len gzhir byas rnam sras mdung dmar can dang 'brel 'khur byas te dka' bcu blo bzang ming can gyis bsgrigs pa 'dis kyang rgyal chen dgyis nas bstan pa dang bstan 'dzin yongs la mthun rkyen 'dod dgu'i char chen rgyun chad med par babs par gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>5328</vol>
<tib>spyi bshags</tib>
<p>1a-2b</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5329</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo rig byed ma'i mchod chog dge legs char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-24a</p>
<col>@024a * (ces bcom ldan 'das ma rig byed dbang mo'i mchod chog dge legs char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni dkon mchog la mi phyed pa'i dad pa sogs bsngags par 'os pa'i yon tan du ma dang ldan pa dge tshul ma tshe 'phel sgrol dkar sras mo sogs dang bcas pa nas skul ma mdzad pa ltar bsod nams rgya mtshos sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni lung dang rtogs pa'i rgyan gyis thugs rgyud lhag par mdzes pa dus 'khor dge bskos blo bzang tshe ring gis grogs dan byas te bgyis pa dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5329</vol>
<tib>bdud rtsi snying po yan lag brgyad pa gsang ba man ngag gi rgyud las dum bu dang po rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@009a * 'di yang t'a la'i t'a chen gung gi shog gso rig 'dzin pa'i dge slong mi bskyod dang dge slong rgyal mtshan gnyis kyis bskul bskrun nas brko mkhan tho ga chi dang gsum ka yis dad pa'i sems kyis yid mthun 'gro ba kun dug gsum nyon mongs mtha' dag sel ba las mthar thug mngon mtho nges legs thob pa'i ched dmigs te phun tshogs gling du dpar du bkod "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5329</vol>
<tib>bka' bsrung gtso mo 'dod khams dbang phyug ma la brten pa'i gdab las ji ltar bya ba'i rim pa dang chos skyong dregs pa lcam dral gyi bsnyen bsgrub bsad pa gcig tu dril ba'i gdams pa 'jigs rung me'i spu gri zhes bya ba bzhugs so  * bka' bsrung gtso mo 'dod khams dbang phyug ma la brten pa'i gdab las ji ltar bya ba'i rim pa ni"</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * ces pa 'di ni rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa bstan 'dzin dang bcas pa la mchog tu dad pa 'bri lung chos rjes nan gyis bskul ba la brten nas mdo rgyud man ngag 'dzin pa'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po'i gzims khang rgyal mtshan mthon po'i gzims chung yid dga' chos 'dzin du sbyar ba'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5329</vol>
<tib>bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan 'grel pa dang bcas pa'i rnam bshad rin chen gsal ba'i sgron me las mngon shes kyi skor</tib>
<p>1a-14b</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5329</vol>
<tib>chos skyong dregs pa lcam dral gyi bsnyen bsgrub bsad pa gcig tu dril ba'i gdams pa 'jigs rung ma'i spu gri zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>5a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * ces chos skyong dregs pa lcam sring gi bsnyen bsgrub bsad las cig car du dril nas bsgrub pa'i thabs 'jigs rung me'i spu gri zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang mthu stobs rgya mtsho'i bkas bskul ba la brten nas mdo rgyud man ngag 'dzin pa sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis chos grwa chen po 'bras spungs kyi gzims khang dga' ldan pho brang gi gzims chung nyi 'od 'khyil bar sbyar ba'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5329</vol>
<tib>dge slong gi bslab bya sogs nye bar mkho ba 'ga' zhig bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@006a * ces pa 'di yang bdag nyid kyi slob ma sde snod 'dzin pa'i dge slong ri khrod pa mang pos bslab pa la gces par 'dzin pa'i thabs dus drug tu bslab bya'i gnas rnams la sngo bgrad bying pa la sdom tshig las rgyas tsam nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum gyi ngos 'dzin gsal ba zhig dgos zhes mgrin gcig tu yang yang nan gyis bskul ba'i ngor sde snod 'dzin pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis bkra shis lhun po'i gzims chung yid dga' chos 'dzin du bkod pa'i yi ge pa ni mdo sngags rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang bstan pa dar rgyas kyis bgyis pa'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5329</vol>
<tib>dge slong gi dus dran bsten tshul</tib>
<p>11a-11b</p>
<col>@011b zhes dge slong gi dus dran bsten tshul 'di yang btsun pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5329</vol>
<tib>gnod sbyin beg tse lcam sring drag tu bskul ba 'phrin las drag po'i pho nya zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>10a-10b</p>
<col>@010b gnod sbyin beg tse lcam sring drag tu bskul ba 'phrin las drag po'i pho nya zhes bya ba 'di yang kun mkhyen chen po shes rab dpal bzang gi gdan sa pa yongs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dpal bzang gis yang yang bskul ba la brten nas gshin rje'i gshed kyi rnal 'byor ba blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba'i phyi mo las thog mar 'bri ba'i yi ge pa ni dka' bcu tshogs gsog pa legs pa chos 'byor ro sarba mangga lam zhus dag "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5329</vol>
<tib>gtan tshigs rig pa'i sdom tshig rigs lam gsal ba'i me long zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@009a * (des na skal bzang thar 'dod rnams yang dag rigs pa'i rjes 'brangs te blang dor tshul bzhin rab phye nas sku gsum gling du bgrod par mdzod de ltar gtan tshigs rig pa yi sdom tshig gsal ba'i me long 'di dbyangs can dga' blo gros kyis sbyar ba kun la phan gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5329</vol>
<tib>phar phyin theg pa'i lugs kyi theg pa gsum gyi sa dang lam gyi rnam par bzhag pa mdo tsam du brjod pa zab don rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-39a</p>
<col>@038b ces phar phyin theg pa'i lugs kyi theg pa gsum gyi sa dang lam gyi rnam par bzhag pa mdo tsam du brjod pa zab don rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di ni mdo sngags gzhung lugs blta ba'i rnam dpyod rab tu rno ba dge bshes ngag dbang tshul khrims kyis 'di lta bu dgos zhes rab dkar lha rdzas dang bcas snga mo nas yang yang bskul zhing nye char yang dam pa'i skye sprul mang thos mkhyen ldan blo bzang chos 'phel rgya mtshos dri med lha rdzas mchog gi gnad skyes dang bcas nan tan du bskul ma mdzad pa'i ngo ma bzlog pa tsam du ^bstan 'gro'i mgon dubs ma gzhin byon pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen smra ba'i khyu mchog du ma'i bka' drin gyis chos gtam smra ba'i bag chags cung zad brtas pa'i btsun gzugs dh'i: wa g'indra zhes bya bas rab tshes sa phag lo'i chos 'phrul smon lam chen mo'i skabs su bshad sgrub bstan pa'i 'byung gnas dga' ldan theg chen gling gi nye 'dabs su sbyar ba dge legs 'phel @039a * 'dis kyang 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam  * aom swa sti gang zhig yi ger 'bri ba'i bsod nams kyang bgrang yas sangs rgyas mchod las cher bsngags pa rgyal yum sher phyin gsungs mdzad ston pa dang 'dzin skyong spel ba'i mkhas rnams gtsug na rgyal gang de'i dngos zin zab don rgya mtsho'i mjings bslab sbyangs gzings kyis brgal ba'i 'bab stegs su nye bar mkho ba'i sa lam rnam bzhag 'di don gnyer can rnams spar gyi gter du bsgrubs 'di las thob pa'i rab dkar dge tshogs kyis 'brel thogs gnas skabs mngon mtho bzhi 'dzom zhing mthar thug theg mchog sa lam rim bgrod nas 'gro kun don du sku gsum myur 'thob shog  ces pa 'di ni ^gongs skyabs mgon mchog gi zhabs gras dang gus dad ldan pa p'a thur zhes bya bas rgyu yon sbyar nas sa lam rnam bzhag 'di nyid spar du bzhengs pa'i kha byad smon tshig tu ^btsun gzugs zhig gis sug bris su bgyis pa dza yantu</col>
</item>

<vol>5331</vol>
<tib>dpal 'khor lo bde mchog l'u ai pa'i lugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug cing dbang blang ba'i cho ga bde chen rol mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-45a</p>
<col>@044a * dpal 'khor lo bde mchog l'u ai pa'i lugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug cing dbang blang ba'i cho ga bde chen rol mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni 'dus pa dang bde mchog gi thun mong gi bshad rgyud rdo rje 'phreng ba las dbang bcu bzhi'i rnam bzhag gsungs pa'i rjes su 'brangs shing lo dril gnyis thun mong gis chog pa rnams rje btsun chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po rang nyid kyis mdzad pa'i dril bu pa'i dkyil chog gzhir bzhag cing lo dril gyi mi 'dra ba'i khyad par dbyer dgos pa rnams d'a i ka pa dang lam ka rgyal bzang ba dang @044b dkyil chog rdo rje 'phreng ba dang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i lam gyi rim par gsungs pa dag las gang 'jug pa bde ba dang skabs su ji ltar bab pa bzhin bkod de dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkhyen brtse cig tu bsdus pa'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang dang dbyer ma mchis pa'i rje btsun bla ma rtsong kha pa chen po nyid kyi zhabs kyi pad mo la spyi bos reg pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa dge legs dpal bzang pos rtsang nyang stong rig pa'i 'byung gnas kyi sa'i cha dpal ri bo mdangs can gyi dgon par sbyar ba'o swa sti bde mchog zung 'jug nor bu'i rgya mtsho la dbang bsgyur mkhas pa'i gling du grangs med byon de las 'ongs pa'i legs bshad gam ga'i rgyun gangs can ljongs 'jir bab kyang nyams dus su rje btsun lha yi dbang po blo bzang mchog grags pa 'brug stong sgrog pas shes bya'i mkha' ma lus khyab pa'i mkhyen brtse'i chu 'dzin las legs bshad bdud rtsi'i char rgyun mi bzad phab dge legs blo gros yangs pa'i rdzing mchog bkang dpal 'byor bzang po'i brlabs phreng ga-yos pa las drangs pa'i rnam dag dbang bzhi'i chu bo'i rgyun skal bzang zhing pa'i lo tog rgyas byed 'di rgyal ba'i bstan pa yun du gnas phyir dang sangs rgyas skyid kyi sgrib gnyis sbyang ba'i phyir 'byor ldan gtong phod nam mkha' dbang phyug gis 'thun rkyen legs par sbyar te rig byed pa gzhung pa sangs rgyas 'phel gyi ri mo la spar mkhan mkhas pa brtson 'grus bzang pos brkos do dam dge bskul sdom brtson bsod 'phel @045a * gyis grub pa'i gnas mchog gi re dgon du bsgrubs 'di yi phyir du sgo gsum 'bad pa dang 'byor ba cung zad btang ba'i rab dkar gyis 'gro ba kun kyang smin lam 'dir zhugs nas grol byed lam gyis zung 'jug myur thob shog  (chu pho spre'u lo dpyid zlar ba cho 'phrul chen po'i dus dpal ldan ge re kun tu bzang po'i nags khrod ming gzhan skyid lung lha sdings kyi don par grub pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>'dod khams dbang phyug dpal ldan lha mo nag mo la tshogs mchod 'bul tshul dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba</tib>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5333</vol>
<tib>dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi las thig dang tshon dgye ba'i rim pa dkyil chog nas phyung ba</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5333</vol>
<tib>dpal 'khor lo bde mchog lu ai pa'i rim pa dang dmar 'khrid zab mo dpal ldan srad rgyud pa'i man ngag zin bris su bkod pa bde chen gsal ba'i dgongs rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-45b</p>
<col>@045b (ces pa 'di ni bka' drin gzhal du med pa manydzu'i mtshan can la lo gsum gyi sngon nas yang dang yang du zhus nas gsol ba btab ltar lha sa smon grong du rgyal ba 'phags pa lha dang rgyal ba'i sras po rnam gnyis kyis gtso byas dge 'dun drug cu skor la n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i bskyed rdzogs dang 'di ka'i sngags btu dang bskyed rdzogs kyi nyams 'khrid bcas rgyas par zin thun du bstsal ba'i rjes su bskyed rim 'di la zin bris ma dag pa mang du 'dug pas khyed kyis mang nyung 'tshams la dag pa zhig bris zhes kha btag bzang po'i gnan sbyin dang bcas bka' phebs pa dang du blangs te rdo rje 'chang de nyid kyi zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa ngag dbang byams pa zhes pas zin bris rnying pa rgyas bsdus gnyis 'dug pa'i bsdus pa la ma dag pa dang ma tshang ba rnams bcos rgyas pa la mtshon don sogs ha cang bshang grags sam snyam pa rnams phri nas dngos su zin thun gnang ba nyid gzhir bzhag ste yos bu'i lo rgyal zla ba'i mar ngo'i tshes bcu dpa' bo dang dpa' mo dang gis 'du ba'i dus khyad par can gyi nyin phur bu lcog byang chub gling du rdzogs par zin bris su btab pa slar yang rdo rje slob dpon de nyid kyi spyan lam du bstar te dag par bgyis pa 'dis kyang 'jam mgon chos kyi rje rgyal ba gnyis pa'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa phyogs dus kun tu rgyas par byed par gyur cig  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5333</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed ro langs brgyad bskor gyi sgrub dkyil gyi ngag 'don zin thor bkod pa bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-22a</p>
<col>@020a * (ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed lha zhe dgu ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs dngos grub dpal ster zhes bya ba 'di ni spyir yi dam gyi lha 'di nyid snyigs ma'i dus su byin rlabs gzhan las che zhing myur bar rgya bod kun tu klags che ba ltar yin zhing khyad par rje bdag nyid chen po yab sras kyis 'di'i skor gyi gzhung dang man ngag rnams rtsal du bton nas gtan la phab par mdzad pas rang re'i dam pa gong ma rnams thugs gcig sa che bar mdzad na yang da lta zhe dgu ma 'di'i dbang rgyun ma nub tsam las nyams len don du gnyer mkhan dkon par snang bas cho ga 'khyer bde ba zhig byung na chos rgyun sogs la phan re'i bsam pas kun nas bslangs te ^bla ma dam pa du ma las 'di'i skor gyi dbang dang gdams ngag mang du thos pa'i ^ban rgan gyi na pa dam tshig rdo rjes sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan rdo rje las pa dge slong don grub bzang po dpal gyis bgyis pa 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa'i snying po 'jam mgon bla ma'i mdo sngags kyi ring lugs dri ma med pa nam yang mi nub cing phyogs dus su kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5333</vol>
<tib>gdung shugs drag pos smre sngags gsol 'debs bya tshul</tib>

<col>@004a * (zhes pa 'di ni dpyod ldan dge slong mgon po bkra shis dang spar dpon tshe dpag gnyis kyi 'dod mos ltar ^pa tu siddhis bris pa skal mnyam la phan thogs par gyur cig mangga lam</col>

<col>@009a * (zhes 'jigs byed dpa' po gcig pa'i mngon rtogs gtor 'bul dang bcas pa'i ngag 'don bsdus pa'i rim pa brjod pa 'di ni co ne'i dpon gyi gdung rgyud du 'khrungs shing dad dang rnam dpyod ldan pa'i dpon aos l'oo yes blo bzang dpal 'byor zhes bya bas kho bos 'jigs byed dpa' gcig gi mngon rtogs rgyas pa ma lcogs pa'i tshe bsdus pa bya tshul zhig gyis zhes gsung gis bskul ba'i ngo bor khri zur bshad sgrub ming can gyis dpa' gcig gi mngon rtogs zhig sngar byas zin kyang 'dir slar yang don gnyer shes 'dod can gzhan re gnyis la'ang phan cher bsdus pa byed tshul mi 'dra ba 'ga' zhig rnam grangs su bkod nas 'di'i dgon nyid du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni t'a yi la lung blo bzang don grub bo</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5333</vol>

<col>@009b zhes lhag pa'i lha mchog bcom ldan gzigs pa chen po'i tshogs mchod bde chen rol mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni dgos dbang gis rig 'dzin gzi brjid rdo rjes 'phral du bris pa'o chos bdag @010a * mkha' 'gros bzod par gsol 'dis kyang theg pa mchog gi lam bzang 'di la bar chad med par rgyas par byed nus par gyur cig  bkra shis dge legs 'phel"</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5333</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba byams mgon gyi dang po thugs bskyed pa nas bzungs lam rim par bgrod de mngon par byang chub pa'i tshul las brtsams shing ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgyas lnga pa'i mdzad pa ji ltar ston tshul gsal bar brjod pa'i sgo nas bstod cing gsol ba 'debs pa'i rab tu byed pa byams mgon zhal bzang lta ba'i dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@006a * (ces pa 'di ni khyu mchog ces pa lcags mo sbrul lor dad rten du rgyal ba byams pa'i zhing 'dir mdzad 'gyur gyi mdzad chen bcu gnyis kyi bris thang bzhengs pa'i skabs su rang gi dad mos kyis nye bar bskul te byams pa 'jug pa'i mdo dang byams pa'i mdo dang byams pa lung bstan pa'i mdo dang 'phags pa dkon brtsegs dang mdo sde bskal bzang 'dul ba lung sogs nas khungs blangs te btsun gzugs ^wa gindra pa tu siddhis bris pa 'gro ba thams cad byams pa mgon pos rjes su 'dzin rgyur gyur cig mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5333</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba byams pa'i sgrub thabs dang 'brel ba'i mchod cho ga dga' ldan pad mtshor 'jug pa'i gru gzings zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@017a * (ces rgyal ba byams pa'i mchod chog dga' ldan pad mtshor 'jug pa'i gru gzings zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhung lugs lta ba'i blo mig yangs shing dad pa'i tshul khrims kyi nod dang ldan pa lha bris pa dge slong blo bzang chos 'byor nas 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i don du ^btsun pa wa gindra pa tu siddhis rgyud sde gang gi lugs su byed kyang 'gal med kyi tshul du ? chen mor sbyar ba'i 'dis kyang bdag gzhan thams cad rgyal ba byams pa mgon pos rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5333</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba'i bstan bsrung chen po rgyal po sku lnga'i gsol mchod dang 'brel bar tshogs mchod 'bul tshul rgyal chen dgyes pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>

<tib>smon tshig phan bde'i char 'bebs</tib>
<p>1a-2a</p>
<col>@002a * (ces can cung pe li'i shog gi dge slong blo bzang dar rgyas dang rab 'byams dge slong blo bzang mchog sgrub gnyis nas rgyu sbyar gyis byams khang chen mo'i khyams pa'i nang du byams bsang ma bcas pa'i gzungs bye ba phrag lnga gzungs gcug tu bzhugs pa'i chos 'khor che chung nyis brgya rang bzhig sar du bskrun pa'i dge 'bras bsngo tshul 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes rin chen gnyis pa'i mandal sne 'dogs dang bcas bskul ma byung ba'i ngor ^rje btsun dam pa'i ming can sh'akya'i blo bzang tshul khrims 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan nas rtsom pa'i tshig slos skyon yod med ma shes par rang blo gang shar du sbyar ba'o yi ge pa ni khu bo chos rje mkhan po dge slong ye shes dge legs so sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5333</vol>

<tib>pan chen chos kyi rgyal po rje btsun blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes dpal bzang pos chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun por byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i bka' khrid stsal skabs kyi zin bris cung zad</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5337</vol>
<tib>'phags pa 'da' ka ye shes zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo</tib>
<p>2b-3a</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5337</vol>
<tib>'phags pa 'du shes bcu gcig bstan pa'i mdo dang theg pa chen po 'da' ka ye shes kyi mdo gnyis bzhugs so  * bdag nyid chen po skyes mchog pu to la'i chig lab ring mo sbo bzhugs so  * 'phags pa 'du shes bcu gcig bstan pa'i mdo ni "</tib>
<p>1a-2a</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5337</vol>
<tib>'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po thabs la mkhas pa'i mdo sde'i rgya cher bshad pa thabs mkhas nyams len gter mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>2a-74a inc [*missing page from 1a-1b*]</p>
<col>@073a * ces 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po thabs la mkhas pa'i mdo sde'i rgya cher bshad pa thabs mkhas nyams len gter mdzod ces bya ba 'di ni sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos 'dzin gyis rang gi gam 'dug nye 'brel thos bsam la rtson pa'i dge phrug zhig glo bur gsar 'tshes skyas chen btegs skabs phyi ma'i rgyags phyer dmigs te mdo 'di lan 'ga' 'don tshe blo la gang shar sug bris su bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan @073b pa rin po che sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa'i rgyur gyur cig dge'o aom swa sti man ngag rta ljang bdun gyis nyer drangs te gzhan phan thabs mkhas spyod pa'i go lar rgyu lus can phan bde'i pad tshal bzhad gnyen sh'akya'i lugs bzang ring du rgyal gyur cig gang de'i gsung gsang 'dzin ma las thon pa'i brgyad khri bzhi stong nad sel blta na legs kun rmongs nad brgyas gzir ba'i 'gro rnams la phan bde'i dpal ster mig gi bdud rtsir bsgrubs dge 'dis 'brel thogs gtso byas ma rgan mgron tshe rabs 'phreng bar dam pa'i mgon gyis pa'i bzung tshang la ma nor bstan pa'i grur zhugs te 'jigs rung ti mi'i grong @074a * las myur brgol shog  ces pa 'di ni dad ldan khyim bdag tshe ring don grub kyis rgyu yon sbyor te khu ral chen mo dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling na chos sbyin sgo brgya 'byed pa'i par gyi 'phrul 'khor legs por bzhengs skabs gyi na pa chos ming bas sbyar ba'o bkra shis par gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5337</vol>
<tib>rje btsun chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i gsung mkhas pa'i mgul rgyan ces bya ba sa lam rnam gzhag</tib>
<p>1a-28b</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5337</vol>
<tib>rje rin po ches gnang ba'i dbu ma'i lta khrid bsdus pa</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * swa sti rgyal bstan bad tshal phan bde'i dri bsung can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir dga' ldan theg chen gling chos sde che nas chos sbyin char 'di  spel mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5337</vol>
<tib>snod rung gsal byed nyi ma'i 'od zer</tib>
<p>14a-18a</p>
<col>@018a * ces snod rung gsal byed nyi ma'i 'od zer 'di btsun pa blo gros rgyal mtshan gyis dge ldan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus kun tu rgyas par byed nus par gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5338</vol>
<tib>blo sbyong snyan brgyud chen mo'i 'khrid yig gzhan phan nyi ma zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-21a</p>
<col>@021a * (ces blo sbyong snyan brgyud chen mo'i rnam bshad gzhan phan nyi ma zhes bya ba 'di ni yul byang phyogs kyi mthar skyes pa'i gyi na pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis bshar sbyang bya ba'i phyir du bkod pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i dbang po tsong kha pa chen po'i bstan pa phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5338</vol>
<tib>bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'don thabs dge legs kun 'byung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>9a-11a</p>
<col>@011a * (ces bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'don thabs dge legs kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni dad pa dang ldan pa aus tsing tshogs th'u gzims dpon 'jam dpal skyabs kyis bskul ba'i ngor ^dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' 'bangs tha shal su ma ti aa bhya sh'a sa na sya dhwa dzas sbyar ba'o ) aom swa sti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri bsub can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir dge ldan bshad sgrub kyi bstan 'phel gling nas chos sbyin char 'di spel dge 'dis bris brkos la sogs pa 'drel thogs kun kyang mngon dga' yi zhing du skyes nas sa lam gyi bgrod pa myur du mthar phyin shog dge legs 'phel "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5338</vol>
<tib>dam can chos kyi rgyal po la brten pa'i 'phrin las bzhi'i dbyug gtor bsngo chog dang 'brel ba'i drag po gtor sgrub 'phrin las bzhi'i dngos grub mchog gi gan mdzod zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-28a</p>
<col>@027b (zhes dam can chos kyi rgyal po la brten pa'i 'phrin las bzhi'i dbyug gtor bsngo chog dang 'brel ba'i drag po gtor sgrub 'phrin las bzhi'i dngos grub mchog gi gan mdzod ces bya ba 'di yang bdag cag gi bla ma gong ma ^rgyal khang rtse ba sku phreng lnga pas tshugs pa'i grwa tshang sgrub khang dge 'phel gling gi zhal 'don lo zad kyi bskang gso'i skabs dang 'brel bar gsar du 'dzugs rgyur ^rgyal khang rtse ba'i ming 'chang ba rta mgrin badzra gyis rgyal mchog skal bzang rgya mtsho'i gtor chen gnam lcags thog chen drag 'bebs gzhir bzhag la stag phu blo bzang chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi chos rgyal phyi nang sbrags ma'i gtor sgrub gnam lcags rdo rje thog chen dang pan chen blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyi gtor chen drug cu pa'i zhal shes dang go bstun dben sa bka' 'bum nas byung ba'i man ngag rnams dang gung thang rin po che'i gtor chen bstan dgra gzhol ba'i gnam lcags 'khor lo chos mdzad bla ma'i gtor chen gyi dmigs rim bar chad kun sel dang khu re chen mo'i phyag len dwangs shel me long tsha har dge bshes blo @028a * bzang tshul khrims kyi chos rgyal gyi gtor zor gyi rnam bzhag rab 'byams pa dkon mchog bstan bcos kyi las bzhi'i drug cu pa'i 'don cha rin chen do shal sogs gzhung du ma'i nyer mkho'i legs chas rnam par brgyan cing snga phyi'i mtshams sbyar tsam bcug ste rab byung brtswo lnga'i phur bu zhes pa sa sprel lor bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson dang ldan pa dge tshul tshul khrims rgya mtsho'o 'dis kyang 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas pa dang skye 'gro yongs kyi phan bde khyab brda la du 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur cig bkra shis 'bar gyur cig dge'o)"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5338</vol>
<tib>dpal dben sa snyan brgyud lugs kyi zab lam rdo rje sems dpa'i bsgom bzlas yid ches gsum ldan gyi khrid sdig mun sel ba'i nyi 'od ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-23a</p>
<col>@022b (ces rdor sems bsgom bzlas kyi khrid 'phros don dang bcas pa phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa 'di ^rigs kun khyab bdag khri chen rdo rje 'chang gi zhal nas byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i khrid lung tshar bzhi sogs mdo phyogs kyi bka' tshes mang po dang sngags @023a * phyogs kyang sgrub thabs rin 'byung gi lha tshogs sogs lhag pa'i lha gsum brgya brgal ba'i rjes gnang sogs dang rdor sems lha bcu bdun gyi dbang sogs rgyud sde bzhi'i dkyil 'khor mang po'i dbang chen drug bcu las brgal ba dbang don gyi gzab bshad dang bcas pa lan du mar thob cing khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal sras rin po che'i zhal nas kyang lam khrid dang dus 'khor sogs kyi dbang dang bla med rdor sems kyi rjes gnang dang bsgom bzlas kyi khrid sogs legs par mnos pa dang tshe mchog gling slob dpon rin po che'i drung nas phayg chen gyi sngon 'gro'i khrid chen bzhi sogs legs par mnos pa sogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen du ma'i bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba btsun pa ^sh'a sa na'i ming can gyis rang gi nyams len gyi phyir du sug bris su bgyis pa dza yantu legs so</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5338</vol>
<tib>ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sengge'i gdong pa can gtso rkyang dang gtso 'khor ci rigs kyi sgo nas bzlog bsgyur dang 'phang sbyor byed tshul 'khyer bde ba 'phrog byed khros pa'i bzhad sgra zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5339</vol>
<tib>dpal gsang ba 'dus pa lha sum cu so gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la mdor bsdus par bstod pa'i rab tu byed pa</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5340</vol>
<tib>brda sprod pa ka l'a pa'i lugs kyi kun bshad kyi dper brjod blo gter dgyes pa'i rol mo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>320a-377a</p>
<col>@376b ces brda sprod pa ka l'a pa'i lugs kyi kun bshad kyi dper brjod blo gter dgyes pa'i rol mo zhes bya ba 'di ni rang nyid la 'di lta bu rtsom pa'i 'os nus gang yang ma mchis kyang rje bla ma nges par thams cad mkhyen pa mah'a pandi ta tshangs sras dgyes pa'i blo ldan gyi zhal snga nas 'di ltar gyis shig ces pa'i bka' lung gser gyi cod pan spyi bo'i rgyan du lhung ba mkhas pa'i bya ba a bag chags 'jig pa'i rten 'brel bzang por rloms te pandi ta sarba dha ra'i ti sogs kyi bya ba dang ka l'a pa'i 'grel pa snga phyi rnams dang si tu thams cad mkhyen pas gsar 'gyur mdzad pa'i byings mdo rtsa 'grel sogs dang de nyid kyi zhal slob brgyud pa dang bcas pas mdzad pa'i t'i ka zin bris sogs ji ltar rnyed pa dang rje bla ma'i legs bshad cung zad zin pa rnams la brten nas rgyal khams kyi bya bral ba ngag dbang legs grub bam 'byung du rung ba'i yon tan la smon pa'i tshul gyis btags ming du 'jam dbyangs smra ba'i nyi ma mcho byung dgyes pa'i lang tsho zhes bgyi bas yon tan rin po @377a * che du ma'i 'byung gnas dpal ae wam chos ldan du khro mo'i lo dpo zla ba'i yar ngo nas brtsams te rim gyis grub par bgyis pa'o granthe dam sarba dikshu bardha pu shu tu slar yang rtsom pa po rang nyid kyis sna tshogs dbyig gi lo rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur nos skabs bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje chos dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor du me tog 'dor ba'i skal bzang bla na med pa myong ba'i nyin zhus dag par byas pa'i dge bas 'gro kun ma rig pa'i ga-yul ngo las bi dza yantu  `aom swa sti gsung gi dbang phyug brnyes pa'i thub mchog gi brgyad khri bzhi stong chos kyi sgo rnams kun sgra don tshul bzhin rtogs las goms 'gyur zhes bden par smra ba de la phyag 'tshal lo 'khrul ba'i dpung tshogs mthar byed brda sprod kyi bstan bcos r'a ma na yi rtul phod des 'phags yul rjod pa'i gzhung gtsang byed pa'i yid 'phrog si t'a khugs dgengs can pas blo mchog gus pa'i mdos mthas bkur de la gtsug lag smra dbang gdong drug lha dgyes pas legs sbyar gas tshig gdams pa'i bdud rtsi 'di rjes slob sharma warma'i snying gi bcud tshul 'di lnga rig stegs la rgyal ba'i gzhung byi dor 'bum bcas mnga' gsol snying stobs dpal yon po'i ri phran zil gnon lhun po bzhin drang srong che de'i bzhed pa sgrub pa'i slad dpal ldan lhun grub steng zhes chos kyi gter gang du yi ge'i phyi mor bskyil ba'i dges 'brel bcas rnam grol lam gyi dri bkrus te kun mkhyen tshangs pa chen po'i gnas brnyes shog (ces rje btsun bla ma 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi dgongs pa ltar grub pa'i tshe su dh'i'i ming gis bris pa sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<tib>legs par sbyar ba lha'i skad dang gangs can pa'i brda' shan sbyar ba dri bral nor bu'i me long bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-201b</p>
<col>@201a * de ltar legs par sbyar ba dang gangs can pa'i brda' shan sbyar ba nyung 'dus 'di ni rang nyid kyi dran gso dang lam 'dir 'jug 'dod rnams kyang gzhung mang po phral klog gi dka' tshegs mi nus pa rnams la zhabs pa gyur du dmigs nas gong gsal gyi gzhung rnams nas btus pa'i bye rtogs dang 'chi med mdzad kyis sna tshogs sde am cad mas rtags gsum so sor ma nges pa thor bu 'di rnam dbye mi ster chos skyong mi 'jug pas sde ba sbyor gyi skabs phan du re nas bkod pa rnams ni lhug pa'i skad dod kyi skabs sbyor rgyu min zhing slar rtags mtha' nges rnyed byung tshe bcos sgyur mdzad pa dang der ma zad da lan 'di na skad dod yongs grags rgyug che ba mkhyen brtse lo ts'a ba'i sde tshan bdun pa dang byams chos bzhi dang mdo sdud pa rnams skaed shan sbyar kyi dpe rgyn ma 'byor bas 'dir ma 'thus pa skar kha 'gengs 'os pa 'thad ldan bdug tshe dpyod ldan rnams kyi der bstun gnang bar zhu zhing sgra t'i ka rnams nas 'byung ba 'dir bkod rnams ni sngon rabs mkhas mchog dam pa rnams kyis ji ltar bsgyur ba'i tshul yid ches su rtog par bya ba'i phyir phyogs tsam bkod pa yin gyis gzhan du dper brjod pa 'di tsam du ma zaed ming ji snyed pa mtha' dag byings la kr'i ta kyi rkyen sbyar bas 'grub pa ni dpyod ldan rnams kyi mkhyen ngor gsal ba nyid la khye brag @201b rtogs byed dang mu nyig phreng ba lang yig nor rgyun 'byams tshes mang ba rang blos gar 'khos brda' sprod pa'i lugs kyi zhus dag btang sgra sgrub nges p ma rnyedd pa rnams khram rtags byas te byad gzhir bzhag gzhan ma sgra sgrub kyi mchan bu dgos pa rnams ka l'a ba'i gzhung ltar bkod yang ba sbyar gyi mtha' dpyod gang grub byas khul 'di ni thub bstan yongs kyi rtsa lag brtse chen stong po'i lung rtogs 'dzin pa'i mchog gi rdo rje slob dpon bcu phrag rig pa'i gnas la 'gran zla dang bral ba'i mdo khams zhu chen pandi ta ngag gi dbang po 'jigs bral phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i lha dbyangs can snyoms pa'i lang tsho'i sde'i bka' drin las brda' sprod pa'i ming tsam thos pa'i rmongs rtul ni rdu sh'a na ke ta nas skar nag rtsis kyi shing rta gra mda' phug pa'i rjes 'brangs rgyal bstan lnga brgya phrag drug pa'i snying nas brgyad gcig 'das shing ma 'ongs bstan pa rnal ma tshig stong brgyad brgya zhe dgu rtags tsam 'dzin pa lnga brgyad gnyis stong sum brgya zhe dgu gnas pa bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan rab byung bcu gsum pa'i rang gsel 'byung khams gsum dang ldan pa lcags los kyi chen po hor gyi rgyal khams su ne'u yol du 'bod pa smin drug gis nya pa rten 'brel skye ba'i zhag gi phur po'i yar tshes lnga'i nyin drang srong rgyu skar mu khyod las skar p'u rb'a sha bh'a'i lha mo dang bdud rtsi'i sbyor bar brtse ba'i nyin phyed phyi cha bum pa'i ta tk'a la phyed bdag zla ba'i thun ya sa'i steng gi mdzes rgyan gcig pu dpal sa skya'i bzhi thog pho brang gi nye zhol rig gnas 'phel rgyas gling du sbyar bas phyogs dus kun du dge legs kyi snang bas khyab par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5341</vol>
<tib>rje thams cad mkhyen pa'i rtogs brjod mdun legs ma bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * ces rang gi rtogs pa mngon par brjod pa mdo tsam du bshad pa 'di ni mang du thos pa'i dge slong shar btsong kha pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis 'brog ri bo che dge ldan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dka' bzhi pa rin chen dpal lo 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che phyogs kun tu rgyas par byed nus par gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5341</vol>
<tib>za byed rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyin sreg bya tshul sdig mun sel ba'i tsha zer zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@009b (ces za byed rdo rje mkha' @010a * 'gro'i sbyin sreg bya tshul sdig mun sel ba'i tsha zer zhes bya ba 'di ni bstan pa'i sbyin bdag dam pa dpon mo yid bzhin 'khor lo nas lha rdzas skyes dang bcas bskul ba'i ngor lcang skya ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan sogs skyes chen du ma'i cho ga mdor bsdus te bzhugs pa rnams su dmigs rnam go sla ba dang khrid rgyun la yod par dgongs pas gsal bar bkod snang ma mdzad la aa khu rin po che shes rab rgya mtsho'i gsung 'bum du de'i khrid kyi zin bris yod pas de dag las lhag khyad 'don rgyu 'dir med mod bla dman rang mnyam 'ga' la phan pa cung zad yod srid snyam pa'i sgo nas cho ga'i rim pa dmigs rnam dang bcas pa gsal bar ^sngags 'chang rgan po blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtshos mi dbang nyid kyi gur sgang steng du sbyar ba'o ) tshul 'di khal kha se chen rgyal khag gi bstan pa'i sbyin bdag chen po t'a cang jun se chen jun wang tshe ring bsam grub dang ga-yung drung rdo rje yid bzhin 'khor lo bcas mthun rkyen sbyar te dpar du bsgrubs pa'i dges skye ba'i phreng bar dal 'byor rten bzang thob drin can bla ma mchog dang mi 'bral zhing sa lam yon tan yongs su mthar phyin shog  sarba mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5342</vol>
<tib>bla ma lha'i rnal 'byor gyi khrid dmigs kyi bsdus don snyan rgyud gter mdzod 'byed pa'i lde mig ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-24b</p>
<col>@024b ces lam gyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa'i bla ma lha'i rnal 'byor gyi khrid dmigs kyi bsdus don snyan rgyud gter mdzod 'byed pa'i lde mig ces bya ba 'di ni chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun por sde snod 'dzin pa brgya phrag mang po pa bla ma mchod pa'i khrid rgyas par byas skabs rgyud pa grwa tshang gi grwa bgres grung ram pa phun tshogs bstan 'dzin sogs don gnyer can mang pos bskul ba la brten nas gdams ngag 'di'i snyan rgyud kyi man ngag thob pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po dpal gyi sde chen phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5342</vol>
<tib>'jam dpal dus dgra'i dbang po ma he'i gdong can bcu gsum lha'i 'khor lo'i rim pa dang po'i zab khrid zin bris 'jigs mdzad rdo rje'i zhal lung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-71a</p>
<col>@071a * (ces 'jam dpal dus dgra'i dbang po ma he'i gdong can bcu gsum lha'i 'khor lo'i rim pa dang po'i zab khrid zin bris 'jigs mdzad rdo rje'i zhal lung zhes bya ba 'di yang sangs rgyas kun 'dus kyi ngo bo kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rje ^rje btsun blo bzang thub bstan 'jigs med rgya mtsho yab sras kyi zhabs pad gtsug gis mchod pa'i bka' drin las lam 'di'i smin byed kyi dbang grol byed rim gnyis kyi khrid rgyab brten gyi lung rgyud kyi bshad pa las tshogs dang bcas man ngag gi bdud rtsi tshim par myang ba dge slong shes rab rgya mtshos rang gi brjed byang dang don du gnyer ba du mas yang yang bskul ngor bris pa bla ma yi dam bka' sdod bsrung ma'i tshogs kyis bzod par @071b mdzad du gsol zhus aom swa sti chos srid 'byor ba'i mdzod dang dge bcu ldan dga' ldan rab rgyas zhes bya'i rgyud grwa cher kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa yab sras kyi thugs rjes chos sbyin 'dzad med rgyun 'di spel sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5342</vol>
<tib>'jam dpal rdo rje bcu gsum lha'i 'khor lo'i rdzogs rim rnal 'byor bzhi'i khrid kyi brjed byang 'jigs mdzad zhal gyi bdud rtsi zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-27a</p>
<col>@027a * (ces 'jam dpal rdo rje bcu gsum lha'i 'khor lo'i rdzogs rim rnal 'byor bzhi'i khrid kyi brjed byang 'jigs mdzad zhal gyi bdud rtsi zhes bya ba 'di yang mdo sngags kyi gsung rab mtha' dag la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa brnyes nas gcig tu rgyal bstan spel ba'i khur 'khyer bas mi ngal zhing snyan rgyud gdams pa'i bang mdzod 'dzin pa smra ba'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'chang dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i bka' drin las 'di'i rgyud dang bskyed rdzogs chen mo'i bshad lung lam rim gnyis kyi dmar khrid bcas yang yang mnos pa dge slong shes rab rgya mtshos tho tsam brjed byang du byas pa bla ma mchog dang bka' sdod bsrung ma'i tshogs kyis bzod par mdzad nas dgyes pa'i gar gyis phyi nang gsang ba'i bdud sde'i ga-yul las rgyal bar mdzad du gsol zhus aom swa sti chos sring 'byor ba'i mdzod dang dge bcu ldan dga' ldan rab rgyas zhes bya'i rgyud grwa cher kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa yab sras kyi thugs rjes chos sbyin 'dzad med rgyun 'di spel sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5343</vol>
<tib>dge ldan bka' brgyud rin po che'i bka' srol phyag rgya chen po rtsa 'grel rnams kyi 'grel bshad mchog mthun dngos grub kyi bang mdzod ces bya ba</tib>

<col>@004a * ces pa 'di ni dad brtson rnam dpyod dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'ga' zhig gis 'di lta bu'i sdom tshig gyis zhes bskul ma mdzad pa'i ngo ma zlog par yos kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po mtshan brjod par dka' ba don gyi slad du smos na ^ngag dbang don grub rin po che'i bka' drin gyis nye bar 'tshe ba'i ban chung gyi na ba (bstan dar) zhig gis chos grwa chen po dga' ldan theg chen gling gi nye 'dabs su du sbyar ba'i yi ge'i 'du byed pa po ni sgra ba nyid do dza yantu "</col>

<item>

<tib>nyi shu pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5344</vol>
<tib>pad+ma yang gsang khros pa lha dgu'i drag po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'jigs rung me'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@014b (ces pad+ma yang gsang khros lha dgu'i drag po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'jigs rung me'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di ni mkhas pa'i snyan grags kyi rgyal rnga 'jig rten gsum gyi rna ba'i bcud du 'jeb pa'i se ra byes grwa tshang du kun mkhyen blo gros rin chen seng ge dang 'khon ston chos kyi rgyal po dpal 'byor lhun grub sogs grub pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dam pa du mas lha 'di'i bsgrub pa gtor bzlog sogs kyi phyag len 'khrul ba med pa'i rgyun bzang po 'jug par mdzad pa'i rgyud 'dzin rig sngags 'chang ba'i gtor sgrub pa rnams kyis bskul ma mdzad par brten gtso bor 'di yi sgo nas rgyud la bcu gsum pa @015a * slob dpon chen po pad+mas mdzad pa'i byang bu drug pa lo chen pi ros mdzad pa'i sbas pa mig 'byed gser gyi thur ma tshar chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i sbyin sreg dngos grub rin po che'i bang mdzod kun mkhyen lnga pa chen pos mdzad pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ye shes snang ba rab 'bar rnams gzhir bzung tshig ris mnan dgos dang phyag len gyi khyad par 'dir mi gsal ba rnams 'jam dpal tshe bdag nag po'i sbyin sreg rus kyi me lce'i 'phreng ba drang srong lostri'i hom gyi lag len yang gsang rgya can las rdo rje gro bo lod kyi sbyin sreg gshin rje dregs pa 'joms byed kyi sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i rigs mthun khungs btsun du mas kha brgyan te rgyal khams pa dge legs rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'am pad+ma dgyes pa rtsal du 'bod pas se ra theg pa chen po'i chos grwar sbyar ba'o bkra shis pa dang dge  ba 'phel gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5345</vol>
<tib>bsdus sbyor snying po'i dgongs don gsal bar byed pa kun gsal me long zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-93a</p>
<col>@092b ces kun mkhyen bla ma mchog gis mdzad pa'i bsdus sbyor snying po kun bsdus rigs pa'i mdzod kyi dgongs don gsal bar byed pa kun gsal me long zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi gam gnas blo bzang bstar gyis yang yang bskul ngor ^rigs smra yongs kyi @093a * tha shal blo gros rgya mtshos sug bris su bgyis pa'o mangga lam  (thugs rje sprin las spros pa'i char rgyun gyis snyigs ma'i dri ma ma lus sbyongs mdzad pa thub dbang yab sras brgyud par bcas pa la sgo gsum gus pas slar yang phyag brgyud ngo mdo dang sngags kyi dgongs don ma lus pa mdo ru bsdus pa bsdus sbyor snying po'i don mdo sogs gzhung dang sbyar te 'grel pa'i tshul mdo tsam bshad pa kun gsal me long 'di skal bzang rigs smra yongs kyi cha rkyen du las khur byed pa bka' bcu bstan 'dzin dang 'byor ldan tshe ring sgrubs kyis rkyen sbyar te don grub nor bu'i gling du bar du sgrub 'dis mtshon dge bas 'brel thogs 'gro ba kun tshe rabs phreng bar dam pas rjes bzung ste tshang la ma nor chos kyi skor zhugs nas rigs lam phra mos rgyal bstan 'dzin par shog snga 'dis mtshon pas 'dzin ma'i khyon yangs por lung rigs dri ma med pa'i dga' ston gyis 'jam mgon bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin nus pa'i khrims ldan dang ma'i tshogs kyis gang bar shog  (ces bsdus sbyor snying po'i 'grel ba kun bsal me long zhes bya ba 'di po reng phyogs kyi chos sde chen po don grub nor bu'i gling nas bar du sgrub skabs gar byang smon tshig zhig dgos zhes gzhung brgya smra ba'i rdo rams pa blo bzang bsam gtan gyis bskul ngor ^btsun gzugs blo gros rgya mtshos bris pa dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5345</vol>
<tib>sa lam gyi rnam gzhag mkhas pa'i yid 'phrog ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-16b</p>
<col>@016b sa lam gyi rnam gzhag mkhas pa'i yid 'phrog 'di ni mkhas pa'i skye bo du mas yang yang bskul ba'i ngor sh'akya'i dge slong dge legs dpal bzang pos dben gnas ri bo ma dang sa can gyi ri khrod du sbyar ba'o aom swa sti rgyal bstan bad chal phan bde'i dri bsung can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sgra rtsir bcud 'gro kun sgyod gyeg kun dga' chos sde gling chos sde che nas chos sbyin char 'di spel sarba mangga lam se rwa'i rab 'byams pa byang chub rdo rjes sbyin bdag byas grub dge bsngo "</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>5346</vol>
<tib>grub mtha'i rnam par bzhag pa'i 'khrul spong gdong lnga'i sgra dbyangs kun mkhyen lam bzang gsal ba'i rin chen sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@016a * ces grub pa'i mtha' rnam par bzhag pa la 'khrul spong gdong lnga'i sgra dbyangs thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam bzang gsal ba'i rin chen sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni snga mo nas mang thos gser khang chos rje gu na ma tis snyan tshig me tog gsar pas bskul zhing @016b dus phyis yongs kyi bshes gnyen chen po mkhas mchog lcang rwa slob dpon pa 'phags pa rin chen gyis khams chab mdo nas ja ga-yu kha thag gi rten bcas nas chab shog tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas stag lo'i dgag lan 'jam rgyas dgos zhes bskul ba'i bka' ngo dang khyad par rang blo goms pa'i slad du mkhan chen rgyal ba thams cad kyi bdag po rin po che las sdom gsum sogs chos kyi bka' drin thob cing 'jam dbyangs bla ma khri rin po che yab sras bzhi dang pan chen bka' 'gyur ba rdo rje 'chang smin grol chos kyi rgyal po sre rdo rje 'chang dang sems dpa' chen po ngag dbang blo gros sogs dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len cing rje bla ma'i mdo sngags rnams la nges shes rnyed cing 'phags bod kyi grub mtha' gzhung dang khyad par sher sgron chad chen rtsa 'grel dus 'khor sogs gzhung lugs chen po rnams la brten gsung rab dang grub mtha' rab 'byams smra ba 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rjes tshig nyung don gsal rgyas 'grel du dkar po zhes pa sa mo sbrul gyi lo cho 'phrul zla ba dkar phyogs rdzogs pa gsum pa'i nyin gangs can gyi bya rgod phung po gnyis pa dpa' po mkha' 'gro'i @017a * 'du gnas ri bo dge 'phel gyi gar 'dug theg mchog rol mchog gsang sngags bde ba chen po'i pho brang nas sbyar ba la slar yang 'bri bsnon cung zad byas pa 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas par 'gyur cig  bkra shis pa dang dge legs 'phel gyur cig  "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5346</vol>
<tib>rnal 'byor spyod pa pa'i lugs kyi yid dang kun gzhi'i rtsa 'grel gyi dka' gnas gsal byed nyi zla zung 'jug ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-61a</p>
<col>@061a * (ces rnal 'byor spyod pa pa'i lugs kyi yid dang kun gzhi'i rtsa 'grel gyi dka' gnas gsal byed nyi zla zung 'jug ces bya ba 'di ni 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i ring lugs 'dzin pa tre bo se rung bla ma byams pa rgya mtsho'i zhal snga nas byi rtsa 'grel sgrag pa 'di lta bu zhig gyis shig pa'i bka' gnad pa stsal ba dang skyabs gcig bka' drin mtshungs zla ma mchis pa rje bla ma srid zhi'i gtsug rgyan yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag don gyi smad du mtshan nas smos te bdag gi mkhan rin po che rigs kun khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang chen po rje btsun blo bzang ye shes bstan pa rab rgyas dpal bzang po sogs bla ma dam pa mang pos bkas bskul ba la brten bka' bzhin sgrub pa mchod pa'i mchog tu bas mnas bka' lung sgyi bos ma nos te zung 'jug bla ma rin po che rnam gnyis kyis skyabs 'og tu chud nas lun ring lon zhing thugs rje dang bka' drin kho nas 'tsho ba bla ma'i nye gnas pa ke'u tshar sprul ming 'dzin pa blo bzang 'jam dbyangs smon lam gyis bla ma dam pa rnams kyi zhal las thes pa'i man ngag la gzhi byas rje yab sras kyi gsung rnams la zhib tu brtags te dwad pa chen pos sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dben sa pa dge slong rnam rgyal bkra shis kyis bgyis pa'o bkra shis</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5349</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das kun rig rnam par mdzad kyi cho ga'i t'ikka gsal ba'i sgron me</tib>
<p>1a-47b</p>
<col>@047a * de ltar kun rig rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i lag len gdon dmigs pa yid la byed tshul shes byed kyi khungs dang sbyar dgag sgrub kyi spros pa cung zad dang bcas te bshad pa 'di ni rgyal ba btsong kha pa chen po'i bka' drin las rgyud sde bzhi'i lam gyi rim pa la blo kha phyogs shing phyad bar du mdo sngags kyi bstan pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' bdag rje btsun shes rab bzang po'i zhabs rdul spyi bos bsten pa la brten nas spyod rgyud kyi gsung rgyun mchan bu bsdus don dang bcas pa dang rje 'dul ba 'dzin pa rang gi mdzad pa'i t'ikka sogs la ring du 'dris par byas pa dang rang gzhan gyi lugs so so'i 'dod tshul phyag len dang bcas pa yang khong du chud par byas te ston pa sangs rgyas nas lo nyi sa stong dang sum brgya bdun cu don gcig song ba ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u'i dus bag yod ces pa chu blo glang gi lo smin drug zla ba'i dkar phyogs la dge slong yon tan bshes gnyen gyis dben gnas yul lha sdings su dbyar ba'o gang gi mtshan tsam rna bar lhung bas kyang ngan song skye ba'i rgyun lam yongs bcad de thar ba'i mchog sbyin rnam par snang mdzad dang dbyer med bla ma'i zhabs la phyag bgyid do de yi rgyud don 'grel byed t'ikka chung zhes nyung gsal legs bshad nor bu'i 'phreng ba 'di par du bskrun pa'i dge @047b bas 'gro ba kun mi khom ngan song ba yang las grol gyur cig rtag tu dal 'byor chong ba'i rten thob cing mtshan ldan bshes gnyen dam pas rjes bzung ste thun mong lam sbyangs sngags kyi sgor zhugs nas rgyud don ji bzhin nyams su len par shog sgo gsum bya bar bcas pa'i lcags kyi khams phyag rgya rnam bzhi'i gser 'gyur rtsis bran te mngon byang lnga yis rnam snang sku thob nas mkha' mnyam 'gro drug 'dren pa'i dpal gyur cig ces pa 'di ni snga sor skyabs mchog 'jigs med dbang po'i bkas t'ika chung 'di nyid dus 'khor grwa tshang gi 'dzin grwa gsham ma'i 'dzin chos su gtong ba bzhin pa yin kyang bris nor rgyun 'byams kyis yid brtan shin tu dka' bar brten dpon slob las thog pa mkhas btsun bzang po'i bdag nyid blo bzang 'jam dbyangs skal ldan nas rgyu sbyar te thugs khur ba zhes shing smra ba'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa 'jam dbyangs chos ldan sogs kyis zhus dag legs par bgyis te bar du bsgrubs pa'i bar byang du ^btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes bris p'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5349</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba'i bstan bsrungs chen po rnams la las bzhi'i 'phrin las 'chol tshul dngos grub myur 'gugs rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col>@004b (ces pa 'di yang 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i dngos slob 'phrin las nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sras chen bzhi'i ya gyal 'jam dbyangs chos kyi rje bkra shis dpal ldan pa sogs sku 'phreng du mar rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan phyogs kun tu sgreng bar mdzad pa'i skye rgu'i 'dren pa chen po mtshan yongs su grags pa khal kha rje btsun dam pa blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtsho'i dpal bzang po nas rgyal ba'i bstan bsrungs chen po rnams la dus gtor dang rgyun gyi mchod gtor sogs kyi skabs gang 'os su sbyar chog pa'i las bzhi'i 'phrin las 'tshol tshul 'di lta bu zhig gyis shig ces bka'i bskul ma gnang ba'i bzhed pa skong ba'i phyir du rig pa 'dzin pa'i tha shal ba bskal bzang gar gyi dbang po 'am ming gzhan blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug tu 'bod pas bris pa 'dis kyang dam pa mchog de'i 'phrin las phyogs bcur rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5349</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba'i bstan bsrungs chen po rnams la las bzhi'i 'phrin las 'chol tshul dngos grub myur 'gugs rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col>@004b (ces pa 'di yang 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i dngos slob 'phrin las nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sras chen bzhi'i ya gyal 'jam dbyangs chos kyi rje bkra shis dpal ldan pa sogs sku 'phreng du mar rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan phyogs kun tu sgreng bar mdzad pa'i skye rgu'i 'dren pa chen po mtshan yongs su grags pa khal kha rje btsun dam pa blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtsho'i dpal bzang po nas rgyal ba'i bstan bsrungs chen po rnams la dus gtor dang rgyun gyi mchod gtor sogs kyi skabs gang 'os su sbyar chog pa'i las bzhi'i 'phrin las 'tshol tshul 'di lta bu zhig gyis shig ces bka'i bskul ma gnang ba'i bzhed pa skong ba'i phyir du rig pa 'dzin pa'i tha shal ba bskal bzang gar gyi dbang po 'am ming gzhan blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug tu 'bod pas bris pa 'dis kyang dam pa mchog de'i 'phrin las phyogs bcur rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5349</vol>
<tib>rin chen mang sprul rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi bsangs mchod dngos grub char chen 'bebs pa'i sprin gyi rnga bsangs ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-26a</p>
<col>@025b ces rin chen mang sprul rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi bsangs mchod dngos grub char chen 'bebs pa'i sprin gyi rnga bsangs ces bya ba 'di yang bstan bsrungs chen po khyad par 'phags pa 'di nyid la bsangs mchod kyis dgyes pa bskyid cing dngos grub zhu ba'i cho ga rgyas shing cha tshang ba 'di lta bu zhig rang nyid nas 'bri 'dun yod pa'i khar dad brtson lhag bsam dang ldan pa bka' bcu 'phrin las @026a * don yod nas bskul ma byung bas 'tshams byar ste gsang bdag ngag gi dbang po dang khyab bdag 'jam dbyangs bzhed sprul sogs yongs 'dzin dam pa du ma'i drin las rgyal po chen po 'di nyid kyi rjes gnang gi rim pa dang lung man ngag sogs 'phran bu 'dzin pa'i ^sh'akya'i dge slong rig pa 'dzin pa'i tha shal pa blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug gis rab byung bcu gsum pa'i chu phag snron zla'i year tshes bco lnga'i nyin me tog rnam par bkra ba'i sding khang dge 'phel byang chub gling gi bsam gtan gyi khang phur dge sbyor mtshams bcad kyi thun 'tshams su grub par bgyis pa 'dis kyang rgyal po chen pos 'phrin las ga-yel med du mdzad cing 'gro kun 'phongs pa'i gdung bzhi nas 'dod dgu'i 'byor ba dbyar mtsho ltar rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<vol>5350</vol>
<tib>dngos po brgyad don bdun cu'i rnam bzhag legs par bshad pa mi pham bla ma'i zhal lung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-22b</p>
<col>@022a * dngos brgyad bdun cu'i don kun ches gsal ba'i legs bshad mi pham bla ma'i zhal lung 'di thub bstan phyogs bcur rgyas pa'i ched bskun pa'i 'gro ba'i lam bzang snang ba 'bar gyur cig de skad smras pa mang thos 'jam dbyangs zhal bzhad pa rab rgyas 'jigs med rdo rje yis dga' ba brgya ldan bshad sgrub dar rgyas gling bkra shis kun nas 'khyil bar sbyar ba dge aom swa sti bra dhy'a bhya: rnam dpyod chu gter ging mtha' 'bral ba'i dogs 'jam dbyangs ? can rtsed gas 'ol ba las legs bshad rlabs phreng bzhad pa'i dpal yon can 'dzam gling bstan pa'i gnyen gcig de la 'dud lung rigs 'odng stong 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis thub bstan sa chen khor yug gsal byed cing lus chos pad+ma'i dga' tshal rgyas byed pa smra ba'i nyi ma gnyis la gzhan yod min dpal ldan mkhas pa'i ded dpon gang gi tshig blo gsal yi dam tshe rgyas byed kunda'i gnyen 'khor 'das rang bzhin gsal sgron nyi ma ste lung rigs 'don 'dzo nor bu'i gter kyang yin de phyir mkhas pa'i skye bo mtha' dag la legs bshad bdud rtsi'i dga' ston spro ba'i phyir dad ldan dar han chos rjes rkyen sbyar te mi pham zhal lung 'di nyid par du sgrub tshul 'dir dad pas 'brel ba  thogs pa kun @022b gnas skabs tshe ring nad med longs spyod 'phel mthar thug sgrib gnyis bag chags las grol te rnam 'dren rgyal ba'i go 'phang myur thob shog (ces gangs can mkhas grub kun gyi gtsug rgyan kun mkhyen chen po 'jam dbyangs bshad pa'i rdo rje phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i sdes mdzad pa'i don bdun cu'i mkha' dpyod nor bu'i phreng mdzes mkhas pa'i mgul rgyan zhes bya ba 'di'ang dad ldan dar han chos rjes gang ci'i mthun rkyen sbyar te zhus dag pa dka' bcu dkon  mchog rgya mtsho rab brtan rgya mtsho gnyis dpod ma be rda rigs thu rab 'byams pa blo bzang bstan 'phel dang rab 'byams pa kun dga' bstan 'dzin gnyis dang yig mkhan ngag dbang chog 'byor dang skos mkhan ngag dbang phyag rdor 'jam dbyangs shes rab skal ldan bsod nams rnams kyis bgyis te dpar du sgrub pa'i dpar byang du sh'akya'i dge slong zhwa ser coa pan 'dzin pa dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang pos sbyar ba'o</col>

<tib>tshem bu dmar khrid kyi gdams pa nyams su len tshul gyi cho ga mdor bsdus</tib>

<col>@003b ces pa 'di ni dang khrims la sogs pa'i 'phags pa'i nor gyis brgyan pa lha btsun dge slong ngag dbang tshe ring nas tshogs chos grwa 'grims pa'i zhor du nyams su len chog pa'i mdor bsdus zhig dgos zhes bskul ba ltar ^wa g'indra pa tu siddhis bsdebs pa'i yi ge pa ni lha btsun shra ma na aa mri ta sh'a sa na'o dge legs 'phel "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5398</vol>
<tib>mi tra brgya rtsa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs rnams kyis mngon par rtogs pa mu tig phreng ba'i gsal byed blo gsal mgul rgyan</tib>
<p>1a-110a</p>
<col>@109a * (ces grub mchog mi tra aanta'i bzhed srol thugs dam brtsa rtsar grags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rim par phye ba mngon rtogs mu tig phreng ba'i gsal byed blo gsal mgul rgyan zhes bya ba 'di yang shar phyogs bstan pa'i gsal byed khri chen blo gros rgya mtsho'i mchog gi sprul sku ngag dbang thub bstan dbang phyug dpal ldan 'phrin las rgya mtsho dang bstan pa'i gsal byed ltar bu sprul ba'i sku ngag dbang blo bzang dpal ldan rgya mtsho sku mched @109b zhabs drung 'jam dbyangs bstan 'dzin rgya mtsho 'bras spungs rgyal ba mkhan zur bstan 'dzin chos bzang sgo mangs mkhan zur bskal bzang dngos grub bshag skor mkhan zur lhun grub rgyal mtshan 'bras spungs sngags mkhan po bskal bzang klu sgrub rgyud stod mkhan zur blo bzang mkhas mchog byams chen mkhan zur ngag dbang nor bu t'a zhabs drung ngag dbang skal bzang rin chen rdo rings bla ma sngags ram pa blo gros bzang po shes 'phel gling bla zur don grub rgya mtsho 'phel rgyas gling bla zur blo bzang 'jam dpal shing tsha sku skye blo bzang dar rgyas rgyud smad dge bshes bstan pa thar pa` rgyud stod dge bshes blo bzang bstan pa rgyud smad dge rgan sngags pa blo bzang ye shes rgyud stod dge rgan sngags ram pa blo bzang sbyin pa sogs rgyud stod smad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen drug cu ri lnga'i grangs su bzhugs pa'i dbang zhu ba po rnams kyis nang mdzod kha btags dngul dkar gyi mandal rin chen gnyis kyi dngos po dang bcas bskul ma mdzad pa ltar skyabs mgon phyag na padmo bdag gi mkhan chen thams cad mkhyen gzigs chen po rje btsun blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtsho dpal bzang po dang lugs 'di'i dbang gi bka' drin dngos su stsal ba'i snang mtha'i mgon po pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa rje btsun blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes dpal bzang po don gyi sgrub pa'i dbang phyug chen po lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rje ye shes bstan pa'i sgron me dpal bzang po rnams kyi zhabs rdul spyi bos nod cing gsung gi bdud rtsis dngos su @010a * 'tsho ba rgyal sras sprul sku ming 'dzin bskal bzang thub bstan 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis rang lo zhe brgyad pa'i steng cho 'phrul zla ba'i gral tshes dge bar rdzogs par bris pa'i yi ge'i 'du byed pa badzra pra sthi ras bgyis pa 'dis kyang rgyal bstan rin po che phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5399</vol>
<tib># lha mo gtad dkar 'gro bzang ma'i sgrub chog dang 'brel ba'i mchod gtor bya tshul phyugs ga-yang 'gugs byed don yod lcags kyu zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5399</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo bde mchog dkar po la brten pa'i tshe sgrub zab pa bzhi ldan gyi khrid yig mdor bsdus bdud rtsi snying po zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@005b ces pa'ang kun mkhyen bo dong pa chen po 'jigs bral dbyangs can dga' ba'i zhal snga nas nye bar 'ong spa'i gdams zab grub pa'i zhal lumg zhin 'jam dbyangs bla ma dgyes pa'i 'bangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang pos bris pa dge "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5399</vol>
<tib>dpal 'khor lo bde mchog bong bu'i zhal can gyi bskyed rdzogs kyi khrid yig snying por dril ba bde chen thig le zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@007b ces pa'ang pan chen grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi sgrub thabs dang 'jam mgon kun dga' grol mchog gi rdzogs rim zhal shes kyi khrid yig sog kyi dgongs pa ltar bya bral spong ba pa @008a * 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang pos dag cing gsal bar bris pa dge legs kyi snang bas phan bde'i padmo dus rtag tu rgyas par gyur cig "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5399</vol>
<tib>dpal 'khor lo bde mchog dril bu'i rim lnga'i zab khrid kyi zur 'debs kyi yig chung</tib>
<p>1a-12b</p>
<col>@012b zhes pa 'di ni tshul 'di don du gnyer ba'i dam ldan rdo rje'i slob bu 'ga' zhig gis nan tan du bskul ngor bla ma dam pa'i zhal gyi bdud rtsi las byung ba'i don bzhin ^dam tshig rdo rjes sug bris su bgyis pa 'dis kyang gsang chen snying po'i ring lugs dri ma med pa dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig ma h'a su kha siddhi mme pra yatstshantu "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5399</vol>
<tib>dpal 'khor lo sdom pa dril bu zhabs lugs lha lnga'i zab lam bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dmar khrid shin tu gsal ba bde chen dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-43b</p>
<col>@043a * ces dpal 'khor lo sdom pa dril bu zhabs lugs lha lnga'i zab lam bskyed pa'i rim pa la slob tshul gyi dmar khrid shin tu gsal ba bde che dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni bla ma lha la mi phyed dad gus dang ldan zhing rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs mthar spel ba'i thugs bskyed phul du byung ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam ldan rdo rje'i mched grogs slob dpon dge bskos drin can lha btsun rin po che bsod nams bzang po lags nas rin po che'i mandal dang bcas bskul ma nan chen mdzad pa la brten nas da lta rang phyogs su dril bu lha lnga 'di la bskyed rim gyi rnam bzhag zhib gsal cha tshang ba zhig mi snang zhing l'u hi pa'i bskyed rim gyi steng nas btus pa'i 'khrid yig 'ga' re snang yang dril bu pa'i rang gzhung gi sgos chos kyi rnam dbye gsal bar ma thon zhing sgrub thabs 'di'i 'gros dang yang @043b cung zad mi mthun par 'dug pas 'dir ni nang dkyil dang thun mongs ba'i skor rnams mtshams sbyor phran tshogs tsam ma gtogs ^lcang skya thams cad mkhyen pa he ru ka dpal rol ba'i rdo rje dpal bzang po'i mdzad pa'i lus dkyil gyi dmar khrid sor bzhag tu bkod cing lha lnga'i sgos chos rnams sgrub thabs rnams dang gsung rgyun la brten nas ci rigs par sbyar te mkhas shing grub pa'i bla ma dam pa du ma'i bka' drin las lugs 'di'i dkyil 'khor du dbang dang rim gnyis kyi zab 'khrid la sogs pa legs par thob pa'i dge slong rig pa 'dzin pa'i tha shal pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes dpal ldan brag ri'i dben gnas sgrub sde yid dga' chos 'dzin du rgyal zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes bcu'i dus chen dang bstun par 'di nyid dkyil 'khor bsgrub mchod tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa dang bcas bla ma lha la gsol ba nan tan du btab ste legs par bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni chos la don gnyer dang ldan zhing blo mig yangs pa'i rdo rje'i slob bu dge slong dge 'dun dar rgyas so 'di la zab cing gsang ba'i man ngag zhal shes rnams gsal bar bkod yod pas lugs 'di'i dbang ma thob dang dam tshig ma gtsang ba gzhan la mi ston cing spar du brko ba sogs kyang ma byas par gsang bas nyams su blangs na bgegs nyung zhing dngos grub myur ba yin par nges pas de ltar thugs la bzhag nas bag yod mdzad par zhu gu hya sa ma ya rakshantu mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5399</vol>
<tib>drang nges rnam 'byed dang rigs kyi yig cha'i rtsod 'phro'i 'bel gtam seng phrug sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-18a</p>
<col>@017b rgyal ku mkhyen pa'i rang mdangs gzugs skur shar ba tsam gyis blo gros mchog stsol zhing rje btsun 'jam dbyangs zhes sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams rgya mtshor yongs su grags pa de nyid bsam bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshul bzung ste byang phyogs khal kha'i dkyil du yang dad yang du byon pas dge lugs pa'i bstan @018a * pa rin po che nyid dar zhing rgyas mdzad pa'i sgo nas yang yang byin gyis rlabs pa'i gdan sa chen mo dga' ldan theg chen gling gi char gtogs lung rigs sgra dbyangs mngon par sgrogs pa'i mkhas mang 'byung gnas 'chad rtsod rtsom gsum gyi mi ltar 'bar ba'i chos grwa chen po dpal ldan bkra shis chos 'phel gling gi stom mo'i 'dzin grwa'i blo sogs dang skabs dang po'i 'dzin grwa'i lca yi mi ngo rgya la sogs pas tso byas pa'i grwa rigs chos smra'i sengge lta bu rnams la ^lung rigs smra ba shes brgya zhes pas sa ga'i chos grwa'i 'khrugs la khang nye ba'i tshe drang nges rnam dpyod dang rigs kyi yig cha'i rtsod 'phro rnams brgal lan tshul gyi gtam kha 'bebs pa'i 'beb gtam de nyid phyis 'byung gi slob gnyer gsar bu rnams la phan snyam nas rgyas par yi ges mi long bas lung rigs kyi mgo smos tsam go bor byas te shog bru 'bebs so bkra shis par gyur cig dge'o "</col>

<item>

<col>@017b ces bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i sngon 'gro sa chog dang lhag gnas kyi lag len gsal bar bkod pa phan bde'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba 'di ni bstan 'gro'i dpal mgon dam pa chos kyi rgyal po mkhan chen mchog sprul rin po ches lag len gsal zhing 'khyer bde ba'i yi ge bris shig par bka' stsal ba dang don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis kyang bskul ba la brten nas dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' 'bangs kyi tha shal pa ^btsun gzugs dam tshig rdo rjes sgyu 'phrul gyi gzhung rnams dang bla chen chos dpal ba'i legs bshad sogs spyi sgos kyi gzhung lugs du mar rang blos gang spobs kyis zhib tu dpyad de don gyi dgongs pa dang mi 'gal zhing 'jug pa bde ba gtso bor byas te nye bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson rnam dpyod kyi dpal ldan ldan pa rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang bstan dar gyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang bstan 'gro yongs la phan pa'i rgyur gyur cig  @018a * bkra shis dge legs 'phel lo zhal gro "</col>
