<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5403</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin bde gshegs 'dus pa'i las byang dregs pa kun 'dul zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10b</p>
<col>@010b (ces bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin bde gshegs 'dus pa'i las byang dregs pa kun 'dul zhes bya ba 'di ni gter gzhung rgya bar gab 'khrugs 'thor bu'i tshul du las byang gi sa bon tsam las mi gsal zhing sngon chad gsal byed lhan thabs kyi yi ge'ang ma byung gshis deng sang gter gzhung tsam gyis lag tu len dka' bar mthong [???] gzhan gyi nyams len la phan 'dod kyi bsam pas kun nas slangs te bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las zab rgyas kyi gdams pa mang du thob pa'i rgyal khams myul ba'i btsun gzugs dam tshig rdo rjes gter gzhung rtsa ba gzhir bzung zhing gzhal yas khang dang lha'i mngon rtogs rnams dag 'don du 'jug pa bde phyir tshigs bcad du bsgrigs dgongs par 'gro nges kyi 'khrugs bsdebs cung zad dang kha 'gengs par 'os pa rnams rigs mthun gyi gzhung rnams las skabs su gang babs blangs ste cha lag tshang zhing 'khyer bde bar bkod pa'o dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5403</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i chos skor gyi cha lag dam tshig dang sdom pa'i rnam bzhag mdor bsdus su bkod pa dngos grub 'dod 'jo dbang gi rgyal po zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-72a</p>
<col>@071b (ces bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa sogs bla med kyi yi dam la brten pa'i dbang bzhi yongs su rdzogs par thob @072a * pa'i sgrub pa po rnams la thog ma kho nar med mi rung du nye bar mkho ba thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i dam tshig dang sdom pa'i bslab bya'i rnam bzhag mdor bsdus su bkod pa dngos grub 'dod 'jo dbang gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'di ni dad brtson rnam dpyod phun sum tshogs pa'i rdo rje'i slob bu slob dpon blo bzang bstan dar sogs don gnyer can du mas bskul zhing rang nyid kyis kyang lhag pa'i lha mchog pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i chos skor gyi zhabs 'degs su 'gyur bar re ba'i bsam pas 'jam mgon chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po yab sras dang mkhas grub klong chen pa rjes 'brangs dang bcas pa'i legs bshad rnams las nye bar btus te rang bzo'i dri mas ma bslang par tshig nyung don 'dus kyi tshul du ^bla ma dam pa rnams kyis bka' drin las mdo sngags kyi chos tshul las cha shas tsam re thob pa'i skal ba can btsun gzugs ^d'irgh'a yu: badzra k'irti 'am dam tshig rdo rje zhes bgyi bas chos grwa chen po se ra theg chen gling du grub par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bskul ba po blo bzang bstan dar nyid kyis bgyis pa 'dis kyang rnam 'dren rgyal ba'i mdo sngags bshad sgrub kyi bstan pa rin po che 'di nyid dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa dang mar gyur 'gro kun rgyal ba dgyes pa'i lam bzang 'di nyid la zhugs nas myur ba nyid du zung 'jug rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig  dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5403</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i sgo nas sku gsung thugs rten rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus dge legs kun 'byung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@010b (ces bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i 'phrin las la brten nas sku gsung thugs rten rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus lag tu blang bde bar bkod pa dge legs kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni mdo sngags kyi gzhung lugs du ma la mkhyen pa'i sbyang mnga' ba lha mchog 'di nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa chen po bla ma dam pa dka' bcu ngag dbang grags pa'i zhal snga nas kyis yi dam 'di nyid la brten pa'i rab gnas kyi cho ga 'khyer bde ba zhig cis kyang dgos tshul gyi bskul ma nan tan du mdzad pa'i gsung ngo ma ldog par bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las zab rgyas kyi gdams pa'i bdud rtsi cung zad myong ba ^btsun gzugs dam tshig rdo rjes slob dpon pad+mas mdzad pa'i rab gnas kyi byang bu nyid rtsa ba'i gzhir @011a * bzung rigs mthun gyi gzhung tshad ldan du ma la zhib tu dpyad de cho ga zor yang ba'i phyogs nyid gtso bor byas te nye bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson rnam dpyod dang ldan pa rab 'byams smra ba dge slong blo gros bzang po'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5403</vol>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<item>

<tib>nye brgyud gsol 'debs</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b (ces byin rlabs nye rgyud kyi bla ma rnams la gsol ba 'debs dngos grub snye ma zhes bya ba 'di ni mang du thos pa'i dge slong blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis [?] can khrod kyi gangs ri'i dbang po'i 'o de gung rgyal gyi lha zhol du sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5406</vol>
<tib>'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs la bstod cing thugs rje bskul ba'i gsol 'debs dang bcas pa phan bde'i gsol 'debs dang bcas pa phan bde'i char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006b (de ltar rgyal ba thams cad kyi thugs rje'i rang gzugs 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs la bstod cing thugs rje bskul ba'i gsol 'debs dang bcas pa phan bde'i char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni sh'akya'i dge slong chos smra ba blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5406</vol>
<tib>'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa</tib>
<p>7a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas phyag rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do gzungs mdo 'di ni rdo rje 'chang chen po rje btsun t'a ra na thas zhus dag gnad nas shin tu dag pa yod do bkra shis "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5406</vol>
<tib>'phags pa thugs rje chen po la bstod pa byin rlabs shin tu che ba</tib>

<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5406</vol>
<tib>phyag chen gsol 'debs bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b (zab rgyas lam gyi rim pa'i nye rgyud gsol 'debs 'di rwa sgred no min han rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po rje btsun blo bzang ye shes bstan pa rab rgyas kyi kha skongs stsal ba'i pan chen chos kyi rgyal po gsung ba phyag chen gsol 'debs rin po che bar du bzhengs pa'i dge ba bla ma'i lam la 'gro kun 'jug phyir brkos pa dge legs ku du 'phel shlooka tha ma 'd dmigs gsal skabs 'don blo bzang chos dbyings nam mkha' yangs pa la ye shes 'od brgya 'gyed pa'i rta bdun dbang rgyal bstan rab tu rgyas mdzad snyigs ma'i mgon rje btsun bla ma'i zhabs la gsol ba 'debs shloo ka 'di khri chen rin po che bzhugs pa'i rgyud 'debs su gsungs so</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5406</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba'i yum mchog rje btsun sgrol ma dkar mo la bstod pa tshe dang ye shes spel bar byed pa'i rin po che zhes bya ba ni "</tib>
<p>1b-4b</p>
<col>@004a * ces rgyal ba'i yum mchog rje btsun sgrol ma dkar mo la bstod pa tshe dang ye shes spel bar byed pa'i rin po che zhes bya ba 'di ni dza sag bla ma blo @004b bzang chos 'phel sogs dam pa 'di nyid la mi phyed pa'i dad pa can rnams kyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes nye bar bskul ba la brten nas sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis snan ngag gi brda' sogs kyis ma bcings bar go bde bar sug bris su bgyis pa'o "</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5408</vol>
<tib>dam can chos kyi rgyal po'i gtor chog bskang gso bstod bskul dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>1a-25a</p>
<col>@024b ('di yang rje btsun su ma ti dharm'a dhwadza'i gsung ngo dam can chos rgyal ma he'i zhal ca la tsa munti dang yab hi la sogs pa gshin rje pho mo'i 'khor gyis bskor ba ni phyi sgrub dang khro bo'i zhal ca la ma he'i zhal can bzhis bskor ba ni rje nyid la dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis mngon @025a * sum du bka' bsgo mdzad nas bran du bkos pa'i chos rgyal nang sgrub shin tu gnyan pa yin te de gnyis la gtor ma 'bul ba'i cho ga cung zad rgyas par phye ba rje de nhyid kyi zhabs kyi padmo la gus pas gdugs pa'i zhal gyi man ngag 'dzin pa gshin rje'i gshed kyi rnal 'byor pa dge legs dpal bzang pos nyang stong rig pa'i 'byung gnas ri bo mdangs can gyi dgon par sbyar ba'o mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5408</vol>
<tib>dpal mgon zhal bzhi pa la mchod gtor 'bul tshul</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@015a * (ces pa 'di yang slob bu dbu mdzad bsam gtan dge slong gi bskul ba'i ngor dam pa'i ming can gyis bgyis pa rab 'byams pa smra ba blo gros kyis bris pa dge</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5408</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje phreng ba las gsungs pa'i drang nges kyis btu zhing byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rtsa ba dang de la lhan thabs sbyar ba'i 'grel pa gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@009b de ltar dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i drang nges kyi sngags btu zhing byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rje'i ngos slob nam mkha' dpal gyis mdzad pa la cung zad lhan thabs kyi tshul du sbyar ba 'di ni rang nyid 'di rigs tsam pa'i rgyu tshogs ma tshang rung de dus bod dbus tsang gi phyogs 'dir 'di'i rgyun chad skabs mdo smad phyogs nas brgyud pa'i 'di'i chos rgyun zhig kho bos 'bad rtsol gyis thob pa slar 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa rin po che'i phyogs dang tho'u kan rin po cher de bzhin khung ngag yin min dogs gcod zhib bcad zhus rjes khung dag yin pa'i nges pa brten bstan gling sprul ba'i sku rin po che sogs bstan pa 'dzin cing spel ba'i 'khur rnams pa'i skyes bu dam pa 'ga' zhig dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du mas kyang 'di'i chos rgyun dgos zhes yang dang yang du bskul ba la brten nas bla ma mkhas grub chen po 'ga' zhig la 'di'i lhan thabs mdzad dgos bskul ma zhus kyang phran gyi lag tu ma 'byor thob nye char mdo smad phyogs nas yong ba'i 'grul yon tan gyi khur can 'ga' zhig nas ci kyang byin rlabs byed dgos zer bar lhan thabs zhig ma byung ba'i mi thob tshul sogs labs kyang de dgos na khyed rang gi rtsom  zhes yang nas yang du au tshugs mthar kyil gyi yong bas yid bsrun pa dang rgyun tsam zhig gi kyang bstan pa bsos su 'gyur ram snyam pas rkyen byas dbyar khral tsam du sog bre'u bgyid pa @010a * de yang rtsa ba nam mkha' dpal gyis mdzad pa de nyid gzhir bdag lta bu'i blo dman rnams kyis go dka' pa rnams lag len du bde khyad gtsor ston gyi 'grel gtor dang sgrub thabs sogs nas len dgos rnams so so zhib gsal dang tshig gi bsgyur kha byed dgos pa dper mtshon rtsa bar yig skyon 'ga' re dogs pa yang bcos zhing mgo smon tsam la rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje phreng ba'i tshig ltar kha 'geng khul dang bcas drang nges kyi sngags btu zhing byin gyis rlabs pa'i cho ga ma tshang ba med pa gsal ba'i sgron me zhes pa 'di'i yul lho phyogs kyi mthar mar ba'i rigs las skyes pa'i btsun pa dge ming can khyab bdag rdo rje zer ba'i pho brang chen po ta la'i byang 'dab brag ri dben pa'i ri bsul du sbyar ba 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa'i snying po phyogs phyogs mthar rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<vol>5408</vol>
<tib>rten 'brel gyi rnam bzhag</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5408</vol>
<tib>yi dam mkha' 'gro chos srung spyi la sbyar rung gi bzlog pa'i cho ga mi mthun phyogs las rgyal ba'i ru mtshon zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5413</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi chos skor gyi yan lag bsangs chog bkra shis dbyangs snyan gyi lhan thabs bkra shis sgo brgya 'byed pa'i lde mig ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-39a</p>
<col>@038b ces rta mchog rol ba'i chos skor gyi yan lag bsangs chog bkra shis dbyangs snyan gyi go don lag len gsal bar byed pa'i yi ge bkra shis sgo brgya 'byed pa'i lde mig @039a * zhes bya ba nyams 'char gyi tshigs su bcad pas mtha' brten pa 'di ni deng dus mchog dman tham cad kyis 'chos spyod gzhan las bsangs gtong ba gtso bor byed pa 'dug pas de dag la phan re'i lhag bsam gyis nye bar bskul te ku s'a li ^dharma badzra gyis skyed tshal yid dga' chos 'phel du kha nas gang thon shar mar spel ba'i yi ge pa ni aor du su hang gi na dge slong blo bzang dar mas bgyis pa kun la phan thogs par gyur cig  bdag gis 'di bris dge ba yis ma gyur nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam pa'i 'gro ba gcig kyang ma lus par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku thob shog  "</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>5413</vol>
<tib>no title [@001b na mo t'a ki ku ru kulle ya gang gi bka' drin 'od kyis gsal byas pas rgyal ba'i lam bzang sgrib pa'i mun bsal te rgyud don ji bzhin mthong ba'i dpal ster ma ]"</tib>
<p>1b-25a</p>
<col>@025a * (zhes mtshon gyi rngul phra rab kyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang 'dra ba'i phan yon thob par gsungs pas nan tan du bsgrub dgos de ltar dngos grub kyi gter chen po bcom ldan 'das rig byed ma'i rnal 'byor tshul bzhin du nyams su blangs pas las kyi sgrib pa thams cad tshegs med du byang zhing 'dag pa dang mtho ris kyi dpal spyi dang khyad par 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po thob par 'gyur ba dang 'chi ba'i tshi ku ru kulle la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyis rjes su 'dzin pa dang rten 'di'i 'og tu mkha' spyod zhing du rig pa 'dzin pa'am chos 'di spyod pa'i chos ldan gyi rgyal po dang thig pa mchog gi rigs can du skye bar 'gyur ba sogs dang gtso bar lam bskyed rdzogs kyi rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyi mthus tshe 'di nyid dam mi ring bar bcom ldan 'das ma'i go 'phang ma don du byed pa sogs gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi phan yon mtha' yas pa rgyud dang pan grub rnams kyis gsungs zhing grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis kyang nan tan du bsngags par mdzad pas 'di lta bu'i rnyed par dka' ba'i lam mchog rin po che yid bzhin dbang gi rgyal po 'di nyid la sgo du ma nas 'bang ba'i sgo nas rang bzhin gyi don phun sum tshogs pa lhun gyis 'grub pa'i dpal la dus rtag tu rol bar bya'o</col>

<p>1a-61a</p>
<col>@060b (ces grub chen dril bu pa'i lugs 'khor lo sdom pa lus dkyil gyi dmar khrid zhal shes bde chen gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi gam du nye bar gnas shing chos 'di don du gnyer ba'i slob ma dpyod yangs pa'i dge slong blo bzang chos 'phel gyis khrid yig gsal zhing go bde ba zhig dgos zhes tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang bcas nan tan du gsol ba btab pa'o ngor dang por rdo rje 'dzin pa shes rab dar rgyas pa'i zhal snga nas dang grub pa'i dbang po blo bzang chos 'dzin pa'i zhal snga nas la rje mkhas grub blo bzang chos ldan pa'i gsung 'gros zhal gdams dbang dang bcas pa mnos pa dang phyis su rje btsun bla ma dam pa bka' drin gsum ldan rdo rje 'chang khri chen ngag dbang mchog ldan pa'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin las lugs 'di'i dbang khrid rgyud shad rnams yongs su rdzogs par thob cing lam 'di la mos pa mi dman pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa ^lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rje dge slong ye shes bstan pa'i sgron mes sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni blo gros dang don gnyer phul du byung ba'i dge slong bsod nams phun tshogs so 'dis kyang @061a * 'khor lo bde mchog gi las bzang phyogs thams cad du rgyas par gyur cig  sngags bla med kyi zab khrid rnams gzhan la gsang bas nyams su blangs na bgegs nyung zhin dngos grub myur bar gsungs pas don gnyer can rnams kyis kyang dpe 'di dbang ma thob pa dang dam tshig mi gtsang ba gzhan la gsang bas nyams su blangs na bgegs nyung zhing dngos grub myur bar gsungs pas don gnyer can rnams kyis kyang dpe 'di dbang ma thob pa dang dam tshig mi gtsang ba gzhan la mi ston cing par du brko ba sogs kyang ma byas par gsang bas nyams su blangs na shin tu legs pas de ltar thugs la bzhag par zhu zhes pa'ang rtsom pa pos smras pa'o</col>

<tib># tshad gzhung klog pa la nye bar mkho ba'i sdom tshig rin chen rigs pa'i sgron me'i 'grel ba ngo mtshar gsal ba'i 'od 'gyed ces bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5415</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa khrag 'thung lha dgu'i sgo nas gtor bzlog bya tshul gyi cho ga sgrigs rdo rje'i thog mtha' zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-24b</p>
<col>@024b (ces bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa khrag 'thung lha dgu'i sgo nas gtor bzlog bya tshul gyi chog sgrigs rdo rje'i thog mda' zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gzhan gyi lag len du nye bar mho bar mthong nas snga 'gyur gyi las sbyor skor gyi gzhung spyi dang khyad par slob dpon chen po'i gsung gtor ma'i las tshogs sogs gtor bzlog gi yig rnying thod bur bzhugs pa 'ga' zhig dang mus srad pa byams pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi bzlog pa'i lag len gyi yi ge kun gzigs lnga pa chen pos mdzad pa'i zor 'phrin rdo rjes pha lam sogs la zhib tu dpyad de gzhi blangs bla ma'i phyag gzhes man ngag gis kyang brgyan nas rgyal khams pa myul ba'i btsun gzugs dam tshig rdo rjes shin tu gsal zhing lag tu blang bde bar sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5415</vol>
<tib>dpal 'khor lo sdom pa lha lnga'i sgrub thabs kyi rnam bshad shin tu bsdus pa las dang po la nye bar mkho ba'i tshogs ldan 'dod 'jo'i bum pa bzang po legs par smra ba'i zin bris dbu phyogs</tib>
<p>1a-26b</p>
<col>@026a *  zhes pa sde rje dus gsum mkhyen pa'i thugs dam lnga tshan lnga las dpal 'khor lo bde mchog lha lnga'i sgrub thabs kyi rnam bshad shin tu nyung ngur bsdus pa 'di ni las dang po pas kyang ches dang po bar gyur ba'i gang zag rnams la phan pa'i ched du lung sbyor dang rgyas bshad dang dgag bzhag dang tshig sbyor mdzes khrigs sogs sbangs shing bral dbang du gyur bas tshig sna yang ches bsdus pa tsam du bkod pa 'di ni dbu @026b mdzad karma 'jigs med dbang 'jang ban karma dpal rgyas gnyis kyi gsung gis bskul ba ma bzlog tsamdu ^karma tshe dbang kun khyab kyis dpal spungs thub bstan gling gi chos grwar bris pa sarba mangga lam `ces pa 'di'i chos sbyin mi bzad spel phyir ^rje dpon mchog sprul zung gis 'og min mtshur phu'i gdan sar par du bsgrubs pa'o "</col>

<item>

<vol>5416</vol>
<tib>tshe dpag med grub pa'i rgyal mo'i lugs kyi bskyed rdzogs zab khrid yi ge 'chi med bdud rtsi'i chu gter zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-22a</p>
<col>@022a * ces pa 'di'ang yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag bka' drin sum ldan kum gzigs 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang po'i zhal snga nas smin khrid bka' drin du nod pa'i tshe phyin chad 'chad nyan bde ba'i slad du ces kyang khrid yig cig 'bri bar 'os zhes bka' lung gser gyi cod pan yang yang bcings pa dang sgrub brgyud bstan pa'i snang byed mkhan chen rdo rje 'dzin pa zla ba bzang po sogs skyabs kyi yul dang chos bzhin du spyod pa'i grogs mang pos kyang rjes bskul gnang bar brten rje 'ba' ra ba'i yig cha rnams dang tshar chen yab sras kyi gsung la zhal shes kyis brgyan te sa bcad kyi chings sogs rje bla mas ji ltar stsal ba nyid la sgro skur dri ma spangs te ma sbas bklags chog gi tshul du snyigs dus kyi rgyal ba t'a'i si hu pad+ma'i mtshan can gyis rjes su bzung ba'i snyom las pa karma ngag dbang yon tan rgya mtshos chos 'khor chen po dpal spungs kyi yang dben kun bzang bde chen 'od gsal gling du bris pa dge legs 'phel "</col>

<item>

<vol>5417</vol>

<col>@022a * ces lamgyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa'i bla ma lha'i rnal 'byor gyi khrid dmigs kyi bsdus don snyan rgyud gter mdzod 'byed pa'i lde mig ces bya ba 'di ni chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun por sde snod 'dzin pa brgya phrag mang po la bla ma mchod pa'i khrid rgyas par byas skabs rgyud pa grwa tshang gi grwa bgres grung ram pa phun tshogs bstan 'dzin sogs don gnyer can mang pos bskul ba la brten nas gdams ngag 'di'i snyan rgyud kyi man ngag thob pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po dpal gyi sde chen phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'o "</col>

<item>

<vol>5417</vol>
<tib>dga' ldan phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag gi gnad gsal bar ston pa 'jam dbyangs bla ma'i zhal lung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006b ces dga' ldan phyag rgya chen po'i rtsa ba rgyal ba'i gzhung lam gyi man ngag gi gnad rnams nyams su len tshul gyi ngo sbrod shing tu gsal zhing tshig nyung la go bde ba 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes yon tan du mas rgyud phyug pa sku mdung dar han mkhan po bskal bzang yon tan dang mchod dpon sde drug mkhan po blo bzang rnam rgyal gnyis kyis bskul ba la brten nas ^dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun por sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus ku du 'phel bar gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5417</vol>
<tib>lam gyi dka' gnas la dogs pa gcod tshul zab don snang ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-25b</p>
<col>@025b ces lam gyi dga' gnas la dogs pa gcod tshul zab don snang ba zhes bya ba 'di ni 'jam dbyangs gong ma bdag po chen po'i rigs kyi cod phan du bzhugs shing thub bstan yongs rdzogs kyi bdag po mdzad pa rje btsun skyang skya rin po che'i bka' bskul ba la brten nas dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis mang yul skyid grong gi ri khrod bkra shis bsam gtan gling du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang lam bzang 'di nyid phyogs kun du 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5417</vol>
<tib>lta ba'i gnad ston pa'i yig chung shin tu gsang ba dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (ces lta ba'i gnad mthur thug pa gsal bar ston pa'i yig chung shin tu gsang ba dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni pan chen bstan pa'i bdag po'i 'phrin las pa chen po bla ma phyag mdzod blo bzang tshe dbang gi bkas bskul ba la brten nas dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis grub mchog dben sa pa'i man ngag bzhin chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun por sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang dpal dben sa snyan rgyud kyi bstan pa yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5417</vol>
<tib>pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa chen po'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor thun mong ma yin pa</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@007b (zhes man ngag gi gnad thams cad tshang ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor 'di ni rje bla ma grub pa'i dbang phyug de dag gi byin rlabs 'jug cing nges par dung ba gdon mi za @008a * mod` kho bo cag yon tan cung zad kyang med bzhin du 'di ltar byed pa mchog tu ga-yar tsha yang rje bla ma rnams kyi mtshan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa rgyu mtshan du byas te` zhabs drung rab 'byams pa ngag dbang rgya mtsho dang nye 'khor ba ye shes bstan 'dzin gnyis kyis bskul ba'i ngor ^sh'akya'i btsun pa blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis sbyar ba'o mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5417</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi rnal 'byor dang 'brel ba'i tshe sgrub kyi gdams pa 'chi med bdud rtsi'i snying po zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b (ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mchog rol ba gsang sgrub kyi rnal 'byor kyi rnal 'byor dang 'brel ba'i tshe sgrub kyi gdams pa 'chi med bdud rtsi'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di ni snga phyir don gnyer ba mang pos yang yang bskul ba dang ney tshang ho'u ched nas pi lig thu gu shri blo bzang byams pa phun tshogs kyis lha rdzas rin chen gnyis pa sran bcu bcas nan tan chen pos bskul ba la brten nas ku s'a li dharma badzra gyis rang lo bcu phrag lnga dang nyag ma bdun du slebs pa chu mo glang gi lo'i cho 'phrul zla ba'i tshes brgyad la bshad sgrub bstan pa'i 'byung gnas chos sde chen po sku 'bum byams pa gling gi rang bshags theg chen chos mdzod du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aor du su dge slong blo bzang dge 'phel lo</col>

<col>@012b (ces rje btsun ma ku ru kulle'i sgrub thabs thun mong ma yim pa autpal gsar ba'i mallika zhes bya ba 'di ni sku tshe du mar rgyas pa'i bstan pa la bya ba mdzad pa'i skyes chen mtsho bdun pandi ta shi ri gi thu no yon chos rje'i sprul ba'i sku blo bzang ae wam lung rigs bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis snga mo @013a * nas bskul ma mdzad par phral du 'dri long ma byung yang nyes lam don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis nan tan du bskul ngor rgyal ba gnyis pa'i rgyal tshab khri chen rdo rje 'chang sa ma te bakshi ngag dbang tshul hrims dpal bzang po dang des pa don gyis thams cad mkhyen pa rdo rje 'chang pha bod kha pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas dpal bzang po dang rje bdag nyid chen po dang dbyer ma mchis pa'i rdo rje 'chang dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron me'i zhal snga nas te bla ma dam pa gsum gyi bka' drin las lhag pa'i lha mo 'di'i dbang lung rjes gnang mang du thob pa sngags 'chang dungs 'chi ba'i ^btsun pa ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis dpal ldan sa skya'i bstan 'dzin tshar chen yab sras sogs kyi gsung thor bur gnas pa rnams shing phag lo'i dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes brgyad la yi ge'i phreng bar spel ba 'dis kyang bstan pa'i rtsa lag dam pa'i rnams kyi bzhed don mtha' dag bgegs med bde blag tu 'grub par 'gyur cig</col>

<col>@009b (ces skyer sgang lugs kyi rta mgrin gsang bsgrub kyi sgrub thabs rta mchog rol ba'i zhal lung zhes bya ba 'di ni lha 'di nyid kyi rjes gnang brgyud pa mi 'dra ba dga' dang sgrub thabs man ngag gi rim pa mang du thos pa'i btsun gzugs rig pa 'dzin pa'i tha shal pa dharma badzra gyis chos kyis rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i bka' srol dang mthun par kun ldan gyi lo chu ston zla ba'i yar tshes bzang por bhata hor gyi yul gyur thegs pa'i bshul lam 'ju lag gi gangs ri'i chen po'i lta zhol lha btsan mched gsum gyi gnas rdzas dmar mandal zhes grags pa'i mdun sar bcag mal gyis pa'i sgar thog tu sbyar ba dge legs su gyur cig khyod mtshan rna bar ltung cing dran pas kyang phyi nang bgegs tshogs mthar byed rta mgrin lha stong gsum khyon dgongs grangs med sprul 'khor dang bka' nyan srung mar bcas pa'i bkra shis shog dge'o</col>

<item>

<vol>5420</vol>
<tib>slob dpon chen po dang rgyal ba tsong kha pa dbyer med pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor don gnyis lhun 'grub</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * (ces pa 'di yang tshogs 'don pa po rnams kyi 'dod mos ltar bla ma rin po ches bsgrigs pa bkra shis par gyur cig</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5424</vol>
<tib>'gro mgon bstan pa'i rin chen gyi gsang ba'i mgur 'grel rdo rje tshig gi mdud grol kun bzang mchod sprin zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-18a</p>
<col>@017b (ces grub pa'i dbang phyug 'gro mgon bstan pa rin chen gyis zab lam gyi gnad gsang ba'i mgur du bzhes pa'i 'grel pa rdo rje tshig gi mdud grol kun bzang mchod sprin zhes bya ba 'di ni ltag tshang lha mo'i dgon gyi mkhan po mkhas btsun bzang gsum gyis yon tan du mas thugs rgyud @018a * legs par gtams pa dkon mchog smon lam gyis snga lo nas bskul kyagn chos srid kyi bya bas da bar 'gyangs pa las nye char kirti rin po che'i gsol 'debs gsar bsgrigs bgyis pas rkyen byas te ^ sh'akya'i btsun pa blo bzang rgyal mtshan sengges mjug gi sbyar byang tsam ma gtogs nyin gcig la shar mar spel ba'i yi ge pa ni rig pa'i gnas la blo gros kyi 'jug pa mchog tu yangs pa mdzod pa chos rje'i tsha bo bstan pa rgyal mtshan gyis bgyis pa dza yantu rgyal bstan padmo bzhad pa'i tshal yangs por blo gsal rkang drug bgrang yas rol pa'i slad dga' ldan zab rgyas chos gling lha lam nas 'dzad med par gyi bdud rtsi'i char 'di phab</col>

<item>

<vol>5427</vol>
<tib>dpal pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i sgo nas gshin po'i rjes su 'dzin pa'i cho ga bde ldan lam sgron zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@010b (ces bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i sgo nas gshin po rjes su 'dzin pa'i thabs rmad du byung ba gnas lung du grags pa'i cho ga'i rim pa lag tu blang bde bar @011a * bkod pa bde ldan lam gyi sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni grab dgon kun bzang chos ldings kyi gdams pa bla ma dam pa rdo rje bde 'byung gi gsung gis nan cher bskul ma mdzad pa la brten nas bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las zab rgyas kyi gdams pa'i bdud rtsi cung zad myong ba ^ btsun gzugs dam tshig rdo rjes rtsa ba'i gzhung slob dpon pad+mas mdzad pa'i gnas lung gi byang bu nyid gzhir gzung de'i tikka kun mkhyen dpal ldan seng ges mdzad pa dang rigs mthun gyi gzhung khungs thub du ma la'ang rang blos gang spobs kyis zhib tu dpyad de spyi dang mthun zhing 'jug pa bde ba'i phyogs nyid gtso bor byas te nye bar sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang 'gro ba kun la 'phral du yun ring du gnas par bde ba'i rgyur gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5427</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dpa' bo gcig pa'i mngon rtogs bdud dpung rnam 'joms zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col>@004b (zhes dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dpa' bo gcig pa'i mngon rtogs bdud dpung 'joms zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs rus stobs 'byor phun sum tshogs pa'i aor du su bka' gyur be'i les 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor bar rgan snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang po ming gzhan lcang skya hu thog thur 'bod pas sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dka' bcu ngag dbang chos ldan no dge legs bkra shis 'bar gyur cig  dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>mkha' spyod gsol 'debs ni"</tib>

<item>

<vol>5428</vol>
<tib>rje btsun n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i bskyed rdzogs kyi dmigs rim shin tu zab pa bde chen lam gyi snying po zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@004b (ces rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i bskyed rdzogs kyi dmigs rim snying por dril ba bde chen lam gyi snying po zhes bya ba 'di yang blo dman las dang po pa pa dag la phan pa'i ched du spros bshad dor nas dmigs rnams yid la byed pa'i rim pa 'ba' zhig lhag pa'i lha 'di nyid la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa blo bzang chos kyi nyi mas dben gnas bde chen chos gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gu shri dge slong blo bzang bzod pa'o 'dis kyang gsang chen zab mo'i bstan pa dar zhing @005a * rgyas par gyur cig  mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi snying khrag lta bu'i zab chos 'di dag snod dang mi ldan pa la dpe tsam yang mi ston par gsang zhing spas te nyams su blang na bar chad chung zhing dngos grub myur pa yin no zhes kyang rtsom pa pos smras so</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5428</vol>

<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@006a * *rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod kyi rnal 'byor dang 'brel bar nyams su blang tshul go bde klag chog tu bkod pa 'chi med rdo rje'i srog sbyin zhes bya ba 'di yang btsun gzugs blo bzang chos kyi nyi mas rje sems dpa' chen po ngag dbang chos kyi rgya mtshos grub pa brnyes pa'i dben gnas bde chen chos gling ngam ming gzhan chos bzang ri khrod du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aor du sugu shr'i dge slong blo bzang bzod pas bgyis pa dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5428</vol>
<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i sindhu ra'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub mchod bdag 'jug bcas kyi cho ga nyung ngur bsdus pa bde chen dga' 'phel zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b (zhes sgrub thabs bde chen 'byung gnas kyi bsdus don nyams len sgo brgya 'byed pa'i lde mig ces bya ba 'di ni dge tshul ma skal bzang chos skyid nas nan cher bskul ba ltar bande dharma bha dras dga' ba'i lo mchu zla ba'i dkar tshes bzang po gsum pa'i nyin bshad dngul chu'i ri phug tu sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5428</vol>
<tib>rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sngags btu'i rjes gnang bya tshul gnas gsum mkha' 'gro'i snying thig ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (ces rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sngags btu'i rjes gnang bya tshul gnas gsum mkha' 'gro'i snying thig ces bya ba 'di ni bde mchog gi rin chen bzhi'i sngags btu dang n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i lung gsum gyi rjes gnang gi rgyun legs par thob pa'i bande dharma bha dras sa skyong gi lor dngul chu'i ri phug tu sbyar ba'o ` aom swa sti phan bde'i 'byung gnas rgyal bstan yongs 'du'i ljong rab rgyas 'gro kun thar mchog 'bras bzang la spyod phyir ri bo gru 'dzin chos grwa nas chos sbyin 'dzad med dpal 'gro'i rgyun 'di spel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5428</vol>
<tib>sman gyi lha mo'i rjes gnang bu la ma 'khor mngon shes mchog stsol sgrub thabs nor bu'i bang mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col>@004a * (zhes bya ba 'di ni lha btsun dge tshul ngag dbang mchog ldan zhes pas 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba ltar 'phags pa lha dge legs rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i yig cha la go sla bar 'ga' zhig lhan thabs bsnan te phyogs myul bya btang ngag dbang chos kyi rgya mtsho ming can gyis bsgrigs pas @004b dge legs su gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5428</vol>
<tib>tshar chen gyis mdzad pa'i rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma n'a ro mkha' spyod ma'i sgrub thabs kyi zur rgyan cha lag</tib>
<p>1a-9b</p>
<col>@009b (ces byams pa chos legs kyis mdzad pa 'di 'don na longs spyod 'phel ba'i rten 'brel yod par gsungs pa 'di nyid sogs shis brjod kyis mtha' brgyan par bya'o zhes pa 'di yab rang bzo ma yin pa rmongs rtul rang nyid la lha mchog 'di nyid kyi zab 'khrid legs par stsal ba'i bka' drin gsum ldan gyi bla ma rdo rje 'chang chen po dgon pa tshang ngag dbang 'od zer sogs kyi zhal chab kyi chos kyi rgyun las ji ltar 'byung ba'i man ngag rnams brjed par dogs te sngar nas kha 'don du 'di lta bu bkod 'dun yod khar don gnyer can 'ga' zhig nas kyang bskul ma byung bas mtshams sbyar te ^ mkhan zur ming 'chang ba aa sha ta la aartha siddhis bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni dge slong bzang po rdo rje'o 'di la nongs pa ci mchis pa bla ma chos bdag mkha' 'gro rnams kyi spyan sngar bzod par gsol zhing dag pa mkha' spyod du 'khrid par mdzad du gsol snod ming log lta can gyi mig lam du ma shor bka' sdod rnam gsum gyis bya ra mdzod cig gu </col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>` bde mchog rdzogs rim rim lnga'i smon lam bzhugs "</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5428</vol>
<tib>no title [@004a * aom swa sti siddham aom gsum ma'i sngags don la rje'i 'dod 'dor badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye ni rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad ma'i ]"</tib>
<p>4a-7b</p>
<col>@007b ('di dharma bha dras bris pa'o sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5429</vol>
<tib> zab lam kun gyi mthar thug ga-yu thog snying gi thig le'i bla bsgrub sdug bsngal mun sel thugs rje'i nyi 'od kyi phyi bsgrub yid bzhin nor bu dbang gi bang mdzod nyams su blang tshul gyi bsnyen yig ngag 'don dang bcas pa bklags chog tu bkod pa mthong bas kun grol bdud rtsi'i nying khu zhes bya</tib>
<p>1a-13b</p>
<col>@012b de ltar zab lam ga-yu thog snying gi thig le'i phyi bsgrub kyi nyams len gsal byed bklags chog tu bkod pa 'di ni deng sang gso ba rig pa'i bstan pa mtha' la thug pa'i skabs 'dir nor phyir zol zog 'tshegs pa'i ming tsam kyi sman pas sa steng khyab kyang rgyud gzhung man ngag gi dgongs don rdzogs par lon pa lta ci rgyud bzhi mgo mjug tshang ba tsam yang ma bklags par zur bkol mgo mjug med pa re dang zog po'i slob dpon gyi ngag sgros la gtsigs su byed pa mang zhing re gnyis don gnyer can byung yang slob dpon mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ma rnyed par gang byung la gtugs pas phral ka tshegs che la phugs yod rgyu chung ba tha na sman gyi ngos 'dzin tshun chad dang lag len ma dag pa'i phung po rgyun 'byams su song ste rang gzhan bslu ba shin tu mang bar mthong bas shes ldan mchis na rgyud gzhung rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i mtshan ldan gyi slob dpon ma rnyed cing thos bsam rgya cher ma 'grub kyang bla sgrub 'di kha'i dbang lung man ngag legs par zhus te sgrub pa la 'bad na rgyud man ngag gi dgongs don mtha' dag rang shugs kyis @013a * go bar nus pa dang byin rlabs rgyud la zhugs pas mthong tshad slob dpon shes tshad man ngag sbyar tshad sman byas tshad 'gro phan du 'gyur bar the tshom med par sman rgyal gu na rang nyid kyis gsungs shing spyir rje btsun 'di nyid ni sman pa'i rgyal po dngos yin zhing snyigs ma'i dus 'dir sangs rgyas sman gyi bla nyid rgyal ba gzhan las thugs rje lhag por gyur bar mdo las gsungs pa ltar rje 'di nyid kyang deng sang snyigs ma'i 'gro ba skyobs pa la mah'a gu ru pad+ma 'byung gnas dang gnyis su med pa sangs rgyas thams cad las thugs rje'i byin brlabs myur ba'i skyabs mgon gcig pur gyur ba yin gshis nges rang nyid kyi go 'phang don du gnyer ba'i slob ma rnams la brtse bas gdams pa'i zab chos khyad par can 'di lta bu yod bzhin du 'tshal bar dang btsag mi'i dpe bzhin tse gcig sangs rgyas bsgrub pa'i zab chos gzhan la re mi dgos par snang bas don gnyer can dag 'di la chig dril du mdzad mkhan 'dra byung na ci ma rung snyam pa'i lhag bsam gyis sngar nas 'bri mdun du yod thog nye lam rang gi grwa rigs tshe'i rig byed 'dzin pa phun tshogs mthar phyin lam 'di'i bsgrub par 'jug 'dod kyis nan tan chen pos bskul ba don yod par bya phyir rtsa ba'i bla ma dam pa rnams kyi thugs rjes zab lam 'di nyid bka' drin du thob cing gsang sngags gsar rnying mtha' dag gi phyogs tsam rig par rlom pa'i bhu su ku ga-yung drung mgon po rdo rjes rang gnas dre'u lhas kyi skyed tshal kun grol gling du rang lo zhe drug pa mi bzad pa'i lo gsar du tshes pa'i tshe sug bris su bstar ba kun la sman @013b pa'i rgyur cig  bkra shis "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5429</vol>
<tib>bka' gdams thig le bcu drug gi bstod gzungs mdor bsdus bya tshul bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col>@004b (zhes pa 'di yang dge slong dharma bha dras bris pas phan thogs par gyur cig  tshe 'das stag lha'i ched du bzhengs</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5429</vol>
<tib>bka' gdams thig le bcu drug gi sgrub dkyil phul byung dgongs rgyan snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@011b (ces bka' gdams thig le bcu drug gi sgrub dkyil phul byung dgongs rgyan snying po zhes bya ba 'di ni bka' gdams kyi ring lugs la snying nas mos pa'i bande dharma bha dras mi zad pa'i lo'i gro bzhin @012a * zla ba'i dmar phyogs rgyal ba gsum pa'i nyin bzhad dngul chu'i ri phug tu sbyar ba'o shu bha mastu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5429</vol>
<tib>byang phyogs shambha lar skye ba'i smon tshig bden tshig cang shes dbang po bka' rgya dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>1a-2b</p>
<col>@002b (ces byang phyogs shambha lar skye ba'i smon tshig bden tshig cang shes dbang po ces bya ba 'di ni bla ma lha'i lung gis zin pa'i snying gi bu slob nyi zla lta bu gnyis dang gling bzhi lta bu yod pa las bar chad kyi dbang du ma gyur tshe zla ba lta bur lung bstan pa'i bu slob mchog tu gyur ba skyes mchog smon lam hu thog thu'i thugs bzhed bsgrub pa'i dgos pa yod pa'i dbang gis rang sems spros bral nges don gyi bla mar yid ches pa'i dam tshig la sel ba ma zhugs zhing drin can bla ma'i snang ba dang ma bral ba'i chos med kyi btsun gzugs blo bzang ming can gyis bka' rgya dang bcas te bris pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5429</vol>
<tib>byin rlabs kyi gter chen po dpal 'khor lo bde mchog dril bu zhabs lugs kyi bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi snying po'i gnad ston pa dngos grub kun 'byung</tib>
<p>1a-23a</p>
<col>@022b (de ltar byin rlabs gyi gter chen @023a * po dpal 'khor lo bde mchog dril bu zhabs lugs kyi bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi snying po'i gnad gsal bar ston pa 'di ni gcig tu dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i bka' rgya shin tu dam zhing gnyis su ni blun rmongs bdag 'dra bas gsang ba mthar thug pa'i zab mo'i gnas dag la 'di ltar ro zhes 'dri ba mkhas dang dam pa'i spyan sngar shin tu ngo gnod zhing bag tsha bar gyur na'ang bde mchog dril bu lus dkyil gyi bskyed rim dang rdzogs rim rim pa lnga'i gnad las brtsams ste dogs gcod dngos su 'khod pa dang dngos su ma 'khod kyang snying po'i gnad dag gsal bar ston pa zhig dgos zhes phyag mdzod lha ri sgang ba blo bzang tshe dbang gis bka' nan cher phebs pa la brten nas ^khyab bdag 'khor lo'i mgon po pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa chen po dang bya bral grub pa'i dbang phyug blo bzang rnam rgyal dang rje btsun rdo rje 'chang chen byams pa'i mtshan can gsum gyi sku drin las dpal dben sa snyan rgyud kyi man ngag la mos blo byed pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis yul skyid grong gi nags khrod bkra shis bsam gtan gling du bris pa 'dis kyang 'jam mgon bstan pa'i snying po dpal dben sa snyan rgyud kyi man ngag zab mo 'di dag yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5432</vol>
<tib>skyer sgang lugs kyi rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgrub thabs bdud dpung 'joms pa'i rdo rje'i sgom rim rta mchog rol pa'i dgongs rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-59a</p>
<col>@058b (ces skyer sgang lugs kyi rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgrub thabs bdud dpung 'joms pa'i rdo rje'i sgom rim rta mchog rol pa'i dgongs rgyan zhes bya ba 'di ni grub dbang rig pa 'dzin pa kun bzang snyan grags rgya mtshos sgrub thabs 'di nyid yul phyogs 'dir dar rgyas che ba snang bas sgo ma rim zhig yod na ris med thongs la phan pa 'dug pas cis kyang brtson zhig ces lan mang por bskul ma mdzad kyang las byang 'di nyid snga 'gyur theg pa'i lugs su mdzad 'dug pas kho bo phyogs der ba cung zad kyang med gshis brtsom khul bgyis kyang blo ldan mgu ba bskyed nus shig mi thon snyam btang snyoms su bzhag kyang dus phyis rab 'byams pa sam 'grub rgyal mtshan phun tshogs rab brtan zhwa dmar sngags pa gu ru bkra shis rnams kyis yang dang yang du bskul ma nan tan mthar skyes byas pa dang @059a * rmi lam gyi 'khrul bar brtsam na legs pa'i mtshan mar mngon pa 'ga' zhig kyang byung bar brten rta mchog rol pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i tha shal btsun pa blo bzang chos kyi nyi ma ming gzhan dharma badzra gyis gsar rnying thun mong gi bshad srol don gcig tu 'bab pa rnams la rang blos gar spobs kyi gsar spel dang snga 'gyur theg pa'i rang skad sor bzhag las 'os med pa rnams rig 'dzin pad+ma 'phrin las kyis mdzad pa'i bka' brgyad sgom khog chen mo dang lo chen dharma shis mdzad pa'i thugs rje chen po bder gshegs kun 'dus kyi sgrub thabs rnam bshad de kho na nyid snang ba'i 'od dang gzhan yang rigs mthun gyi yig cha 'ga' zhig las ci ltar 'os pa blang ste zil gnon zhes pa me pho rta'i lo snron zla ba yar tshes la dkon mchog gsum bla ma 'dzin cing dad pa dang gtong ba dang bag yod la sogs pa bsngags 'os yon tan gyis thugs rgyud phyug pa mi'i dbang po har chin ching wang ratna siddhi'i pho brang dad ha cang thag mi ring ba'i 'brog dgon pa'i gnas lhun sdug sa 'dzin gyi phreng bas 'khor yug tu bskor bar bhi dhi priksha'i ljon pa sogs kyi nags tshal 'thug po bar mtshams med par 'khrigs pa'i gseb na ri dwags sna tshogs dang stag gzig dom dren sogs 'jigs su rung ba'i gcan gzan du ma rgyu zhing 'dab chags sna tshogs skad snyan gyi rol mo 'byin pa'i bsam mtha' dben pa'i bsti gnas bde chen rab rgyas su sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson dpal ldan dge slong blo bzang kun dga'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5433</vol>
<tib>skyer sgang lugs kyi rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgrub thabs rgyas pa rta  mchog rol pa'i zhal lung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12b</p>
<col>@012b (cs skyer sgang lugs kyi rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgrub thabs rta mchog rol pa'i zhal lung zhes bya ba 'di ni lha 'di nyid kyi rjes gnang brgyud pa mi 'dra ba 'ga' dang sgrub thabs man ngag gi rim pa mang du thos pa'i btsun gzugs rig pa 'dzin pa'i tha shal pa dharma badzra gyis chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i bka' srol dang mthun par kun ldan lo chu stod zla ba'i yar tshe bzang por bha ta hor gyi yul grur thegs pa'i bshul lam 'ju lag gi gangs ri chen po'i lha zhol lha btsan mched gsum gyi gnas rdzas dmar mandal zhes grags pa'i mdun sar bcag mal bgyis pa'i sgar thog tu sbyar ba dge legs su gyur cig </col>
</item>

<vol>5433</vol>
<tib>sman bla'i byabs khrus</tib>

<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi tshogs mchod bzhugs so lung thob "</tib>

<col>@004a * (de ltar dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i tshogs mchod ji ltar bya ba'i tshul 'di ni slob dpon shanti bas mdzad pa'i 'jigs byed tshogs mchod du nang gi rnal 'byor gtso che ba las lag len ha cang mi gsal ba dang pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa gong mas bstsal ba'i @004b 'jigs byed tshogs mchod la gzhi byas te bstan pa'i gsal byed du gyur ba'i dam pa chen po lung rtogs yon tan du mas nye bar phyug pa'i lcang skya mchog sprul rin po che nas bskul ma mdzad pa ltar gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pa'i tha shal pa ^ sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang skal bzang rgya mtshos sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni drung yig tshangs skya blo ldan no sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@010b (ces rje bdag nyid chen po rgyan drug mchog gnyis chos bsrung ye shes kyi mgon po dang bcas pa la phyag mchod gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul lag tu blang bde bar bkod pa byin rlabs nyin byed 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba'i dpa' bo rdo rams pa blo bzang rab gsal gyis bkra shis pa'i lha rdzas dang bcas nan tan chen po yang yang bskul ba la brten nas sangs rgyas kun 'dus kyi ngo bo bla ma rdo rje 'chang yab sras rnams kyis bka' drin kho na nye bar @011a * 'tshe ba sh'akya'i rjes 'jug blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtshos chos grwa chen po bkra shis 'khyil kyis rang gshags chos 'byor dga' tshul du bris pa 'dis kyang gser zhun cod pan 'chang ba'i ring lugs phyogs dus kun du dar zhing rgyas par byed nus par gyur cig  bkra shis</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5440</vol>
<tib>rje bla ma rgyan drug mchog gnyis dang bcas pa la phyag mchod 'bul ba'i tshul lag tu blang bde bar bkod pa byin rlabs nyin byed 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@013a * (ces rje bdag nyid chen po rgyan drug mchog gnyis chos bsrung ye shes kyi mgon po dang bcas pa la phyag mchod gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul lag tu blang bde bar bkod pa byin rlabs nyin byed 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba'i dpa' bo rdo rams pa blo bzang rab gsal gyis bkra shis pa'i lha rdzas dang bcas nan tan chen po yang yang bskul ba la brten nas sangs rgyas kun 'dus kyi ngo bo bla ma rdo rje 'chang yab sras rnams kyis bka' drin kho na nye bar 'tshe ba sh'akya'i rjes 'jug blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtshos chos grwa chen po bkra shis 'khyil kyis rang gshags chos 'byor dga' tshul du bris pa 'dis kyang gser zhun cod pan 'chang ba'i ring lugs phyogs dus kun du dar zhing rgyas par byed nus par gyur cig  dge'o bkra shis</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@012b (ces rgyal yum 'dod khams dbang phyug dpal ldan lha mo'i 'jam po gsum gyi gtor sgrub bya tshul dngos grub gangga'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba 'di ni gnas mchog bsod nams kun sdud gling du dpal mnyam med ri bo dge ldan pa'i bstan pa bstan 'dzin dang bcas pa'i bsrung ma yin stabs dpal ldan lha mo'i bsrung ma'i gtso bor bgyis na legs zhes bka' lung phebs pa bzhin 'di ga'i dgon sde phan tshun gyi legs gnyis bya ba gong 'phel gyi thabs su gtor sgrub lan grangs mang po bsgrub dgos pa'i skabs du mar lag len 'khyer bde 'di lta bu zhig byung na legs 'dug bsam rang nyid kyis sngar nas 'bri 'dun thog nye char aa ba ka ga-yas ru jo rig thu wang gi shog bag yod zhi dul sogs kyi yon tan can dam tshig gtsang pa'i rdo rje slob ma dge bshes ye shes grags pa nas bskul ma byung bar brten ^ rgyal dbang yab sras rdo rje 'chang lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rje sogs pan grub du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos mchod pa'i ^ btsun pa ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan nas ming gzhan dam tshig rdo rjes dga' ldan chos mdzod gling gi blang brang bkra shis bsam gtan pho brang du sa sprul go bzhin can gyi zla ba'i yar ngo'i gsum tshes la sbyar ba'i 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i dbang po 'jam dpal snying po'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa dri ma med pa 'di nyid dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par rgyur gyur cig </col>

<tib>glang ri bsangs mchod</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5445</vol>
<tib>sher phyin ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs byin rlabs 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba</tib>

<tib>mo lo rnams thos sras kyi gter sgrub dang chos skyong lcam sring gi tshogs 'khor ni"</tib>
<p>1a-18b</p>
<col>@018b (ces dzam lha dkar po 'brug zhon gyi sgrub thabs lha gcig jo bo chen po 'brom chos kyi rgyal po yab sras la bcol ba'i sgrub thabs las tshogs tho tsam gyis brgyan te bsnyen sgrub mchod skang sogs cung zad rgyas tsam gyis bsgrigs pa dgos zhes sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang 'od zer mdzo dge sdod kyi dge slong dbyug sengge dang rkang tsha'i ri khrod pa blo bzang shes rab sogs kyis nan cher yang yang bskul ba bzhin rnam 'byor gyis dbang phyug mi tri dzo ki rwa sgrengs byang chub bzang po shi'u lo tstsha ba sogs kyi dgongs don gsar bsdebs su sh'akya'i btsun pa mi bskyod rdo rje'i sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bhakshi na wagindras bgyis pa sdod bcud dge legs 'phel ba'i rgyur gyur cig shi bham bkra shis par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5448</vol>
<tib>'phags ma rje btsun ma gdugs dkar gyi byabs khrus bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-23a</p>
<col>@023a * (ces pa 'phags pa rje btsun ma gdugs dkar gyi sgrub thabs dang byabs khrus nyon mongs gdung sel zhes bya ba 'di ni dad gus phun sum tshogs pa lha btsun no mon d'a la'i dang chos la blo mig yangs la gu shri dge slong chos rgya mtsho gnyis kas 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor ma ldog ti dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi mkhyen brtse'i nus pa'i bdag nyid dpal ldan bla ma dam pa bka' drin 'khor med dza ya pandi ta blo bzang 'phrin las dpal bzang po'i zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos len pa rje dam pa 'di nyid kyi bka' drin gyis kho na'i nye bar 'tshe ba slob ma'i tha shal las kyang che tha shal ba'i char gtogs sprang btsun phyogs med snyoms las kyi rnal 'byor pa shri ge thu'i ming can gyis bla ma gong ma'i gsung rgyun la bstan nas sug bris so</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>

<vol>5448</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi chos bskor las nad bdag stobs 'joms kyi cho ga 'khyer bde bar bkod pa kun phan bde bdud rtsi'i zeg ma zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>

<item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5450</vol>
<tib>dgra lha mched dgu la mchod gtor 'bul tshul dang dgra lha'i dpang bstod sogs byed tshul gyi cho ga dngos grub bdud rtsi'i rol mtsho zhes  bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@016b (ces dgra lha mched dgu la mchod gtor 'bul tshul dang dgra lha'i dpang bstod sogs byed tshul gyi cho ga dngos grub bdud rtsi'i rol mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni ^ bshad sgrub bstan pa'i 'byung gnas dpal ldan bkra shis 'khyil gyi bla brang thub bstan pho brang chen mo nas ^ skyabs mgon bla ma mchog gi zhabs brtan dang dgon srong gi chos srid kyi lam don du dgra lha mched dgu la bskang gsol dang dgra lha dpang bstod byed tshul gsogs 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bla brang chen mo'i las khur 'dzin pa dpyod ldan rab 'byams pa dkon mchog sbyin pas nang mdzod dang bcas dang yang yang bskul ngor rje bla ma rjod par dka' ba rdo rje 'chang blo bzang thub bstan 'jigs med rgya mtsho'i zhabs rdul @017a * spyi bor len pa'i slob bu rgyal mkhan po grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong dkon mchog byams pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5512</vol>
<tib>chos kyi rje byams pa'i rnam 'phrul de nyid la gsol ba 'debs zhing zhabs brtan du byas pa</tib>
<p>13b-14a</p>
<col>@014a * ces chos kyi rje byams pa'i rnam 'phrul de nyid la gsol ba 'debs zhing zhabs brtan du byas pa 'di yang don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis bskul ba'i ngor sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba'o "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5512</vol>
<tib>dam can rdo rje legs pa'i gsol kha</tib>
<p>33b-35a</p>
<col>@035a * ces dam can rdo rje legs pa'i gsol kha 'di ni ri khrod 'dzin pa'i bka' bcu pa shes rab seng ges 'tshams sbyar te lha 'di nyid rigs brgyud la lhag par 'go ba tshe dang ldan pa shes rab rgya mtsho'i nyer mkho'i lag len du dmigs nas sde snod 'dzin pa'i rgyal khams pa bya bral blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis ra sa ra mo cher smras pa'i yi ge pa ni gsol kha pa blo bzang phun tshogs so "</col>
</item>

<item>

<p>12b-12b</p>
<col>@012b (zhes pa 'di dge tshul rnam dpyod dang ldan pa blo bzang dbang rgyal gyi thugs dam du dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis 'phral du bkod pa'o</col>

<item>

<tib>khyab pa sgo brgyad rab gsal kun dga' nor bu zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>5a-13a inc [*missing page from 1a-4b*]</p>
<col>@013a * (ces khyab pa sgo brgyad rab gsal kun dga' nor bu zhes bya ba 'di ni snga sor bandi ta blo bzang thub bstan nyi ma dang dge bshes mgon po gnyis kyis bskul ba dang byis su 'ang khu re chen mor slob ma rnams la bstan pas bdag cag la bstan pa ltar yi ger bris dgos ces bskul ngor ^blo bzang bkra shis kyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni tho'ang tshe ring mkhyen rab bo</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5515</vol>
<tib>lam gyi rtsa ba bshes gnyen bsten tshul mdor bsdus lam mchog sgo 'byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@013a * (ces pa 'di tshig sbyor mdzes pa lhur mi byed par don gyi ngo bo tsam ^rdo rje 'chang rnam gnyis sogs bla ma rnams kyi gsung rgyun ltar sh'a sa na'i ming can gyis bris pa'o</col>
</item>

<tib>` khyab pa sgo brgyad go blang bde ba'i gnad</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5516</vol>
<tib>blo sbyong snyan brgyud chen mo'i 'khrid yig gzhan phan nyi ma zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-21a</p>
<col>@021a * (ces blo sbyong snyan brgyud chen mo'i rnam bshad gzhan phan nyi ma zhes bya ba 'di ni yul byang phyogs kyi mthar skyes pa'i gyi na pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis bshar sbyang bya ba'i phyir du bkod pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i dbang po tsong kha pa chen po'i bstan pa phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5516</vol>
<tib>bstod pa rnam dag gangs ri ma</tib>
<p>1a-2b</p>
<col>@002b (ces rje btsun chos kyi rgyal po btsong kha pa chen po gang du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshul ston pa'i sprul pa'i  bkod pa mtha' yas ba las phyogs gcig gi tshul las brtsams te mdor bsdus par brjod nas smon lam du bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa go bde bar sbyar ba 'di ni rje rin po che de nyid la mi phyed pa'i dad pa brtan po la sogs pa'i yon tan du mas legs par brgyan pa drung nam mkha' dpal 'byor ba'i gsung gis nye bar bskul te btsun pa dge legs dpal bzang pos sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5516</vol>
<tib>dbu ma pa'i lugs kyi bden gnyis las brtsams pa'i brgal lan log rtog brag ri 'joms pa'i rdo rje'i me char zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@013a * zhes rje btsun tsong kha pa yab sras kyi bzhed pa ltar thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho dang rgyal dbang lnga pa rnam pa gnyis kyi gsung las bden gnyis ngo bo gcig la ldog pa tha dad du gsungs pa la kha cig rgol ba'i lugs su byas 'dug pa de dag mi 'thad pa'i tshul dpyod ldan dag la go bar byed pa'i yi ge pa ni mkhas pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos bsten pa'i mang thos rigs pa smra ba blo bzang bstan rgyan gyis byas pa dge legs su gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5516</vol>
<tib>dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor yan lag drug gi khrid bsdus pa</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@013a * sde snod 'dzin pa du mas bskul nas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bor gyur ba rje rin po che thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyi gsung gi cha las dar ma rin chen gyis brjed byang du bkod pa'o 'dis kyang mdo sngags kyis bsdus pa'i thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  aom swa sti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri bsung can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir kun dga' dharma gling chos sde che nas chos sbyin char 'di spel sarba mangga lam"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5516</vol>
<tib>dpal mnyam med ri bo dge ldan pa'i ston pa bstan pa bstan 'dzin dang bcas pa tshad mar sgrub pa'i sgo nas bstod cing gsol ba gdab pa'i tshul skal pa bzang po'i nyin byed 'dren pa'i skya rengs zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5516</vol>
<tib>lta khrid bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-5b</p>
<col>@005a * (ces pa 'di ni rang gi slob bu dang @005b brtson rnam dpyod ldan pa sku 'bum rab 'byams pa nor bu rgya mtshos bskul ba la brten nas rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi khyab bdag zhwa ser cod pan 'dzin pa'i gtsug rgyan rje btsun dam pa blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtsho'i zhal snga nas sogs mkhyen brtse'i bdag nyid dam pa du ma'i drin las chos 'di'i bka' drin lan 'ga' yar mnos pa mdo sngags kyi chos tshul du ma la blo gros kyi 'jug pa mi dman pa sh'akya'i dge slong ye shes bstan pa'i sgron me ming gzhan rol pa'i rdo rjes lha ldan sprul pa'i gtsug lag khang gi nye 'dabs su sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni chos tshul du ma la rnam dpyod mchog tu yangs pa'i byang rtse dpon slob ngag dbang lhun 'grub kyis bgyis pa sarba dza yantu bkra shis</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5516</vol>
<tib>shing rta'i srol 'byed kyi rnam gzhag rin chen rigs pa'i ri bo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-23a</p>
<col>@022b ces shing rta'i srol 'byed kyi rnam gzhag rin chen rigs pa'i ri bo zhes bya ba 'di ni dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bo dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag skyabs mgon rdo rje 'chang chen po nas rang cag blang dor gyi gnas la mgron po phyogs slad pa bzhin du gyur ba rnams la thugs brtse bas nye bar dgongs te tshugs par mdzad pa'i grwa tshang rin po che theg chen bshad sgrub gling gi gzhung gsar ba'i 'dzin grwa'i blo gsar ba 'ga' zhig gis shing rta'i srol 'byed kyi dpe cha mi mthun pa mang po yod pa'i stabs kyis khas blangs 'dzin bde ba mi 'dug pas phyogs gcig pa zhig 'bri dgos zhes pa'i ngo bzlog ma nus par rab 'byams pa 'jam dpal gzhon nus khas len snga ma'i rgyun 'dzin pa dang rtsod pa 'phel ba'i phyir du cud mi 'dra ba byas pa tsam ma gtogs mkhas pa chen po aa ky'a yongs 'dzin gyis mdzad pa'i shin rta'i srol 'byed kyi rnam gzhag la gzhir byas nas bris pa @023a * 'dis kyang 'gro ba kun rgyal ba'i dam chos ma lus pa 'dzin pa'i rgyu khon byed par gyur cig aom swa sti rnam grol bshad sgrub rin chen 'byung gnas mchog rnam 'dren rje btsun dam pa'i gdan sa cher rnam mang 'gro la chos sbyin spel phyir du rnam dag par gyi 'phrul bzang deng 'dir bsgrubs dge'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5516</vol>
<tib>skyabs 'gro'i khrid yig</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@013a * (ces pa 'di ni rigs rus stobs 'byor dad 'dun brtson pa phun sum tshogs pa'i har chin skal bzang ae phu dbang gi skyabs 'gro'i dmigs rim rgyas shing go bde ba cig gyis zhes bskul ba ltar ban rgan gyi na ba ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos bod chos lha khang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge slong dpal bzang ngo aom swa sti thub bstan dar zhing de 'dzin zhabs brtan mched par 'di gzhengs pas rgyu sbyor gyis gtsos pa'i 'gro kun dkon mchog gsum dang mi 'bral zhing bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub myur thob shog ces skyabs khrid kyi par 'di nyid aerte ni phyag mdzod pa dam chos rab rgyas kyis gzhengs pa'i par byang du 'du gsum pa ^blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug jigs med rgya mtshos bris sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5516</vol>
<tib>tshad ma kun las btus pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@017a * (tshad ma kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so rgya gar gyi mkhan po rigs pa smra ba'i gtsug gi nor bur grags pa ba su dha ra rakshi ta dang bod kyi lo tstsha ba dge bsnyen seng rgyal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o aom swa sti gsung rab kun gyi rigs gnad bsdus rtsom tshe ngo mtshar brtags mang byung 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis legs bskul ba'i ngo mtshar tshad ma kun btus la dus ngan snyigs ma'i mtha' khob tu slob gnyer byed mkhan med ma zad slob gnyer dgos pa'i gtam tsam med dpe yang shin tu rnyed dka' bas tha na dpe rgyas ci ma rung snyam du smon pa'i yid bskul nas dka' bcu blo bzang bkra shis dang dge bsnyen tshangs pa gnyis po yis par bsgrubs rnam dkar dge ba'i mthus 'gro kun rten bzang rim brgyud de sangs rgyas go 'phang myur 'thob shog khyad par bstan 'dzin zhabs pad brtan 'gal rkyen kun sel mthun rkyen bsgrubs bstan pa yun ring gnas 'gyur cig ces pa 'di ni dka' bcu blo bzang bkra shis kyis bris pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5517</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po'i rnam par thar pa la bstod pa bdud dpung phye mar 'thag pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10b</p>
<col>@010b ces bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po'i rnam par thar pa la bstod pa bdud dpung phye mar 'thag pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rgya cher rol pa'i mdo'i rjes su 'brangs te ^sh'akya'i dge slong dge 'dun grub pa dpal bzang pos byang chub chen po'i dben gnas theg chen pho brang du sbyar ba'o "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5517</vol>
<tib>gnod sbyin chen po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi bskang gso'i rim pa bar chad kun sel zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006a * (ces @006b gnod sbyin chen po rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi bskang gso'i rim pa bar chad kun sel zhes bya ba 'di yang rigs rus mchog tu dge zhing dad pa dang rnam dpyod phun sum tshogs pa rig gnas mtha' dag la mkhyen pa'i spyan yangs ga-yo ba'i sde pa rnam sras dzam la zhes byabs bskul ba'i ngor mdo rgyud dam pa'i man ngag 'dzin pa sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis 'di'i sgrub thabs slob dpon pad+mas mdzad par grags pa dang grwa pa mngon shes kyis mdzad zer ba'i yig rnying 'ga' zhig 'dug kyang snga mo nas brgyud pas bris nor mngon che zhing phal tshig ring thung yang mi snyoms pa yid brtan dka' ba dang gzhan ma khungs btsun pa'i gtor chog gtsang ma zhig ma mthong yang 'di'i rjes gnang las tshogs rags rim dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i zhabs drung du thob pa'i gsams pa la gzhi byas sngar gyi yig rnyig de dag gi legs cha rnams kyis kyang kha bskangs te chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po'i gtsug lag khang du sug bris su byas pa las slar yi ge pa ni rab 'byams smra ba'i lo tstsha ba dge 'dun dpal 'bar ro 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cig </col>
</item>

<p>11a-16b</p>

<item>

<vol>5517</vol>
<tib>'phags pa 'da' ka ye shes zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5517</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba thams cad kyi thugs rje'i rang gzugs 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs la bstod cing thugs rje bskul ba'i gsol 'debs dang bcas pa phan bde'i char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>23b-27b</p>
<col>@027b de ltar rgyal ba thams cad kyi thugs rje'i rang gzugs 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs la bstod cing thugs rje bskul ba'i gsol 'debs dang bcas pa phan bde'i char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni ^sh'akya'i dge slong chos smra ba blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos sbyar ba'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5517</vol>
<tib>rje bla ma'i gsung 'bum thor bu las lam gyi gtso bo rnam gsum rtogs brjod mdun legs ma sogs le tshan bdun zur du bkol ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@011a * ces bla na med pa'i rin po che gsum gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba zhes bya ba mang du thos pa'i dge slong spong ba pa shar tsong kha pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis 'brog ri bo che dge ldan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dka' bzhi pa rin chen dpal lo 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che phyogs kun nas rgyas par byed nus par gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5517</vol>
<tib>rje btsun gsang ba'i bdag po la bstod pa bdun rnam dag smon lam dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>27b-29b</p>
<col>@029b ces rje btsun gsang ba'i bdag po la bstod pa bdun rnam dag smon lam dang bcas pa 'di ni nye gnas nam mkha' rdo rjes nan cher bskul ba'i don du mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams pa ^blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis stong ri nyi shar gyi dben pa'i gnas su sbyar ba'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5517</vol>
<tib>rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs la bstod pa 'jam dbyangs mnyes par byed pa'i bstod sprin rgya mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>16b-23b</p>
<col>@023b ces rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs la bstod pa 'jam dbyangs mnyes par byed pa'i bstod sprin rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams pa ^blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis gangs can khrod kyis gangs ri'i dbang po 'o de gu rgyal gyi lha zhol du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sde snod 'dzin pa bha dra p'a la'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5517</vol>
<tib>rje btsun sgrol ma 'gro ba 'gugs shing 'phongs sel ma la mandal bzhi mchod kyi sgo nas gsol ba gdab tshul gyi cho ga kun tu 'khyer bde</tib>
<p>1a-12b</p>
<col>@012a * (ces rje btsun sgrol ma 'gro ba 'gugs shing 'phongs sel ma la mandal bzhi mchod kyi sgo nas gsol ba gdab tshul gyi cho ga kun tu 'khyer bde ba 'di ni lung dang rtogs pas mngon par mtho ba'i dus 'khor dge bskul ba blo bzang tshe ring gis 'di lta bu zhig dgos ^@012b zhes nang rtan du bskul ba ltar ^bsod nams rgya mtshos sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson rnam dpyod dang ldan pa chos mthun gyi slob thugs mdzad blo bzang rdo rjes bgyis pa dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5518</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba kun gyi mkhyen brtse nus gsum gyi bdag nyid rje btsun tsong kha pa chen po la dmigs brtse ma'i gsol 'debs dang 'brel ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor dga' ldan lha brgya ma'i 'khrid yig dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-16a</p>
<col>@015b (ces rgyal ba kun gyi mkhyen brtse nus gsum gyi bdag nyid rje btsun bla ma btsong kha pa chen po la dmigs brtse ma'i gsol 'debs dang 'brel ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor bya tshul dga' ldan lha brgya mar grags pa'i dmigs skor nyams su len tshul dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni mtshan brjod par dka' ba'i drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma khyab bdag rdo rje sems mchog khri chen ngag dbang mchog ldan pa'i zhal @016a * snga nas kyis 'di'i 'khrid yig cig rtsoms shig pa bkas gnang ba dang bstan pa'i gsal byed dza ya pandi ta hu thog thus kyang bskul ma mdzad pa bcas rtsom 'dun gyi thog khal kha ga-yon ru thu she ye gung rgyal mtshan gyi shog t'a bla ma aerte ni dar han shi r'e ge thu blo bzang bsod nams dang nang so blo bzang brtson 'grus dka' bcu blo bzang chos dbang gsum gyis bla ma'i rnal 'byor 'di ga'i dmigs rim sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang ba'i kha gsal khyer bde ba zhig dgos tshul don gnyer chen pos bskul ba la brten nas 'di ga'i 'khrid yig grub mchog 'jam dpal rgya mtshos mdzad pa la gzhi byas te rje bla ma'i bstan pa la shes nas dad pa thob pa'i ^sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos sug bris su bgyis pa 'dis 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan pa rgya chen po 'grub par gyur cig sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>

<vol>5518</vol>
<tib>shes pa'i 'phrin yig gi ti ka bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-81a</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5519</vol>
<tib>slob ma la sprins pa'i rnam bshad 'dod pa'i zug rngu sel bar byed pa'i snying gi thur ma zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-63b inc [*missing page from 62a-62b*]</p>
<col>@063a * (ces slob ma la springs pa'i tshig don mdor bsdus su 'grel pa snying gi thur ma zhes bya ba 'di ni legs nyes 'byed pa'i blo gros kyi mig dang ldan pa lha btsun dge slong ngag dbang 'od zer gyis 'di lta bu zhig ces kyang bris shig pa'i au tshugs mthar ba skyel gyi ngor dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa'i sa mtha'i btsun chung wa g'indra pa tu siddhis skyabs mgon dam pa rim byon gyi gdan sa chen po ri bo dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling du sug bris su bgyis pa spyir na bdag lta bu'i yig 'jog bstan pa'i than ltas lta bur song bar ma zad gzhung ngan 'ga' zhig gi khog pa zug pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba las 'os med na'ang mkhas pa'i bya ba 'char rtsod rtsom gsum smon pa'i yul du byed nas dam pa'i rjes su zlos pa yin pas 'dis kyang tshang spyod rnam par dag pas gzhi bzung ba'i 'jam mgon bstan pa dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig  * aom swa sti lha mi'i ston pa kun mkhyen zas gtsang sras lnga rig pan chen btsun pa zla ba'i zhabs rgyal ba gnyis pa blo bzang grags pa sogs thub dbang rgyud 'dzin bcas la snying nas 'dud bka' dang gdams ngag gangs ri'i sbor 'gying zhing 'chad rtsod rtsom la dbang ba'i lus stobs rgyas rnam dag bslab gsum ral pa'i khur 'chang ba mkhas grub bstan 'dzin gdong lnga'i dbang por 'dud gang de'i legs bshad snying gi thur ma 'dis don gnyer 'dod pa'i snying rlung sel ba'i slad kho bo dngos po'i mthun rkyen legs sbyar te chos sbyin mi @063b zang bkod legs spar 'di bsgrubs 'dis mtshon rang gzhan rnam dkar bsdoms pa'i mthus phan bde'i gter gcig rgyal ba'i lung rtogs chos 'jam dpal snying po'i dgongs pa ji lta bar bshad dang sgrub pas rtag tu phel bar shog 'di la 'brel thogs gtso byas 'gro ba kun skye bar dal 'byor rten thob rab tu 'byung theg pa mchog gi bshes kyis rjes bzung ste thos bsam sgom pas rang rgyud sbyang bar shog lan grangs du mar rgyal bas bsngags pa yi rnam dag tshul khrims zhing sa gshin pa la ting 'dzin shes rab lo tog cher smin te rnam grol 'bras bu'i dpal la spyod par shog ma rig 'khrul 'khor snying gi zug rngu kun ye shes rno rgyun 'bab pa'i thur ma yis drung phyung sgrib gnyis dgra las rnam rgyal ba'i thub chen dpa' po'i go 'phang myur thob shog ces par byang smon tshig 'di nyid dam chos 'gyur med gling gi bla ming 'dzin pa bhikshu aa yusthi ta k'irtis bris pa dge </col>
</item>

<p>81b-82b 'og [gong 'og 82a-82b]"</p>
<col>@082b ['og] de ltar phag mo skor gsum gyi byin rlabs kyi cho ga khrims tshogs 'di ni spos khang pa rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i sgrub dkyil dang glo bo mkhan chen bsod nams lhun grub kyi mdzad pa'i byin rlabs kyi cho ga la brten rje bla ma sku drin mtshungs pa ma mchis pa 'jam dbyangs dbang phyug rab brtan gyis ji ltar mdzad pa'i phyag bzhes kyi brgyan nas rje btsun bla ma'i bran du gyur ba dge slong ngag dbang chos grags kyis chu mo bya'i lo zla ba bdun pa'i yar tshes la sgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni chos grags bzang po'o "</col>

<item>

<vol>5521</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yab yum gyi sgrub thabs mdor bsdus zung 'jug rnam rol zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-14b</p>
<col>@014b (ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yab yum gyi sgrub thabs mdor bsdus zung 'jug rnam rol zhes bya ba 'di ni lam 'di la lhag par mos pa'i slob ma 'ga' zhig gis thos bsam gtso bor byed pa'i skabs sogs su rgyun par sgrub thabs rgyas pa mi lcogs par 'dug pas bskyed rim gyi gnad tshang ba'i nyams len snying por dril ba zhig dgos zhes nan tan du bskul ba'i ngor bla ma gong ma dag gi man ngag phyag bzhes la brten nas ^rje bdag nyid chen po'i rdo rje'i gsung mngon rtogs zung las ci rigs par bsdus te 'jam dpal zhi khro'i rnal 'byor la mos pas sbyor ba'i btsun gzugs ^dam tshig rdo rjes sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gus ldan dge slong blo bzang nam mkha' rdo rje'o 'dis kyang 'jam mgon bla ma'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa dri ma med pa 'di dag phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par byed nus par gyur cig dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<p>1a-34b</p>
<col>@034a * (ces bcom ldan 'das mgon po 'od dpag med la mchod cing gsol ba gdab pa'i cho ga dge legs dpal ster zhes bya ba 'di ni phyogs mthar bston pa'i rgyal mtshan mi nub par 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bla ma rab 'byams pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis phyogs 'di'i skye dgu'i bsod nams gsog pa'i zhing mchog dam par rgyal ba 'od dpag med spas kyi thu bo gnyis bcas kyi sku brnyen che ba gtsug lag khang dang bcas pa zhig bzhengs thog phyag mchod smon lam sogs kyi cho ga'i rgyun 'dzugs rgyur cho ga 'di lta bu zhig cis kyang gsar du bsgrigs dgos zhes 'phrin yig gi lam nas nan cher bskul ba don yod par bya ba'i phyir dam pa gong ma rnams kyis mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas byang sems du ma'i mchod chog @034b gi babs la gzhi kas nas 'gal med 'khyer bde'i tshul du bla ma dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa'i rmongs rgan bhu su ku pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod ldan pa'i rdo rje'i slob bu dge tshul bkra shis rdo rjes bgyis pa 'dis kyang bstan pa dang 'gro ba kun la phan bde rgya chen po 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur cig ) dge ldan ngo mtshar ga-yu lo bkod pas mdzes dus ngan bsod nams gling gi dga' tshal du chos byin spel phyir bar du sgrub pa'i dges 'gro kun phan bde'i dpal la spyod gyur cig dge legs 'phel "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<tib>bcom ldan 'das mgon po 'od dpag med la mchod cing gsol ba gdab pa'i cho ga dge legs dpal ster zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@034a * (ces bcom ldan 'das mgon po 'od dpag med la mchod cing gsol ba gdab pa'i cho ga dge legs dpal ster zhes bya ba 'di ni phyogs mthar bston pa'i rgyal mtshan mi nub par 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bla ma rab 'byams pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis phyogs 'di'i skye dgu'i bsod nams gsog pa'i zhing mchog dam par rgyal ba 'od dpag med spas kyi thu bo gnyis bcas kyi sku brnyen che ba gtsug lag khang dang bcas pa zhig bzhengs thog phyag mchod smon lam sogs kyi cho ga'i rgyun 'dzugs rgyur cho ga 'di lta bu zhig cis kyang gsar du bsgrigs dgos zhes 'phrin yig gi lam nas nan cher bskul ba don yod par bya ba'i phyir dam pa gong ma rnams kyis mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas byang sems du ma'i mchod chog @034b gi babs la gzhi kas nas 'gal med 'khyer bde'i tshul du bla ma dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa'i rmongs rgan bhu su ku pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod ldan pa'i rdo rje'i slob bu dge tshul bkra shis rdo rjes bgyis pa 'dis kyang bstan pa dang 'gro ba kun la phan bde rgya chen po 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur cig ) dge ldan ngo mtshar ga-yu lo bkod pas mdzes dus ngan bsod nams gling gi dga' tshal du chos byin spel phyir bar du sgrub pa'i dges 'gro kun phan bde'i dpal la spyod gyur cig dge legs 'phel "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5521</vol>
<tib>byin rlabs kyi gter chen po bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po lha bcu gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs dngos grub myur stsol zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@011a * (ces byin rlabs kyi gter chen po bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mar po lha bcu gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs dngos grub myur stsol zhes bya ba 'di ni bsod nams stobs kyis mngon par 'phags shing lha mchog 'di nyid yi dam gyi lhar bsten pa'i sa skyong mi'i tsod pan dam par gyur ba ded t'a gung ta la'i tshe tsheng jo nang tshe brtan don grub rdo rje'i mtshan can gang des lha mchog 'di nyid kyi sgrub thabs rgyas pa rgyun du mi lcogs par 'dug pas lhan skyes kyi sgrub thabs las cung zad rgyas pa zhig cis kyang dgos zhes nan tan chen pos bskul ma mdzad pa bzhin grub chen mi tra'i gzhung lhan thabs dang bcas pa gzhir bzung kha 'gengs 'os rnams lugs srol 'di kha'i dam pa rnams kyi gsung ji ltar rigs pas brgyan nas rgyas bsdus 'tsham zhing lag tu blang bde bar bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin kho nas nye bar 'tsho ba ^dam tshig rdo rjes dben gnas brag ri kun tu sbyin pa gling du nye bar sbyar ba'i yi ge'i grogs dan byed pa po ni rin chen rdo rje'o 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che dang 'gro ba mang po la phan thogs par gyur cig dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5522</vol>
<tib>byang chub kyi sems mnga' ba'i bya mgrin sngon zla ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa 'khor ba mtha' dag snying po med par mthong ba rnams kyi rna rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-133a</p>
<col>@132a * zhes pa 'di yang spyir tshul 'di lta bu dgag bya @132b che zhing dgos pa chung na'ang gong gi lung bstan du 'byung ba ltar kho bo cag gi tshe 'dir 'god pas skabs su babs pa'i dbang gis rang lo bcu gcig pa nas bzung drang snang dang srma 'dod rang dbang med pa yang yang 'byung ba dang 'god dgos pa'i bskul ma lta bu'i rmi ltas nar mar byung ba'i rkyen gyis ngag nas mang du thal ba la brten nas dka' bcu ye shes bzang pos snga mo nas nan gyis bskul ma byas shing brtsom pa'i nye char tshe rabs du ma nas bka' drin gyis 'brel ba'i 'gro ba'i 'dren mchog dam pa bsod nams ye shes dpal bzang po'i bkas bskul ba dang gzhan yang dka' bcu blo bzang rnam grol 'jam dbyangs mthar phyin sogs du mas kyang bskul bas mtshams sbyar te 'di nyid mgo snga mo nas brtsams kyang 'jug yongs su rdzogs pa gangs ri'i khrod kyi rig pa smra ba'i khyu mchog kun gyi bsti gnas kyi gtsug gi nor bur gyur ba dpal ldan 'bras spungs phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du me sbrul sa gas nya ba'i yar ngo'i d'i ki 'du ba'i dus tshes khyad par gyi nyin grub pa'i byed pa po ni gnubs kyi rigs las bande sha gzugs ma ti'i ming can no tshul 'di'ang gsang ba'i rgya yis btab dad med log lta can dag la ston cing sgrogs pa byed gyur na dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ta re sarba mangga lam  @133a * aom swa sti legs byas chu gter las 'khrungs dam chos kyi dkyil 'khor rab rgyas dga' ba'i 'od dkar 'phro dad ldan mgrin sngon gtsug gi rgyan gyur cig rmad byung rgyal sras zla bas dge mtshan stsol 'jam mgon blo bzang grags pa'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin la gus pas 'dud gang gi thugs kyi bang mdzod las 'ongs pa'i rtogs brjod rin chen rna rgyan 'di ko mtshar legs bshad 'di nyid par bskrun dge ba'i mthus rgyu sbyong dad ldan dge slong bzang po dang dad brtson ldan pa tshe ldan 'phel la sogs dngos dang brgyud pa'i 'brel thogs 'gro ba kun lam mchog rnyed nas kun mkhyen sar 'grod shog (ces pa 'di ni dad brtson lhag bsam mchog tu dge ba dge slong bzang pos 'di nyid par du bskrun pa'i tshe smon tshig gcig dgos tshul ltar ngag dbang 'jigs med kyis bris pa 'di'i bar kun dga' chos gling gi par khang du 'dug) sarba mangga lam dge'o shu bham "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5523</vol>
<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i bsdus don nyams mgur ma'i 'grel pa don ldan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@017a * ces byang chub lam rim nyams mgur ma'i 'grel pa don ldan zhes bya ba 'di gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba'i dge bshes lha rams pa phun tshogs dge legs kyis bskul ba'i ngor chos mdzad bla ming gis sbyar ba phun tshogs dge legs su gyur cig  dge'o mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5523</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan 'dod khams dbang phyug dmag zor rgyal mo'i dbang bzhi rigs gtad rjes gnang gi cho ga bsam 'phel dbang gi rgyal po dum bu gnyis pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-21a</p>
<col>@021a * (ces pa 'di yang dpal ldan 'dod khams dbang phyug dmag zor rgyal mo'i dbang bzhi skur tshul dang las bzhi snga mo sogs kyi so so'i rig gtad rjes gnang gi chog bsam 'phel dbang gi rgyal po 'di ni chu bya lo'i cho 'phrul zla ba'i tshes bco lnga'i bkra shis stobs sbyor 'brug gi nyin kun gzigs lnga pa'i yongs 'du'i ljon la gzhir byas nas lo rgyus sogs gzhan nas cung zad kha bskang te dge slong bsam grub ming can gyis ye shes mkha' 'gro'i sgrub gnas dpon gnas bsam gtan gling du bris pa'o 'dis kyang ma dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyi bar chad zhi zhing dngos grub bstsol rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa phyogs kun tu dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5525</vol>
<tib>bdud rtsi sman gyi rnam dbye ngo bo nus ming rgyas par bshad pa dri med shel phreng zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-174a</p>
<col>@173a * ces gso ba rig pa'i gzhung lugs chen po 'dir brtson pa dag la dgos ched gong smos 'di ltar dgos zhes snga nas bzo sprul mchog gi yang rtser son pa rje stong lha chen pa dharma mangga las nan bskul gnang bar mgo brtsams par ga-yeng bas lo shas lus la nga cha rang slob gsar bu 'ga' dri bshad lan mang btab kyang mi brtan brjed ngas cheb dag gis 'di phyogs mkhas grags thon pa dag gis kyang gsal kha 'di zhes dang snga phyi zhal mtshungs bzhig mi yong bar the tshom pa las ma byung phyir 'dir gtugs pa'i dgos khyad gzhan la yang 'di ltar gsungs zhes rgyu mtshan yod pa zhig deng dag brjed ngas che bas mi yong 'dug phyir gang nas phal cher gang lcogs zhig yi ger 'debs thub byung na rang gzhan kun la phan sleb che bar 'dug ces nan bskyed pa der bden pa'i tshig la spro ba'i dga' ba bcas bri bar byas la der yang sman ngo tshar ma zhig ma bris na thor bu res go mi chod snyam nas rgyas pa brim langs kyang thor chags tshang bar bris la der yang sman rigs phal che ba la khungs gtam rgyus bshad re 'dug kyang ma spros skabs rer phreng re tsam med na gsar skyes rnams spros pa mi tshim 'dug par bstun rgyas ming btags pa'i zol gyis ga-yar khral tsam du me lug zla ba dang po'i tshes bcu dgu nyi ma me bzhi'i 'grub sbyor nas brtsams phyi ma bshol ba'i tshes bcu bdun gong bzhin nyi ma me bzhi'i 'grub sbyor la grub par byas te de bar zhag nyer brgyad po'i bring la bcad mtshams dam pas 'di nyid khon las rtsol ba med par 'bad de aa ksha sha ba rar brgyud ldan bi ji'i rigs 'bangs kar brgyud kyi btsun pa yongs kyi bran mtha' dge bshes bstan 'dzin phun tshogs bya bas sbyar ba'i dge bas gso rig brgyud 'dzin kun gyis dgongs bzhes su gyur nas @173b lus can yongs la phan pa'i rgyur gyur cig   aom swa sti gang gi mtshan tsam dran pa'i rtsi maghis dug gsum lag 'gro bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi yi nad kyi kha rlungs mtha' dag sel mdzad pa bcom ldan sman pa'i rgyal por gus pas 'dud mgon de'i sprul pa rig pa'i ye shes dang yid las skyes zung thugs rje'i mtsho chen las sman chu yan lag brgyad ldan cher phab pas lus can rnams la srog gi dga' ston sgrubs drang srong lha chen ral pa las 'ongs te mkhas dbang dz hu bstan 'dzin phun tshogs kyis rnam dpyod hub kyis rdzogs par 'thung ba las man ngag zegs ma'i bcud du slar yang skyugs rin chen shel gong sman gzugs kun 'char las 'tsho byed rgyan du 'os pa'i shel 'phreng ngag thon pa'i sman gzhung 'di nyid aer te ni phyag mdzod mgon po skyabs kyis spar du sgrubs de las byung ba'i rnam dkar dge tshogs kyis @174a * 'gro kun lus sems nad las grol gyur te rga shi nad dang gtan bral zhi ba che sman gyi bla ma'i go 'phang myur thob shog (ces pa'ang dharma swa mi ming can wa g'i ndra bcu siddhis bris pa dge bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling brgyan du byon</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5526</vol>
<tib>bla ma'i rnal 'byor dang 'brel bar byang chub lam rim gyi snying po'i don nyams su len tshul legs gsung kun gyi sgo 'byed skal ldan re skong zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@008b (zhes bla ma'i rnal 'byor dang 'brel bar byang chub lam rim gyi snying po don nyams su len tshul legs gsung kun gyi sgo 'byed skal ldan re skong zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi slob ma don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis lam rim gyi gnad don tshang ba'i nyams len 'khyer bde ba zhig dgos zhes nan tan du bskul ngor tshul 'di nyid byin rlabs khyad par du 'phags shing @009a * 'jug pa bde bar mthong nas bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin kho nas 'tsho ba'i btsun gzugs snyom las pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes bla ma'i gsung rgyun las 'byung ba'i man ngag ji lta ba bzhin bris pa 'dis kyang 'jam mgon rgyal ba'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa rin po che 'di dag nam yang mi nub cing phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<tib>blo rigs kyi rnam gzhag mdor bsdus pa kun phan nyi ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>

<col>@001b (ces shar phyogs bstan pa'i @002a * srog shing mchog gi bka' ngag bzhin rgyal sras sprul sku'i ming 'dzin gyis phral du bris pa'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5526</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan stag tshang ra ba stod pa'i gzhan sel rgol ngan tshar gcod gnam lcags thog 'bebs ces bya ba bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-12b inc [*missing page from 13a*]</p>

</item>

<tib>dpal ldan stag tshang ra ba stod pa'i gzhan sel rgol ngan tshar gcod gnam lcags thog 'bebs ces bya ba bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
