<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5526</vol>
<tib>gtan tshigs rigs pa'i rnam bzhag gsal bar bshad pa yongs 'dus nags tshal zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-22a</p>
<col>@022a * ces gtan tshigs rigs pa'i rnam bzhag gsal bar bshad pa yongs 'dus nags tshal zhes bya ba 'di ni dgon lung byams gling gi mkhan po au cu mu chin lha rams pa bskal bzang lha dbang gis au cu mu chin dbang gi lha khang chen mo theg chen chos 'khor gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang snyan grags so 'dis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  'di'i spang zung cu zer yod "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5526</vol>
<tib>gtan tshigs rigs pa'i rnam bzhag gsal bar bshad pa yongs 'dus nags tshal zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-22a</p>
<col>@022a * ces gtan tshigs rigs pa'i rnam bzhag gsal bar bshad pa yongs 'dus nags tshal zhes bya ba 'di ni dgon lung byams gling gi mkhan po au cu mu chin lha rams pa bskal bzang lha dbang gis au cu mu chin dbang gi lha khang chen mo theg chen chos 'khor gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang snyan grags so 'dis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  'di'i spang zung cu zer yod "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5526</vol>
<tib>lam rim smon lam</tib>
<p>2b-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (mnyam med tsong kha pas byang chub lam rim chen mo'i smon lam du mdzad pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5526</vol>
<tib>rgyal chen rnam sras kyi gtor chog dngos grub bang mdzod kyi zur 'debs rgyas pa'i gtor sgrub bya tshul dang bcas pa gsal bar bkod pa rgyal chen dgyes pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-25a</p>
<col>@025a * (ces rgyal chen rnam sras kyi gtor chog dngos grub bang mdzod kyi zur 'debs rgyas pa'i gtor sgrub bya tshul dang bcas pa gsal bar bkod pa rgyal chen dgyes pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba 'di bstan 'dzin dam pa'i skyes mchog ail ku sang hu thog thu no yon no mang hang rin chen rdo rje'i gsung gis bskul ba ltar ^mkhan ming 'dzin pa wa g'indra pa tu siddhis khu re chen mor bsdebs pa dad brtson rnam dpyod yangs pa dge slong ngag dbang 'chi med kyis bris pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal chen dgyes nas bstan pa dang bstan 'dzin yongs la mthun rkyen 'dod dgu'i char chen rgyun chad med par phabs par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5526</vol>
<tib>rgyal chen rnam thos sras kyi gong gnon gyi lha dpal gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi sgrub thabs dngos grub kun 'byung ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@005b (ces phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyis bsgrub thabs dngos grub kun 'byung ces bya ba 'di yang rgyal chen rnam thos sras kyi sgo nas 'phrin las bsgrub pa'i skabs du ma zhig tu nye bar 'kho bar mthong nas rang gzhan la phan pa'i sems kyis kun nas blangs te gsang bdag ngur smrig gar rol rje ngag gis dbang po 'phrin las dpal bzang po dang kun mkhyen chen po 'jam dbyangs bzhad sprul dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang po'i zhal snga nas sogs dam pa du ma'i zhabs drung nas yi dam 'di nyid kyi rjes gnang legs par thob pa'i ^sh'akya'i dge slong gyi na pa blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug gis slob dpon 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa'i 'di'i sgrub thabs rtsa 'grel dang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan dang mkhas chen ngag dbang chos grags sogs kyi mdzad pa'i rnam thos sras kyi rje gnang gi cho ga sgrigs dang 'phags sde lo tsa ba'i rnam sras bsgrub thabs dgos 'dod kun 'byung sogs tshang thug kyi yig cha du mar zhib tu spyad nas sgrub thabs kyi zur sogs so so'i bka' srol ma phyed pa'i gang dran rgyas 'geb lta bu ma yin par 'di nyid kyi srol bka' nyams pa med pa'i lugs su rang gi bsam gtan gyis khang bur mtshams cad dge sbyor gyi thun par zhig @006a * tu sgrigs pa 'dis kyang 'gro kun gsang ba'i bdag pos rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig ) phyag na rdo rje'i mngon rtogs 'di 'di phyi'i las kun 'grub byed yin yin kyang las nyon che ldan rnams rnam kun dran shes gsal bar shog badzra tishta: "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5526</vol>
<tib>rgyal chen rnam thos sras kyi gong gnon gyi lha dpal gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi sgrub thabs dngos grub kun 'byung ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@005b (ces phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyis bsgrub thabs dngos grub kun 'byung ces bya ba 'di yang rgyal chen rnam thos sras kyi sgo nas 'phrin las bsgrub pa'i skabs du ma zhig tu nye bar 'kho bar mthong nas rang gzhan la phan pa'i sems kyis kun nas blangs te gsang bdag ngur smrig gar rol rje ngag gis dbang po 'phrin las dpal bzang po dang kun mkhyen chen po 'jam dbyangs bzhad sprul dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang po'i zhal snga nas sogs dam pa du ma'i zhabs drung nas yi dam 'di nyid kyi rjes gnang legs par thob pa'i ^sh'akya'i dge slong gyi na pa blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug gis slob dpon 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa'i 'di'i sgrub thabs rtsa 'grel dang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan dang mkhas chen ngag dbang chos grags sogs kyi mdzad pa'i rnam thos sras kyi rje gnang gi cho ga sgrigs dang 'phags sde lo tsa ba'i rnam sras bsgrub thabs dgos 'dod kun 'byung sogs tshang thug kyi yig cha du mar zhib tu spyad nas sgrub thabs kyi zur sogs so so'i bka' srol ma phyed pa'i gang dran rgyas 'geb lta bu ma yin par 'di nyid kyi srol bka' nyams pa med pa'i lugs su rang gi bsam gtan gyis khang bur mtshams cad dge sbyor gyi thun par zhig @006a * tu sgrigs pa 'dis kyang 'gro kun gsang ba'i bdag pos rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig ) phyag na rdo rje'i mngon rtogs 'di 'di phyi'i las kun 'grub byed yin yin kyang las nyon che ldan rnams rnam kun dran shes gsal bar shog badzra tishta: "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5526</vol>
<tib>rnam thar dad pa'i sgo 'byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-26a</p>
<col>@026a * lhar bcas 'gro ba yongs kyi skyabs mchog hal lha rje btsun dam pa'i sku phreng lnga pa rje btsun blo bzang tshul khrims 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i rnam par thar pa thun mong ma yin pa gsal bar bstan pa dad pa'i sgo 'byed ces bya ba 'di ni hu rye chen mo'i mkhan po no mon han gyis snga sor rje 'di'i gsang ba'i rnam thar bris shig ces bka' gnang ba dang slad nas kyang su nyid ga-yon ru'i shag gi dad pa'i stobs phul du byung ba dad ldan pa dge slong mkhas mchog gis lha rdzas ser pos thog drangs nas dngul srad du ma'i yon tan bcas te nan cher bskul ba'i ngor mtha' khob pa'i mtha' ta khobs mthar skys pa'i tha shal ba shes brgya zhes bya bas dad gus chen pos sug bris su bgyis pa'o dge'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5526</vol>
<tib>rnam thar dad pa'i sgo 'byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-26a</p>
<col>@026a * lhar bcas 'gro ba yongs kyi skyabs mchog hal lha rje btsun dam pa'i sku phreng lnga pa rje btsun blo bzang tshul khrims 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i rnam par thar pa thun mong ma yin pa gsal bar bstan pa dad pa'i sgo 'byed ces bya ba 'di ni hu rye chen mo'i mkhan po no mon han gyis snga sor rje 'di'i gsang ba'i rnam thar bris shig ces bka' gnang ba dang slad nas kyang su nyid ga-yon ru'i shag gi dad pa'i stobs phul du byung ba dad ldan pa dge slong mkhas mchog gis lha rdzas ser pos thog drangs nas dngul srad du ma'i yon tan bcas te nan cher bskul ba'i ngor mtha' khob pa'i mtha' ta khobs mthar skys pa'i tha shal ba shes brgya zhes bya bas dad gus chen pos sug bris su bgyis pa'o dge'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5526</vol>
<tib>rtags kyi 'jug pa'i dgongs 'grel gsal bar</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col>@007b zhes pa 'di yang don gnyer can du ma'i ngor dka' bcu'i ming can ratn'artha sid dhis bgyis pa dge legs su gyur cig  mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5526</vol>
<tib>ston pa'i rgyal tshab 'phags pa'i gnas brtan 'dul 'dzin bcu drug la mchod 'phrin dpal ldan ye shes dbang pos mdzad pa bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5526</vol>
<tib>no title [@002a * dus gsum rgyal kun ngo bo gcig bsdus pa bskal bzang thub bstan 'jigs med 'gro ba'i mgon lung rtogs bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'i dpal rnam 'dren rje btsun bla mar gsol ba 'debs ]"</tib>
<p>2a-2b</p>
<col>@002a * ('di yang gong bstun dam pa'i ming 'dzin gyis gsol ba btab pa ltar ^rgyal sras rdo rje 'chang @002b nyid kyis mdzad pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5527</vol>
<tib>rje btsun bcom ldan 'das ma chen mo dam tshig sgrol ma rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa lnga ma'i bdag nyid can gyi sgrub thabs dang ras bris dkyil bsgrub mchod sbyin bsreg bya tshul dang bcas pa gsal bar bkod pa don gnyis lhun grub ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-42a</p>
<col>@041b (ces rje btsun bcom ldan 'das ma chen mo dam tshig sgrol ma rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor lha nyi shu rtsa lnga ma'i bdag nyid can gyi sgrub thabs dang ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub mchod sbyin bsreg bya tshul dang bcas pa gsal bar bkod pa don gnyis lhun grub ces bya ba 'di ni rang gi nyams len dang tshul 'di nyid don du gnyer ba gzhan dag la'ang phan pa'i bsam pas kun nas bslangs te rje btsun thams cad mkhyen pa kun dga' snying pos 'phags yul pan grub kyi zhal lung ji lta ba bzhin mdzad pa'i sgrub dkyil gnyis gzhir bzung de dag la med du mi rung ba'i lhan thabs kyi yig cha grub mchog kun dga' mi 'gyur rdo rjes mdzad pa rnams sor gnas kyi thog ngag 'don gyi tshig gi mtshams sbyor dang kha skong gi rim pa'ang ci rigs su sbyar zhing lag len gyi khyad par 'ga' zhig kyang gsal bar byas te mkhas shing grub pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin la brten nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi dbang dang rgyud gzhung gdams ngag sogs rje btsun sgrol ma'i chos skor mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams @042a * pa sngags btsun ^dam tshig rdo rjes bla ma lha la gsol ba legs par btab ste gangs can sa'i thig le bod yul dbus kyi rdo rje gdan ra sa 'phrul snang gi gtsug lag khang chen po'i nye 'dabs su me mo glang lo'i ston zla 'bring po'i yar ngo dpa' bo mkha' 'gro sprin ltar 'dus te dngos grub char bzhin 'bebs pa'i dus bzang tshes bcu'i nyin tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa'i dga' ston dang bcas grub par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bla ma lha la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan zhing gzhung lugs rab 'byams la blo mig yangs pa'i rdo rje'i slob bu dge slong blo bzang nam mkha' rdo rje'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa dang bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu dam pa rnams sku khams bzang zhing sku tshe ring pa'i sgo nas rnam par dkar ba'i mdzad pa 'phrin las thams cad gong nas gong du 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang skye 'gro thams cad chos 'byor bde skyid kyi dpal la dus rtag tu rnam par rol pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5527</vol>
<tib>rje btsun bcom ldan 'das ma dam tshig sgrol ma rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bum bskyed dang bdag 'jug gi chog sgrigs phan bde'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-34a</p>
<col>@033b (par 'dir @034a * dus chen tshes bdu dang bstun par bla ma lha la tshogs gter phul te gsol ba btab nas bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni gus ldan mchod las pa dge tshul blo bzang chos ldan no 'dis kyang zab gsang rmad du byung ba'i lam bzang 'di nyid dus kyi mthar yang mi nub cing phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  mah'a su kha siddhi mme bra yatstshantu</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5529</vol>
<tib>byang phyogs bstan 'gro'i pad tshal rgyas par mdzad pa'i rjo sku 'phreng lnga pa'i rnam thar bskal ldan gdul bya'i tsha gdung sel bar byed pa'i gangga'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-25b </p>
<col>@025a * (ces 'di yang rje gongs ma rnams kyi rnam @025b thar sog yig su bris pa 'di skyabs mgon thams cad mkhyen pa sku 'phreng brgyad pas bod kyi yig tu bsgyur zhes gsung ba bzhin du bka' bcag mi nus pas bris pa 'di yang chos rje wa gindra su ma ti aartha siddhi ming can bsgrigs pa'i dge ba 'di nyid phyogs tu kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par 'gyur cig ) dge'o mangga lam "</col>

<item>

<vol>5531</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed lha bcu gsum ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i ngag 'don gyi rim pa legs bshad bdud rtsi'i zil dngar zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-34a</p>
<col>@034a * (ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed lha bcu gsum ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i ngag 'don gyi rim pa legs bshad bdud rtsi'i zil dngar zhes bya ba 'di ni rang nyid kyis brjed byang du bya ba dang skal mnyam gzhan la'ang phan 'dod kyi bsam pas dkyil chog rin chen phreng ba'i dgongs pa gzhir bzung ba la mtshan ldan dam pa'i phyag bzhes kha 'gengs 'os kyis brgyan te ^rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi khyab bdag dus gsum rgyal ba'i spyi gzugs mkhas shing grub pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rje ye shes bstan pa'i sgron me dpal bzang po khri chen rdo rje 'chang sa ma ti pakshi rdo rje 'chang pha bong kha pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas dpal bzang po nyang ston rdo rje 'chang blo gros kun dga' bstan 'dzin dpal bzang po rtsa ba'i yongs 'dzin bka' drin mnyam med rdo rje 'chang lha btsun ngag dbang sbyin pa dpal bzang po rnams kyi zhabs drung nas yi dam 'di nyid kyi smin byed zab mo'i dbang bzhi rdzogs par thob pa'i bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba ^lha'i btsun pa ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan nam dam tshig rdo rjes ^'jam dbyangs gong ma'i gser gyi bka' lung gis bsod nams kun sdud gling zhes bsngags pa'i gtsug lag khang gi gzims chung rab zhi bde ldan dga' tshal du sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5531</vol>
<tib>grub pa'i gnas mchog dpal ldan shambha lar skyes pa'i smon tshig ka l'a bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13b</p>
<col>@013a * (ces pa 'di'ang 'phags pa don yod lcags kyus mdzad pa'i sham bha la'i lam yig dang 'jig rten khams ? 'grel chen gyi mjug tu drag po 'khor lo can gyis kla klo 'joms tshul dang nang le'i 'grel chen gyi mdor bsdus gsum pa'i 'gor de dag gi nges don dang ye la'i 'grel chen gyi mdor bsdus gsum par kla lo 'dul ba'i thabs mkhas tsam du 'phags pa'i tshul bstan yin par gsungs pa rnams kyi thad kyi bu ston zhabs kyi 'grel mchan dang mkhas grub thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'jig rten khams le dang nang le'i ti ka chen zhang zhung pa dang blo gros chos skyong gi ye le'i ti ka chen ? chen chos rgyan gyi de nyid snang ba'i snying po mkhas grub nor bzang rgya mtsho'i dri med 'od rgyan pan chen @013b dpal ldan ye shes kyi shambha la'i lam yig grub dbang klong rdol rin po che'i sham bha la'i zhing bkod kyi bshad pa rnams las btus te btsun gzugs wa gindras smon 'dun mtshams sbyar dang brjed byang du bla ma ltar gsal ba btab ste bris pa'i smon pa'i don 'grub par gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5531</vol>
<tib>khyab bdag 'khor lo'i mgon po rje btsun dam pa blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam thar skal bzang dad pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-72a</p>
<col>@071a * (ces rje btsun bla ma dam pa dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po dad ldan pa skyabs mgon blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i rnam par thar pa skal bzang dad pa'i shin rta zhes bya ba 'di yang rang nyid skyes sbyangs yon tan gang yang med pas mkhas pa rnams dgyes pa'i gtam gyi re ba gtan nas med kyang dpal ba'i rten mi lus rin po che thob pa'i dus 'dir dam pa'i rnam thar bsgrigs pa skal pa bzang snyam pas snga mo nas bri ba'i 'dun pa yod na yang rje de nyid kyi rnam thar zhib rgyas ma rnyed pas lus ring song shing phyis su rang gi grogs 'ga' zhig gis kyang gsung bas rkyen byas te ngo mtshar pa'i rnam thar zhib gsal bri ba'i rdo mthog na'ang thun mong pa'i mdzad pa rags pa mdo tsam zhig mkhas pa'i dbang po dza ya pandi ta rje blo bzang 'phrin las kyis mdzad pa'i rnam thar la gzhir byas gzhan mdzad pa'i cha shas thar thor 'ga' zhig sog yig dang man ju'i brjed tho dang dus mtshungs kyi skyes chen dam pa gzhan rnams kyi rnam thar dang chab shog gsan yig rje nyid kyi gsung @071b thor sogs la zhib tu dpyad khul bgyis shing de dag gi snying po khu bsdus kyi thog tu 'di kha'i rgan rabs yid ches pa'i ngag rgyun 'ga' yis kyang zur brgyan nas skyabs mgon dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos bsten pa'i rmongs rtul gyi na pa ser gzugs ngag gi dbang po zhes bya ba sgyur byed zhes pa sa phag lo'i smin drug zla ba nas 'go brtsams te rgyal zla ba'i tshes dge ba'i nyin mjug rdzogs par bgyis pa 'di la nor 'khrul gyi cha ji snyed mchis pa la mkhas pa'i dbang po rnams kyis thugs 'khrel ma mdzad par bcos rogs gnang ba'i bka' drin skyangs par zhu zhu 'dis kyang mkha' mnyam 'gro kun bshes gnyen dam pas dgyes bzhin rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing rgyal bstan snying po blo bzang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  aom swa sti ngag gi dbang phyug 'jam dbyangs gzhon nu gang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes grags pa mgon de'i spyod tshul gang thub bris pa'i dges rgyal bstan dar zhing 'gro kun bde gyur cig ` aom swa sti 'jam mgon blo bzang grags pa'i bstan pa mchod phyogs mthar spel ba'i thugs bskyed mthus grub pa yo ge dzny'a badzra zhes grags pa'i rje btsun bla ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos mchod skyabs mgon dam pa gang gi rnam par thar mtha' med rgya che rgya mtsho lta bu las chu thig tsam zhig li khar spel 'di yang tshul 'dir  mos ldan rnams kyi dga' ba'i gsol de phyir khu re bstan pa dar rgyas dgon spyi so'i khams @072a * tshan dad brtson blo gros ldan dge slong grags pa tshe brtan zhes pa yis mi zad chos sbyin spel phyir par du bsgrubs 'dir 'bad dge bas tshe rabs thams cad du rje btsun bla ma mchog dang mi 'bral zhing ring por mi thogs shambha lar skyes nas bla med lam gyi rim pa mthar phyin shog gnas skabs 'dir yang tshe dang bsod nams dang dpal 'byor legs tshogs dbyar mtsho ltar 'phel zhing dpal mgon trakshda la sogs bsrung ma'i tshogs ga-yal ba med par rtag tu grogs byed shog ces pa 'di yang btsun gzugs rab 'byams pa ngag gi dbang po zhes pas bris pa dza yantu bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling brgyan du byon dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5532</vol>
<tib>pan chen bsod nams grags pas mdzad pa'i phar phyin dang dbu ma'i spyi thal sogs kyi dogs gnas 'ga' zhig las brtsams pa'i dri lan som nyi'i khong skran sel ba'i bri tshe phag mgo zhes bya ba bzhugs so  "</tib>
<p>1a-19a</p>
<col>@018b (ces pa 'di ni khal kha'i khu re nas byung ba'i dri ba mang rab cig lag tu son par brten so so'i dri lan tshul du dpyod pa'i sgo tsam re byur na gzur gnas don gnyer can 'ga' zhig la phan srid par bsam te spong ba par gtogs pa'i dge bshes ming can tshul khrims rnam rgyal gyis dben gnas stag lung brag tu nyin gsum bzhi'i ring la 'bad pas bsgrigs pa yi ger bkod pa po ni spos dkar sprul pa'i sku ngag dbang tshul khrims rnam @019a * rgyal lo 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  brka shis par gyur cig  ` aom swa sti gzhung 'di slob gnyer rnams la phan snyam pas par 'di khu ri khams tshan zhu rten ni dge bshes dge slong ye shes legs par bskrun dge bas rgyal bstan yun ring gnas pa dang dge 'dun thugs mthun khrims gtsang ba bka' pot lnga 'chad nyan yar ngo'i zla ltar 'phel rgyas shog (par 'di khu ri chen mo'i kun dga' chos gling grwa tshang du zhugs</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5532</vol>
<tib>rigs ldan dkyil 'khor kun gyi khyab bdag dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rdo rje 'chang ngag dbang blo bzang mkhas grub dpal bzang po'i rnam thar dad pa'i 'khri shing zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-63a</p>
<col>@062b ces rigs dang dkyil 'khor gyi khyab bdag dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rdo rje 'chang ngag dbang blo bzang mkhas grub dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyi rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho lta bu las rang gi blo gros kyis ji tsam dpogs pa ltar du bsgrigs pa dad pa'i 'khri shing zhes bya ba 'di ni rje bla ma gang gi sras slob dge slong ngag dbang shes rab dang ngag dbang 'chi med gnyis kyis bla ma thugs rje can 'di nyid kyi rnam thar gsar bsgrigs shig byung na legs tshul lha rdzas dang bcas mol bar brten sngar nas rnam thar gyi sa bon ma mchis shing rab byung bsnyen rdzogs bzhes tshul lta bu la lo zla gang yin gyi nges med stabs ji bzhin bris par dkar na'ang bla ma rin po che rang gis gsungs pa'i gsol 'debs dang gsan yig 'ga' dang gsung thor phyag bris rnams la gzhir byas rang gis mthong thos su byung ba sogs kyis zur brgyan nas dogs pa'i gnas su gyur ba rnams bla ma rin po che'i sku mdu rgyun @063a * du bcar ba'i rgyus can rnams la yang dri bcan zhib tu dpyad khul bgyis te gong du smos pa ltar bgyis pa'i 'os ma yin yang rang dang skal pa mnyam pa dag gis bla ma dran pa'i rkyen du gyur bar re zhing rang nyid kyang skal pa bzang po'i rten 'brel du bsams te byang phyogs sa mthar skye na'ang skyabs mgon dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len cing bka' drin mtshungs med bla ma gang gi slob ma'i tha shal 'bras rams pa'i char gtogs gyi na ba ngag gi dbang po zhes bya bas rab byung bcu bzhi pa'i kun ldan zhes pa lcags byi lo'i rgyal zla'i tshes gcig nas mgo brtsams te mchu zla ba'i dmar phyogs rgyal ba dang po'i nyin skyabs mgon rje btsun mchog gi gdan sa dga' ldan theg chen gling gi nye 'dabs su mjug rdzogs par bgyis pa 'dis kyang rje btsun bla ma mnyes pa'i mchod sprin du gyur zhing bdag sogs 'gro ba thams cad bshes gnyen dam pas mi 'phongs pa kho na'i rgyur gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5535</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sa'i cho ga sogs lag len snying por dril ba</tib>
<p>1a-12b</p>
<col>@012b tshul 'di yang dge slong blo bzang bstan 'dzin gyis nan cher bskul ba la brten nas btsun pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis ngag 'don bzhin bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni rje drung blo bzang dbang rgyal lo dge'o legs so "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5538</vol>
<tib>dpal chen dur khrod bdag po'i bskang bshags bdud las rgyal ba'i ru mtshon bzlog bsgyur ja phud dang bcas pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>

<item>

<item>

<vol>5540</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa lha dgu'i las gzhung rta mchog bzhad pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi sgom rim bsnyen thabs dang bcas pa'i rnam bshad gnad don rab gsal kun phan sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>

<tib>dam can ging lnga gza' gdong gi mnga' gsol chos skyong thugs mnyes par byed pa'i ga la bingga'i dbyangs snyan gyi glu zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5540</vol>
<tib>pad+ma yang gsang khros pa'i las byang gyer sgom 'jigs med rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-37a</p>
<col>@036b (ces pad+ma yang gsang khros pa khrag 'thung lha dgu'i byang gyer sgom 'jigs med rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di yang rgya sngags 'chang chen po 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rigs 'jig rten dbang phyug phyag na pad dkar gyis rjes su bzung ba'i gdung dri med pa las byung ba gnas rnying chos kyi rje sku 'bring po'i gsung gis snga gong nas bskul ba dang nye lam chos sde chen po theg chen gling gi byes mkhas nyan grwa tshang pa'i slob dpon bsod nams rgyal mtshan gtor sgrub par bcas pa rnams dang grong smad pa 'phrin las rgya mtsho sogs kyis bskul ba la brten nas 'khon ston rdo rje 'chang dpal 'byor lhun grub sogs lam 'di'i sgo nas grub pa brnyes pa'i yongs 'dzin dam pa chos bzhin du spyod pa rnams kyi bka' drin la brten nas zab @037a * mo'i tshul 'di la blo gros kyi snang ba cung zad rgyas pa'i za hor gyi rigs las a'a wa dh'u t'i ba'i btsun pa ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho ming gzhan gang shar rang grol du 'bod pa'i ldom bu pas yang gsang khros pa'i rgyud lo chen bee ro tsa na'i 'gyur med pa seb gdong nas gter ston rnam gsum gyis spyan drangs pa'i gter ma grub thob 'dar char la bka' babs pa slob dpon hen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis mdzad pa'i las byang mus sras dpal ldan seng ges mdzad pa'i 'phrin las kyi sgom khog rin chen 'phreng ba bla chen chos dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i sgom khog gnyags ky ban dhe rnam rgyal bzang pos mdzad pa'i las byang tshad chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i chos skyong skor gyi yi ge rnams la gzhi byas yig rnying so so'i tshigs bcad rnams byin rlabs kyi tshan kha che ba'i phyir nang sor bzhag gsar du dgos pa rnam dang tshig lhug phal che ba tshigs bcad du bsdebs nas myos byed kyi lo hor zla lnga pa'i dkar phyogs kyi dga' ba gnyis pa'i tshes la dga' ldan pho brang sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sngags ban ngag dbang 'phrin las so sarba mangga lam aom swa sti gsang chen rgyud sde mah'a yo ga las bka' gter zung 'jug yang gsang khros pa zhes rgyal ba kun dngos pad+ma 'byung gnas dang gangs can grub mchog dpal ldan 'da' char sogs rgya bod mkhas grub rnams kyi thugs kyi bcud mchog thun dngos grub 'byung ba'i gter chen po skal ldan thar 'dod rnams kyi 'jug ngogs mchog bskyed rdzogs zung du 'jug pa'i lam bzang dang 'phrin las rnam bzhis ghan don bsgrub pa'i tshul ma tshang med par ston pa'i gdams pa mchog gangs can mgon po thams cad mkhyen pa yis legs gsungs cho ga rdo rje sgra dbyangs zhes gzhung mchog 'dir zhugs thos bsam bsgom pa yis 'gro rnams kha sbyor bde ba chen po'i sku ye shes bla ma'i go 'phang 'thob phyir du mi zad par gyi mchod sprin 'gyed pa po lha chos 'di la shes nas dad thob pa rnal 'byor dbang po blo bzang yar 'phel dang rab 'byams smra ba thabs mkhas bzang po dang brko 'dri zhus dag byed po zla med pa yig mkhan rab 'byams byams pa rin chen dang par rkos mkhas pa sde dge aa 'bus byas dge ba 'di yis 'gro kun sems can rnams pad+ma rgyal po'i go 'phang mchog thob nas ma rig ldongs pa'i skye tshogs thams cad la rol pa'i rta skad phyogs bcur sgrogs par shog  las byang rin po che 'di nyid mdo smad dga' ldan bkra shis 'byung gnas su par du bsgrubs skabs par byang smon tshig 'di ni chos smra ba dge bshes don yod dpal ldan bgyis gyis pa dge legs 'phel mangga lam bkra shis</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>5545</vol>
<tib>dgra lha mched dgu'i bzlog bsgyur bya tshul bar chad kun gyi tshar gcod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (ces dgra lha mched dgu'i bzlog bsgyur bar chad kun gyi tshar gcod zhes bya ba 'di ni lha dge slong blo bzang bstan 'dzin gyis dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor rig pa 'dzin pa'i dge slong ngag dbang lhun grub kyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni de tshul blo bzang mkhas mchog go bkra shis par gyur cig mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5545</vol>
<tib>'dir lha mo bu rdzi ma la bsangs mchod 'bul bar 'dod pa ni "</tib>
<p>12b-13a</p>
<col>@013a * (zhes pa 'di ni bu chung tshe brtan rdo rje'i don du ^dam tshig rdo rjes bris pa'o tshe dpal 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5545</vol>
<tib>dzambha la dkar po'i sgo nas ga-yang 'gugs pa'i zab mo gdams pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b (ces dzambha la dkar po'i sgo nas ga-yang 'gugs pa'i zab mo gdams pa zhes bya ba 'di ni lha 'di sgrub pa'i dus su rmi lam du brda 'byung bas rbi shi rel thu pandi tas sug bris su bgyis pa'o dge'o sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5545</vol>
<tib>'go ba'i lha lnga'i gsol mchod phan bde 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006b (ces 'go ba'i lha lnga'i gsol mchod phan bde'i 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba 'di ni btsun gzugs blo bzang chos kyi nyi mas rang gi lha gsol gyi tsho mkho ban bsam nas rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung las btus te 'khyer bde bar dben gnas bde chen chos gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gu shri dge slong blo bzang bzod pa'o mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5545</vol>
<tib>'go ba'i lha lnga'i mchod bstod bskang bshags sogs gtor chog 'dod don lhun grub zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@014b (ces 'go ba'i lha lnga'i mchod bstod bskang bshags sogs gtor chog 'dod don lhun grub zhes bya ba 'di ni lung rtogs @015a * kun gyi gter mdzod pa lha btsun blo bzang don grub rdo rjes nan tan du bskul ba'i ngor pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa rje btsun blo bzang dpal ldan bstan pa'i nyi ma phyogs las rnam rgyal dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i cho ga nyid la kha skong dang cha lag tshang ba mtshams sbyar ci rigs pas brgyan te bla ma  dam pa gong ma rnams kyi phyag bzhes dang gsung rgyun la brten nas gshin rje'i gshed kyi rnal 'byor pa ^sh'akya'i btsun pa su ma ti badzra gyis chos sde chen po'i dga' ldan bkra shis gling du legs par bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni bla ma lha bsrung la mi phyed pa'i dad brtson rnam dpyod yangs pa'i slob bu dge slong blo bzang rdo rjes bgyis pa'o bkra shis pa dang dge legs 'phel sarba mangga lam dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5545</vol>
<tib>kong rtse 'phrul gyi rgyal po sogs la mchod tshul</tib>

</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5545</vol>
<tib>lha mo bu rdzi ma'i sgo nas sri'u gso ba'i cho ga bee t'urya'i khang bzang zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>7a-12a</p>
<col>@013a * (ces bstod cing 'phrin las bcol bar bya'o mthar brtan bzhugs dang gshegs gsol ci bde bar byas te shis brjod kyis mtha' rgyan par bya'o de ltar don yod par bya ba'i phyir du rig pa 'dzin pa bzhad pa'i rdo rjes gter gzhung gi yi ge khungs ma las btus te shing pho stag lo'i gro zhun zla ba'i dkar phyogs kyi rgyal tshes dge bar shar mar spel ba'i yi ge pa ni rdo rjes gzhi'o mangga lam dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5545</vol>
<tib>lha mo dung skyong ma la mchod gtor 'bul tshul bskang bshags sogs bya ba'i cho ga</tib>

<col>@007a * (ces 'dod khams dbang mo lha mo dung skyong ma'i bskang bshags sogs mchod gtor 'bul tshul 'di yang slob dpon pad+mas gter gzhung khungs ma mdzad pa yod pa de la gzhi byas te bstan 'dzin mkhas grub ye shes kyis bsgrigs pa la'ang kha bskong sbyar te bris pa'i dge bas rmong srid 'dod skye bo rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bu dang tsha bo myur du thob cing yod pa rnams kyang tshe ring nad med ring du 'tsho bar dge legs 'phel mangga lam dge ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5545</vol>

<col>@010a * (ces nor lha dzambha la dkar po'i bskang chog 'dod dgu'i char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni gtor ma'i las sbyor dang sa dpyad sman rtsis sogs kyis 'gro phan gyi 'phrin las rgya che ba dge slong sangs rgyas don 'grub kyis dam can gyi bskang gsol gyi dpe cha lha rdzas bcas yang yang bskul ngor ^rgyal mkhan po grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba 'gro ba thams cad la phan thogs par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>

<col>@020a * ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas rab gnas byed tshul byin rlabs yi rol mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni rab gnas kyi cho ga du ma dang dam pa'i phyag bzhes mthong brgyud bzhin rang gzhan la phan 'dod kyi bsam pas btsun gzugs ^dharma badzra gyis 'phar ba zhes pa lcags mo glang gi lo dbyar dus kyi dga' ma lang tsho dar la babs pa na skyid mo tshal gyi bsti gnas yid dga' chos 'phel du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aor du su dge slong blo bzang kun dga' bgyis pa sarba dza yantu mangga lam "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5545</vol>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5545</vol>
<tib>ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma seng ge gdong ba can gyi bskang gso'i lhan thabs reg gzigs tu 'god pa 'phrin las dngos grub kun gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba tshogs mchod 'khyer bde dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@010b zhes ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma seng ge gdong ba can gyi bskang bso'i lhan thabs reg gzigs tu 'god pa 'phrin las dngos grub kun gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba 'di ni ma gcig mkha' 'gro de nyid rang gi dgon pa dga' lan phun tshogs dge 'phel rnam par rgyal ba'i gling gi bsrung mar mnga' gsol pa'i tshe dus gtor sogs kyi skabs su nye bar mkho bar bsam nas bris 'dun yod pa'i thog rang gi gam du gnas pa'i dgon gnyer dge slong grags pa don grub kyis lha rdzas dri med dang bcas 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ma byung bar brten dpal ldan sgo mang grwa tshang @011a gi 'don cha dang phyag len la gzhi byas bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gsung gis brgyan te ^btsun gzugs ye shes don gnyis lhun grub kyis rab byung bcu bzhi pa'i me yos lo'i gro bzhin zla ba'i mar ngo'i tshes brgyad la bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni bskul ba po nyid kyis bgyis pa 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che 'di nyid mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan mi 'gyur ba'i ga-yung drung mi shig pa'i rdo rjer 'gyur cig dge legs 'phel mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5545</vol>
<tib>ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sengge'i gdong ba can gtso 'khor gsum ma'i sgrub thabs spu gri 'bar ba'i 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@007b zhes rje btsun chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa nas brgyud pa'i seng gdong ma gtso 'khor gsum gyi sgrub thabs spu gri 'bar ba'i 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba 'di ni deng sang rang phyogs pa 'ga' zhig gis rje bla ma'i man ngag thun mong ma yin pa 'di 'dra yod bzhin du de las zab pa'i seng gdong ma'i man ngag zhig gzhan du mod snyam pas gzhan phyogs kyi man ngag zab zab mor btags pa'i shog 'khyar de gnyis la khyi dang gla ba phrad pa bzhin 'jug la mthong nas rje bla ma'i man ngag 'di la lang klongs bshags bsun bzlog tshogs brgya me mchod sogs rnying lugs kyi rgyas 'gebs sna tshogs pas bslad par byed pa 'ga' zhig kyang mthong nas rang lugs gtsang deng de ba'i yig cha zhig 'bri 'dun yod thog nye char bla brang bkra shis 'od 'bar du pha rol gyi bsam sbyor ngan pa'i mthu gtad sogs kyi ltas mtshan 'byung ba bzlog ched du seng gdong ma dang chags lugs khro rgyal gtsug tor 'bar ba gnyis kyis gtso bo'i phyir bzlog gi sgrub pa khag 'ga' zhig 'dzug 'dun skabs klag chog 'di lta bu nyer 'khor 'dug tshul 'ga' zhig gis mos pa la brten nas btsun gzugs ^dharma badzra gyis rje lcang skya gong ma dang @008a * rgyal dbang skal bzang rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i seng gdong ma gtso rkyang gi sgrub thabs dang rdo rje 'dzin pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i gtso 'khor gsum ma'i sgrub thabs rnams gong 'og bsgrigs te bzhes ao rgyan gling du mgyogs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang don grub po dge legs 'phel bar gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5545</vol>

<col>@007a * ces ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma seng ge gdong ba can gyi sgo nas bzlog bsgyur bya tshul rdo rje'i thog mda' zhes bya ba 'di ni bdag gi yongs 'dzin dam pa lha 'di nyid la thugs dam mdzad pa'i hur tsha pi lig thu bla ma rin po ches 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bka' stsal ba bzlog par mi nus par dang du blangs te 'di skor gyi man ngag cung zad thob pa'i btsun gzugs ^ye shes don gnyis lhun grub kyis 'di nyid ky gtor bzlog sogs la gzhi byas bla ma'i man ngag gis brgyan te rnga chen ces pa chu pho khyi lo'i dbo zla ba'i mar ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis stobs ldan 'byor ba'i nyin mgyogs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni nye gnas tshe ring rdo rje grags so sarba mangga lam dza yantu "</col>

<item>

<tib> rje btsun sgrol ma'i brgya bzhi zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5547</vol>
<tib># bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sgo nas dkar phyogs skyong ba'i bsrung ma lha klu gzhi bdag rnams la yul khrus bya tshul</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006b (ces yul phyogs mtha' dag gi dkar phyogs skyong ba rnams kyi mi mthun rgud pa mtha' dag sel ba'i thabs yul khrus bya tshul 'di yang kun la phan pa'i bsam pas rgyal sras ming can gyis bris pa'o dge'o legs so</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5547</vol>
<tib># gshin po'i dur 'debs kyis bslang ba sogs ji ltar bya tshul gyi cho ga mdor bsdus gzhan phan snying po zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9b</p>
<col>@009b (ces pa 'di ni rig 'dzin dpal mgon bzhad pa'i rdo rje ming can gyis tshad ldan dam pa rnams kyi gsung rgyan las byung ba ltar bris pa la lta shes su grags pa'i rtsis mkhan dang mkhas pa rnam dpyod can zur bar gnas pa rnams kyi gzugs na thugs kyis mi khrel zhu'o yi ge pa ni bsod rnams dbang phyug gis gis bgyis pa 'dis kyang 'gro ba mang po la phan thogs par gyur cig bkra shis pa dang dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5547</vol>
<tib># mandal gyi dmigs rim gsal bar ston pa phan bde'i char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-14b</p>
<col>@014a * (ces mandal gyi dmigs rim gsal bar ston pa phan bde'i char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni dad stobs phun sum tshogs pa skyid grong rdzong bzhugs grong po che pa sde ba tshe dbang bag gros 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba la @014b brten nas bla ma dam pa rnams kyi zhabs rdul spyi bo'i rgyan du 'dzin pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bkra shis bsam gtan gling du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5547</vol>
<tib>mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu'i sgrub thabs</tib>
<p>1a-5b</p>
<col>@005a * (zhes sogs mkhas grub khyung pos mdzad pa'i bkra shis byin brlabs can yongs grags ltar bya'o gangs can 'gro ba'i mgon po rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa gzigs chen po rje btsun blo bzang bstan pa'i dbang phyug 'jam dpal rgya mtsho dpal bzang pos mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus 'di lta bu zhig bgyi dgos zhes bka' lung spyi bor phebs pa gus pa chen pos mnos te mgon po 'di'i man ngag legs pa thob pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis 'di'i mngon rtogs dngos gzhi rje blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa gzhir bzhag kha skong rnams gsar du bsgrigs te shing sprul mchu stod zla ga'i yar tshe ston pa thub pa'i dbang pos @005b bden bzhi'i chos 'khor bskor ba'i dus chen gyi nyin pho brang chen po po ta lar sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs kun tu dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5547</vol>
<tib>mthu chen dgra lha chen po mched dgu'i gsol mchod dgra las rgyal ba'i ru mtshon zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@011a * ces dpal gsang ba'i bdag po'i bka' sdod dkar phyogs skyong ba'i bsrung ma mthu rtsal can dgra lha chen po mched dgu'i gsol mchod dgra las rgyal ba'i ru mtshon zhes bya ba 'di ni jing gir gnam gyi rigs rgyud stobs 'byor mnga' thang gi mngon par mtho zhing bla ma dkon mchog la mi phyed pa'i dad gus dang ldan pa thu sa lag chi hung tha'i ji tshe dbang rdo rje lags nas rgyal blon 'bangs du ma'i lha gsol gyi don du phan pa'i lhag bsam gyis bskul ma nan cher mdzad pa ltar mkhas grub du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bo'i rgyan du 'dzin pa'i rgyal khams pa ^badzra k'irtis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod yangs pa'i slob bu dge tshul bstan 'dzin bzang po'o 'dis @011b kyang dkar phyogs skyong ba'i lha bsrung mthu stobs can rnams kyis rtag tu 'go zhing stongs grogs mdzad de bstan 'gro yongs la phan rgya cher thogs shing bkra shis dge legs phyogs kun tu khyab par byed nus par gyur cig  lha rgyal lo dge legs 'phel mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5547</vol>
<tib>rgyal chen rnam thos sras kyi gong mnon gyi lha dpal gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi sgrub thabs dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@006b (ces phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi sgrub thabs dngos grub kun 'byung ces bya ba 'di yang rgyal chen rnam thos sras kyi sgo nas 'phrin las bsgrub pa'i skabs du ma zhig tu nye bar mkho bar mthong nas rang gzhan la phan pa'i sems kyis kun nas blangs te gsang bdag ngur smrig gar rol rje ngag gi dbang po 'phrin las bzang po dang kun mkhyen chen po 'jam dbyangs bzhad sprul dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang po'i zhal snga nas sogs dam pa du ma'i zhabs drung nas yi dam 'di nyid kyi rjes gnang legs par thob pa'i ^sh'akya'i dge slong gi na ba blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug gis slob dpon 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa'i 'di'i sgrub thabs rtsa 'grel dang mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan dang mkhas chen ngag dbang chos grags sogs kyi mdzad pa'i rnam thos sras kyi rjes gnang gi cho ga sgrigs dang 'phags sde lo tsa ba'i rnam sras kyi sgrub thabs dgos 'dod kun 'byung sogs tshang thug gi yig cha du mar zhib tu sbyar nas sgrub thabs kyi zur sogs so so'i bka' srol ma phyed pa'i gang dran rgyas 'geb lta bu ma yin par @007a * 'di nyid kyi srol bka' nyams pa med pa'i lugs su rang gi bsam gtan gyi khang bur mtshams bcad dge sbyor gyi thun bar zhig tu sgrigs pa 'dis kyang 'gro kun gsang ba'i bdag pos rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig ) phyag na rdo rje'i mngon rtogs 'di 'di phyi'i las kun 'grub byed yin yin kyang las nyon che ldan rnams rnam kun dran shes gsal bar shog badzra tishtha: mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5547</vol>
<tib>rje btsun bcom ldan 'das ma seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma la bstod pa mkhas pa'i gtsug rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5547</vol>

<col>@004a * (zhes rje btsun sgrol ma la gsol ba 'debs pa rang gi 'dod gsol dang gzhan la bslu med kyi snying gtam du smras pa 'di yang sh'akya'i btsun pa blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis rang lo bcu dgu bar chu byi lo'i cho 'phrul zla ba'i chos gsum la ban rkang rnam rgyal gling du sbyar ba 'di yang phan yon che ba'i nges pa yang dag pa yod pa yin no phan bde'i 'byung gnas rgyal bstan yongs 'du'i ljon rab rgyas 'gro kun thar mchog 'bras bzang la` `spyod phyir bde ldan gling gi chos grwa cher chos sbyin 'dzad med dal 'gro'i rgyun 'di spel bkra shis par gyur cig sarba mangga lam dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5547</vol>
<tib>rje btsun sgrol ma la mandal bzhi mchod kyi sgo nas gsol ba btab tshul gyi cho ga gsal bar bkod pa 'dod don kun 'grub ces bya ba</tib>
<p>2b-9b</p>
<col>@009a * (ces rje btsun sgrol ma la mandal bzhi mchod kyi sgo nas gsol ba gdab tshul gyi cho ga gsal bar bkod pa 'dod don kun 'grub ces bya ba 'di ni rang gzhan gyi don du sgrol cho ga yang yang lag tu bstan skabs chog sgrigs 'khyer bde ba zhig dgos tshul byung bar brten mchims kyi rtsa tshig gzhir bzhag snar thang pa'i man ngag brgya rtsar ma 'dus pa'i bka' gdams gong ma'i yig rnying khungs thub gzhan dga' zhig las kyang lag len gyi zhib cha cung zad blangs shing dam pa so so'i mdzad pa'i chog sgrigs du ma la yang gzhigs nas 'jug bde bklags chog pa'i tshul du mkhas shing grub pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin kho nas 'tsho ba'i rgyal khams pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes dpal ri dgon gyi nye 'dabs dben gnas su rgyal zla ba'i tshes brgyad kyi nyin sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge bshes dge @009b slong d'irgh'a yub badzra gyis bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang bstan 'gro yongs la phan thogs par 'gyur cig bkra shis pa dang dge legs 'phel dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5547</vol>
<tib>rje btsun sgrol ma'i mandal bzhi pa'i bla brgyud gsol 'debs bzhugs so  * rje btsun sgrol ma la mandal bzhi mchod kyi sgo nas gsol ba btab tshul gyi cho ga gsal bar bkod pa 'dod don kun 'grub ces bya ba bzhugs so  * rje btsun sgrol ma'i brgya bzhi zhes bya ba bzhugs so  * rje btsun sgrol ma'i mandal bzhi pa'i bla brgyud gsol 'debs ni "</tib>

<col>@002a * (ces sgrol ma'i mandal bzhi par grags @002b pa'i cho ga'i yan lag tu ^skyabs mgon dpal ldan ye shes kyis mdzad pa'i bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs kyi gras su rang gis thob pa'i bla ma'i brgyud rim ltar bcug bris so</col>

<item>

<item>

<vol>5548</vol>
<tib># ma gcig 'dod khams dbang phyug dpal ldan lha mo'i gtor chog 'phrin las rnam bzhi lhun grub ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12b</p>
<col>@010b (ces ma gcig 'dod khams dpal ldan lha @011a * mo'i gtor chog 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i lhun grub ces bya ba 'di ni aer te ni jo bo'i dgon pa 'di nyid kyi bstan pa'i bya ba thams cad dang khyad dge 'du sde rnams kyi 'gal rkyen thams cad sel zhing mthun rkyen thams cad sgrub pa'i thabs gang la 'bad na legs par brtags bar chos skyong bsrung ma 'di nyid la gtor chog 'di ltar zhig dgos snyam pa'i nyams glo bur byung zhing rgyun 'don byed rgyud yig cha mang po la ltos mi dgos pa'i tshig chog nag 'gros su bkod pa zhig byung ba legs 'dug snyam pa'i phan pa'i bsam pas 'bri 'dun yod thog aer te ni jo bo'i dgon pa 'di nyid kyi tshogs chen dge bskos dge slong blo bzang don yod hur tsha spi lig thus mandal kha btags dang bcas pas bskul ba la brten nas cho ga dngos gzhi'i bstan pa'i gsal byed lcang lung bante ta rje btsun ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dpal ldan dmag zor rgyal mo gtor chog 'ang cag la yongs grags par 'brel nas las bzhi lha mo'i mngon rtogs spyan 'dren dang mtshan sngags bstod pa 'phrin bcol rnams zhig tu bkod pa de nyid gzhir bzung la tshad ldan dam pa rnams kyis mdzad pa la dpal ldan lha mo'i gtor chog gi yig cha dang sgo bstun nas dgon gnas 'di'i sgos kyi dbang gis tshig bsgyur dang cung zad bsnon bri rang blo'i tshod kyis byas ste gang gi she re ke thu mer geng mkhan po banti ta gu shr'i nom chi chos rje'i ming 'dzin lha'i btsun pa su ma ti dzny'a na shri'i la lakshim ming can gyis lhun grub bde chen rin chen jo bo'i gling du khro mo zhes pa shing pho 'brug lo'i nag pa zla ba'i yar ngo'i mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i dus bzang tshes bcur bris pa'i yi ge 'du las smon gyis 'brel ba tshogs chen dge bskos chen @012b mo su ma ti badzra s'a nis bgyis pa 'dis kyang dge 'dun rnams kyi 'dod don bgegs med du sgrub pa'i rgyur gyur cig bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling brgyan du byon dge'o sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5548</vol>
<tib>nang gi khong skran 'don pa'i skyug sman zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5551</vol>
<tib># ma gcig dpal lha'i rjes gnang bya tshul gyi cho ga gzhan phan nyin byed shes bya ba dum bu gsum pa</tib>
<p>1a-49a [*gong 'og 8*]</p>
<col>@048b (ces dpal ldan lha mo dka' chen nyer gcig gi rjes su gnang ba'i cho ga bdud rtsi'i char rgyun skal ldan tshim byed ces bya ba 'di ni rigs drug pa rdo rje 'chang brag ni mchog sprul rin po che blo bzang chos 'byor rgya mtsho dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas dang bka' drin mtshungs med rje btsun 'jam dbyangs 'phrin las dpal bzang po sogs bshes gnyen du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi gtsug tu brten cing nye bar 'tsho ba dang ^phyag na pad dkar dur smrig gar gyi rnam rol skyabs mgon thams cad mkhyen pa ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan mkhyen rab 'phrin las rgya mtsho dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' lung rdo rje'i tshig spyi bor phebs pas bka' bzhin sgrub pa'i mchod par dmigs te de'i bka' 'bangs tha shal mkhan po bsam grub bstam 'dzin nam ming gzhan rtag pa'i rdo rjes tshad ldan mkhan pa rnams kyi yig cha mang po kun sgrigs nas bla ma dam pa rnams kyi zhal shes dang phyag len man ngag gis legs par rgyan te shin tu gsal bar bkod pa 'di ni ^byang phyogs bstan pa'i gsal byed rje btsun dam pa rin po che'i gdan sa chen po rigs gnas kun gyi 'byung gnas ri po dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling du rab byung bco lnga pa'i grangs bya bcu bdun pa chu mo lug lo'i dpyid zla 'bring gi tshes bcwo lngar mjug rdzogs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni @049a * dad brtson rnam dpyod mchog tu yangs pa'i dge tshul sna tshogs rdo rjes bgyis pa 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa spyi dang khyad par du rgyal ba gnyis pa'i ring lugs dri ma med pa phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas pa dang bstan 'dzin skyes chen dam pa rnams kyi zhabs pad brtan cing mkha' nyams sems can thams cad la pham thogs par gyur cig mangga lam dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5554</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo sdom pa lha lnga'i dkyil 'khor du skal ldan gyi slob ma rnams bcug nas smin byed kyi dbang bskur tshul gyi bshad sbyor bde chen bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-98a</p>
<col>@097b ces byin rlabs kyi gter chen po bcom ldan 'dab dpal 'khor lo sdom pa lha lnga'i dkyil 'khor du skal ldan gyi slob ma rnams bcug nas smin byed kyi dbang bskur tshul gyi bshad sbyor bde chen bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni don gnyer can gyi slob bu 'ga' zhig gis lugs 'di'i bdag 'jug gi dmigs rim gsal bar thon pa'i dbang t'i ka zhig dgos tshul mol bar brten deng sang lha nga 'di la yi dam du byed pa mang zhing dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod bdag 'jug sogs kyi lag len kyang dar so che bar snang bas tshul 'di lta bu zhig byung na bdag 'jug gi dmigs rim sogs kyang zhal la 'thon zhing slad nas dbang rgyun spel mkhan dag la'ang phan che bar bsams nas rje bdag nyid chen po'i gsung dkyil chog rin chen bang mdzod dang mkhas grub rje'i bde chen rol mtsho gnyis kyi dgongs don rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho'i dkyil @098a * chog nyid gzhir bzung mtshams sbyor gyi bshad pa phal cher gong smos kyi dbang bshad rnams las ci rigs par btus shing rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi phyab bdag rdo rje 'chang dngos kun mkhyen dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron me dpal bzang po la sogs pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams kyi phyag bzhes gsung rgyun gyis nye bar brgyan nas rgyas bsdus 'tsham zhing 'khyer bde ba'i tshul du mkhas shing grub pa'i bla ma dam pa du ma'i bka' drin las 'di'i skor gyi dbang dang gdams pa mang du thob pa'i rgyal khams pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes dpal ldan brag ri'i dben gnas su sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan las ky rdo rje chos mdzad dge slong bstan 'dzin bzang po dang mchod las pa dge tshul blo bzang chos ldan zung gis bgyis pa 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa'i snying po khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i mdo sngags bshad sgrub kyi ring lugs dri ma med pa 'di ag dus kyi mthar yang mi nub cing phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig mah'a su kha siddhi mme pra yatshtshandu "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5554</vol>
<tib>mi 'khrugs pa'i cho ga</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@008a * ces rgyal ba mi 'khrugs pa la mdo chog gi lugs bzhin mchod cing gsol ba btab pa'i rim pa mngon dga' zhing du bgrod pa'i 'phrul gyi gru gzings zhes bya ba 'di ni chos mthun grogs bshes mkhyen ldan dka' bcu bde spyid dpal gyis gzhan phan gyi lhag bsam dkar bas lha dbang drgya sgor gyi nyen dang bcas te bskul ma byung ba bzhin rang nyid kyang mos 'dun gyis mtshams sbyar te ^sh'akya'i btsun gzugs blo bzang rta dbyangs ming pas hal ha dbus ru'i klung chen tho'u la'i nub 'gram gyi char gsar bsgrigs byas so 'dis kyang 'brel thogs skye 'gro rnams dang mo dang dga'i zhing du mi bskyod rgyal ba'i mdun sar phan chun gshes bzhin du mjal ba'i rgyu byed par gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5555</vol>
<tib># grub mtha' rnam par bzhag pa'i 'krul spong gdong lnga'i sgra dbyangs kun mkhyen lam bzang gsal ba'i rin chen sgron me zhes bya ba bzhugs so"</tib>
<p>1a-18a</p>
<col>@017b ces grub pa'i mtha' rnam par bzhag pa 'khrul spong gong lnga'i sgra dbyangs thams cad mkhyen pa'i la bzang gsal ba'i rin chen sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni snga mo nas mang thos gser khang chos rje gu na ma tis snyan tshig me tog gsar bas bskul zhing bus phyis yongs kyi bshes gnyen chen po mkhas mchog lcang rwa slob dpon pa 'phags pa rin chen gyis khams chab mdo nas ja ga-yu kha btag gi rted bcas nas chab shog tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas stag lo'i dgag lan 'jam rgyas dgos zhes bskul ba'i bka' ngo dang khyad par rang blo goms pa'i slad du mkhan chen rgyal ba thams cad kyi bdag po rin po che las sdom gsum sogs chos kyi bka' drin thob cing 'jam dbyangs bla ma khri rin po che yab sras bzhi dang pan chen bka' 'gyur ba rdo rje 'chang smin grol chos kyi rgyal po sra rdo rje 'chang dang sems dpa' chen po @018a * ngag dbang blo gros sogs dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len cing rje bla ma'i mdo sngags rnams la nges shes rnyed cing 'phags bod kyi grub mtha'i gzhung dang khyad par sher sgron tshad chen rtsa 'grel dus 'khor sogs gzhugn lugs chen po rnams la brten gsung rab dang grub mtha' rab 'byams smra ba 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rjes tshig nyung rgyas 'grel du dkar po zhes pa sa mo sprul gyi lo cho 'phrul zla ba dkar phyogs rdzogs pa gsum pa'i nyin gangs can gyi bya rgod phung po gnyis pa dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i 'du gnas ri bo dge 'phel gyi gar 'dug theg mchog rol tsho gsang sngags bde ba chen po'i pho brang nas sbyar ba la slar yang 'phri bsnon cung zad byas pa 'dis rgyal ba'i bstan pa phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas pr gyur cig  'di yang chos sbyin rgya cher spel phyir cang cung chos grwa chen gling du par du bsgrubs pa'o dge legs 'phel "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5555</vol>
<tib>bka' dge dgongs pa gcig bsgrub kyi phyag rgya chen po gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13b</p>
<col>@013b zhes rgyal po'i pho brang 'phyong rgyas stag rtse nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun spangs chos rjes dris pa'i lan du bya btang ma ni bha dras (chos rgyal rdo rje tshe brtan pa mkhas grub nor bzang rgya mtsho) dben gnas rin ceng sgang du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang skye bo mang po la phan pa rgya chen po byed nus par gyur cig  chos sbyin rgya cher spel phya ri dga' ldan phun tshogs gling du par du bsgrubs pa'o mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>

<item>

<vol>5557</vol>
<tib>bla ma'i bka' drin rjes su dran nas gsol ba 'debs tshul dngos grub myur du 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>

<col>@006a * de ltar byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i dmigs khrid nyams su len tshul gyis bcad mdor bsdus 'di ni snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis mtsho bdun gyi lha khang chen mor sdom brtson sde snod 'dzin pa'i dka' rab 'byams mang pos gtso byas rnam dpyod mos 'dun can gyi dge tshul slong sogs btsun skya mang po la lam rim gyi dmigs khrid phog skabs rang gi gam du nye bar gnas pa 'ga' zhig gis sa bcad logs su bkod pa zhig yod na blo la bzung nas khrid dmigs kyi bshad pa tshor bsam blo btang na 'chang sla la sdums bde ba zhig 'ong ba 'dra bas sa bcad logs su bsgrigs pa zhig gyis zhes bskul ba'i ngor bsgrigs pa ste yi ge pa ni chos 'di la mos pa'i dpyod ldan dge tshul dpal bzang ngo 'dis kyang rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa'i bstan pa'i snying po chos tshul dri ma med pa 'di nyid phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5557</vol>
<tib>'dul ba'i bslab bya 'od ldan snying po zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-93a</p>
<col>@093a * ces 'dul ba'i bslab bya 'od ldan snying po zhes bya ba 'di ni dge tshul ye shes dpal ldan gyis dge tshul gyi bslab bya rgyas pa blangs 'das so drug gi ngos 'dzin shin tu gsal ba zhig dgos zhes bskul ba la brten nas dge tshul gyi bslab bya ston pa'i gzhung sum brgya ba dang 'od ldan gnam rtse ldeng ma rnams la gzhi byas 'dul ba mdo rtsa ba dang de'i rgya cher 'grel sogs gzhung khungs thub mang po nas kha bskangs shing rje btsunj chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i man ngag gis legs par brgyan te 'dul ba 'dzin pa ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis rnam 'gyur zhes pa lcags pho stag gi lo gro bzhin zla ba'i yar tshes dge bar bkra shis bsam gtan gling du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cig "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5561</vol>
<tib>sngags kyi bklag thabs bsdus pa 'grel pa mthong don gsal zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5562</vol>
<tib># gcig tu bral gyi yig cha'i dga' gnas kha skang dang bcas pa gsal bar bshad pa'i rnam bzhag blo gsar dga' skyed beedurya'i mgul rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-19a</p>
<col>@017b ces pa 'di ni ^rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs rje rin po che @018a * la zhal gzigs te man ngag gnang skabs he ru ka lhun po'i rtse mor dngos su zhugs te 'dzam gling spyan sngan sdan 'dug pas byin rlabs ha cang myur du 'jug pa'i dbang gis rgya gar na he ru ka'i rnal 'byor pas yid rdul ltar mang du byung zhes gsung pa'i he ru ka de nyid dpal ldan chos grags la zhal gzigs te ci 'dong gsung bar phyogs las rnam rgyal zhus pas ha ha he zhes gsung byin pa tsam gyis chos grags nyid phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams mu med par btsal kyang rnyed rgyu med pa rigs pa smra ba'i seng ge'i ngar skad sgrog pas phas rgol gyi ri dwags ngan pa yod tshad gyi thod bu ma dral byed kyi 'gran zla med pa'i pan chen zhig tu gyur pa sogs dran pa tsam gyis byin rlabs mchog stsol zhing sgrub 'brel med par dngos grub mchog stsol ba'i yid ma gyi lha'i gtso bo de nyid bsam bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshul bzung ste byang phyogs khal khar byon zhes snang mtha'i pan chen gyis dngos su lung bstan pa'i skyes chen dam pa mtshan brjod par dka' bdon gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te ^rje btsun blo bzang tshul khirms 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes rgya bod hor gsum na yongs su grags pa'i ba dan dkar po rnam par bsgreng bde nyid ri bo dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling ci rigs su lo bcu phrag gnyis tsam zhal zhugs pa'i ring la mdo sngags zung 'brel dang thun mong gi rigs gnas rgya bod hor gsum na yod tshad dang bod na yang nub la khad pa'i sgra rigs par mkhas pa'i blo gsal mkhas mang klong brdol du byung zhing rje nyid kyi byin rlabs kyis 'chang rtsod rtson gsum gyi bya ba me ltar 'bar ba'i sgo nas dpal @018b ldan 'bras spungs bkra shis sgo mang gnyis par song ba'i chos grwa chen po dga' ldan theg chen gling pa'i rigs smra'i char gtogs shes brgya zhes pas gcig tu bral gyi dka' gnas skong la snga nas sems la phral phral du byung ba'i mos mno'i tho re ba rnams lung rigs kyis brgyan te bsam kyin yod skabs spyid chos phyi ma'i dam dam bcang khad nye ba'i tshe gzhung gsar gong 'og gi grwa rigs rigs smra'i ser phrug rnams la phan snyam pas rkyen byas te shog bur bir spa 'di yang ^bla ma he ru ka de nhyid rmad byung bas kyang ramd byung ngo mtshar bas kyang ngo mtshar ba'i gser zhal bskal brgyang zhugs tes mtha'i 'gro ba kun gyis ma rig mun pa sel bar mdzad pa'i rgyur 'gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<col>@018b ces las bzhi'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga dngos grub kyi lcags kyu zhes bgyi ba 'di ni rang gi dad ldan gyi slob ma dge slong grags pa rgyal mtshan dang kun dga' sbyin pa gnyis kyis bskul ba'i ngor ^rgyal ba gnyis pa tsong kha pa chen pos mdzad pa'i sbyin sreg chen mo gzhir byas mkhas grub rjes mdzad pa'i 'dus pa'i sbyin sreg dang rje thams cad mkhyen pa pan chen rdo rje 'chang chen pos mdzad pa'i dbang drag gi sbyin sreg rnams kyis kha bskangs te 'don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te rdo rje 'chang mkhan chen thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i zhabs rdul spyi bor blangs te zhal gyi bdud rtsi myong te rdo rje 'chang khyab bdag dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i bka' drin gyis nye bar 'tsho ba'i jing gir lha rigs kyi @019a * btsun pa blo bzang bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba'i dge bas rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par byed nus par gyur cig mangga lam "</col>

<vol>5562</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba'i lung zin chos sde chen po sku 'bum byams pa gling gi gzhi bdag le'u che'i gsol mchod cha lag dang bcas pa dgos 'dod 'jo ba'i yid bzhin lcags kyu zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>

<col>@012b ces dpal phyag na rdo rje'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg dngos grub bdud rtsi'i char rgyun zhes bya ba 'di ni dge slong grags pa rgyal @013a * mtshan gyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes nan gyis bskul ba ltar dge slong blo bzang dar rgyas kyis ^pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i rje btsun 'jam dbyangs dang 'phags ma sgrol ma gnyis kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga dang mthun par chu yos zla ba brgyad pa'i nyer gsum la aer te ni jo bo'i lha khan chen mor sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bsod nams dbang phyug go 'dis kyang rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5563</vol>
<tib>mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu la spyi stabs kyi gtor ma 'bul bar 'dod pa ni "</tib>
<p>1b-4a</p>
<col>@003b (ces mnga' gsol bya de nas gtang rag gi mchod bstod dang yig brgya bsod gsol rten yod na brtan bzhugs dang med na gshegs su gsol bsngo sman bkra shis bka' rgya rnams dkyus ltar bya'o @004a * mgon dkar yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i spyi stabs kyi cho ga 'di ni thu med thabs ky t'a rgan tas kyis bskul ngor ^dharma badzwa gyis hu ru chen po'i zi'i ho sho'i dge tshogs gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aor du su dge slong ngag dbang bstan 'phel lo dge'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5563</vol>
<tib>'phags ma yid bzhin 'khor lo'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun</tib>

<tib># blo rigs kyi rnam gzhag mdor bsdus pa kun phan nyi ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>

<col>@020a * (zhes blo rigs kyi rnam gzhag gsal bar byas pa  kun phan nyi ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam dpyod mchog tu langs pa'i dge bshes rab 'byams pa ngag dbang chos bzang gis blo gsar pa rnams la phan 'dod kyi bsam pas bskul ba la brten nas dgon lung byams pa gling gi mkhan po au cu mu chen lha rams pa bskal bzang lha dbang gis au cu mu chen dbang gi chos kyi sde chen po theg chen chos 'khor gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson dge slong blo bzang snyan grags so 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas te 'gro kun dge ba'i dpal la spyod par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam dge bar gyur cig  'di'i sbar zung cu zir yod</col>

<item>

<tib>'dod lha sna tshogs kyi sgrub thabs kyi mjug tu bya ba'i smon lam shis brjod sogs smon lam gyi skor bzhugs "</tib>
<p>4a-6a</p>
<col>@006a * ces sogs smyung gnas kyi smon lam shis brjod dang bcas pa 'di ni dka' bcu klu sgrub rgya mtshos bskul te ^sh'akya'i btsun pa blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis bgyis pa'o "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5566</vol>
<tib>gcig tu bral gyi yig cha'i dka' gnas kha skang dang bcas pa gsal bar bshad pa'i rnam gzhag blo gsar dga' skyed bee d'urya'i mgul rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-19a</p>
<col>@017b ces pa 'di ni ^rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs rje rin po che @018a * la zhal gzigs te man ngag gnang skabs he ru ka lhun po'i rtse mor dngos su zhugs te 'dzam gling spyan sngan sdan 'dug pas byin rlabs ha cang myur du 'jug pa'i dbang gis rgya gar na he ru ka'i rnal 'byor pas yid rdul ltar mang du byung zhes gsung pa'i he ru ka de nyid dpal ldan chos grags la zhal gzigs te ci 'dong gsung bar phyogs las rnam rgyal zhus pas ha ha he zhes gsung byin pa tsam gyis chos grags nyid phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams mu med par btsal kyang rnyed rgyu med pa rigs pa smra ba'i seng ge'i ngar skad sgrog pas phas rgol gyi ri dwags ngan pa yod tshad gyi thod bu ma dral byed kyi 'gran zla med pa'i pan chen zhig tu gyur pa sogs dran pa tsam gyis byin rlabs mchog stsol zhing sgrub 'brel med par dngos grub mchog stsol ba'i yid ma gyi lha'i gtso bo de nyid bsam bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshul bzung ste byang phyogs khal khar byon zhes snang mtha'i pan chen gyis dngos su lung bstan pa'i skyes chen dam pa mtshan brjod par dka' bdon gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te ^rje btsun blo bzang tshul khirms 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes rgya bod hor gsum na yongs su grags pa'i ba dan dkar po rnam par bsgreng bde nyid ri bo dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling ci rigs su lo bcu phrag gnyis tsam zhal zhugs pa'i ring la mdo sngags zung 'brel dang thun mong gi rigs gnas rgya bod hor gsum na yod tshad dang bod na yang nub la khad pa'i sgra rigs par mkhas pa'i blo gsal mkhas mang klong brdol du byung zhing rje nyid kyi byin rlabs kyis 'chang rtsod rtson gsum gyi bya ba me ltar 'bar ba'i sgo nas dpal @018b ldan 'bras spungs bkra shis sgo mang gnyis par song ba'i chos grwa chen po dga' ldan theg chen gling pa'i rigs smra'i char gtogs shes brgya zhes pas gcig tu bral gyi dka' gnas skong la snga nas sems la phral phral du byung ba'i mos mno'i tho re ba rnams lung rigs kyis brgyan te bsam kyin yod skabs spyid chos phyi ma'i dam dam bcang khad nye ba'i tshe gzhung gsar gong 'og gi grwa rigs rigs smra'i ser phrug rnams la phan snyam pas rkyen byas te shog bur bir spa 'di yang ^bla ma he ru ka de nhyid rmad byung bas kyang ramd byung ngo mtshar bas kyang ngo mtshar ba'i gser zhal bskal brgyang zhugs tes mtha'i 'gro ba kun gyis ma rig mun pa sel bar mdzad pa'i rgyur 'gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5566</vol>
<tib>grub chen tshem bu lugs kyi thugs rje chen po'i dmar khrid ye shes mkha' 'gro'i zhal lung zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@026a * ces grub chen tshem bu lugs kyi thugs rje chen po'i dmar khrid ye shes mkha' 'gro'i zhal lung zhes bya ba 'di ni chos tshul 'di la mos pa srang ba dge slong chos 'byor gyis nan chen pos bskul ba la brten nas snyigs ma'i dus 'dir rgyal ba'i dam chos 'di'i snyan rgyud kyi man ngag thob pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bal bod mtshams kyi dben gnas bkra shis bsam gtan gling du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cig  "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5567</vol>
<tib># blo rigs kyi rnam gzhag mdor bsdus pa kun phan nyi ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-20a</p>
<col>@020a * (zhes blo rigs kyi rnam gzhag gsal bar byas pa  kun phan nyi ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam dpyod mchog tu langs pa'i dge bshes rab 'byams pa ngag dbang chos bzang gis blo gsar pa rnams la phan 'dod kyi bsam pas bskul ba la brten nas dgon lung byams pa gling gi mkhan po au cu mu chen lha rams pa bskal bzang lha dbang gis au cu mu chen dbang gi chos kyi sde chen po theg chen chos 'khor gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson dge slong blo bzang snyan grags so 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas te 'gro kun dge ba'i dpal la spyod par gyur cig  sarba mangga lam dge bar gyur cig  'di'i sbar zung cu zir yod</col>
</item>

<item>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5567</vol>
<tib># gsol 'debs re skong bsam 'phel dbang gi rgyal po zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces pa 'di yang sprul ba'i sku chos kyi rje ngag dbang koo shri kad ni chen ngon grub rdo rje'i sku phreng rim byon gyi gsol ba 'debs dgos zhes byang phyogs bstan 'gro'i mgon dpung skyabs mgon rje btsun dam pa hu thog thu'i mi sna shi dang rdza'i sang dge slong byams pa rab rgyas sa ma blo bzang shes rab dang dbu mdzad dge slong ngag dbang dge slong ngag dbang phun tshogs 'od zer dge slong ngag dbang blo bzang tshe dpag dge slong sangs rgyas rgya mtsho dge slong blo bzang tshul khrims rnams kyis bskul ba ltar yongs 'dzin ^dge sbyong byams par 'bod pas sbyar ba'o bkra shis par gyur cig  dge'o mangga lam</col>
</item>

<col>@010a * (ces legs par bshad pa chu yi bstan bcos lugs gnyis rlabs phreng rgyan ldan zhes bya ba 'di ni sngar rgyud la bag chags 'jog pa'i phyir du rtsom pa'i khrul dus tshod la dpag pa'i mdo sngags kyi gzhung du grang du rung tsam kha shas bris yod na'ang shing gi bstan bcos 'di dar so che zhing mthong byed mkhan mang du 'ong bar snang bas de la 'grel pa zhig kyang byung na legs zhes pa rong su nyid shog nas sngags 'os yon tan du ma'i rgyan 'phreng 'dzin pa nom chi zhabs drung skal bzang dar rgyas kyis yang yang nan gyis bskul te 'bri bar brtsam yang de'i chos kyis rga lam rim las logs su mi dgos la gzhan rnam go sla 'ba' zhig gtsor 'don dang dpe yang yongs grags mkhas blun thams cad la 'char bde ba kho nar snang bas sbyar stabs de las gsal du gtong rgyu med pa lta bur snang zhing phyogs mthun gyi khungs gsal mgon po klu sgrub kyi shes rab brgya pa skye bo gso thig gsum dang tsa na ga rgyal po'i lugs kyi bstan bcos ma su raksha'i byas pa'i lugs kyi bstan bcos nyi ma spas pas mdzad pa'i tshigs su bcad @010b pa'i mdzod mchog srid kyi tshigs bcad brgya pa dri med pa'i dris lan rin po che'i phreng ba sa skya'i legs bshad rnams dang gzhan yang 'phrin yig bslab bya sogs de mthun rnams drang te bshad na tshig tshogs che lci bar 'gyur bas 'dir ljon shing chu'i khams kyis rgyas par byed pa'i dpe dang mthun par de nyid du ma tshang ba 'ga' zhig kha bskangs nas cung zad rgyas su btang der mchog dman gtso phal gyi rim pas chos kyi sarga sngon du byas kyis kyang 'dir gong nas gong du bgrod pa'i rim pas mjug tu byas te go rim bsdebs pa sogs don 'grel gyi tshul du byas nas btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes dben gnas yid dga' chos 'dzin du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gtsug lag lta ba'i blo mig can bhikshu aartana aa nantas bgyis pa 'di yang skye bo rnams la dge ba'i 'jug ngogs gsal ba'i rgyur gyur cig sarba k'a le shri yo dha ba tu</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5603</vol>
<tib>rje thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung 'bum thor bu las dril bu lha lnga'i sgrub thabs dngos grub kyi bang mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@015a * ces dril bu lugs kyi lha lnga'i sgrub thabs ngag tu 'don bde ba gtso bor byas te brjod pa 'di ni gong dkar nas dpon sa bdag mo nor 'dzin chos bzhin skyong ba'i rgyal mos bskul ba la brten nas btsun pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i dpal gyis chos 'khor rgyal bkra shis lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni chos kyi dpal 'byor legs pas bgyis pa 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa phyogs dus thams cad du rgyas par byed nus par gyur cig  mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@009b ces bcom ldan 'das dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshogs kyi mchod pa'i ngag 'don bde chen 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba 'di ni ri bo bde chen gyi dus 'khor chog gra ba rnams nas bskul ma yod pa'i thog gam gcar rnam par rgyal ba'i 'dus sde'i dus 'khor chog gra ba'i dbu mdzad dge slong bskal bzang 'byor rgyas nas nan tan chen pos bskul ma byung ba'i ngor rje thams cad mkhyen pa tsong kha pa chen po'i phyag bzhes bzhin dge ldan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du bkod pa'i rnal 'byor ma @010a * mchod pa'i tshogs mchod la gzhi byas dus zhabs pas mdzad pa'i dus 'khor gyi tshogs mchod sogs rgya bod mkhas grub gzhan gyi yig cha la'ang brtags te sh'akya'i dge slong rig pa 'dzin pa blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos ri bo po ta la'i gzim chung nyi 'od 'khyil bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni mchod dpon sde drug mkhan po blo bzang rnam rgyal gyis bgyis pa'o "</col>

<item>

<vol>5604</vol>
<tib>dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs la mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@013a * dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i phyi rol mchod pa'i cho ga lag mchod dang bcas pa 'di snyigs dus kyi rgyal ba gnyis pa chos kyi rje thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpa gyi zhal snga nas kyi phyag bzhes bzhin du 'dul ba 'dzin pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis yi ger bkod pa yin zhing 'di'i mchod phreng smon lam shis pa brjod pa rnams ni chos kyi rje nyid kyis mdzad pa yin no 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa spyi dang khyad par du dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bshad sgrub mtha' dag phyogs du gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  ` aom swa sti phan bde'i 'byung gnas rgyal bstan yongs 'du'i ljon rab rgyas 'gro kun thar mchog 'bras bzang la spyod phyir bkra shis lhun grub chos grwa cher chos sbyin 'dzad med dal 'gro'i rgyun 'di spel sarba mangga lam "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5604</vol>
<tib>dpal 'khor lo sdus pa'i rim pa dang po'i lam la slob pa'i tshul go bde bar rjed pa 'dod pa 'jo ba'i snying po zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-62a</p>
<col>@061b ces dpal 'khor lo bde @062a * mchog gi rim pa dang po'i lam la slob pa'i tshul 'dod pa 'jo ba'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di ni zhang rin po che'i chos kyi gdan khri 'dzin pa nang so ngag dbang rgya mtsho pa'i gsung gis nan cher bskul zhing gzhan yang don gnyer can mang pos bskul ba dang bdag nyid kyang lam 'di la mchog tu dad pas kun nas bslang ste dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi rnal 'byor pa chos smra ba'i btsun pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i dpal gyis rnam 'gyur gyi lo'i sa ga zla ba'i mar ngo'i tshes bcu la dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi chos grwa chen po'i dga' ldan pho brang me tog mngon par bkra ba'i lding khang du nye bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod can bshes gnyen bkra shis so 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par byed nus par gyur cig  bkra shis "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5604</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi cho ga lag len snying por dril ba</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * (tshul 'di yang dge slong blo bzang bstan 'dzin gyis nan cher bskul ba la brten nas btsun pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis ngag 'don bzhin bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni rje drung blo bzang dbang rgyal lo</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5604</vol>
<tib>grub chen kun tu dge ba'i lugs kyi bcom ldan 'khor lo bsdoms pa'i bskyed rdzogs snying por dril ba zung 'jug gzhal med khang du bgrod pa'i them skas zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@013a * (ces grub pa'i dbang phyug l'u ai pa'i lugs kyis 'khor lo sdoms pa'i bskyed rdzogs snying por sgril ba 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes gnam la nyi zla zung gcig dang sa la rgyud grwa rnam gnyis su grags pa'i nang mtshan dpal ldan stod rgyud grwa tshang gis bla ma dbu mdzad grub dbang dge legs rgya mtshos sogs dam pa du ma'i skye sprul sgrub khang pa blo bzang dge legs rgyal mtshan sogs 'dus grwa tshang mas bskul ngor ^gong ma'i lung gis zhwa ser bstan pa'i gsal byed aa chi thu no min han du 'bod pa sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang ye shes bstan pa rab rgyas kyi byang rwa sgreng rgyal ba'i dben gnas kyi gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5604</vol>
<tib>mdo sngags gnyis ka'i lam gyi snying po'i gnad bstan pa gser gyi yang zhun zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@013a * ces mdo sngag snyis ka'i lam gyi snying po'i gnad bstan pa gser gyi yang zhun zhes bya ba 'di ni srid pa'i phun tshogs la snying po med par mthong nas dben pa'i ri sul du rtse gcig sgrub la gzhol ba sha ru bla ma ye shes dbang rgyal gyis lta sgom spyod gsum gyi nyams len gyi gnad rgyun du snying la bcad chag pa 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba la brten nas mdo rgyud man ngag 'dzin pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bkra shis bsam gtan gling du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs kun tu 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<tib>bar do'i chos bshad bya tshul</tib>

<col>@019a * ces bla ma'i rnal 'byor dang 'brel bar lam gyi gtso bo @019b rnam gsum gyi zab khrid skyong tshul 'khyer bde ba lam bzang snying po rab gsal zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi slob ma dad brtson rnam dpyod mchog tu dge ba'i lha btsun dge bskos dge slong rnam rgyal grags pa dang chos la 'dun pa'i gus ldan dge slong blo bzang tshangs dbyangs gnyis kyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba ltar mkhas dang grub pa'i dam pa du ma'i bka' drin gyis legs par 'tsho ba'i rgyal khams pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes 'khrid yig snga ma rnams la gzhi byas dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i gsung rgyun man ngag gis legs par brgyan te gnad tshang don 'dus kyi tshul du bkra shis zla ba'i yar tshes bzang por dge ldan pal ri'i dben gnas su sbyar b'ai yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan slob bu sdom brtson bstan 'dzin bzang po'o 'dis kyang 'jam mgon bstan pa'i snying po ring du gsal bar byed nus pa'i rgyur gyur cig dza yantu "</col>

<item>

<col>@012a * ces dpal mah'a ka la phyag drug pa'i zhi rgyas kyi sbyin sreg dngos grub dpal gyi bdud rtsi zhes bya ba 'di ni snga mo nas rgyud smad sngags ram pa blo bzang chos grags nas 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba dang rang nyid kyang mos pa chen pos bskul ba ltar bla ma mgon po'i rnal 'byor spyod pa ^sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis sbyar ba yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang chos 'phel lo dpal ldan smad rgyud theg chen yangs rtse cher mgon po'i zhi rgyas sbyin sreg gsung par 'di 'bul ba'i sngags rams blo bzang chos grags kyis 'di dang phyi ma'i legs tshogs sgrub pa la bla ma mgon pos 'phrin sgrub rjes 'dzin shog mangga lam "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5605</vol>
<tib>'jam dpal gshin rje gshed kyi bka' sdod 'chi bdag las kyi gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa'i nyin zhag gi dbyug gu drug cu rtsa bzhi'i gtor ma la brten te drag po gtso bor gyur ba'i las sgrub pa'i rim pa gnam lcags thog chen drag 'bebs zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-14b</p>
<col>@014b ces pa 'di ni bstan pa'i gsal byed du gyur ba'i dam pa chen po lung rtogs yon tan du mas rgyud phyug pa'i lcang skya mchog sprul rin po che nas nyin zhag gcig gi dbyug gu drug cu pa'i gtor ma la brten te las sgrub pa'i rim pa tshang la ma nor ba zhig dgos zhes bskul ma mdzad pa'i gsung ngor sh'akya'i dge sbyong rig pa 'dzin pa'i tha shal ba blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos pho brang po ta lar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni zha lu mkhan po ngag dbang yon tan 'byung gnas so "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5605</vol>
<tib>khro bo rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyin sreg dang dam tshig rdo rje'i bsgom bzlas bya tshul dngos grub kun 'byung</tib>

<col>@005a * zhes pa 'di ni rje thams cad mkhyen pa nas mkhas grub dge legs dpal bzang po la brgyud pa'i snyan rgyud kyi man ngag las 'byung ba ltar 'jam mgon snyan rgyud 'dzin pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis rang gzhan la phan pa'i bsam pas pho brang chen po'i gzim chung bde ba can du sbyar ba'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5605</vol>
<tib>mgon po 'od dpag med la brten pa'i 'pho khrid gser gyi yang zhun man ngag snying po kun bsdus bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@012a * (ces rgyal ba 'od dpag med la brten pa'i 'pho khrid gser gyi yang zhun man ngag kun 'dus kyi snying po zhes bya ba 'di yang dam pa'i skye 'dzin khyad par can nas 'pho khrid nyer mkho don tshang ba rgyas bsdus brkyangs b skums bgyis chog pa 'di lta bu zhig bris zhes phegs pa'i dgongs pa bskang che ba dang rang la'ang nyer mkho'i brjed byang du bsams nas mkha' bo ga-yul 'jug ma'i khrid lan du mar thob pa'i dam pa rnams kyis man ngag la rje rgyal ba gnyis pa'i legs bshad sogs kyi spros pa cung zad bsnon te ra sa spang lung ri khrod du dad pa mkhan ming gis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni po dong chos mdzad ye shes bskal bzang ngo ris med 'gro rnams bar do'i 'jigs skrag las grol byed rje btsun bla ma'i gsung gsang 'di mang thos bshes gnyen ngag dbang chos 'dzin nas gzhan la sman pa'i thugs bskyed bzang po yis bar du bskrun cing mkhan ming grags pas kyang sgo gsum mthun par 'bad pa'i dge ba'i mthus bar do'i 'jigs skrag 'khrul snang las grol te bde can zhing du thogs med bgrod par shog</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5606</vol>
<tib>brtan bzhugs gsol 'debs bsam don lhun grub drang srong grub pa'i bden tshig ces bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces 'di ni byang phyogs hal ha'i yul gru chen por thub bstan spyi dang khyad par du yang 'jam mgon bla ma khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyi ring lugs ches @003b cher gsal bar mdzod pa po rje btsun dam pa sku phreng ngag dbang blo bzang chos kyi nyi ma bstan 'dzin dbang phyug dpal bzang po gnas kyi lha 'jam dpal dbyangs ^gong ma bdag po chen po'i bka' lung bzhin gser gyi bum bzang las gsal 'thon 'khrul des rnyed thog gangs can 'gro ba'i lha gcig phyag na pad dkar 'chang ba ngur smrig gar gyas rnam rol pa ^rgyal mchog thams cad mkhyen pa chen po nas dbyu phud mtshan gsol bcas legs par grub bstun khu rol chen po mkhan po no min han aer te ni phyag mdzad rgyal khag bzhi bcas tsho ba bdun nas ched du mang gas pa'i mi sna t'a bla ma t'a bla ma blo bzang ye shes gsol dpon karma dza'i sang tshe ring don grub gzims 'gag chos bkra shis dge slong bstan pa dar rgyas sogs thum mong nas brtan bzhugs smon tshig 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor 'od gsal lha las babs pa'i rigs sngags 'chang ba su ma ti shri ma na dha rma sya sh'a sa na sye ki rti sha rar @004a *  'bod pas pho brang rgyal mtshan 'thon po'i gzims chung bka' gdams pho brang sbyar ba'o mangga lam dge'o)"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5606</vol>
<tib>zhabs brtan gsol 'debs drang srong bden tshig yid kyi re bskongs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces khal kha rje btsun dam pa'i yang srid mchog sprul drangs gsal nges rnyed byung 'phral khu ral t'a bla ma blo bzang ye shes gsol dpon karma skyabs dza'i sang tshe ring don 'grub bcas gang gi zhabs 'brangs pa rnams nas brtan bzhugs gsol 'debs smon tshig zhig dgos zhes bskul ba dang rang nyid kyang mos pa'i 'tshams sbyar te sh'akya'i ring lugs 'dzin pa ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan mkhyen rab 'phrin las rgya mtsho ste ming gzhan ta la'i bla ma badzra dharmar 'bod pas sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5606</vol>
<tib>zhabs brtan gsol 'debs drang srong bden tshig yid kyi re bskongs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces khal kha rje btsun dam pa'i yang srid mchog sprul drangs gsal nges rnyed byung 'phral khu ral t'a bla ma blo bzang ye shes gsol dpon karma skyabs dza'i sang tshe ring don 'grub bcas gang gi zhabs 'brangs pa rnams nas brtan bzhugs gsol 'debs smon tshig zhig dgos zhes bskul ba dang rang nyid kyang mos pa'i 'tshams sbyar te sh'akya'i ring lugs 'dzin pa ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan mkhyen rab 'phrin las rgya mtsho ste ming gzhan ta la'i bla ma badzra dharmar 'bod pas sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5607</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das sman bla'i mdo chog gi snying po bsdus yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@006b ces pa 'di yang deng sang gi skye bo 'ga' la phan par 'dod pa'i bsam pas chos smra ba blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po'i gzims khang du sbyar ba'o ` aom swa sti brtsod dus 'gro ba'i 'dren pa bde gshegs brgyad mchod pa'i chog rmad byung yid bzhin nor chos sbyin spel bslad par du bzhengs pa yi dge bar ni yang rdzogs byang ched du bsngo blo bzang rgyal ba gnyis pa yi bstan pa'i rin chen mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan srid tsher bsgrigs lags @007a * pa gang de'i thugs dgongs rdzogs gyur cig bkra shis dge legs 'phel "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5607</vol>
<tib>bde smon zhing mchog sgo 'byed ma bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col></col>
