<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5607</vol>
<tib>bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@010b (ces bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga 'di ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa chos kyi grags pa dang blo bzang phun tshogs @011a * gnyis kyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos ces yang yang bskul ba la brten nas sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis grub chen gling gis mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa dang sbang lo chen pos mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa dang sa skya pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du mas mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa dang mkhas grub chen po mkhan po'i na po che sangs rgyas ye shes kyis mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa dang gzhan yang grub mtha'i so so'i bla ma mchog dman du mas mdzad pa'i bla ma mchodpa mang po zhig mthong zhing brjod bya'i don rnams khong du chu dpar byas te legs pa'i cha thams cad legs par bsdus nas mdo rgyud dam pa'i man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du tshig sbyor spangs te go bde bar chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po'i gzims khang rgyal mtshan mthon po'i yang thog tu sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5607</vol>
<tib>bla ma'i bka' drin cing thugs rje bskul ba'i gsol 'debs byin rlabs phreng ba</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (ces khal kha rje btsun dam pa rdo rje 'chang dngos rje btsun ngag dbang blo bzang chos kyi nyi ma bstan 'dzin dbang phyug dpal bzang po'i bka' drin dran cing thugs rje bskul ba'i gsol 'debs byin rlabs 'phreng ba 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes zhal snga nas mkhan po dka' chen dpal ldan bstan 'dzin legs nas bskul ma byung ba bzhin sh'akya'i dge sbyong blo bzang 'phrin las thub bstan chos kyi nyi ma dge legs rnam rgyal dpal bzang pos gzims chung bka' gdams pho brang du bris pa'o dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@009b zhes bde ba can gyi 'pho khrid dpa' bo ga-yul du 'jug pa'i 'grel bshad 'chi bdag ga-yul @010a * rgyal zhes bya ba 'di ni ^bla ma rdo rje 'chang la 'di'i khrid phul skabs zhal snga nas khrid zhal bzhes dang bcas pa 'di ltar bdag la dgos zhes bka' lung stsal ba spyi bos mnos te rje rin po che'i 'pho ba'i gdams ngag pan chen blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi gdams ngag yongs 'dzin ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi gdams ngag dben sa snyan rgyud kyi gdams ngag nye brgyud 'od dpag med kyi 'pho ba'i gdams pa rnams gung bsgrigs pa'i tshul du bla ma'i man ngag gis brgyan te ji ltar thob pa'i phyag khrid de bzhin bka' bzhin sgrub pa'i mchod pa'i tshul du bde chen lhun grub gling zhes bya bar mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams pa dka' bcu bi dy'a kshanti'i ming can gyis sug bris su bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang ma gyur 'gro kun bla ma'i gsung gi bdud rtsis tshims nas rgyud smin cing grol te rdzogs byang la myur du reg pa'i rgyur gyur cig  "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5608</vol>
<tib>gsang mgon yid bzhin nor bu'i bsnyen sgrub byed tshul dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5b</p>
<col>@005b (zhes gsang mgon yid bzhin nor bu'i bsnyen sgrub byed tshul dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni bstan srid gnyis ka chos bzhin du skyong ba'i mi wang rin po che srong btsang sgam po'i mtshan can gyis dar dkar po dri med lha rdzas che ba dang bcas bskul ma gnang ba'i ngor chos skyong 'di'i rgyud dang rgya gzhung chos skor gyi lung dang man ngag byin rlabs rjes gnang gi rim pa rnams mang du thob ste bsnyen sgrub rdzogs pa'i khul bgyis pa'i rgyal khams pa tshangs sras dga' ba'i blo gros kyis ^bla ma'i phyag bzhes bzhin dge phyogs dang mthun par sug bris su bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang bstan 'gro sogs la ryga cher phan thogs pa'i rgyur gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5608</vol>
<tib>lhag lha'i bsnyen pa la nyer mkho'i cha lag ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (zhes pa 'di ni deng dus kyi blo dman pa'i las dang po pa dag la bsnyen pa byed mkhan mang du yod pa rnams la de'i cha lag lta bur mkho ba'i phyir tshangs sras dga' ba'i blo gros kyis gong ma dag gi gsung ltar zur du bkod pa'o 'dis kyang bstan pa la phan thogs pa'i rgyur gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5608</vol>
<tib>ma gcig 'dod khams dbang phyug dpal ldan lha mo'i gtor chog 'phrin las rnam bzhi lhun grub las khol du phyung ba</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col>@006b zhes ma gcig 'dod khams dbang phyug dpal ldan lha mo'i gtor chog 'phrin las rnam bzhi lhun grub las khol du phyung zhing rgyud las byung ba'i bstod pa don dam ma nyid byin rlabs kyi tshan kha shin tu che la'ang bcug ste phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa 'di ni gsar du tshugs pa'i skabs su bi dy'a kshan tis lugs 'di'i nye brgyud dbang dang rjes gnang gi skor rgyal brten bsnyen sgrub las gsum la sogs pa'i gdams pa rnams mang du thob ste bsnyen sgrub byed khul bgyis nas khyi pho lo'i dus khyad par pa cho 'phrul gyi yar tshes bco lngar zhi ba'i lha mo dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas dus tshod la dbang zhing ye shes kyi ma mo rnams rgyu ba'i cha la sug bris su bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa yun ring du dar rgyas su brtan par gnas pa dang ma rgan 'gro ba rnams chos kyi dpal la dus rtag tu rol pa'i rgyur gyur cig "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5608</vol>
<tib>mandal gyi 'dod gsol</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5608</vol>
<tib>me lha'i bsnyen pa bcu cha'i sbyin sreg dang bcas pa byed tshul dngos grub 'grub pa'i thabs mchog skya rangs dmar ser zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9b</p>
<col>@009b zhes me lha'i bsnyen pa bcu cha'i sbyin sreg dang bcas pa byed tshul dngos grub 'grub pa'i thabs mchog skya rangs dmar ser zhes bya ba 'di ni cho ga'i ngag 'don phal che ba gser khang rin po che blo bzang bstan 'dzin rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i cho ga dngos grub kun 'byung gzhir bzhag la sbyor dngos mjug gsum gyi phyag len mi gsal ba rnams rdzong dkar rdo rje 'chang 'jigs med bsam gtan rin po che sogs bla ma dam pa rnams kyi man ngag gis brgyan te rang la shin tu nye bar mkho zhing skal mnyam gzhan la'ang phan srid snyam pa'i bsam pas dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bsnyen chen sdod skabs da sha kri tstsha kshanti'i ming can zhig gis thun mtshams su phyogs gcig tu sgrigs nas gsum ldan rtsa ba'i bla ma rdo rje 'chang gi spyan lam du gzigs su phul tshe zhus dag dang rgyab yig gnang nas bsngags pa mdzad de stsal ba yin pas rten 'brel kyang khyad che ba yin no 'dis kyang blo bzang rgyal ba'i bstan pa dri med pa dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa dang de 'dzin pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi zhabs pad brtan cing mdzad 'phrin phyogs bcur rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig  "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5608</vol>

<col>@002b (zhes rgyal ba'i bstan bsrung lha chen tshangs pa 'khor bcas la mchod gtor 'bul zhing 'phri las bcol tshul chos bsrung dgyes pa'i glu dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di ni dad brtson sku rten pa bkra shis don grub kyis lha rdzas bcas skul ba'i 'dod mos ltar chos 'di'i man ngag mang du thob pa'i rgyal khams pa da sha kri tstsha bi dy'a kshanti'i ming can gyis bshad sgrub bstan pa'i 'byung gnas phan bde chos 'khor gling du sug bris su bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang bstan 'gro yongs la sman yon dam pa'i rgyur gyur cig</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5609</vol>
<tib>rje btsun 'jam dbyangs kyi sgrub thabs 'khor lo'i man ngag dang bcas pa ye shes nyi 'od ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@003b ces rje btsun 'jam dbyangs kyi sgrub thabs 'khor lo'i man ngag dang bcas pa chos kun gsal ba'i ye shes nyi 'od ces bya ba 'di ni bsnyen chen bgyis pa'i skabs su @004a * mtshan lta bzang po khyad par can bcas lag tu 'ongs pas yin ring du gsol ba btab ste khyi pho chu lo'i ston zla ra ba'i tshes bco lnga'i nyin rdo rje nyi ma dang las kyi mkha' 'gro ma rgyu ba'i dus su phan bde chos 'khor gling gi kun dga' bde skyid kyi gnas su tshangs sras dga' ba'i blo gros kyis rang gi slob ma mang thos dpal bstan srung zhes byas nga mo nas bskul ngor sug bris su bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas zhing 'gro ba kun gyi mi shes pa'i mun pa myur du bsal ba'i rgyur gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5609</vol>
<tib>ston pa thub pa'i dbang po nye ba'i sras chen brgyad dang bcas pa la phyag mchod bya tshul bde skyid 'byung gnas zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-16b</p>
<col>@016b (ces pa 'di ni bstan sgron chos mdzad bla mas mdzad pa'i phyag mchod gzhir byas te zhal 'don gyi rim pa gzhan nas cung zad kha bskang ste dpal ldan bla ma'i bzhed dgongs ltar kshanti'i ming can gyis phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa'i dge bas rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa'i rgyur 'gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5609</vol>
<tib>zlab mo rten 'byung gsungs pa'i sgo nas ston pa la bstod pa legs bshad snying po chung ngu'i sa bcad nor bu'i phreng ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b (zhes zab mo'i bstod pa legs bshad snying po'i sa bcad nor bu zhes bya ba 'di ni drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma rin po che ngag dbang mtshan can gyi zhabs drung du 'di'i bshad 'khrid zhus pa'i skabs su ji ltar stsal ba'i sa bcad rnams rjed par 'phangs nas de bzhin kshanti'i ming can gyis bris pa'o des kyang bstan 'gro la phan thog pa'i rgyur gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5610</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi lam rim pa gnyis kyi rnal 'byor la slob tshul zung 'jug sgrub pa'i them skas zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-93a</p>
<col>@093a * ces dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bskyed pa'i rim pa la slob pa'i tshul 'di ni rang gi slob ma rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang bstan 'dzin sogs mang pos ? don du chos smra ba'i btsun pa dam chos dpal 'byor gyis rang lo re bdun gyi thog mon bod kyi mtshams chos skyong beg tse lcam sring gi pho brang dben gnas dpal ldan sgom spug tu sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni ? rigs las byung ba'i rnam dpyod phun sum tshogs pa mdo sngags rab 'byams la blo mig yangs pa'i 'brong rtse chos rje ye shes dpal 'byor gyis bgyis pa dge legs 'phel "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5610</vol>
<tib>bstan bsrung chos skyong chen po dam can rdo rje legs pa 'khor dang bcas pa la brten pa'i sgo nas gtor bzlog gi cho ga bstan dgra bdud dpung cig car 'joms pa'i rab 'jigs rdo rje'i thogs mda' zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@006a * (ces dam can legs kyi gtor bzlog gi cho ga 'di yang gsang sngags gsar ma'i lugs bzhin bstan 'gro la phan pa'i slad du rig 'dzin rdo rjes sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni ratna badzra sug bris su sa ma ya gyu hye: dge'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5611</vol>
<tib>gangs can 'gro ba'i mgon po thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga'i rnam bzhag rgyas par bshad pa tshig don gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-91a</p>
<col>@090a * ces gangs can 'gro ba'i mgon po thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga'i rnam bzhag rgyas par bshad pa tshig don gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni snga mo nas dad brtson rnam dpyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i bya btang ba bde ba'i byung gnas dang rigs pas smra ba 'phrin las dang blo bzang rgya mtsho sogs rang gi slob ma mang po zhig dang khyad par du khrod 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bka' bcu pa skal ldan nyi shar dang bde legs rgya mtsho khu dbon dang bkra shis dar rgyas sogs kyi yang ynag bskul bar byas kyang sngon chad phyogs 'dir cho ga 'di'i bshad pa mthong thos gang yang med pa'i dbang gis dam pa'i man ngag med par rang bzo'i tshal du gyur na mi rung snyam du dogs nas re zhig btang snyoms su gzhag kyang phyis su mdo smad lho phyogs kyi yul gyi bstan 'gro'i dpung gnyen dam pa khrom thog sku skyes rin po che blo bzang dge legs dang sde snod 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dka' bcu rab 'byams du ma dang dad ldan gyi @090b dge slong spong ba pa mang rab zhig gis nan tshig gis bskul tshe chos 'di la mchog tu dad pa'i snga phyi'i bskul ba po de rnams kyi gsung gcag mi phhong ba dang rang yang chos 'di la dad pas kun nas blang te mdo rgyud dang mkhas grub dam pa rnams kyi gsung ngag dri ma med pa la brten nas rang gi tshod tsam zhig srin po zhes pa shing mo yos lo'i sbrang ldan gyi zla ba'i dkar phyogs rgyal ba dang po'i tshes la reb gong stod kyi dben pa'i gnas mchog dar zhing bde 'jom gyi dga' ba'i tshal du dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i rje btsun bla ma dam pa de nyid la cho ga 'di'i bshad lung sogs legs par zhus pa'i bka' 'bangs kyi tha shal du gtogs pa yul reb gong gi ma ni pa bsam gtan rgya mtsho ming gzhan yi ngog ces byabs legs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson ldan pa'i dge tshul don grub rgya mtsho'o 'dis kyang 'gro kun theg pa mchog gi bshes gnyen dam pa rjes su 'dzin par gyur cig 'di la 'bri 'don byed 'dod pa'i blo chen rnam la zhu ci 'tal blo dman bdag 'dra rnams kyis ni tshig bsdebs shin tu dag ngos nas @091a * mtshal skag gur gum la sogs pa'i na bza' 'dzom zhing dbul bzhed na rtsa bshad bcad lung khungs mtshan rnam par dbye phyir zhib mo'i blos mtshan dang 'gyur phyag tsam la gtogs dpe 'di'i 'og mjug thams cad du skag can sa bcad lung khungs dang mtshal can rtsa ba'i 'don cha dang ser chung rtsa ba'i lung dang mtshan ser chen bshad pa'i rgyab rten lung snag rkyang gzhung don bshad pa ru shes par bgyis la lag len mdzod dpe 'di ni snod min dang dbang ma thob pa rnams la bstan par mi bya'o dge legs 'phel bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling brgyan du shog  "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5613</vol>
<tib>myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po'i rjes gnang bcu gsum ji ltar bya tshul skal bzang mgul rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-61a</p>
<col>@061a * (dpal myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po phyag drug pa'i rjes gnang bcu gsum ji ltar bya ba'i tshul cha tshang ba go bde bar bkod pa 'di ni mdo sngags rab 'byams smra ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos mdzad blo bzang mkhas btsun gyis yang nas yang du nan tan chen pos bskul ba la brten nas drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas bka' drin mtshungs med slob dpon rin po che dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po gnyis kyis bka' drin gyis nye bar 'tsho ba sh'akya'i btsun pa ngag dbang bstan 'dzin gyi ming can gyis yig cha mang po'i gung sgrigs bla ma gong ma'i zhal shes dang phyag len gyi man ngag gis rgyan te shin tu gsal bar phyogs gcig tu bkod pa 'di la bla ma mgon po 'khor bcas kyis bzod par bzhes nas bdag la sgrib par mi 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol ces pa'i yi ge pa ni blo bzang dngos grub bo 'dis kyang bstan pa dang sems can thams cad la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>thig gdab tshul blo bzang bstan pa'i nyi mas mdzad pa</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5614</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo bde mchog l'u ai pa'i lugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bde chen rol mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1b-36a</p>
<col>@035b dpal 'khor lo bde mchog l'u ai pa'i lugs kyi dkyil 'khor bde chen por 'jug cing dbang blang ba'i cho ga bde chen rol mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni 'dus pa dang bde mchog gi thun mong gi bshad rgyud rdo rje 'phreng ba las dbang bcu bzhi'i rtsam bzhag gsung ba'i rjes su 'brangs shing lo dril gnyis thun mong gis chog pa rnams rje btsun chos kyi rgyal po rtsong kha pa chen po rang nyid kyis mdzad pa'i dril bu pa'i dkyil chog gzhir bzhag cing lo dril gyi mi 'dra ba'i khyad par dbye dgos pa rnams d'a ri ka pa dang khams rgyal ba zab pa dang dkyil chog rdo rje 'phreng ba dang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i lam gyi rim par gsungs pa dag las gang 'jug pa bde dang slabs su ji ltar bab pa bzhin bkod de dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkhyen brtse cig tu bsdus pa'i @036a * ngo bo rdo rje 'chang dang dper ma mchis pa'i rje btsun bla ma rtsong kha pa chen po nyid kyi zhabs kyi pad mo la spyi bos reg pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa dge legs dpal bzang pos zhung nyang stong rig pa'i 'byung gnas kyi sa'i cha dpal ri bo mdangs can gyi dgon par sbyar ba'o swa sti bde mchog zung 'jug nor bu'i rgya mtsho la dbang bsgur mkhas pa'i gling du grangs med byon de las 'ongs pa'i legs bshad ga ga'i rgyun gangs can ljongs 'dir bab kyang nyams dus su rje btsun lha yi dbang po blo bzang mchog grags pa 'brug stong sgrog pas shes bya'i mkha' ma lus byabs pa'i mkhyen brtse'i chu 'dzin las legs bshad bdud rtsi'i char rgyun mi bzang phab dge legs blo gros yangs pa'i rdzinng mchog la 'ang dpal 'byor bzang po'i brlabs phreng ba yos pa las drangs pa ri rnam dag dbang bzhi'i chu bo rgyun skal bzang zhing pa'i lo tog rgyas byed 'di rgyal ba'i bstan pa yun du gnas phyir dang sangs rgyas skyid kyi sgrib gnyis sbyang ba'i phyir 'byor ldan btong phong nam mkha' dbang phyug gis mthun rkyen legs par sbyar te rig byed pa gzhung ba sangs rgyas 'phel gyi ri mo la spar mkhan mkhas brtson 'grus bzang pos brkos dong ma dge bskul sdom brtson bsod 'phel gyis grub pa'i gnas mchog gi de dgon du bsgrubs 'di yi phyir du sgo gsum 'bad pa dang 'byor ba cung zad btang ba'i rab dkar gyis 'gro ba kun kyang smin lam 'dir zhugs nas grol byed lam gyis zung 'jug myur thob shog chu pho spre'u lo dyid zlar ba cho 'phrul chen po'i dus dpal ldan ge re kun tu bzang po'i legs khrod ming gzhan skyid lung lha sdings kyi dgon par grub pa'o dge'o"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5614</vol>
<tib>chos skyong dregs pa lcam sring la 'phrin las 'chol ba'i tshigs su bcad pa stobs ldan yid 'gul zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@004b chos skyong dregs pa lcam sring la 'phrin las 'chol ba'i tshigs su bcad pa stobs ldan yid 'gul zhes bya ba 'di ni chos skyong 'di nyid bsten cing sgrub pa'i ^btsun chung aa mo gha si dha badzra gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dha na s'a ga ra'o 'dis kyang chos skyong chenpo dgyes shing 'phrin las @005a * rnam bzhis ga-yel med skyong bar mdzad pa'i rgyur gyur cig  bar gyi yi ge pa ni dge slong sbyin pa tshul khrims so "</col>

<tib>rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rde'u 'grems pa la nye bar mkho ba'i lag len zin bris su bkod pa mthong bas don rtogs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9b</p>
<col>@009a * (ces rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rde'u 'grems pa la nye bar mkho ba'i lag len bris su bgyis la mthong bas don rtogs ces bya ba 'di ni dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling gi blo dpon che drag rnams nas khur bzhengs kyi sman gyi slobs grwa gsar 'jug mdzad skabs su rang gi mched lung rig sun kham khyen dpyod yangs pa @009b dge slong k'oo shris bskul mdzad pa dang slob ma rnams kyang 'jug pa bde ba'i phyir du bsam ste rtsa ba gsum so sor bgyis pa yin cing slar rtsa ba gsum gyi rde'u gcig car du 'grems pa'i skabs pa babs pa zhig byung na sgyur la phran bu dgos pa rnams de dus su smra bar bya rgyu yin no 'di kha rang ming gi mtshon sbyar dpyad bkod par 'os pa'i man ngag tu gyur ba'i rigs ni nyin mo'i skar ma lta bu las ma mchis rung slob ma rnams la phan pa'i bsam p as kun nas slangs ste dge slong bskal bzang rgyal mtshan gyis ming gzhan thu pod aer te ni aem che zhes pas blo la gang shar zheig dpyid kyi nyi ma 'phul babs su gyis pa'i yi ge pa ni rang gi slob ma man ngag dbang ye shes so 'dis kyang gso rig kyi bstan pa yin mor byed pa'i dpal 'gran pa'i rgyur gyur cig mangga lam</col>

<col>@010a * (ces mgon po yid bzhin nor bus gtsos gtsang ris dpal mgon don lnga yul lha skye lha sogs la brten pa'i ga-yang 'bod bya tshul yid bzhin dgug pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba 'di ni @010b bsod nams 'phel ba'i gling gi grwa ba thun mong nas dang dad brtson dang ldan pa a'u tseng tshogs thu mgron gnyer 'jam dpal skyabs kyis nan cher bskul ba'i ngo ldog pa mi nus par ^gnas bskos 'jam dbyangs gong ma'i bka' lung gis ^chin su tsug thu no mong hang zhes 'bod pa ^btsun gzugs su ma ti aa bhya sh'a sa na dhwa dzas bgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni drung yig pa dge slong blo ldan no 'dis kyang 'gro ba thams cad srid zhi'i dbul ba rnams las 'das nas zad mi shes pa'i gter chen po 'thob par gyur cig gu dge'o</col>

<item>

<tib>rab byung bco lnga'i rtsi gzhi shel dkar me long zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-25a</p>
<col>@024b (ces phug lugs rtsings kyi bstan bcos chen po beed'urya dkar po las byung ba'i rtsis kyi skor rnams mdor bsdus sde gsal bar ston rtsis gzhung shel dkar me long zhes bya ba 'di ni sbyangs pa dang skyes stobs gang gi ngos nas yangs blo gros dang shes rab dman zhing rnam dpyod dang stobs pa zhan pa yin kyang @025a * bka' drin mtshugs med skyabs mgon dam pa mchog gi sprul sku rin po che dza ya'i mtshan can nyid nas 'di lta bu zhig bgyis shig pa'i gnang ba dang yang chos sde skal bzang tshe dbang dang tshong chen dge bskos bka' bcu pad+ma dang slob dpon rin chen sogs kyang nan cher bskul ma byung bar bsten ^khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang chen rje btsun blo bzang sbyin pa dpal bzang po'i bsung rgyun cis gzhung snga ma'i 'gro kyis gzhi byas ste gzhung las pa'i ming can chos rje sbyin pa sa tshe bstan gyis dga' ldan dge rgyas gling du ga-yar khral tsam du bris so 'di la nor 'khrul gyi cha rnams mkhas pa rnams thugs brtsis dgongs nas zhu dag gnad ra mdzd du gsol ba dang dge ba'i cha cung zad yod na dpe rang gzhan tshe rabs kun tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rjes su bzung zhing dus kyi 'khor lo'i bshad sgrub kyi bstan pa gong nas gong du 'phel zhing rgyas pa'i rgyud gyur cig </col>

<tib>mkhan chen chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung 'bum las 'bras rtsis legs bshad kun 'dus zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-34a</p>
<col>@033b (ces pa tshes gza' rgyu skar sbyor ba byed pa 'phrod rten 'brel dus sbyor nyi ma spar sme sa bdag rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par phye ba legs bshad kun 'dus zhes bgyi ba 'di ni rang gi rtsis gsar ba bu slob rnams kyis nan gyis bskul ba'i ngor rgyud rdo rje mkha' 'gro mdo sde nyi ma'i snying po stag sna'i mdo rtsis kun 'dus pa lu gu gdong rtsis rtsis 'go brgya pa 'bras rtsis rin chen 'phreng ba sdong po dgu 'dus @034a * khrom rtsis sogs nas bshad pa rnams bsdus shing go bde bar tshigs su bcad de dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas khams gsum gyi bla ma srid gsum gyi 'dren mchog khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang chen po pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa'i bka' 'bangs tha shal ching kis lha'i btsun pa blo bzang bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan nam ming gzhan ri bong la seng ge bzhin pandi tar 'bod pas rab 'byung gnyis pa'i dkar po zhes pa sa mo sprul gyi lo mgo hor zla bcu gnyis pa rgyal zla ba'i dga' ba bzhi ba'i nyin rma chu'i 'gram du sbyar ba'i thog ma'i yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang rab brtan no 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhig rgyas la yun ring du gnas par 'gyur cig </col>
</item>

<tib>'od dpag med pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so * bsangs gser skyems bzhugs so * khyad par aur gnon bzhugs so * kun rigs chu shel dbang po zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>

<vol>5643</vol>
<tib>pad dkar zhal lung dri med rgya mtsho las tshes bza' skar sa bdag dus chod rgyu ba rnams bcos phran gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-23b</p>
<col>@023b (zhes rtses rnams kyis bzhung 'di ni mnga' ris khal 'khrungs pa'i lo tstsha ba 'jam dpal rdo rje zhal lnga nas gyis mdzad pas pad dkar zhal lung dri med rgya mtsho legs bshad gsal ba'i sgron las tshes dagn gza' skar ma dang rgyu'i sa bdag rnams kyis bcos phran gyis nyis pa kun zhi zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun bcu rtsa gsum pa'o dge'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5643</vol>
<tib>rnam sras bum pa sgrub ni"</tib>
<p>1b-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (zhes rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la brten nas nor dang tshe dpal dgugs shing bsgrub pa'i cho ga dgos 'dod gru char 'bebs pa'i chu 'dzin zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs dus kyi dpal mthon pos brjed pa'i thun dbang dkon mchog bkra shis kyi bskul ba ltar ^ sh'akya'i btsun pa blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis slob dpon 'gro bzang snying po'i dgongs pa bzhin sug bris su bgyis te bkod pa 'di kyang 'gro ba'i dbul phongs thams cad sel bar gyur cig   sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5643</vol>
<tib>rus cho ga mdo ni"</tib>
<p>8b-14a</p>

<col>@003b (ces bzlas so rtsis pas ting nge 'dzin ldan pa byas shing snang brgyad snying po dang bden tshig brjod kyi sa 'tshams phye la rus sbal 'brang bdag dang yon bdag min gyi mah'a gser gyi rus sbal dang 'jam @004a * dpal yon gyi brjod gong gi mis sa la ko long sel ba'i phyogs sam phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad du zab gnang du 'dzugs aithi shing stag yos lo bas lho nub kyi rdo dkar bzhi la gser gyi rus sbal bris phyogs bzhir 'dzudgong gi mis zab gnad 'dzugs zer ba 'byung ba aur nan mdzad pa rnams bla ma mkhyen wag'indra'i gsungs las thos so dge'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mchog rol pa gsang sgrub kyi bdag mdun cho ga'i yan lag tu bzlog pa rgyas par sbyar ba'i tshul bdud las rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin dang mgon po sbrag sgrub kyi gtor zlog bya tshul gyi yig chung rin chen 'phrul gyi lde mig ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@006a * (ces khro bo'i rgyal po dpal rta mchog rol ba dang myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po sbrag sgrub kyi sgo nas gtor zlog bya tshul gyi yig chung 'phrul gyi lde mig ces bya ba 'di ni mdo smad kyi bshad gra kun gyi dbus na rgyal mtshan gyi tog ltar mngon par 'phags pa'i chos sde chen po bkra shis 'khyil gyi gso rigs grwa tshang du bstan pa bstan 'dzin dang bcas pa'i rim gror dmigs te lo re bzhin rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi gtor zlog phyag len rgyun chags su mdzad rgyur rdo rje'i 'phrul sgyogs su bka' sdod beg tse dang sbrag pa 'brel mi mtshungs bgal yin rung rang bstan gyi srung ma'i gtso bo mgon po dang sbrag sgrub byed tshul zhig byung na legs pa 'dug pas ci'i kyang yi ger bkod pa zhes grwa tshang de kha'i slob dpon nang don tha snyad rigs pa mtha' dag la nang byan chud pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen blo bzang 'jigs med kyis yang yang nan tan du bskul ba bzhin ku s'a li dharma badzra gyis skyed tshal yid dga' chos 'phel du shar mar spel ba'i yi ge pa ni aor du su dge slong blo bzang dge 'phel lo</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub bka' stod bcas pa mchod cing bskang bshags bzlog pa bya ba'i cho ga dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@012a * (ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mchog rol ba gsang sgrub bka' sdod dang bcas pa mchod cing bskang bshags bzlog pa bya ba'i cho ga dngos grub char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i bka' srol dri ma med pa las nye bar 'ong ba'i yi dam srung ma'i mchod chog rnams kyi 'gros dang sgro bstun te ku s'a li dharma badzra gyis rang gzhan la phan pa'i bsam pas dge byed zhes pa chu pho stag gi lo sgrub gnas mchog bde chen chos gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dang brtson dang ldan pa biksha su ma ti aa nantas bgyis pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub cho ga dang 'brel bar tshes bcu'i dus su ao ti y'a na yi slob dpon chen por gsol ba gdab pa'i tshul dngos grub bdud rtsi'i za ma thog</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@011a * ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi cho ga dang 'brel bar tshes bcu la sogs pa'i dus su slob dpon chen po la gsol ba gdab pa'i man ngag dngos grub bdud rtsi'i za ma tog ces bya ba 'di ni zhwa dmar sngags pa gu ru bkra shis kyis tshul 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes nan tan du bskul ngor ^ku s'a li dharma badzra gyis tshig gi mtshams sbyor tsam ma gtogs pan chen thams cad mkhyen sogs tshad ldan mkhas grub kyi gsung 'ba' zhig las btus te khro mo zhes pa shing 'brug mchu zla'i mar ngo'i mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i dus chen gyi nyin chos sde chen po byams pa gling gi bla brang bkra shis 'od 'bar du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aa nanta'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub dang bka' srung sbrags sgrub kyi gtor bzlog gi cho ga rdo rje'i 'phrul sgyogs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12b</p>
<col>@012b (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub dang bka' bsrung beg tse sbrags te sgrub pa'i gtor bzlog cho ga rdo rje'i 'phrul skyogs zhes bya ba 'di ni mkhas shing grub pa brnyes pa'i bla ma dam pa du ma'i zhal gyi bdud rtsi myang pa'i btsun gzugs rig pa 'dzin pa'i tha shal ^ dharma badzra gyis mnyam med ri bo dge ldan pa'i bka' srol gyi yi dam chos skyong gi gtor bzlog rnams phyag len dang sgo bstun te 'gal med khyer bde'i lugs su sems dpa' chen po ngag dbang chos kyi rgya mtsho'i sgrub gnas bde chen chos gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aor du su dge slong blo bzang kun dgas bgyis pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub gyi bzlog pa'i cho ga bdud dpung pha ma'i rgyal rnga zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5b</p>
<col>@005b (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi bzlog pa'i cho ga bdud dpung pham pa'i rgyal rnga zhes bya ba 'di ni don gnyer ba 'ga' la phan pa'i slad du gu s'a li ^ dharma badzra gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aor du su bikshu sa ma ti aananta'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub gyi chos skor las klu gtor rgyas bsdus kyi cho ga bdud rtsi'i rol mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@008a * ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi rnal 'byor pas klu gtor gyi cho ga rgyas bsdus nyams su blang tshul bdud rtsi'i rol mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni rgya gar grub chen gyi gzhung bzhin bdag gi bla ma dam pa rdo rje 'chang la li ta badzra gyis gsal bar mdzad pa'i klu chog phan bde'i rgya mtsho las btus te ku s'a li ^dharma badzra gyis 'khyer bde bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aa nanta'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub gyi chos skor las tshes bcu sogs gyi skabs su nye bar mkho ba slob dpon gyi gsol 'debs bsam pa lhun 'grub mar grags pa bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi bka' bsgo byed tshul ye shes rdo rje'i gur khang zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col>@004b (smras pa snyigs ma'i brlang spyod mun nag gis bos pa'i ma rungs log 'dren srin bya stong gi dpung tshar gcod byin rlabs nyi ma 'ong po che dge legs pad bzhad pa'i gnyer gnyen 'di rmad rta mgrin gsang sgrub skyer sgang lugs kyi byin rlabs byed tshul ye shes rdo rje'i gur khang zhes bya ba 'di ni pi lig thu gu shri bsam 'grub nyi ma'i 'dod mos ltar blo bzang chos kyi nyi mas bris pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi chos skor las bum gter chog dgos 'dod kun 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-13b</p>
<col>@013b ('di yang rta mgrin chos skor yan lag tu yul phyogs 'di dang dus 'di'i skye bo'i khrod bya rog lus dkar brtul zhugs nyer 'dzin pa  ^ dharma badzra zhes bya'i snyoms las pas rma chen spom ra'i sras mchog seng mtho yi lha mo me tog bkra ba'i dga' tshal du mdzes byed chu stong nyal sbyar ba ste yi ge'i byed po blo bzang kun dga'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi chos skor las 'chi ka ma'i sems can la phan thabs bya tshul nyams thag dbugs 'byin zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12b</p>
<col>@012a * (ces 'chi ka ma'i sems can la phan thabs bya tshul nyams thag dbugs 'byin @012b zhes bya ba 'di ni deng dus snyigs mar gyur ba'i dbang gis phal ba rnams lta ci 'grel mang po'i 'dren por rlom pa 'ga' zhig kyang 'chi ka'i sems can gyis sngas mgor slebs pa na byin rten myang du 'jug pa las phan pa'i thabs gzhan mdzad mi mkhyen pa mang po mthong bas rkyen byas mchog dman thams can kyis lag tu blang bde ba 'di 'dra zhig bris na 'ga' zhig la phan par 'gyur ba srid snyam nas ku s'a li dharma badzra gyis mo tog ltu ma ra'i bsti gnas su sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bikshu wa gindra sha sa na wa rtas bgyis pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi chos skor las chu gtor rgyun 'khyer tshogs gnyis rin chen 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b (ces chu gtor rgyun khyer tshogs gnyis rin chen 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba 'di yang ^ dharma badzra gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aananta'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi chos skor las phyir bzlog gi gdams pa sngags 'chang dpa' bo'i lag cha zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5b</p>
<col>@005b (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas rbod gtong bzlog pa'i gdams pa nyams su blang tshul sngags 'chang dpa' bo'i lag cha zhes bya ba 'di yang ku s'a li ^dharma badzra gyis bla ma gong ma'i man ngag lag tu blang bde bar sbyar ba ste yi ge pa ni aa nanta'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi chos skor las rgyal gdon 'dul thabs kyi las kyi rim pa spu gri'i 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-14a</p>
<col>@014a * (ces rgyal gdon 'dul thabs kyi las kyi rim pa spu gri'i 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba 'di ni rta mchog rol pa'i chos skor gyi yan lag tu skabs sa babs mthong nas ku s'a li dharma badzra gyis chos sde chen po sku 'bum byams pa gling du shar mar spel ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod yangs pa'i drung yig ngag dbang bstan 'phel lo</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi gdab las kyi cho ga mchon cha'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@011b ces dbang chen rta mchog rol ba gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas dgra bgegs sgrol ba'i gdab las kyi cho ga mtshon cha'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di yang ku s'a li @012a * ^ dharma badzra gyis chu yos nag pa zla ba'i tshes lnga la dben gnas bde chen chos gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bhi kshu su dhi a'a nanta'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi 'phrin las kyi le lag ngan pa dgu thub kyi man ngag</tib>
<p>1a-6b</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas bka' bsgo byed tshul rdo rje'i go cha zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5b</p>
<col>@005b (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas bka' bsgo zhes grags pa'i byin brlab byed tshul rdo rje'i go cha zhes bya ba 'di yang ku s'a li dharma badzra gyis lhag pa'i lha 'di nyid kyi rnal 'byor ba dag la nye bar mkho ba'i bsam pas mdzes byed kyi lo sa ga zla ba'i yar tsher bzang po la 'gros dgon pa'i gnam gyi skyed mos tshal yid dga' chos 'phel du shar mar spel ba'i yi ge pa ni aa nanta'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas byabs khrus byed tshul bdud rtsi'i bum bzang zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9b</p>
<col>@009b (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas bkru byabs srung ba bya ba'i chog bdud rtsi'i bum bzang zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po sgo me ting skya dpon slob kun bzang snyan grags rgya mtshos bskul ma mdzad pa bzhin khrus kyi cho ga spyi dang sgo bstun zhing man ngag khyad par 'ga' zhig gis zun brgyan slob ma la ngo smon pa'i tshig gi mtshams sbyor bsal bar bgyis te ku s'a li ^dharma badzra gyis dge byed kyi lo sa ga zla ba'i tshes bzang por sgrub sde bde chen chos gling du sbyar bar yi ge pa ni blo bzang kun dga'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas rab gnas byed tshul byin rlabs kyi rol mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17b</p>
<col>@017b (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas rab gnas byed tshul byin rlabs kyi rol mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni rab gnas kyi cho ga du ma dang dam pa'i phyag bzhes mthong brgyud bzhin rang gzhan la phan 'dod kyi bsam pas btsun gzugs ^ dharma badzra gyis 'phar ba zhes pa lcags mo glang gi lo dbyar dus kyi dga' ma lang tsho da la babs pa na skyed mos tshal gyi bsti gnas yid dga' chos 'phel du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aor du su dge slong blo bzang kun dgas bgyis pa sarba dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas rbad bdun ma la brten pa'i gdon 'dul bya tshul gdug can tshar gcod zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8b</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgrub thabs dregs pa kun 'dul zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgrub thabs tshig nyung la don cha tshang ba tshigs bcad du sdebs pa 'di 'dra zhig dgos zhes dkon mchog bla mar 'dzin cing dad pa dang gtong ba la sogs pa dam pas bsngags pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dur bed wang phun tshogs bsam grub kyi dpon mo nor bu r'a gas nan gyis bskul ngor ku s'a li ^dharma badzra gyis aor du su wang gi ho ro'i sgar thog tu thun gcig la mgyogs par sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi shis brjod ga-yas 'khyil dung gi rang sgra zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>2b-3b</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi smon lam shis brjod pa bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-2b</p>
<col>@002b (smras pa theg mchog lam du zhugs pa'i skal ldan rnams rig 'dzin grong du bde blag bsgrod 'dod na yang dag smon pa'i khyu mchog 'di zhon ces chos kyi rdo rjes smras pa dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi tshogs 'khor gyi cho ga rnal 'byor rol pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col>@007a * (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi tshogs 'khor gyi cho ga rnal 'byor rol pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba 'di yang zhwa dmar sngags pa gu ru bkra shis kyis bskul ba dang lha 'di nyid yi dam du byed pa mang po la'ang phan par mthong nas rgyal khams nyul ba'i dharma badzra gyis tshogs 'khor spyi dang sgo bstun cing rnying gi dgongs pa dang @007b yang mi 'gal bar sna tshogs dbyig ces pa shing mo sprul gyi lo mi'i dbang po wang ratna siddhi'i pho brang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang kun dga' bgyis so</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi zhi rgyas dang pa gsum gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga ye shes me 'od zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-21a</p>
<col>@020b ces @021a * rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi zhi rgyas dbang gsum gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga ye shes me 'od ces bya ba 'di ni lha 'di nyid yi dam du byed pa dag gis bsnyen pa'i kha bskong dang rang gzhan gyi rim 'gro sogs la sbyin sreg sgrub dgos pa'i skabs du mar yig cha gzhan mang po la ltos mi dgos pa'i tshig cho ga lag len du sgril ba zhig byung na legs pa 'dug bsam rang nyid kyis 'dri 'dun yod thogs chos sde bkra shis chos gling gi khri pa zhwa dmar rab 'byams pa chos snyan grags kyis kyang bskul ba la brten n as gsang ba spyi'i cho ga 'od kyi snye ma'i dgongs pa bzhin khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i bka' srol dang mthun par ku s'a li ^ dharma badzra gyis 'phar ba zhes pa lcags mo glang gi lo'i rgyal zla ba'i yar tshes la bla brang bkra shis 'od 'bar gyi gzims chung bde chen phug tu sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang kun dgas bgyis pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi zhi rgyas dbang gsum gyi sbyin sreg gi zur rgyan ye shes me 'od gsal byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-27a</p>
<col>@027a * (rje btsun rdo rje 'chang chen po thu bu bkwan pa ^ dharma badzra gyis dri ma med pa'o</col>
</item>

<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub lugs kyi gnyis kyi rgyun 'khyer snying po bcud 'dus zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@004b (zhes pa'ang dharma badzra gyis bris</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub mnga' gsol ni lha rgyal snyan pa'i rnga gsang dang pan chen blo bzang chos rgyan gyis mdzad pa'i beg tse'i mnga' gsol bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-2a</p>
<col>@002a (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi mnga' gsol lha rgyal snyan pa'i rnga gsang zhes bya ba 'di ni dmar sngags pa gu ru bkra shis kyis lo du mar yang yang nan gyis bskul ngor ^dharma badzra gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rigs pa smra ba'i dka' bcu dkon mchog nyi ma'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5644</vol>
<tib>skyer sgang lugs kyi rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi drag po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bdud sde sreg byed bskal ba'i me dpung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-14b</p>
<col>@014b ces skyer sgang lugs kyi rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi drag po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bdud sde sreg byed bskal ba'i me dpung zhes bya ba 'di ni 'di nyid kyi drag po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bla ma gong mas mdzad pa zhig ma mthong bas gsang ba spyi'i cho ga 'od kyi snye ma'i dgongs don gtso bor bzung rgyud dang grub chen gyi gzhung gzhan dang rje bla ma'i legs par bshad pa la brten nas btsun gzugs rig pa 'dzin pa'i tha shal pa ^dharma badzra gyis dge byed zhes pa chu stag lo'i rgun zla tha chung gi mar ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i nyin thun gcig kho na la rdzogs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aor du su dge slong blo bzang kun dgas bgyis so "</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@012a * (ces skyer sgang lugs kyi rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgrub thabs rta mchog rol pa'i zhal lung zhes bya ba 'di ni lha 'di nyid kyi rjes gnang brgyud pa mi 'dra ba 'ga' dang sgrub thabs man ngag gi rim pa mang du thos pa'i btsun gzugs rig pa 'dzin pa'i tha shal pa dharma badzra gyis chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i bka' srol ba mthun par kun ldan gyi lo chu stod zla ba'i yar tshes bzang por bha ta hor gyi yul grub thegs pa'i bshul lam 'ju lag gi gang ri chen po'i lha zhol lha btsan mched gsum gyi gnas rdza dmar mandal zhes grags pa'i mdun sar bcag mal bgyis pa'i sgar thog tu sbyar ba dge legs su gyur cig </col>

<p>1a-15b</p>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<col>@007b (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas rgyal rdzongs bya tshul gnod tshe kun sel zhes bya ba 'di ni sngar bkod bde 'don cha thung drag yid tshim pa zhig mi yod pa 'dug pas rgyas tsam zhig 'god thub na legs pa 'dug zhes 'ga' zhig gis bskul ba dang dus 'dir rgyal gdon shin tu sdang bas rang gzhan gyi rkyen sel sogs la nye bar mkho ba'i bsam pas ^ dharma badzra gyis skyed tshal yid dga' chos 'phel du ja sbyor gcig gi yun la grub par sbyar te dge slong blo bzang kun dga'i sor mo'i 'du byed glog ltar bsgyur bas bris pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5646</vol>
<tib>chos skyong chen po gza' bdud ra hu la'i 'phrin bcol gnyer gtad bcas pa phas rgol gyi klad pa 'gems pa'i sengge'i nga ro zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@005a * (chos skyong chen po r'a hu lar gser skyems kyi mchod pa 'bul tshul bar chad kun sel zhes bya ba 'di ni rang yi dam lha'i bsnyen pa'i skabs su bar chad cung zad byung ba'i rkyen byas te kha nas gang gyung bla gzugs blo bzang mkhas grub kyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rang gi slob ma dbu mdzad blo bzang mchog grub nyi mas bris</col>

<item>

<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs bdud las rnam rgyal gyi ngag 'don khrigs chags su bsdebs pa bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-30a</p>
<col>@029a * (ces dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs bdud las rnam rgyal gyi ngag 'don khrigs chags su bsdebs pa bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'di yul byang phyogs kyi mthar 'khyams pa'i sprang btsun snyom las pa ngag dbang @029b blo bzang chos ldan zhes bgyi bas deng sang 'jigs byed dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs 'don cha nyung ba la gtso bor mos pas ngag 'don byed 'dod mkhan mang na'ang rgyal ba'i dbang po rje bdag nyid chen pos mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs bdud las rnam rgyal ni gang zag dbang po rnon pas bsam bsgom byed tshul gtso bor mdzad pas ngag 'don gyi tshe tshig phrad sbyar dgos mang ba sogs kyis dbang po dman pas ngag 'don bya dka' ba dang gzhan bdud las rnam rgyal ji lta ba bzhin ngag 'don du bsgrags pa'i dpe rang gis ma mthong bas rang gi nye 'khor ba rnams kyi ngag 'don bya ba dang gzhan la'ang phan 'dod kyi bsam pas rje nyid kyi sgrub thabs bdud las rnam rgyal sor bzhag pa la smon lam shis brjod gnyis rje rang gis mdzad pa mi 'dugs dpal ldan smad rgyud grwa tshang gi zhal 'don mdzad bzhin pa mkhas pa'i dbang po zhang zhung pa chos dbang grags pas mdzad pa'i smon lam shis brjod gnyis kyis kha bskang ste mtsho bdun gyi lha khang chen mor bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa @030a * ni gzhung lugs rab 'byams pa smra ba'i spobs pa can blo bzang nyi ma'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i dbang po blo bzang grags pa' chos tshul dri ma med pa phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig </col>

<item>

<col>@009b smras pa kun bzang rdo rje 'dzin pa gdug can ngor cher khros gza' bdud drag po'i skur zhengs pa nang rgyad gsum gyi bstan srung mthu po che rgyal dbang pad+ma'i las mkhan dug hur nag bdag cag ltos bar bcas pa @010a * cher 'go zhing dran pa'i mdo la dgra bgegs brlag pa'i mtshon mthu stobs rno myur gnam lcags thog gi sprun gza' mchog khyab mjug sdod zla sde brgyad kyi rno 'dus pha lam ral gro ngar ma 'di gza' bdud bran khol sa gnas rig 'dzin sogs rang slob dam ldan du mas bka' bzhin du bsgrubs shing lha rdzas dang bcas bskul ba'i ngor gsang chen bstan bsrung zhing spel ba dang bstan dgra ming tsam med par brlag pa'i phyir rdzogs chen chos dbyings stobs ldan rdo rjes sbyar dge bas bstan 'gro'i phan bde rgyas par shog </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5646</vol>

<col>@005b (ces pa 'di ni aa ma'i dgongs don zab mo blag tu rtogs pa'i chas pa sprul pa'i sku rin po che nas lnga ma glud chog lhug tu grub pa zhig 'bod pa slad tshigs bcad du sdebs dgos pa'i bka' nan che ba'i ngor snga ma yig rnying de la gzhi byas nas thar 'dod de bon dang snyan thog gcig ma sogs nas kha bskang ste ltag tshang sku skye skye wantra kirthis sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>

<vol>5646</vol>

<col>@003a * (skyes pa mtshon thogs rol mo'i sgra dang bcas pa nyer dgu'i srod la lam gyi bzhi mdor bskyal lo des mi kha chod par the tshom med mi kha rdog dril gyi mdos shin tu zab slob dpon pad+ma ka ras mdzad rdzogs so mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5646</vol>
<tib>mtsho sman gur mdos bcos thabs ni"</tib>

<col>@004b (ces bsrung ma'i dbang po dam can rdo rje legs pa'i bskang @005a * 'phrin gser skyems 'phrin las rnam bzhi lhun grub zhes pa 'di yang dad stobs lhag bsam gtong phod nor gyis phyug pa'i ri chas bsrung ma'i dbang po'i sku rten chos rje bsod nams mthu stobs kyi bskul ma mdzad pa bzhin ^ rgyal sras sprul sku'i ming 'dzin bskal bzang thub bstan 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis ^ 'phags mchog phyag na padmo'i gsung rnams la gzhi bgyis te dad mos mtshams sbyor bzang pos sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni drung yig rdo rje tshe dbang gi bris pa dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>5651</vol>
<tib>mkha' 'gro grib sel bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5651</vol>
<tib>mkha' 'gro ma sengge'i gdong can gyi sgo nas byang grol dang byabs khrus bya tshul rkyen ngan sel byed zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@009a * (ces mkha' 'gro ma sengge gdong can gyi sgo nas byang grol dang byabs khrus bya tshul rkyen ngan sel byed ces bya ba 'di ni rab byams smra ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bskul ba'i bka' ma bcag par tha shal pra nydza'i ming can gyis sug bris bgyis pa 'dis kyang 'gro kun mi mthun ga-yul las shin tu rgyal zhing mkha' spyod bde chen gnas su rol bar gyur cig  mangga lam</col>
</item>

<tib>rgyal po'i chen po sku lnga'i bzlog bsgyur zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@008a * (zhes bstan bsrung pa'i chos skyong rgyal po'i bzlog bsgyur gyi cho ga gnam gyi thob zhes bya ba 'di dad ldan dge slong blo bzang bkra shis kyis bskul ba'i ngor rdo rje 'chang ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho'i mdzad pa rgyal po sku lnga'i gtor cho ga rdo rje sgra dbyangs ma dang 'brel ba'i bzlog bsgyur gyi cho ga las mkhan blo bzang slob dpon zhes bya ba aartha siddhi lam can gyis sug bris su sbyar ba'o mangga lam dge'o</col>

<tib>` rta mgrin gsang sgrub mnga' gsol ni"</tib>
<p>19a-20b</p>
<col>@020b (ces rta gsang sgrub kyi mnga' gsol lha rgyal snyan pa'i rnga gsang zhes bya ba 'di ni zhwa dmar sngags pa ku ru bkra shis kyis lo du mar yang nan gyis bskul ngor la dharma badzra gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rig pa smra ba'i dka' bcu'i dkon mchog nyin ma'i 'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<tib>` thugs rje chen po'i cho ga'i go rim ni"</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5654</vol>
<tib>dam can rdo rje legs pa la gsur gtong tshul dpa' po dgyes bskyed ces bya</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b (ces pa 'di yang dharma badzra gyis dam can chen por gsur mchod phul na legs pa zhig kun rtogs kyi ri mor shar te phral ba bris pa'i yi ge pa ni aor du su dge slong ngag dbang bstan 'phel lo</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5654</vol>
<tib>pa ba'i dkar chags</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5654</vol>
<tib>rta mchog rol pa'i rnal 'byor pas mchog dman mgron la gtor ma dang gser skyems bsangs sogs gtong ba'i skabs 'dod gsol kha bsgyur byed tshul</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col>@004b (zhes pa'ang ^ dharma badzra gyis smras</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5654</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub chos skor las bka' sdod beg tse lcam dral gyi gtor chog shin tu 'khyer bde ba bstan srung dgyes pa'i rol mo bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (gnod sbyin beg tse lcam dral gyi gtor chog shin tu bsdus pa bstan bsrung dgyes pa'i rol mo zhes bya ba 'di yang ku s'a li dharma badzra gyis shing sprul lha babs kyi dus chen nyin dang pa dang rnam dpyod dang gtong ba la sogs pa bsngags 'os yon tan gyis rgyud phyugs pa mi yi dbang po ratna siddhi'i pho brang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong ngag dbang bstan 'phel lo</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5654</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub chos skor las bka' srung beg tse lcam dral gyi rjes gnang cho ga ches gsal ba klag pas don 'grub ces bya bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a *  dpal rta mchog rol pa'i bka' sdod gnod sbyin dregs pa lcam sring gi rjes gnang gi cho ga klag pas don 'grub ces bya ba 'di yang rgyal ba dge 'dun rgya mtsho dang tshar chen gyi yig cha lag gzhi byas te ku s'a li dharma badzra gyis lag tu blang bde bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong blo bzang kun dga'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5654</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub chos skor las bka' srung rdo rje legs pa yi gtor chog shin tu 'khyer bde ba dam can rol mtsho zhes bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (de nas gtang rag gi mchod bstod dang bzod gsol rten yod na brtan bzhugs dang med na gshegs gsol bgyis la bkra shis kyis mtha' brgyan par bya'o skyes mchog rdo rje legs pa'i gtor chog dam can rol mtsho zhes bya ba 'di yang don gnyer ba 'ga' zhig gis 'di lta bu'i cha tshang la 'khyer bde ba tshigs su bcad du sdebs pa zhig dgos zhes nan gyis bskul ngor ku s'a li ^ dharma badzra gyis bla ma dam pa'i gsung las btes te shing sprul lha babs kyi dus chen nyin sbyin pa'i bdag po mi dbang ratna siddhi'i pho brang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aa nanta'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5654</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub chos skor las nad bdag stobs 'joms kyi cho ga khyer bde bar bkod pa kun phan bdud rtsi'i zeg ma zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (ces nad bdag stobs 'joms kyi cho ga 'khyer bde bar bkod pa kun phan bdud rtsi'i zeg ma zhes bya ba 'di yang ku s'a li dharma badzra gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gu shri ngag dbang bstan 'phel lo</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5654</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi chos skor las rang gzhan la dge mtshan spel ba'i cho ga dge legs rgya mtsho'i char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11b</p>
<col>@011b (ces bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi rnal 'byor bdag gis rang dang sbyin pa'i bdag po po sogs la bkra shis kyi dge mtshan spel ba'i cho ga dge legs rgya mtsho'i char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni tshul 'di lta bu nye bar mkho ba'i skabs du ma zhig mthong zhing lha 'di nyid kyi chos skor yongs su rdzogs pa grub pa'i mtha' brgyan par bya ba'i ched du ku s'a li ^dharma badzra gyis mdzes byed kyi lo sa ga zla ba'i yar tshes bzang por skyed tshal yid dga' chos 'phel du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aor du su dge slong blo bzang kun dga' bgyis pa 'jig rten na nyi zla lhar gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5654</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi chos skor las rgyal gsol gyi cho ga 'phrin las lhun 'grub ces bya ba bzhugs so  "</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@008a * (rgyal gsol gyi cho ga 'phrin las lhun grub ces bya ba 'di ni rta mgrin gyi rnal 'byor pas rgyal po sku lnga bsten mchod byed pa 'brel chags shing gsol mchod dgos pa'i skabs bya mang du mchis pas mchod cho ga 'khyer bde zhig chos skor khrod du 'gong pa skabs su babs par bsam nas ku s'a li ^ dharma badzra gyis yig rnying dad gong ma lnga pa chen mo'i gsung rnams las bcus te sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni a'a nan ta'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5654</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas char 'bebs byed tshul gyi cho ga sprin bcud 'dus pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-25b</p>
<col>@025b (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas char 'bebs byed tshul gyi cho ga sprin bcud 'dus rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'di yang ku s'a li ^dharma badzra gyis khre mo zhes pa shing pho 'brug gi lo'i nag zla'i yar tshes la 'khri shing dang me tog sna tshogs ldem ldem gar byed cing dwangs bsel yid du 'ong ba'i nyal 'gro lhung lhung gi sgra 'byin pa spu sdug 'dab chags du ma skang snyan gyi rol mo 'khrol ba'i bsti gnas yid dga' chos 'phel du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni blo bzang kun dga'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5654</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas sri mnan byed tshul rdo rje'i lhun po brtsegs pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-20b</p>
<col>@020a * (ces rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas sri mnan byed tshul rdo rje'i lhun po brtsegs pa zhes bya ba 'di yang dus kyi dbang gi sri'i gnod pa shin tu che bar 'dug pas mnan thabs kyi yi ge lag tu blang bde ba zhig ci'i kyang brtsom shig ces don gnyer ba du mas snga phyir yang yang bskul ba la brten nas rang phyogs kyi bla ma gong mas mdzad pa'i yig cha'i rigs ma mthong shing mi bskyod rdo rjes byas zer ba zhig 'dug pa lha mo'i sgrub sri lte phur nag mo dang dam sri gnyis kha sbyor du gnon pa sogs sri'i ngo bo tsam yang ngos ma zin pa'i lag len tha chad dang lcags mkhar gyi 'don cha la gro sngags pa'i dpe 'khyam gyi tshogs 'ga' zhig bsres te sengge'i ya mgal dang phag gi ma mgal mi 'grigs bzhin du sbyar ba'i yig nyog la ming rdo rje'i thog mda' zhes 'dogs pa ngo tsha bor ba'i brdul zhugs su snang la sngags pa ral khur ngoms pa mang pos kyang thod rabs tsam la brten nas snang bar gang shar byed pa las lag len tshad ldan byed mkhan dkon par 'dug pas gsal zhing 'gril la lag tu glang chog ma 'di 'dra zhig bgyis na rma khar phan na khyi tshil gyi dpe bzhin mchog @020b dman mang po la nye bar mkho ba'i skabs kyang srid snyam te btsun gzugs ^dharma badzra gyis rtsa ba'i gzhung 'byung ba rin chen kun 'dus dang sgo bstun yig cha dum nas kha 'geng 'os kyis brgyan te 'phar ba zhes pa lcags mo glang gi lo'i cho 'phrul zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes brgyad kyi nyin zla brang bkra shis 'od 'bar du thun gcig la rdzogs par sbyar ba'o ) "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5655</vol>
<tib>blo sbyong nye bar mkho ba'i lung sna tshogs bzhugs lags "</tib>

<col>@008b (ces pa 'di yang chos la gcig tu brtson zhing rang bzhin kyi bsam pa brtan pa'i slob ma dge tshul tshul khrims dar rgyas kyis yang dang yang bskul ba'i bzhin snyom las pa tshul khrims ming can gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bskul ba po nyid do</col>

<tib>gnyer gtad bzhugs s+ho "</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5655</vol>
<tib>grub mtha' smra ba bzhi'i gzhi lam 'bras gsum gyi bzhed tshul so sor yod pa las bden gnyis las brtsams te gzhi'i 'dod tshul tsam bkod pa dpyod ldan mgub bskyed pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@012b ('di yang tshe mchog gling yongs 'dzin mchog sprul rin po che rje 'jam dpal ye shes bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po nas khal kha khu re chen mo'i grwa rigs rab 'byams pa ngag dbang thub bstan la gnang ba yin no 'dis kyang rgyal bstan yun ring du gnas shing 'gro kun bshes gnyen dam pas rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig ) aom swasti blo gsar rnams la nye bar mkho ba yi grub mtha'i rnam bzhag tshigs su bcad ma dang bslab tshig dang bcas par du bzhengs pa po spar dpon dge slong blo bzang @013a * tshe ring ste dge bas rgyal bstan yun ring gnas pa dang ^ dam pa'i zhabs brtan chos grwa rnam gnyis kyi dge 'dun thugs mthun khrims gtsang bka' po ta lnga'i  'chad nyan yar ngo'i zla ltar 'phel rgyas shog (ces pa 'di yang bran ngag gi dbang pos bris pa lags  par 'di khu re chen mo'i kun dga' chos gling grwa tshang du bzhugs dge'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5655</vol>

<col>@014a * (ces grub pa'i mtha' rnam par bzhag pa 'khrul spong gdong lnga'i sgra dbyangs thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam bzang gsal ba'i rin chen sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni snga mo nas mang thos gser khang chos rje gu na ma tis snyan tshig me tog gsar bas bskul zhing dus phyis yongs kyi bshes gnyen chen po mkhas mchog lcang rwa slob dpon pa 'phags pa rin chen gyis khams chab mdo nas ja g-yu kha btags kyi rten bcas chab shog tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas stag lo'i dgag lan 'byams rgyas dgos zhes bskul ba'i bka' ngo dang khyad par rang blo goms pa'i slad du mkhan chen rgyal ba thams cad kyi bdag po rin po che las sdom gsum sogs chos kyi bka' drin thob cing 'jam dbyangs bla ma khri rin po che yab sras bzhi dang pan chen bka' 'gyur pa rdo rje 'chang smin grol chos kyi rgyal po srang rdo rje 'chang sems dpa' chen po ngag dbang blo gros sogs dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len cing rje bla ma'i mdo sngags rnams la nges shes rnyed cing 'phags bod kyi grub mtha'i gzhung dang @014b khyad par sher sgron tshad chen rtsa 'grel dus 'khor sogs gzhung lugs chen po rnams la brten gsung rab dang grub mtha' rab 'byams smra ba ^'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rjes tshig nyung don gsal rgyas 'gril du dkar po zhes pa sa mo sbrul gyi lo cho 'phrul zla ba'i dkar phyogs rdzogs pa gsum pa'i nyin gangs can gyi bya rgod phung po gnyis pa dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i 'du gnas ri bo dge 'phel gyi gar 'dug theg mchog rol mtsho gsang sngags bde ba chen po'i pho brang nas sbyar ba la slar yang phri snon cung zad byas pa 'dis rgyal ba'i bstan pa phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5656</vol>
<tib>rgyal tshab chos rjes rje'i drung du gsan pa'i shes rab le'u'i zin bris</tib>
<p>1a-49a</p>
<col>@048a * dam pa'i chos spyod pa la 'jug pa'i shes rab le'u'i rnam bshad 'di ni bstan pa rin po @048b che'i khur ches cher 'dzin pas mi ngal zhing mdo sngags kyis bsdus pa'i gzhung gi gnad du ma thugs su chud cing bslab pa gsum la gces sbras su mdzad pa bshes gnyen chen po nam mkha' bzang po ba dang grags song pa gnyis kyis rje nyid kyi drung du spyod 'jug gi rnam bshad yongs su rdzogs pa zhig byung na zer pa'i zhu yig me tog rgya chen po dang bcas pa mdo khams stod nas bskur byung bas rkyon byas khong rnam gnyis kyi slob ma dge ba'i shes gnyen seng bzang pas shes rab le'u'i t'ikka tsam byed pa byung na zhes yang dang du bskul ba la brten nas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'dren pa dam pa mdo sngags kyis bsdus pa'i bstan pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i gnad ma lus par thugs su chud pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam pa'i chos ma lus pa 'dzin pa'i smon lam legs par grub pa'i sems dpa' chen po de nyid kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma sbyi pos blangs shing khyad par du le'u'i 'di'i don yang rje de nyid las bka' drin mnos nas zab mo'i don la dad pa dar ma rin chen gys 'brog ri bo che dge ldan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson sde snod 'dzin pa nam mkha' dpal bzang ngo 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun rin du @049a * gnas par gyur cig 'di'i dbu zhabs su cung zad re dang par skabs 'gar kha skong phran tshegs re min pa rgyal sras 'jug ngogs kyi sher le ji lta ba bzhin 'dug go mangga lam swa sti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri bsung can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir dga' ldan theg chen gling chos sde che nas chos sbyin char 'di spel"</col>
</item>

<item>

<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (zhes gsungs te 'di ni dgongs 'grel gyi mdo'i don du 'ang snang ngo lhag mthod 'dis ni nyon mongs mngon gyur gyi gnyer po mi byed kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsal sbyong ba'i phyir du byed do 'di la brten nas ji snye dpal dmigs pa'i lhag mthod gzhan mang po yang rtogs par nus so zhes zhi lhag gnyis kyi dka' ba'i gnas la rgyal ba'i dgongs pa byin chi ma log par bshad pa 'di ni zhi lhag gnyis kyi rnal 'byor pa chen po blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis sbyar ba'o 'di la brten nas yang dag pa'i lam la phyin ci log tu rtog pa'i dri ma zhi bar gyur cig  mangga lam swa sti rgyal bstan pad tshal phan bde'i dri bsung can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir dga' ldan byams pa gling chos sde chen sa chos sbyin char 'di spel</col>

<item>

<tib>bde smon zhing mchog sgo 'byed kyi 'don sgrigs 'khyer bde gnad tshad rnam dag zhing du bgrod pa'i nye lam zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@017b (ces bde smon zhing mchog sgo 'byed kyi 'don sgrigs 'khyer bde gnad tshad rnam dag zhing du bgrod pa'i nye lam zhes bya ba 'di ni 'di kha'i khams tshan chos 'khor gling gi grwa rigs dad ldan dge slong rgyal mtshan gyis bde smon 'don thabs rang gzhan rgyun gyi nyams len du bgyis chog pa 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes rab dkar lha dar dang bcas nan tan du bskul ba don yod par bya ba'i phyir mang thos rigs smra'i brdul zhugs 'chang ba'i btsun gzugs 'jam dbyangs dgyes pa'i bshes gnyen gyis rab tshes lcags sprel cho 'phrul gnam gang gi @018a * nyin dge bar dpal ri dge rgyas kyi mdun shod chos grwa bkra shis chos 'byor gling du yi ger sdebs pa 'dis kyang bstan 'gro yongs la phan bde rgya chen po 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur cig  dge legs 'phel (aom swa sti skyabs mgon bzhi pa'i thugs rje'i 'od stong gis dus mthat rgyal bstan 'dab ba rgya bzhad pa'i tshal chos grwa bkra shis chos sbyor gling mchog nas spar gyi chos sbyin sbrang rtsi'i dga' ston spel sarba mangga lam ` 'dis mtshon dge bas spar brko sman pa sogs 'gro kun 'od dpag med kyi zhal mthod ste rgyal sras spyod pa rgya mtshor legs bslab nas bla med byang chub myur du thob par shog  sman pa 'u he hu das</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5660</vol>
<tib>dbang chog ni"</tib>
<p>1a-45a</p>
<col>@044a * (dpal 'khor lo bde mchog l'u ai pa'i lugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug cing dbang blang ba'i cho ga bde chen rol mtsho zhes bya ba 'di ni 'dus pa dar bde mchog gi thun mong gi bshad rgyud rdo rje 'phreng ba las dbang bcu bzhi'i rnam bzhag gsungs pa'i rjes su 'brangs shing lo dril gnyis thun mong gis chog pa rnams rje btsun chos kyi rgyal po rtsong kha pa chen po rang nyid kyis mdzad pa'i drol bu dkyil chog gzhir bzhag cing lo dril gyi mi 'dra ba'i khyad par dbye dgos pa rnams d'a ri ka pa dang lam ka rgyal bzang ba dang @044b dkyil chog rdo rje 'phreng ba dang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i lam gyi gsungs pa dag las gang 'jug pa bde ba dang skabs su ji ltar bab pa bzhin bkod de dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkhyen brtse cig tu bsdus pa'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang dang dbyer ma mchis pa'i rje btsun bla ma rtsong kha pa chen po nyid kyi zhabs kyi pad mo la spyi bos reg pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa dge legs dpal bzang pos rtsang nyang stod rig pa'i 'byung gnas kyi sa'i cha dpal ri bo mdangs can gyi dgon par sbyar ba'o swa sti bde mchog zung 'jug nor bu'i rgya mtsho la dbang bsgyur mkhas pa'i gling du grangs  med byon de las 'ongs pa'i legs bshad gam gi'i rgyun gangs can ljongs 'dir bab kyang nyams su rje btsun lha yi dbang po blo bzang mchog grags pa 'brug stong sgrog pas shes bya'i mkha' ma lus khyab pa'i mkhyen brtse'i chu 'dzin las legs bshad bdud rtsi'i char rgyun mi bzad phab dge legs blo gros yangs pa'i rdzing mchog bkang dpal 'byor bzang po'i brlabs phreng ga-yos pa las drangs pa'i rnam ngag dbang bzhi'i chu bo'i rgyun skal bzang zhing pa'i lo tog rgyas byed 'di rgyal ba'i bstan pa yun du gnas phyir dang sangs rgyas skyid kyi sgrib gnyis sbyang ba'i phyir 'byor ldan gtong phod nam mkha' dbang phyug gis 'thun rkyen legs par sbyar te rig 'byed pa gzhung pa sangs rgyas 'phel gyi ri mo la spar mkhan mkhas pa brtson 'grus bzang pos brkos dod ma dge bskul sdom brtson bsod 'phel @045a * gyis grub pa'i gnas mchog gi re dgon du bsgrubs 'di yi phyir du sgo gsum 'bad pa dang 'byor ba cung zad btang pa'i rab dkar gyis 'gro ba kun kyang lam 'dir zhugs nas 'grol byed lam gyis zung 'jug myur thob shog  chu pho spre'u lo dbyid zla rab cho 'phrul chen po'i dus dpal ldan ge re kun du bzang po'i nags khrod ming gzhan skyid lung lha sdengs dgon par grub pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5660</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgo nas rab gnas shin tu bsdus pa bya tshul</tib>

<col>@002b (ces pa 'di ni ^sh'akya'i btsun pa blo bzang bsam grub kyis dam pa rnams kyi gsung bzhin du myur bar bris pa'o 'dis kyang 'gro ba rnams la phan thogs par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5660</vol>
<tib>gsol mchod</tib>
<p>2b-3a</p>
<col>@002b (zhes dpal chen rta mgrin gyi thugs kyi pho nya gter gyi bdag po @003a * sprin ring rgyal po la gsol mchod bya ba'i rim pa 'phrin las 'gugs pa'i pho nya zhes bya ba 'di ni ^ chos skyong 'di nyid mchod cing bsten pa lha'i btsun pa aa mo gha sidha badzras rang gi sgar thog tu bris bkra shis</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5660</vol>
<tib>'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed kyi bka' sdod dam can chos kyi rgyal po phyi sgrub la brten nas drug bcu pa dang 'brel ba'i gror chen la sogs pa'i dmigs rim cung zad bshad pa dam ldan re skong yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba bzhugs so 'di dbang ma thob pa sogs su rung la mi ston pa'i bka' rgya dam po mdzod mdzod sa m'a ya rgya rgya rgya"</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@011b (ces pa 'di ni ^ sh'akya'i btsun pa aa mo gha siddhi badzra gyis dang dgon gyi bstan @012a * rgyun la phan pa byung ngam snyam bsam pas ^ snang ba mtha' yas pan chen thams cad mkhyen gzigs chen po rje btsun blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes dpal bzang po'i stsal ba'i nang sgrub gyi gtor chen de nyid gzhir bzung rgyal dbang bdun pa bskal bzang rgya mtsho'i stsal ba'i gtor chen gyi cho ga mkha' 'gro'i zhal lung dang dam pa gzhan mang po'i legs par bshad pas kyang brgyan te rang bzos ma slad par yid brtan du rung ba'i tshul du chu stag lo hor zla bdun pa'i yar tshes bzang por sbyar ba'o 'di dpar ma thob pa sogs snod min rnams kyi mthong thos kyi yul du mi gtong bar bka' rgya dam po mdzod cig  sa m'a ya rgya rgya</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5660</vol>
<tib>khams gsum bdud 'dul sprin ring rgyal po'i bsangs mchod mdor bsdus</tib>
<p>1a-2a</p>

<tib>blo rigs kyi sdom tshig blang dor gsal ba'i me long zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@006a * (smras pa blo gros zhib mos blang dor gyi blo yi spu ris 'byed pa'i phyir blo rigs sdom tshigs mdor bsdus 'di blo bzang ming can zhig gis bkod 'dir 'bad dge bas 'gro ba kun legs nyes lta ba'i mig phye nas mnor lam bzang mthar phyin te kun mkhyen go 'phang myur thob shog  aom swa sti yongs 'dzin mkhas dbang dbyangs can dga' blo yi gsung 'di kun dga' chos gling grwa tshang du dge bsgo dge bshes blo bzang rdo rje yis par du bsgrubs dges rgyal bstan rgyas par shog sarba dza ga tam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5665</vol>
<tib>'phreng ba dang kri ya sbrag pa'i dkyil 'khor zhe lnga'i dbang bskur tshul gyi cho ga bzhugs so"</tib>
<p>1a-102b</p>
<col>@101b ces rdor 'phreng nas bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor zhe gnyis kri ya nas bshad pa'i dge legs su byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum ste dkyil 'khor zhe lnga'i ngas bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i ngag 'don gyi cho ga sgrigs blo gsal mgul rgyan nor bu'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mkhyen rab 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang gnyis su med cing brtse ba 'jig rten dbang phyug dang dbyer med pa'i dpal ldan bla ma dam pa 'jam mgon bla ma khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po'i rgyal tshab zhe bzhi pa khri rin po che ngag dbang blo gros rgya mtsho dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis 'phreng ba'i dbang bskur gcig dang sngags rim sor bzhag pa'i yig cha gcig byed ae thub ltos zhes bka'i gnang ba thob cing chos sde chen po dge 'dun lung du 'phreng ba'i dbang bskur skabs chos sde'i khri rin po che dang gzhi byas kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'ga' zhig gis bskul ba dang phyis su mdo sngags yongs su rdzogs pa'i bstan pa'i gsal byed mkhas pa'i dbang po bstan 'gro'i don la gcig tu gzhol ba'i nges pa @102a * don gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bde chen chos gling gi khri rin po che grags pa rgyal mtshan mdo sngags kyi gzhung lugs rgya mtsho lta bu la thos bsam bsgom pa mthar phyin pa'i yongs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po dza ya pandi ta blo bzang 'phrin las sde snod gsum dang rgyud sde bzhi'i thos pa'i nor gyis phyugs cing sdom pa gsum gyi bcas 'tshams las mi 'da' bar bstan 'gro'i don khur du khyer ba'i rgyal mkhan po rnam rgyal aer rde ni no mon han mtshan gzhan blo bzang tshul khrims phyogs las rnam rgyal gso ba rig pa dang nang don rig pa la sbyangs pa'i ming man zhing bstan 'gro'i don la lhag bsam che ba'i rab 'byams smra ba ngag dbang bstan 'dzin aer dhi ni no mon hang sde snod gsum la sbyangs pa che zhing mdo sngags kyi lung man ngag gis phyugs pa'i bka' 'gyur ba do lon nor gyi d'a bla ma blo bzang tshul khrims sogs kyis bskul ba ltar ban rgan snyom las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang po 'jam dbyangs gong ma'i lung gis kon ting phu'u shan bkwang tshi t'a koo shri ming gzhan lcang skya hu thog thur 'bod pas rnal 'byor rdzogs 'phreng dkyil chog rdo rje 'phreng ba kri ya munydza rje bdag nyid chen po'i gang sngags lam rim rnams la gzhi byas sa bzang 'phags pa dang pan chen thang rtse ba gnyis kyis mdzad pa'i 'phreng ba dang kri ya sbrags ma'i sgrub kyi la pan chen bzang bkras pas mdzad pa'i 'phreng ba gnyis kyi lhan 'thabs 'phags sde lo tstsha ba chab mdo'i mkhan chen rje drung dge 'dun bkra shis kyis mdzad pa'i 'phrengba dang kri ya sbrags ma'i sgrub dkyil pan chen thams cad @102b mkhyen pa'i rdzogs 'phreng gi lhandkon mchog rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i dbang chog gi ngag 'don skyid shod zhabs drung gis mdzad pa'i 'phrengba dang kri ya sbrags ma'i sgrub dkyil rnams kyis legs chas brgyan te 'khyer bde bar sbyar pa'i yi ge pa ni gzhung lugs rab 'byams la sbyangs pa mi dman zhing bslab gsum sde snod 'dzin pa'i rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang nyi ma'o 'dis kyang rgyal bstan spyi dang khyad par rgyal ba gnyis pa 'jam dpal snying po'i bstan pa rin po che dri ma med pa 'di nyid phyogs dus thams cad dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig    "</col>
</item>

<col>@004a * ces rtsa ba'i bla ma dang 'jam dpal @004b dbyangs zung 'brel gyi bla ma'i rnal 'byor 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes rang gi gam du nye bar 'khod de gang ci'i bya ba la brtson pa lhur len pa'i lhag bsam dge ba can mdo sngags kyi gzhung lugs la sbyangs pas spob pa mi dman zhing rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dka' bcu shes rab dar rgyas kyis bskul ba'i ngor ban rgan gyi na pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis sbyar ba'o yi ge pa ni gzhung lugs rab 'byams la spobs pa yangs pa'i rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang nyi ma'o 'dis kyang rang gzhan thams cad tshe rabs kun tu mtshan ldan bla mas rjes su 'dzin pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig  mangga lam bha wantu</col>

<item>

<vol>5666</vol>
<tib>tshogs mchod kun bzang mchod sprin</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@009a * ces dpal bde mchog gi sgo nas tshogs mchod bya tshul kun bzang mchod sprin zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba aer rde ni no min han zhes bgyi bas snga mo nas yang dang yang du bskul ba sems lnga chang zhing nye lam rang gi zla bo sdom brtson rnam dpyod dang ldan pa ka bcu ngag dbang chos ldan zhes bgyi bas bde mchog gi bsnyen 'tshams byed skabs 'jug tu tshogs mchod byed tshul cig dgos zhes bskul ba la brten nas ban rgan snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang po zhes bgyi bas tshogs mchod byed tshul snga ma cung zad rgyas pa de rdo rje 'chang sngags ram pa dge 'dun bkra shis kyis rdo rje 'phreng ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la tshogs mchod bya tshul mdor bsdus shig bkod pa ltar dang rjes ma shin tu bsdus pa de rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa lnga pa don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te mkhan rin po che ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i tshogs mchod 'dod dgu'i mchod sbyin ltar la 'jam dbyangs sa skya pandi tas mdzad pa'i tshogs 'khor las kyang cung zad kha bskang te zung gru zi zhes pa'i lha khang chen mor sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson chos la 'dun pa'i ka bcu ngag dbang chos 'byor ro 'dis kyang rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  dge'o "</col>

<item>

</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5667</vol>
<tib>dmags zor ma phyag bzhi pa rnam sras gsum gyi gtor 'bul ni"</tib>

<col>@003a * (ces pa 'di ni dmag zor rgyal mo mgon po phyag bzhi pa rgyal chen rnam sras gsum la mchod gtor 'bul tshul 'khyer bde ba zhig gyis zhes cing gir gnam gyi rigs las su ju mi se chen ching dbang tshe brtan don 'grub kyi lus chen rigs rus phun sum tshogs shing rnam dkar gyis bsam sbyor ma gtab zab mo dang mtshungs pa'i dpon mo ngag dbang bsod nams kyis bskul ba'i ngor snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis 'jam dbyang gong ma'i rgyal khab kyi bod chos lha khang du grags par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang nyi ma'o mangga lam)"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5667</vol>
<tib>dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bla rgyud gsol 'debs byin rlabs char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p></p>
<col>@004b (ces dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bla rgyud gsol 'debs byin rlabs char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni chos sde chen po dgon klung byams pa gling gi rgyud pa'i grwa ba spyi mang gis 'dus pa'i bla rgyud gsol 'debs shu lo ka re rer bla ma gsum re'i mtshan thon pa zhig gyis zhes bskul ba la brten nas ban rgan snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos ding sang rang cag la dbang rgyun bshad rgyun man ngag gi rgyun gsum ka gang las brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams kyi gsol 'debs smon lam dang bcas pa sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong bstan 'dzin chos dar ro bkra shis</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5667</vol>
<tib>dpal mgon zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa dur khrod bdag po gsum gyi gtor 'bul dang gzhi bdag gi gtor 'bul 'tshams tho bskyed chog dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003a * ces dpal mgon zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa dur khrod bdag po gsum gtor 'bul bde mchog gi bsnyen 'tshams sogs byed pa'i tshe 'khyer bde ba dang gzhi bdag gi gtor 'bul 'tshams sogs gang gi skabs su yang byas chog pa dang 'tshams tho skyed chog dang mchod gtor 'bul tshul 'tshams gang byed 'khyer bde bar bkod pa 'di ni dka' bcu @003b ngag dbang chos ldan sogs don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis bskul ba'i ngor ban rgan snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyi zung gru zi'l lha khang chen mor sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge tshul blo bzang tshe ring ngo mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>gcod kyi man ngag</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * ces pa 'di ni gyi na pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis gyi nar bris pa dge  shu bham ha "</col>

<tib>ma ni ril bsgrub kyi cho ga 'khyer bde bzhugs s+ho "</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5667</vol>
<tib>mnyam med dga' ldan pa'i snyan brgyud thun mong ma yin pa'i tshe khrid kyi bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs 'chi med mchog sbyin zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-2a</p>
<col>@002a * ces mnyam med dga' ldan pa'i snyan brgyud thun mong ma yin pa'i tsho khrid kyi bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs 'chi med mchog sbyin zhes bya ba 'di ni dad pa dang gtong ba'i rgyan gyis mdzes pa'i har chin byams pa bkra shis kung gis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba ltar ban chung gyi na pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos 'jam dbyangs gong ma'i rgyal khab chen po pe'i cing gi bod chos lha khang du grags par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gsung rab la lta ba'i rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge tshul bstan 'dzin no  'dis kyang rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5667</vol>
<tib>rab gnas bkra shis snye ma'i lhan thabs</tib>
<p>1a-14a</p>
<col>@014a * ces pa 'di ni yi dam rdo rje 'jigs byed la brten nas bkra shis snye ma ltar rab gnas 'bring po byed tshul ngag 'don dang phyag len byed tshul 'dul 'dzin pa'i rab gnas kyi yig cha che chung gnyis nas kha bskang ste rang dang skal pa mnyam pa dag la phan pa'i phyir gyi na pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis bkod pa ste dgag bzhag sogs rgyas par gzhan du 'chang 'dod pas 'dir ma spros shing rab gnas byed pa mchod yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs rlab po che sog pa'i don du yin pas bla ma dang yon bdag gnyis ka'i ngos nas byas lo tsam ma yin par bsod nams sog pa'i thabs su 'gyur pa cig bya 'tshal lo zhes gsol ba 'debs so  'dis kyang bstan pa dang sems can la phan par gyur cig bkra shis dge legs 'phel bar gyur cig  "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5667</vol>
<tib>rab gnas dge legs rgya mtsho'i char 'bebs kyi zur 'debs zhes bya ba bzhugs so legs so "</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * ces rab gnas dge legs rgya mtsho'i char 'bebs zhes bya ba'i zur 'debs 'di ni 'jam dbyangs mi'i tshul 'dzin gong ma chen po nyid gyis thig tshad dang ljags bkod mdzad nas bzhengs pa'i rje btsun 'jam dbyangs thugs rje chen po kun tu bzang po gsum gyi sku brnyan ye shes pa dngos su byon pa lta bu'i khyad mtshar mthong bas yid 'phrog gong ma chen po khang shi khrir bzhugs nas dgung lo so dgu pa lcags 'brug zla 7 tshes 12 la rab gnas bgyid skabs pho brang shar gyi ja sag bla ma phun tshogs rgya mtsho dang rang gi zla bo don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis gzhung rang na rdzas dang yo byad phyag len thams cad mchan bu dang sdom tshig gis gsal bar mdzad snang na'ang 'don cha'i cho ga dang sbel mar song shing kha 'thor ba lta bus blo dman rnams kyis go dka' bar 'dug pas thams cad phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa 'di lta bu zhig gyis zhes bskul ba ltar gyi na pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan ming gzhan lcang skya hu thog thur 'bod pas 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi gnas mchog ri bo rtse lnga'i tha'i lo zi zhes pa'i gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni smon lam rin chen no 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar zhing sems can la bde skyid 'phel bar gyur cig  bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling brgyan du byon "</col>
</item>

<vol>5667</vol>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5667</vol>
<tib>sems dpa' chen po glang ri thang pa rdo rje seng ges mdzad pa'i byang chub sems sbyong gi gdams pa tshig brgyad mar grags pa'i khrid yig theg chen dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9b</p>
<col>@009a * de ltar byang chub sems sbyong gi gdams pa zab mo tshig brgyad ma'i 'grel ba nyams len dang sbyar ba shin tu gsal ba bkod pa 'di 'di snang chos brgyad rnam g-yeng gi khol bor gyur pa'i gyi na pa blo bzang chos ldan ming can gyis pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa'i sras grub mchog chos 'phel mtshan can las gdams pa'i khrid rgyun legs mnos shing nyid kyis brjed byang mdzad pa yi zin bris mdor bsdus yig chung dang sems dpa' chen por sgreng bas mdzad pa'i 'di yi rnam bshad dang rgyal sras chen po zhi ba lha'i spyod 'jug rnams la blo chung gis  dpyad de rang gis go tshod tsam rang nyid bag chags 'jog pa dang skal mnyam gzhan la'ang phan 'dod kyi bsam pas kun gyis go bde bar gnas mchog 'jam dbyangs gong ma che khang shis rgyal bstan spel ba'i slad @009b mtsho bdun mchod yon bkram pa'i sar gsar bzhengs lha khang chen mor sbyar yi ge pa ni thub pa yi gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba la rnam dpyod yangs pa'i spobs pa can sdom brtson blo bzang nyi ma'o 'di mtshon dge ba ji snyed pa 'gro kun byang chub sems ldan zhing blo bzang rgyal ba'i dbang po yi bstan pa dar zhing rgyas phyir bsngo dge'o"</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5667</vol>

<tib>grub pa'i dbang phyug chos nyid rang grol nas brgyud pa'i mkha' 'gro snyan brgyud lugs kyi khros ma nag mo lha lnga'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg</tib>

<col>@022a * ces ma cig khros ma nag mo'i zhi pa'i sbyin bsreg bya tshul ye shes me 'od ces bya ba 'di ni gnyan khrod pa ngag dbang phun tshogs kyis mdzad pa'i khros ma nag mo'i sbyin bsreg rab dkar bdud rtsi bum bzang dang gnyan khrod pa bsam 'phel ming can gyis mdzad pa'i ma cig khros ma nag mo'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg ye shes me 'od dang gnyan khrod pa dge slong bi tyas mdzad pa'i khros nag lha lnga'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg shes rab rgya mtsho'i mdzad pa khros nag lha lnga'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg dam tshig rdo rjes mdzad pa'i bunte shr'i'i lugs kyi khros nag lha lnga'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg tsha khar dge bshes blo bzang tshul khrims kyi 'jigs byed dba' bo gcig pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg sogs kyis gzhir byas nas gcig la mi gsal ba rnams cig shos la kha skang te gungs bsgrigs nas sangs rgyas dngos 'dra'i bshes gnyen mang po'i drung nas sbyin bsreg gi khrid lan gnyis thob cing dam pa de rnams kyi zhabs rdul spyi bos reg pa skal ba cung zad thob pas rgyal khams nyul ba'i gnas bskor ba ^ dzny'a na pra ni dh'a nas zin bris su bgyis pa 'di la dbang ma thob pa dang dam tshig gi sel ba can rnams lhas na bka' bsrung mkha' 'gro'i bka' chad 'ong ba yod pas su rung rung la ma ston legs so "</col>

<item>

<tib>ma cig khros ma lha lnga'i dkyil 'khor du bdag nyid 'jug cing dbang blang ba'i cho ga byin rlabs bdud rtsi'i dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
