<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5668</vol>
<tib>sgra pa shes rab rin chen pa'i rtsod lan lung rigs seng ge'i nga ro zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-36a</p>
<col>@035b ces sgra pa shes rab rin chen pa'i rtsod lan lung rigs seng ge'i nga ro zhes bya ba 'di yang chos grwa chen po'i slob dpon rnam pa sogs bstan pa'i rtsa lag sde snod 'dzin pa 'chad? nyan gyi go sar bzhugs pa mang po dang khyad par mdo sngags rab 'byams skang gnyis smra ba ngam ring mkhan chen tshe brtan rgyal mtshan gyis yang yang bskul ba la brten nas sh'akya'i dge slong rigs pa smra ba blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po'i gtsug lag khang du g-yar khral du 'tshal ba'i yi ge pa ni bslab gsum sde snod 'dzin pa'i dka' bcu pa snying stobs rgya mtsho dang slad nas mtshams rnams su lung rigs 'ga' zhig 'jug pa sogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod phun sum tshogs pa'i sh'akya'i dge tshul rje drung blo bzang dbang rgyal lo 'di la brten nas kyang bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig hi ta su kha shts'a ka ra buddha de sha bista ra bha ga   @036a * aom ye dharm'a he tu pra bha w'a he tunte sh'anta th'a ga to hya wa dat te sh'anytsa yo ni ro dha ae wam b'a d'i mah'a shra ma na: sw'a h'a "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5668</vol>
<tib>slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis mdzad pa'i dbang bsdud kyi man ngag lag tu blang bde bkod pa yid bzhin 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5b</p>
<col>@005a * ces pa 'di yang byang phyogs bstan pa'i bdag po skyabs mgon mchog gi sprul sku'i gam bcar ba mkhyen dpyod phul du phyin pa bla sman mkhan po lags nas gsung ba'i thugs bzhed bskong ba'i slad du mkhas grub dam pa rnams kyi zhabs rdul brten pa'i @005b btsun gzugs ngag gi dbang pos mus lor lag myong byed tshul ltar ri mo'i lam du spel ba 'dis kyang bstan dang 'gro ba yongs la phan thogs pa dang gang de'i bzhed don lhun gyis 'grub pa'i rgyur gyur cig dza ga tam"</col>
</item>

<item>

<col>@004a * (ces dpal ye shes kyi mgon po phyag drug pa'i rgyun bsnyen byed tshul mdor bsdus klag chog tu sgrigs pa 'di ni @004b bla ma mgon po 'di la rgyun par mi phyed pa'i dad rtse gcig dang ldan pa lha ldang phyag nang zhal ngo bsod tshe lag nas bla ma mgon po 'di la rgyun par chags med kyi bzlas bsgom byed tshul zhig bris zhes bskul ma byung ba ltar mkhas grub chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i mgon po 'di'i las gsum rnam bzhag tu gtor ma dang ma 'brel ba'i rgyun bsnyen byed tshul gsungs pa la tshig gi 'bru bsnon gyi thog gtor 'bul sogs nyams len bde ched du la bskong ste dad pa mkhan po thugs rje'i ming can nas ser smad khri 'dzin dus ssug bris su bgyis pa'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5673</vol>
<tib>dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dbang chog ngag 'don gyi rim pa go bde ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-26a</p>
<col>@026a * bla ma dang gtso bo tha mi dad pa'i zhabs drung du dbang bzhi rdzogs par thob pa'i bka' drin gtang rag gi yon du mandal 'bul bar zhu dpal gsang 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dchog dag 'do gyi drim par bsgring par 'di yang dpal ldan 'dus pa'i lam la nyams len mdzad pa'i sde che chung thams cad kyi 'don pa dang mthun pa zhus dag rgyas par byas shing slar yang dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mig lam du phab nas dag par bgyis pa'o dge'o legs s+ho mangga lam bkra shis par gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<tib>bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po'i rnam par thar pa la bstod pa bdud dpung phye mar 'thag pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@011a * ces bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po'i rnam par thar pa la bstod pa bdud dpung phye mar 'thag pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rgya cher rol pa'i mdo'i rjes su 'brangs te sh'akya'i dge slong dge 'dun grub pa dpal bzang pos byang chub chen po'i dben gnas theg chen pho brang du sbyar ba'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5676</vol>
<tib>bla ma dang rje btsun sgrol ma dbyer med du gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul lam gyi gnad tshang ba'i smon tshig dang bcas pa bzhugs "</tib>
<p>6a-8b</p>
<col>@008b ces pa 'di ni dad ldan pad tshal drung yig bsod nams rab brtan gyis bla ma dang rje btsun sgrol ma dbyer med du byas te gdung shugs drag pos gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul lam gyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon tshig dang bcas pa zhig dgos zhes nan chen pos bskul ba la brten nas dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bkra shis bsam gtan gling du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang 'gro kun bshes gnyen dam pas rjes su 'dzin par gyur cig "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5677</vol>
<tib>byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i t'ikka rin po che'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-261a</p>
<col>@260a * ces byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i tikka rin po che'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba 'di ni bka' bod lnga'i gzhung la sbyangs pa chos rje dang sgrub pa snying por mdzad pa'i bshes gnyen bstan 'dzin rgya mtsho sgrub la gzhol ba'i dge slong blo bzang chos 'phel sogs don gnyer can du mas lha rdzas sogs kyi skyes dang bcas yang yang bskul ba la brten nas dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi rang gzugs skyabs mgon rdo rje 'chang don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te bdag gi mkhan rin po che ^rje btsun dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang po'i zhal nas rgya bod kyi blo sbyong thams cad kyi gtso bo dang snying por gyur ba ni spyod 'jug gi gzhung 'di nyid yin zhes yang yang gsungs pa thos pa'i rkyen gyis rje de nyid kyi sras kyi thu bo ^rje btsun dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron me dpal bzang po'i spyan sngar 'di'i tshig don la bshad pa zhus pa'i tshe rje rang nyid kyi phyag dpe ngos ma gnang ste gzhung tshig 'dzin thub na bzang zhes bka' bstsal ba dang klong rdol bla ma rin po che'i zhabs drung du 'di'i @260b ljags lung zhus dus zhal nas pan chen snang ba mtha' yas dpal ldan ye shes kyis gzhung yongs rdzogs dus rgyun zhal 'don mdzad cing bod kyi mkhas pa snga ma rnams kyis kyang gzhung yongs rdzogs sam ma mtha' bag yod lan gyi le'u bzhi dang bsngo ba'i le'u ste lnga zhal 'don du mdzad pa yin pas 'di tsam re'ang 'don thub na skal ba bzang po yin zhes gsungs pa bzhin 'di'i gzhung blo la bzung zhing rgyal sras rin po che skal bzang thub bstan 'jigs med rgya mtsho dang rje btsun bla ma bsod nams dbang rgyal gyi zhal snga nas las kyang lung gi byin rlabs thob pa rgyal mkhan po grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis rgyal tshab rin po che'i dar t'ika chen mo'i sa bcad cung zad bsdus tshig 'grel ji lta ba bzhin la lam rim chen mo dang blo sbyong chen mo nas cung zad kha bskangs te rma klung dal gyis 'bab pa'i nye 'gram lha gnyan sku bla'i ri zhol dga' ldan rab rgyas gling du sbyar'i yi ge pa ni bskul ba po dge slong chos 'phel lo "</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib># rgyal ba byams mgon gyi dang po thugs bskyed pa nas bzung lam rim par bgrod de mngor par byang chub pa'i tshul las brtsams shing ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgyas lnga pa'i mdzad pa ji ltar stong tshul gsal bar brjod pa'i sgo nas bstod cing gsol ba 'debs pa'i rab tu 'byed pa byams mgon zhal bzang lta ba'i dga' ston zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5679</vol>
<tib>rnam 'dren bskal bzang sangs rgyas stong gi mchod chog phan bde'i dngos grub stsol ba'i 'dod 'jo'i bum bzang zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-78a</p>
<col>@077a * (ces bskal bzang rnam 'dren stong gi mchod chog phan bde'i dngos grub stsol ba'i 'dod 'jo'i bum bzang zhes bya ba 'di ni tshad ldan dam pa god ma rnams kyi gsung las btus te rang gzhan gyi tshogs gnyis rlabs che rdzogs phyir gong ma chen po'i bka'i lung gis bstan pa'i rtsa lag phul byung @077b thugs rjes kun tu khyab pa chab srid chen po'i bla ma lcang skya ho thug thur 'bod pa btsun pa ye shes bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis srid gsal khrir bzhugs bcu gsum pa chu sprul lo'i cho 'phrul zla ba'i yar tshes dge bar zung cu zi'i rang shag dam chos lhun gyis grub pa'i dga' tshal du rdzogs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni las smon dge bas nyer gnas ku shri blo bzang rdo rje dang dge slong blo bzang bstan 'dzin gnyis kyis bris pa'i dge bas rgyal bstan rin po che yun ring du gnas shing 'gro kun rdzogs ldan gsar ba'i dga' ston la longs spyod pa'i rgyur gyur cig</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5679</vol>
<tib>theg chen gso sbyong ji ltar bsrung tshul sogs gsal bar bkod pa sdom brtson rna rgyan zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-16a</p>
<col>@016a * ces theg chen gso sbyong ji ltar bsrung tshul sogs gsal bar bkod pa sdom brtson rgyan zhes bya ba 'di ni tshul 'di la mos shing rnam dpyod phul du byung ba'i ngag dbang shes rab kyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba ltar mang thos rigs smra'i gzugs brnyan ^sprang btsun ngag dbang dpal ldan gyis sug bris su bgyis pa 'dis kyang rang gzhan la phan thogs par gyur cig  mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5680</vol>
<tib># chos rgyal bdun gyi bstod pa ni "</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@004b (ces byang phyogs shambha la'i yul gyi rigs ldan rnams la bstod cing gsol ba 'debs pa'i rab tu phye ba dngos grub rnam par 'byung ba'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 'di ni pan chen phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dpal ldan dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas khyab bdag 'khor lo'i mgon po rje btsun blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas thugs brtse ba chen po'i sgo nas dgyes bzhin du stsal ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5680</vol>
<tib># chos rgyal bdun gyi bstod pa ni "</tib>
<p>3b-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (zhes chos rgyal rigs ldan bdun gyi bstod pa 'di ni dus 'khor chog grwa ba bka' chen ye shes rnam rgyal gyis bskul ba ltar ^dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor pa ^sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5680</vol>
<tib># dus gsum rgyal ba'i spyi gzugs bka' drin gsum ldan gyi drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma rgyal sras rdo rje 'chang chen po'i 'khrungs rabs gsol 'debs smon tshig dang bcas pa ngo mtshar au dumba ra'i 'phreng mdzes ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (ces dus gsum rgyal ba'i spyi gzugs 'jam mgon bstan pa'i srog shing mtshungs zla ma mchis pa rigs dang dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag bka' drin gsum ldan gyi drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma rgyal sras rdo rje 'chang chen po bskal bzang thub bstan 'jigs med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i zhal mnga' nas kyi 'khrungs rab gsol 'debs smon tshig dang bcas pa ngo mtshar au dumba ra'i 'phreng mdzes ces bya ba 'di yang ^'jam dbyangs ^ gong ma chen po'i bka' yis bkur ba bstan pa'i gsal byed 'gro kun bde skyid kyis 'tsho ba rje btsun dam pa zhes bsngags pa 'jam dbyangs gzhon nu ngur smrig gar gyis rnam par rol ba byang phyogs 'gro ba'i 'dren pa chen po 'jam mgon bstan pa'i sgron me mtshungs zla ma mchis pa blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtsho'am mtshan gzhan blo bzang dge legs rab rgyas dpal bzang po nas 'di lta bu zhig gyis shig ces chab shog gi lam nas bka' stsal phebs pa gus pas nod de yengs su grags pa'i 'khrungs rab rnams kyi steng tshad thub kyi yig cha kha shes nas byung bas kyang kha bskang ste ^rgyal ba kun las lhag pa'i bka' drin dang thugs rje'i gter chen drin can bla ma mchog de'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len pa'i bka' sla ba'i tha shal stag phu'i sprul ming ^sh'akya'i dge slong rmongs rtul gyi na ba blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug tu 'bod pas rang gi bsam gtan gyi bsti gnas dge 'phel byang chub gling du gus pa chen pos sbyar ba 'dis kyang tshe rabs kun tu drin can bla ma mchog gis dgyes bzhin rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig dge'o</col>
</item>

<col>@003a * ces pa thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtsho'i 'khrungs rabs gsol 'debs brtan bzhugs dang bcas pa 'di yang 'jam dbyangs gong ma rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring pa gung tshe dbang nor bu sogs dang mtsho sngon dpon khag rnams kyis bskul ba la brten nas chos smra ba blo bzang ye shes kyis pho brang chen po po ta la'i gzims chung bde ba can du sbyar ba'o sarba mangga lam legs so "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5680</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bdag 'jug mdor bsdus sogs</tib>
<p>1a-46a</p>
<col>@045b (ces pes se bkra shis rgya mtsho dang zhabs drung blo bzang zla ba shu sh'i blo bzang dar ma bcas thun mong nas ngos dang dpal dus kyi 'khor lo 'byer ma mchis pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor rgyas pa'i yan lag tu thun mong ma yin pa'i lam mtha' dag rgyud la skye ba'i gsol 'debs dang bla ma'i mtshan sngags dang yi dam gyi snying po nye snying ga bzlas pa byas nas dbang len pa bla ma lhag pa'i lhas tshe rabs thams cad du bral ba med par rjes su bzung zhing lhag par rigs ldan drag po'i 'khor gyi thog mar skye ba'i smon tshig dang bzod gsol nyer bsdus shis brjod bcas 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba ltar ^sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan sbtan pa'i nyi ma phyogs las rnam rgyal dpal bzang pos gzims chung bka' gdams pho brang @046a * du sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5680</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i mdun bskyed sgrub cing mchod pa'i chog phyi rol mchod pa dang bcas pa</tib>
<p>1a-16a</p>
<col>@016a * (ces bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo'i mdun bskyed ji ltar sgrub pa'i chog ^pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa rje btsun blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i dus kyi 'khor lo'i sku gsung thugs yongs su rdzogs pa'i sgrubs thabs bsdus pa dang bstun pa'i mdun bskyed sgrub tshul 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes stobs dang rigs rus cho 'brang phun sum tshogs pas dpa' zhing dad gus gtong ba la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis mdzes pa'i mtsho sngon ching wang bsod nams rdo rje bskul ba la brten nas ^sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan bstan pa'i nyi ma phyogs las rnam rgyal dpal bzang pos gzims chung bka' gdams pho brang du sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5680</vol>

<col>@003a * (ces dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas dus kyi 'khor lo'i bshad pa dang dbang gi brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams kyi gsol 'debs 'di ni aa ri lugs san air te ni no mong han ngag dbang lhun grub dar rgyas kyis bskul ba'i ngor ^sh'akya'i dge slong rig pa 'dzin pa blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bum bskyed kyi cho ga</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>
<col>@004a * (ces dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bum bskyed sgrub tshul gyi cho ga 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes stobs dang rigs rus cho brang phun sum tshogs pas dpa' zhing dad gus gtong ba la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis mdzes pa'i mtsho sngon ching wang bsod nams rdo rjes bskul ba la brten nas ^sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan bstan pa'i nyi ma phyogs las rnam rgyal gyis gzims chung bka' gdams pho brang du sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5680</vol>
<tib>dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sku gsung thugs yongs rdzogs sgrub pa'i thabs dngos grub bdud rtsi'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-26a</p>
<col>@025b (ces dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sku gsung thugs yongs rdzogs bsgrubs pa'i thabs dngos grub pa bdud rtsi'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs rus cho 'brang phun sum tshogs pa'i stobs dang dad pa dang gtong ba sogs yon tan gyis phyug pa mtsho sngon jun dbang dkon mchog bkra shis kyis rang nyid bya ba dang phyogs de'i grwa rigs la'ang btsug chog pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ma mdzad par brten 'dzam gling mkhas pa'i gtsug rgyan dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas dur smrig gar gyis rnam par rol ba mkhas grub dge legs dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs pa dkar zhal lung dang slar yang mgon de gdul bya'i dpal du byon pa pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs bsdus pa sogs dam pa gong ma rnams kyi gsung la zhib par brtags ngos gtso bor khams gsum 'gro ba'i bla ma bka' drin gsum ldan rdo rje 'chang chen po dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad kyi spro bsdu'i gzhir gyur ba bdag cag kha ba ri ba'i 'dren mchog rje btsun blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtsho dpal bzang po'i zhal gyi bum bzang las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi sgrub thabs la gzhi byas te khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po shar tsong kha pa chen po legs @026a * par bshad pa dang mi 'gal bar khyab bdag 'khor lo'i mgon po bka' drin mtshungs med kun mkhyen rgyal dbang mchog gi drung du lugs 'di'i rngul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor chen por smin cing grol ba'i skal bzang thob pa'i sh'akya'i dge slong rje btsun blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes sam ming gzhan don yod rdo rje zhes 'bod pas shambha la'i yul du rigs ldan rgyal po rnam gnon chen po sa skyong chen po bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi ral ba'i cod pan la zhabs kyi sen mo rnam par bkod cing chos bstan nas khrir bzhugs kyi sgang lo so lnga pa sprul lo rgyal zla ba'i 'dul tshes nyer gnyis la rdzogs par bgyis pa'i yi ge pa ni dge tshul blo bzang rig grol lo aom swasti phan bde'i 'byung gnas rgyal bstan yongs 'du'i ljon rab rgyas 'gro kun thar mchog 'bras bzang la spyod phyir dge ldan phun tshogs gling zhes par chos sbyin 'dzad med dal 'gro'i rgyun 'di spel sarba manggha lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5681</vol>
<tib>legs bshad snying po'i gsung bshad zin bris su bkod pa kun mkhyen gsung gi chu rgyun dag byed mchod yon zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-36a</p>
<col>@035b ces legs bshad snying po'i gsung bshad zin bris su bkod pa kun mkhyen gsung gi chu rgyun dag byed mchod yon 'di ni bdag cag gi dpal ldan bla ma dam pa kun mkhyen chos kyi rgyal po mtshungs med yab rje ^mi bskyod dgyes bzhad rdo rje'i dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang po mi pham dbyangs can dga' ba'i sde'i zhal snga nas kyis rab byung bcu gsum pa'i chu stag gi lor rgyal bas lung bstan pa'i chos sde chen po dpal ldan bkra shis 'khyil gyi pho brang chen mor chos 'di'i bshad lung gi bka' drin stsal skabs gang gi bka' 'bangs tha shal ^dkon mchog rgyal mtshan gyis cha shas tsam zhig shog dril du byas nas ^rje nyid la gzigs pa phul bar mgo mjug @026a * tshad mar gzigs rtog dang zhus bdag gi bka' drin stsal te dgyes pa'i gsung gi gnang ba spyi bor phebs pa ltar slar yang shog dril phyi mor byas nas rang nyid kyis 'bad pa chen pos sug bris su dag par bgyis pa 'dis bstan 'gro la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig  slar yang sngon gyi zin tho dang bstun nas mchan bu btab ste mdo sngags chos kyi skyed tshal dga' ldan chos 'khor gling nas bar du bkod "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5681</vol>
<tib>yum don gsal ba'i sgron me'i rnam kun mngon rdzogs kyi sbyor ba'i skabs su mkho ba'i zur rgyan dpyid kyi me tog gsar ba'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-12a</p>
<col>@012a * ces pan chen bsod nams grags pa'i phyar phyir skabs bzhi ba'i spyi don yum don gsal ba'i sgron me'i zur brgyan dpyid kyi me tog gsar ba'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba 'di yang sa mthar skyes pa'i dge sbyong gyi gzugs brnyan can gyi dge slong su ma ti aa yu shes sbyar ba'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5681</vol>
<tib>` 'phrin las kyi rnam bzhag blo gsal 'jug ngogs rin chen them skas zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-42a</p>
<col>@041b ces 'phrin las kyi rnam bzhag blo gsal 'jug ngogs rin chen them skas zhes @042a * bya ba 'di ni rje btsun dam pa dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje'i gter chen por gyur ba mtshungs med bla ma 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rje'i gsung rab snga phyi phal cher la 'dris par byas zhing gsungs bsgres la gzhir byas te legs bshad don gnyer gyi blo gsang 'ga' zhig la phan ched dang rang nyid kyang bag chags bzhag pa'i phyir du sh'akya'i dge slong ngag dbang bkra shis kyis 'jam dbyangs bla ma'i gdams rigs grol gyi yon tan brkyang dang ldan pa'i mkhas grub mang po'i 'dug nas phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba dge ldan bshad sgrub dar rgyas bkra shis 'khyil ba'i gling nas sbyar ba 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa phyogs dus kun du dar zhing rgyas par byed nus par gyur cig mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5682</vol>
<tib>bde mchog bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgya cher bshad pa sbas pa'i don kun gsal ba zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-254a</p>
<col>@253b ces dpal 'khor lo bde mchog nyung ngu'i rtsa rgyud kyi rgya cher bshad pa sbas pa'i don kun gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mang du thos pa'i dge slong shar tsong kha pa blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis @254a * dpal bde mchog gi rtsa ba'i rgyud dang bshad pa'i rgyud dang cha mthun pa'i rgyud kun dang bde mchog gi skor spyi dang khyad par du lo dril nag gsum gyi gzhung kun dang bde mchog gi 'grel pa dum la ring du 'dris par byas pa'i mthar bde mchog gi bshad sgrub nyams pa gso ba'i don dang rang gi brjed byang du dmigs te 'brog ri bo che dga' ldan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dka' bzhi pa rin chen dpal lo sarba mangga lam swasti rgyal bstan bad tshal phan bde'i dri bsud can bshad sgrub 'dab rgyas rnam grol sbrang rtsi'i bcud 'gro kun spyod phyir dga' ldan theg chen gling chos sde che nas chos sbyin chang 'di spel "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5683</vol>
<tib>dus 'khor bskyed rim bshad lung gi brjed tho 'jam dpal gsung gi 'od zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-22b</p>
<col>@022b ces dus 'khor bskyed rim 'jam dpal zhal lung gi bshad pa'i brjed tho 'jam dpal gsung gi 'od zer zhes bya ba 'di yang gser 'phad zhes nga me bya zla 5 tshes 9 la gsang bdag zla ba bzang po gsum ldan ngur smrig 'dzin pa'i rnam par rol ba ^dang po'i sangs rgyas 'jam mgon sde khri rin po ches chos thun bzhir bstsal ba la sngar gzims khang brtse thog nas dri med 'od 'grel rkyang gi bshad lung gnang ba'i skabs kyi gsung bshad yid la dran pa re gnyis kyis zur brgyan te dge slong shes rab rgya mtshos rang nyid lam bzang 'di dang mi 'bral ba'i smon lam gyi sten du bris pa'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5683</vol>
<tib>'dus pa'i rtsa rgyud kyi gleng gzhi sbas bshad kyi yi ge bzhi bcu'i gsal byed rdo rje'i lam gyi sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col></col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5683</vol>
<tib>'jam dpal dus dgra'i dbang po ma he'i gdong can bcu gsum lha'i 'khor lo'i rim pa dang po'i zab khrid zin bris 'jigs mdzad rdo rje'i zhal lung zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-75a</p>
<col>@075a * ces 'jam dpal dus dgra'i dbang po ma he'i gdong can bcu gsum lha'i 'khor lo'i rim pa dang po'i zab khrid zin bris 'jigs mdzad rdo rje'i zhal lung zhes bya ba 'di yang sangs rgyas kun 'dus kyi ngo bo kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rje ^rje btsun blo bzang thub bstan 'jigs med rgya mtsho yab sras kyi zhabs pad gtsug gis mchod pa'i bka' drin las lam 'di'i smin byed kyi dbang gro byed rim gnyis kyi khrid rgyab brten kyi lung rgyud kyi bshad pa las tshogs dang bcas man ngag gi bdud rtsi tshim par myang ba dge slong shes rab rgya mtshos rang gi brjed byang dang don du gnyer ba du mas yang yang bskul ngor bris pa bla ma yi dam dka' sdod bsrung ma'i tshogs kyis bzod par mdzad du gsol ce'us</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5683</vol>
<tib>'jam dpal rdo rje bcu gsum lha'i 'khor lo'i rdzogs rim rnal 'byor bzhi'i khrid kyi brjed byad 'jigs mdzad zhal gyi bdud rtsi zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-27a</p>
<col>@027a * (ces 'jam dpal rdo rje bcu gsum lha'i 'khor lo'i rdzogs rim rnal 'byor bzhi'i khrid kyi brjed byang 'jigs mdzad zhal gyi bdud rtsi zhes bya ba 'di yang mdo sngags kyi gsung rab mtha' dag la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa brnyes nas gcig tu rgyal bstan spel ba'i khur 'khyer bas mi ngal zhing snyan rgyud gdams pa'i bang mdzod 'dzin pa smra ba'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'chang dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i bka' drin las 'di'i rgyud dang bskyed rdzogs chen mo'i bshad lung lam rim gnyis kyi dmar khrid bcas yang yang mnos pa dge slong shes rab rgya mtshos tho tsam brjed byang du byas pa bla ma mchog dang bka' sdod bsrung ma'i tshogs kyis bzod par mdzad nas dgyes pa'i gar gyis phyi nang gsang ba'i bdud sde'i ga-yul las rgyal bar mdzad du gsol</col>
</item>

<vol>5695</vol>
<tib>gnyan khrod yig chung gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11a</p>
<col>@010b (zhes mkha' 'gro'i snyan brgyud kyi gnyan khrod 'gro bas zhal shes yig chung 'di yang mkhas grub byams pa karma dar rgyas kyi gsungs las ji ltar 'byung ba bzhin gang zag blo rmongs shing shes rab chung la rang dang skal ba mnyam pa rnams kyi don du chos med dge slong byams pa lha dbang rigs 'dzin gyis bkod pa'o blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis snyan brgyud zhal gdams chen po ma rig mun sel yi ge dag min dang lag len la nor 'khrul byung ba mang po dang 'di la 'gro lugs rnam gsum dang 'gro tshul bzhi sogs yang ma gsal mjug chos sbyin bskor sogs gtong mi bde ba la brten snga mo rang nas chu mig la 'gro mkhan tshos gnyan khrod 'gro ba'i yig chung 'di kha gsal ba zhig mi 'dug pas bzo bcos byed rog zer mkhan mang po byung ba ma zad nye char ri chos byang 'dren pa ngag dbang rab 'byor dge slong bstan pa'i nyi ma dge slong byams pa bsod nams bcas nas bskul ba'i ngor lo chung dus nas chos 'di la shin tu mos pa'i chu mig pa ngag dbang dge legs dpal bzang nas 'dzin byed lo'i hor zla lnga pa'i dmar phyogs kyi dga' ba gnyis pa'i nyin byed gza' lhag pa skar ma khrum stod 'phrod chen 'dod bya sbyor ba tshe ldan dbyangs aa yig 'char ba'i nyin bcom ldan 'khor lo sdom pa lha lnga'i gnas ae ka ljongs bsam gtan gling nas spel ba'i yi ge pa ni gnyal zangs chen sprul sku ngag dbang bsod nams bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan gyis bris pa'o swasti rnam 'dren rgyal kun yum chen sher phyin ma'i yongs don ma yig mkha' 'gro'i thungs kyi bcud bdag 'dzin nad kun sel ba'i sman mchog dang kun mkhyen sgo 'phar 'byed pa'i thabs mkhas de dad stobs tser son mdzod pa ngag tshul dang dge slong ngag dbang phan bde spar las mkhan lha rgyal kyis mtshon bcu phran zung ldan gyis dad btson dngos pos spar gyi 'du byed skrun 'dis mtshon dge tshogs rab dkar bcu drug cha rnam mdas bstan 'gro'i mkha' la rab 'phags te rtag chad mtshan mtha'i smag rum ring bskrad cing don gnyis kun da bzhad pa'i rgyur gyur cig zhal gro</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5695</vol>
<tib>jo bo rje lha gcig lugs 'phags ma sgrol ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sgrub thabs dang rjes su gnang ba'i cho ga dngos grub kun stsol zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5695</vol>
<tib>nam mkha'i rnal 'byor gar gyi dbang po yi 'khrul rnang rol par shar ba'i rdzun chos las rje btsun seng ldeng nags sgrol sgrub pa'i thabs 'phrin las gnad ldan tsinta ma ni bzhugs  dam med log lta'i bang mdzod can dag la bstan par mi bya dam tshig rdo rje rgya "</tib>
<p>1a-33a</p>
<col>@032b ces dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi 'phrin las ma lus pa gcig tu bsdus pa'i lha mchog @033a * rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zab lam rim pa gnyis kyi rnal 'byor nyams su len tshul sogs 'phrin las rab 'byams kyi gnad kun mtshang ba med pa'i gdams pa'i snying khu citta ma ni zhes bya ba 'di yang dengs can lhan gcig rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen gzigs chen po'i sku'i zhabs 'bring pa gtsug lag lugs brgyar 'jug pa'i mkhyen spyan yangs shing dad stobs phul du byung ba 'dod 'jo'i dpal 'khyil gyi rgyun bzo'i do dam pa mkhan po lcang grong chos mdzad nas ga-yang ti'i bum pa dang suwarna'i phur ma srang gi 'khor lo gang bsogs dngos po'i skyes dang bcas 'di lta bu zhig ci nas kyang dgos zhes don gnyer chen pos bskul ma byung ba la brten nas lhag pa'i lha mchog rje btsun thugs rje'i gter chen la yang nas yang du gsol ba btab pa'i ngor gsung gi gnang ba ji ltar stsal ba la rang bzos slad pa med par ^sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug gam ming gzhan bskal bzang gar gyi dbang por 'bod pa'i rmongs brtul gyi na pa zhig gis rang gi bsti gnas pa 'brod dge 'phel byang chub gling du bkod pa 'dis kyang 'gro kun rje btsun sgrol mas dgyes bzhin rjes su 'dzin rgyur gyur cig  zin bris las thog mar 'bebs pa'i yi ge pa ni sngags ram pa ngag dbang bskal bzang gis bgyis pa'o sarba mangga lam dge legs 'phel "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5695</vol>
<tib>nam mkha'i rnal 'byor pad+ma shwa ra yi dag snang rol par shar ba'i zab chos las rje btsun seng ldeng nags sgrol la brten pa'i char 'bebs bya tshul bdud rtsi'i bum bzang bzhugs dam med log lta'i bang mdzod can dag la ston par mi bya dam tshig rdo rje'i rgya "</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@013a * (ces pa 'di yang rje btsun sgrol mas dgyes bzhin rjes su bzung ba ^sh'aya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug gam ming gzhan gar gyi dbang pos zil gnon zhes pa me rta cho 'phrul zla ba'i dmar phyogs kyi dga' ba dang po'i nyin rang gi bsam gtan gyi khang bu dge 'phel byang chub gling du grub par bgyis pa 'das kyang 'gro ba kun la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig  snod min log lta'i bang mdzod cang gyi spyod yul min pas bag yod par mdzod cig aom sti ma ti mi li mi li sw'ah'a sprin 'dus sngags nag ga ba ru shig 'bebs sngags sarba mangga lam</col>

<tib>bca' yig rnying pa gsal zhing gso bar byed pa'i nyi ma zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@006a * ces pa 'di ni srid skyong bar grags pa rnams kyi phyogs nas mkhan po no mong hang ted mkhan po sogs rang cag dka' bcu pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di ni ji ltar gces spras bya zhing legs par 'gyur ba khyed rnams kyis shes zhes bsgos pa dang du blangs pas bca' yig rnying pa gso bar byed na phan par 'gyur snyam du gros mthun byas nas dka' bcu'i ming skam 'dzin pa chos rgyal zhes bya bas rab byung bco lnga'i me pho stag lo la khu ri chen mor bris pa'o "</col>

<item>

<vol>5696</vol>
<tib>dben gnas bshad sgrub dge 'phel byang chub gling gi sbong ba rnams la khrims su bca' ba'i gser yig rje btsun chen po'i zhal lung zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5696</vol>
<tib>dka' bsrung chen po dam can rnam gsum gyi gtor chog 'phrin las sgrub byed dpa' bo'i nga ro'i zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-19a</p>
<col>@019a * (ces dam can rnam gsum gyi gtor chog 'phrin las sgrub byed dpa' bo'i nga ro zhes bya ba 'di ni ^gung thang 'jam pa'i dbyangs rje btsun dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron me'i gsung gi bdud rtsis 'tsho ba'i bya btang ba bstan bsrung nyid kyi stong grogs kyis brag phug tu mi tshe skyel ba dge slong blo bzang tshe dpag gi 'dod mos ltar ^mkhan po no mon han gyi ming 'dzin pa wa g'indra su ma ti pa tu siddhis bsgrigs pa yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod yangs pa shra ma n'a aamri ta sha sa na'o dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5696</vol>
<tib>dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro tshul gyi gdams pa zab mo snyan brgyud khyad par gsum ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-22b</p>
<col>@022b ces dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro tshul gyi gdams brgya cher bshad pa khyad par gsum ldan zhes bya ba 'di bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab dgongs 'grel dang bcas pa ji bzhin du 'byed pa la mkhas pa'i pandi ta chen po 'jam mgon bla ma blo bzang rgya mtsho'i zhal snga nas la sogs pa'i yongs 'dzin du ma'i zhabs kyi padmo spyi bos len pa yul gangs can gyi skyabs 'gro pa 'khon btsun dpal 'byor lhun grub kyis blo gsal zhing don du gnyer ba'i 'dun pa dang ldan pa ngag dbang chos rgyal gyis nan gyis bskul ba'i ngor rang dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir ri sko bkra shis chos rjod mi pham rnam par rgyal ba'i sde chen po bya lo hor zla lnga pa'i chos bzang po la sbyar ba 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>rgyal ba kun gyi mkhyen brtse nus gsum gyi bdag nyid rje btsun btsong kha pa chen po la dmigs brtse ma'i gsol 'debs dang 'brel ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor dga' ldan lha brgya ma'i 'khrid yig dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-16a</p>
<col>@015b (ces rgyal ba kun gyi mkhyen brtse nus gsum gyi bdag nyid rje btsun bla ma btsong kha pa chen po la dmigs brtse ma'i gsol 'debs dang 'brel ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor bya tshul dga' ldan lha brgya mar grags pa'i dmigs skor nyams su len tshul dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni mtshan brjod par dka' ba'i drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma khyab bdag rdo rjes sems mchog khri chen ngag dbang mchog ldan pa'i zhal snga nas kyis 'di'i 'khrid yig cig rtsoms shig pa bkas gnang ba dang bstan pa'i gsal byed dza ya pandi ta hu thog thus kyang bskul ma mdzad pa bcas rtsom 'dun gyi thog khal kha ga-yon ru thu shi ye gung rgyal mtshan gyi shog t'a bla ma ae rte ni dar han shi re ge thu blo bzang bsod nams dang nang so blo bzang brtson 'grus dka' bcu blo bzang chos dbang gsum gyis bla ma'i rnal 'byor 'di ga'i @016a * dmigs rim sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang ba'i kha gsal khyer bde ba zhig dgos tshul don gnyer chen pos bskul ba la brten nas 'di ga'i khrid yig grub mchog [???] 'jam dpal rgya mtshos mdzad pa la gzhi byas te rje bla ma'i bstan pa la shes nas dad pa thog pa'i sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos sug bris su bgyis pa 'dis 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan brgya chen po 'grub par gyur cig  mangga lam "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<col>@016b (ces rgyal ba kun gyi mkhyen brtse nus gsum gyi bdag nyid rje btsun bla ma btsong kha pa chen po la dmigs brtse ma'i gsol 'debs dang 'brel ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor bya tshul dga' ldan lha brgya mar grags pa'i dmigs skor nyams su len tshul dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni mtshan brjod par dka' ba'i drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma khyab bdag rdo rjes sems mchog khri chen ngag dbang mchog ldan pa'i zhal snga nas kyis 'di'i 'khrid yig cig rtsoms shig pa bkas gnang ba dang bstan pa'i gsal byed dza ya pandi ta hu thog thus kyang bskul ma mdzad pa bcas rtsom 'dun gyi thog khal kha ga-yon ru thu shi ye gung rgyal mtshan gyi shog t'a bla ma ae rte ni dar han shi re ge @017a * thu blo bzang bsod nams dang nang so blo bzang brtson 'grus dka' bcu blo bzang chos dbang gsum gyis bla ma'i rnal 'byor 'di ga'i @016a * dmigs rim sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang ba'i kha gsal khyer bde ba zhig dgos tshul don gnyer chen pos bskul ba la brten nas 'di ga'i khrid yig grub mchog 'jam dpal rgya mtshos mdzad pa la gzhi byas te rje bla ma'i bstan pa la shes nas dad pa thog pa'i sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos sug bris su bgyis pa 'dis 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan brgya chen po 'grub par gyur cig  mangga lam "</col>

<tib>rigs pa drug cu pa</tib>
<p>1a-5a</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5697</vol>
<tib>zab mo stong pa nyid kyi lta ba la log rtog 'gog par byed pa'i bstan bcos lta ba ngan pa'i mun sel zhes bya ba bshes gnyen chen po sh'akya mchog ldan dang go bo rab 'byams pa bsod nams seng ge pa rnam gnyis la gdams pa bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-278a</p>
<col>@277b ces zab mo stong pa nyd kyi lta ba la log rtog 'gog par byed pa'i bstan bcos lta ngan mun sel shes bya ba @278a * rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang dbyer med pa'i dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rje btsun chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i 'phro cung zad lus 'dug pa 'phros lus pa mi mdzes par 'dug pas lus khyod kyis gyis shig ces sa skyong mi'i dbang po rig gnas mtha' dag la mkhyen pa rgyas shing bsod nams chen po la mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos rgyal chen po bkra shis kyi mtshan can gyis bka' lung nan cher gnang ba dang sde snod 'dzin pa du mas kyas de ltar gyis shig ces gsungs pa rnams dang du blangs te dbu ma'i gzhung lugs mang du thos shing bla ma dam pa'i bka' drin las 'phags pa yab sras kyi lung bzang la dad pa thob pa'i sh'akya'i dge slong bde legs nyi mas 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gnas phang phong khar sbyar ba 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas pa dang 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig   khu re chen mo'i 'dul khrims gtsang brung yid dga' chos 'dzin gling drwa tshang gi par khang du bzhugs "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5699</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi chos skor las bla blu'i cho ga rin chen srog gi chad mthud zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@008b bla blu'i cho ga rin chen srog gi chad mthud zhes bya ba 'di bla 'gugs dgos pa 'ga' zhig gi skabs lag tu bza' btung gi rigs zhig thogs te ming nas khyi 'bod pa bzhin byed pa las` bya thabs gzhan mi shes pa mang po mthong bas rkyen byas te mdos gto glud kyi chog 'di rigs sde snod la spyangs pa'i dge bshes rnams 'gal rkyen med cing lto 'grangs nyi mdos pa'i skabs spangs bya dang nang gdon sogs kyis gtses dus blang byar mdzad pas spangs blang gang gi phyogs yin pa ma shes kyang rma khar phan na khyi tshil gyi dpe bzhin nye bar mkho ba'i skabs kyang srid snyam te btsun gzugs dharma badzra gyis yid dga' @009a * chos 'phel zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal du bris pa'o swasti tshul 'di dge slong thabs mkhas rgyas mtsho yis chos sde bde chen lhun grub gling mchog tu rgyu rkyen sbyar te dpar du bzhed sa ba'i dges 'gro kun bla med byang chen myur thob shog ces sh'a sa dha ras sug bris su bgyis pa'o mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5699</vol>

<col>@014b (ces bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i 'grol lam rdzogs pa chen po aa ti'i rnal 'byor zab mo'i khrid yig gsang lam @015a * gsal ba'i snang mchog ces bya ba 'di ni snga sor grub mchog bla ma mchog gi gsung las aa ti'i zab lam 'di rta mgrin gyi chos skor 'di la gal che zhing rtsa ba'i zin po yang che bar 'dug na'ang rtsa tshig tsam las nyams len gsal byed kyi yi ge zhig ma byung bar snang bas da res rigs mthun gyi 'khrid rgyun mang po 'dzom pa'i thog 'di nas 'khrid yig go bde ba zhig bris na legs tshul gyi bka' spyi bor lhung ba gsung ngo ma ldog par rim 'gyangs su lus pa las slar 'dren mchog dam pa de nydi kyi dgongs pa rdzogs pa dang gdams ngag gi rgyun mi nub pa la yang phan 'dod kyi bsam pas kun nas bslangs te chos skor 'di dag gi rdzogs rim gyi rtsa ba'i gzhung ye shes gsang lam du sa bon tsam gsungs pa la gzhi brten aa ti zab don snying po'i gter gzhung gis khog phubs tshad ldan gyi 'khrid yig gzhan dag las kyang cung zad kha bskangs rig 'dzin brgyud pa'i phyag bzhes gsung rgyun gyis kyang ci rigs par brgyan nas bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las chos tshul 'di dag gi zab 'khrid la sogs pa mang du thos pa'i sngags btsun ^sa ma ya badzra gyis sbyar ba 'dis kyang bstan pa dang sems can mang po la phan thogs par gyur cig </col>

<item>

<col>@023b ces bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i zab lam rdzogs rim kyi 'khrid yig @024a * shin tu gsal ba rnam grol lam bzang zhes bya ba 'di ni sngon chad lugs 'di'i grol lam nyams su len bde'i yig gsal khrigs su chags pa zhig kyang ma byung zhing ji ltar bsgom tshul gyi phyag bzhes man ngag gi rgyun yang nyag phu bar gyur bas 'khrid dpe rkang tshugs pa 'di lta bu zhig ma byung na zab lam 'di dag nub par 'phangs nas bla ma lha la gsol ba rtse gcig tu btab ste mnang ba nod par byas te tshul 'di dag la tshad mar gyur ba'i mkhas grub dam pa bla chen chos dpal bzang pos rim gnyis kyi khrid kyi sa bon zin thor mdzad pa la gzhi byasrigs mthun gyi gzhung gzhan nas kha 'gengs par 'os pa rnams rgyu mtshan khyad par can gyi nges pas gar dbang thugs rje chen po bde gshegs kun 'dus kyi rdzogs rim rdo rje gsum gyi rnal 'byor cha lag dang bcas pa las blangs te ci rigs su sbyar bla ma dam pa'i phyag bzhes zhal gdams kyis kyang legs par brgyan nas rang nyid kyi brjed byang dang skal mnyam 'ga' zhig la yang phan par bsam nas lam 'di la mos pas spyod pa'i btsun gzugs ^dam tshig rdo rjes sug bris su bgyis pa'o "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5761</vol>
<tib>khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa bzhugs "</tib>

<col>@006b khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa slob @007a * dpon mtho btsun grub rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dzny'a de wa dang zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur slad kyis ban de dpal brtsegs rakshi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5761</vol>
<tib>lam rim chen mo'i bshad lung gi brgyud 'debs ni"</tib>
<p>4b-5a</p>
<col>@005a * (zhes pa 'di ni bka' drin mtshungs med rje btsun bla ma byams pa'i mtshan can gyi gsan rgyun ltar dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bkra shis bsam gtan gling du sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>sman bla bsdus pa'i kha skong bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-4b</p>
<col>@004a * (ces pa 'di ni sa lug lo ^ri bo dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling la sogs pa'i chos sde che chung rnams su mdo cho ga yid bzhin dbang rgyal dang mdo cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhal 'don du 'jug skabs mdo cho ga bsdus pa'i kha skong du ^sh'akya'i rjes 'jug tha shal ^blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtshos bris nas par du bzhengs pa'i mthus snyigs dus kyi rgyud pa'i ming yang med par sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che rgyas par gyur cig sarba mangga lam )yangs pa'i rgyal khams 'dis mtshon mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi rgud pa kun zhi zhing chos dang 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa @004b yi  dpal la rtag tu rol pa'i bkra shis shog  'di rje btsun blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi gsung aom su pra ti shtha badzra sw'a h'a</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5761</vol>

<p>1a-13b</p>
<col>@013a * (zhes bcom ldan 'das sman bla'i mdo chog gi snying po bsdus pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu la nyams len bya ba la sbyor dngos rjes gsum du ji ltar bya ba'i tshul mkhan chen zhi ba 'tsho'i mdo chog dang bstun nas gsal bar bkod pa 'di ni rje btsun blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i thugs bskyed smon lam gyi mthus mdo chog gi snying po 'di la thugs dam byed pa mtha' dbus thams cad du khyab cing dar cha che yang sbyor ba'i skor rnams mdo chog la zhal 'phangs mdzad nas gsal bar ma mdzad pas blo gros dman pa dag gis ji ltar bya ba'i tshul mi shes pa mang du snang bas de dag la phan du re ba dang lhag par bkra shis bsam gtan gling du chu lug dbo zla ba'i tshes brgyad kyi nyin theg pa chen po'i gso sbyong gi sdom pa dang bcas sman bla'i mdo chog gi snying po 'di gsar du btsugs pa'i tshe @013b chog sgrigs khungs btsun 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes rang gi slob ma rnams kyis bskul ba la brten nas sman mdo brgyad brgya pa dang mkhan chen zhi ba 'tsho'i mdo chog dang mdo chog yid bzhin dbang rgyal rnams la zhib tu brtags shing rje btsun blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi dgongs pa dang mthun par byas te dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bkra shis bsam gtan gling du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang snyigs ma'i skye bo ngag la phan thogs par gyur cig  "</col>

<item>

<vol>5761</vol>
<tib>spar byang smon tshig ni"</tib>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5764</vol>
<tib>skyer sgang lugs kyi rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgrub thabs rgyas pa rta mchog rol pa'i zhal lung zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@017b (ces skyer sgang lugs kyi rta mgrin gsang grub kyi sgrub thabs rta mchog rol pa'i zhal lung zhes bya ba 'di ni lha 'di nyid kyi rjes gnang brgyud pa mi 'dra ba 'ga' dang sgrub thabs man ngag gi rim pa mang du thos pa'i btsun gzugs rig pa 'dzin pa'i tha shal ba dharma badzra gyis chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po'i bka' srol dang mthun par kun ldan gyi lo chu stod zla ba'i yar tshes bzang por  @018a * bha ta hor gyi yul grur thegs pa'i 'thul lam brdu lag gi gangs ri chen po'i lha zhol lha btsan mched gsum gyi gnas rdza dmar mandal zhes grags pa'i mdun sar ba cag mal bgyis pa'i sgang thog tu sbyar ba dge legs su gyur cig  dge'o</col>

<item>

<vol>5767</vol>
<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i 'khrid yig 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi zhal lung gi bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i 'grel pa gser gyi lde mig</tib>
<p>1a-14b</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5767</vol>
<tib>dpal jo bo chen po'i lugs kyi sgrol ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sgrub thabs man ngag dang bcas pa dngos grub 'dod dgu'i mchog sbyin zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-21a</p>
<col>@020b (ces dpal lha gcig jo bo chen po nas nye bar brgyud pa'i rje btsun sgrol ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sgrub thabs man ngag dang bcas pa dngos grub 'dod dgu'i mchog sbyin zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi slob ma don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis kyang bskul zhing tshul 'di nyid rang phyogs su byin rlabs kyi bka' babs gzhan las che zhing nyi bar mkho ba'i gad mas pa khyad par can zhig yin na'ang las tshogs kyi rigs mang tsam las 'phral tu dgos pa'i bsnyen sgrub mchod chog gi rim pa lag tu blang bde ba zhig mi snang bas rang gzhan mang po'i nyams len tu phan 'dod kyi bsam bas kyang kun nas bslangs te rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dge 'dun bkra shis kyi sgrub thabs dang pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa'i las tshogs sogs la gzhi byas bla ma dam pa'i phyag bzhes gsung rgyun gyis brgyan nas mkhas grub yongs 'dzin du ma'i bksd drin la brten nas lhag pa'i lha mo 'di nyid kyi chos skor mang du thos pa'i rgyal khams pa ^ dam tshig rdo rjes ri bo dge mtho'i na gas khrod bdud rtsi sman chu'i 'gram sdings su rgyal bas chos 'khor bskor ba'i dus chen gyi nyin grub par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni chos 'dun slob bu @021a * dge slong bstan 'dzin  bzang po'o 'dis kyang bka' gdams gsar snying gi bstan pa rin po che nam yang mi nub cing phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun rin tu gnas pa dang bdag gzhan thams cad rje btsun sgrol mas  dus rtag tu dgyes bzhin rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyun gyur cig</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5767</vol>
<tib>'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed bka' sdod dang bcas pa'i sgo nas 'chi bslu ba'i cho ga bya tshul phas rgol 'joms byed dpa' bo'i ru mtshon zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@013a * (ces 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed kyi bka' bsdod dang bcas pa'i sgo nas 'chi bslu ba'i cho ga phas rgol 'joms byed dpa' bo'i ru mtshon zhes bya ba 'di ni dam pa gong ma'i gsung rgyun la gzhi gzung grwa sa chen po'i bla khag rnams kyi phyag bzhes kyis brgyan te rang rang bskal mnyam dag la phan srid snyam pas tshangs sras dgyes pa'i rdo rjes bgyis pa'o dge legs 'phel bar gyur cig  dge'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5767</vol>
<tib>nges 'byung skye ba sogs kyi ched du mchog gsum gyi thugs rje bskul ba'i gsol 'debs byin rlabs myur 'jug zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces srid pa las nges par 'byung ba'i blo phyin ci ma log pa rgyud la skye ba sogs lam gyi gtso bo rnams nyams su len nus pa'i ched du mchog sum gyi thugs rje bskul ba'i gsol 'debs byin rlabs myur 'jug zhes bya ba 'di ni dam pa'i chos la don gnyer che zhing dad pa brdan po nyams len la yang gzhol ba'i mong gol cing gu shi chos rje sbyin pa rgya mtshos nan tan chen pos bskul ba'i ngor ^ chos smra ba lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rjes sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan au rang zhabs drung dpal bzang bstan 'dzin gys bgyis pa dge legs su gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5767</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas 'chi bslu bya tshul 'chi bdag ga-yul ngo bzlog pa'i dpa' bo zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5773</vol>
<tib>rje 'jam dbyangs bzhad pas mdzad pa'i dngos brgyad don bdun bcu'i rnam bshad kyi mgo 'jug bar gsum gyi tshigs bcad kyi 'grel ba blo gsar dga' byed ces bya ba</tib>

<item>

<col>@020b (ces jo bo rje nas brgyud pa'i bcom ldan rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa lha dgu'i dkyil chog mngon dga'i zhing du bgrod pa'i them skas zhes bya ba 'di ni rab 'byams smra ba'i dbang po t'a bla ma ngag dbang dar rgyas dang dad ldan thu sa lag chi ba da rang gu'i gnyis kyis bskul ba la brten nas rig pa 'dzin pa lcang skya rol pa'i rdo rjes dpal ldan jo bo aa ti shas mdzad pa'i mi 'khrugs pa'i bsgrub thabs dkyil chog sbyin bsreg gsum dang dze ta ri dang dpa' bo rdo rje'i gzhung dang ^ pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang kun zigs lnga pa chen po sogs kyi gsung rab @021a * rnams la legs par dpyad de dam pa'i dgongs pa dang mi 'gal zhing lag tu blang bde bar bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod phun sum tshogs pa nye gnas dge slong dge legs nam mkhas bgyis pa 'dis kyang 'gro ba mang po la phan 'dog par gyur cig  )sarba mangga lam "</col>

<item>

<col>@003b (ces gur gyi mgon po'i rjes gnang dbang brgyud kyi bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs bsam don kun 'grub ces bya ba 'di yang shr'i badzra mah'a k'a la n'a tha'i ming can gyis khyi lo zla ba brgyad pa'i dkar cha'i tshes la lhun grub bde chen rin chen jo bo'i gling du legs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aer khem pi lag thu dge slong snyan grags chos 'phel lo 'dis kyang dpal ldan sa skya pa'i bstan pa phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  mangga lam dge'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5774</vol>
<tib>pan chen rin po che blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga'i tikka skalo ldano mgulo rgyano zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-66a</p>
<col>@066a * (ces lhar bcas 'gro ba'i gtsug rgyan pan chen blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga'i rnam bshad skal ldan mgul rgyan zhes bya ba 'di ni tshe 'di'i phun tshogs la yid brtan med par mthong nas sgrub pa la rtse gcig tu gzhol ba'i sgrub sde byang chub gling du bzhugs pa'i ri khrod pa rnams dang gzhan yang chos 'di la shin tu mos pa'i dad ldan mang pos ring mo nas yang yang bskul ba la brten nas dpal ldan bla ma dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bor len pa'i sh'akya'i btsun chung 'du shes gsum pa {bu su ku pa} pa ye shes dpal 'byor {bu dza na zas spyod} bas rang lo so lnga'i dus dben gnas {su ta na gnyid log ku ti sa ra bshad} dga' ldan chos rdzong du legs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan {kyang kya} dge slong ngag dbang bstan 'dzin no 'di la brten nas kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5774</vol>
<tib>phyag na rdo rje drag po gsum bsgril gyi bsnyen pa bya tshul sbyin bsreg dang bcas pa rdo rje'i lhun po brtsegs pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-16a</p>
<col>@015b  ces gsang ba'i bdag po drag po gsum dril gyi bsnyen pa bya tshul sbyin bsreg dang bcas pa rdo rje'i lhun po brtsegs pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ri khrod 'dzin pa'i dge slong bstan 'dzin rnam rgyal gyis snga phyir lan grangs mang po'i bar du nan tan chen pos bskul ba dang don gnyer ba gzhan du mas kyang gsol ba btab pa la brten nas rig pa 'dzin pa ^blo bzang chos kyi nyi mas sgrub thabs kyi ngag 'don rnams mkhan chen las kyi rdo rje'i gsung byin can nyid bsgyur bkod ma byas par rang sor bzhag cing dmigs rim rnams yig cha du ma nas legs cha bsdus shing man ngag gis rnam par brgyan te bkod la 'di'i sbyin bsreg bla ma snga mas mdzad pa zhig ma mthong yang gsang ba spyi'i cho ga 'od kyi snye ma @016a * dang rje bla ma'i sbyin sreg dngos grub rgya mtshor gzhi byas khyad par pa kha bkang dgos rnams slob dpon chen po wa la tsandas mdzad pa'i gtum po'i sbyin sreg gi rgya gzhung dang gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud sogs tshad ldan gyi gzhung dang gtum po me 'bar gyi sbyin sreg bla ma snga mas mdzad pa rnams dang sgo bstun te gsal zhing lag tu blang bde bar chos sde chen po dgon lung byams pa gling gi gtsug lag khang bkra shis 'od 'bar gyi nye 'dabs su sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rigs smra dka' bcu dkon mchog nyi ma dang aor du su dge slong blo bzang don grub bo bkra shis dge'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5778</vol>
<tib>lha mi'i rnam 'dren dam pa ^ gong sa rgyal ba'i dbang po thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa chen po'i mchog gi sprul pa'i sku rin po che'i brtan bzhugs gsol 'debs smon lam bden tshig gi mtshams sbyor dang bcas pa 'dod 'jo'i dpag bsam dbang po zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-11b</p>
<col>@007a * (zhes lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba yongs kyi mgon skyabs dpung gnyen mtshungs zla ma mchis pa gong sa rgyal ba'i dbang po thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa chen po'i mchog gi sprul pa'i sku rin po che'i ^ zhabs brtan gsol 'debs smon lam @007b bden tshig gi mtshams sbyor dang bcas pa 'dod 'jo'i dpag bsam dbang po zhes bya ba 'di ni ^ gong sa lha mi'i rnam 'dren chen po gang nyid nges pa'i don du bskal ba dpag tu med pa'i snga rol nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po'i skur mngon par rdzogs par byang chub zin na'ang 'khor ba'i 'dam rdzab tu bying ba'i 'gro ba rnams sgrol ba'o slad du gru 'dzin ri bo'i spar dus gsum rgyal ba sras bcas kun gyi thugs rje gcig tu bsdus pa'i rang gzugs rgyal sras lag na padmo'i sku'i rnam par rol pa las sku dngos kyis gdul bar mi 'os pa'i 'gro ba rnams 'dren pa'i slad du zhing khams bye ba phrag brgyar mtshan dpes spras pa'i mchog gi sprul sku nas bya dang ri dwags gsul ba'i phyir de dang de'i rnam par bstan pa'i gzo bo sprul sku'i bar gyi sprul pa'i bkod pa mtha' slas pa rim dang cig car @008a * ci rigs par ston par mdzad pa'i mtha' ni kun mkhyen nang phan tshun kho na'i spyod yul las bdag sogs 'ching ba kun ldan so so skye bo rnams kyis cha shas tsam yang brjod nus pa'i go skabs dang bral yang mi mjed 'jig rten gyi zhing 'dir sprul pa'i bkod pa ji snyed cig ston par mdzad pa las 'phags bod gnyis su ji ltar byon pa'i sprul pa'i bkod pa che long tsam zhig bka' gdams bstan pa'i chu mgo dpal aa ti sha yab sras kyi gsang chos glegs bam rin po che las ji ltar gsungs pa dang gzhan yang dam pa'i zhal las rim pa'r brgyud de kun la yongs su grags pa ni 'phags yul nor 'dzin sgeg mo'i lto bar rnam 'dren bzhi ba don kun grub pa'i spyan sngar khye'u snang bar gyur ba nas bzungs chos rgyal dge ba dpal gyi bar du pandi ta grub dbang ku s'a li rgyal po 'jig rten phal ba @008b bya dang ri dwags sogs ci rigs pa'i rnam pas mkhas pa dang grub pa dpung stobs thabs mkhas sna tshogs kyi sgo nas rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'dzin skyong spel ba dang skal bar ldan pa'i sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin par mdzad bsil ldan rwa ba dkar pos khor yug tu bskor ba'i sman ljongs 'di 'phags pa nyid kyi gdul zhing du gzigs shing phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas rnams kyis bskul bas mtshams sbyar te thog mar mtsho dbri ba nas bzungs mi'i 'gro ba spel ba'i bar du gzugs sku'i bkod pa dngos su ston pa nas gang zag phal ba'i rgyud dang sa rda byin gyis rlabs pa'i bar du thugs rje'i 'jug pa cir yang ston par mdzad cing de nas rje bo'i thog ma gnya' khri btsan po nas bzungs mnga' bdag ral ba can gyi bar du sa'i tshangs pa rin dang cig car ci rigs pa'i rnam par bstan nas mnga' 'bangs @009a * bde bar skyong ba dang dam pa'i chos kyi dbu brnyengs shing srol btod dar rgyas su mdzad pa dge ba bcu'i khrims bcas shing chab 'bangs thams cad chos 'byor bde skyid dpal la sbyor bar mdzad de rjes 'brom ston rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas nas pan chen pad+ma badzra gyi bar du dge bsnyen dang rig sngags 'chang ba'i dbang po mkhas grub gnyis ldan rim dang cig car rigs pa'i tshul bzungs nas bod yul mun nag gi gling rum du rgyal bstan gsal ba'i sgron me rgya cher spor par mdzad cing thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun grub pa dpal bzang po nas bzungs bde chen chos kyi rgyal po yon tan rgya mtsho'i bar du gser sbyangs cod pan 'dzin pa'i ngur smrig 'chang ba bar ma chad pa'i tshul du byon nas thub bstan rgya mtsho'i yang snying rgyal ba gnyis pa'i ring lugs kyi rgyal mtshan srid gsum rtse mo'i bar du @009b mthon por sgreng bar mdzad khyad par rigs dang dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i khyab bdag nges pa don gyi thams cad mkhyen pa chen po ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho'i sku'i rnam par bstan nas bcu phrag rig pa'i gzhung lugs dang mdo rgyud spyi bye brag gi tshig don mtha' dag phyogs re tsam ma yin par thub pa'i bstan pa lus yongs su rdzogs pa thos bsam sgom gsum gyis gtan la 'bebs par mdzad pas rgyal ba bu ram shing ba'i ring lugs rtsod pa'i dus 'dir ches cher gsal bar gyur cing dpal lag na rdo rje'i sprul pa mi'i dbang po bstan 'dzin chos kyi rgyal pos gangs ljongs kyi 'gro ba ma rungs pa'i rgyal phran bsul bus gtses shing nyam thag pa rnams dbugs phyungs shing rang dbang du byas nas ^ gong sa lha mi'i rnam 'dren chen po'i zhabs 'og tu tshud pa'i skal bzang la byor bar mdzad pa brtse chen @010a * rjes su'ang thams cad mkhyen nas blobzang rin chen tshangs dbyangs rgya mtsho nas bzung lha mi'i rnam 'dren chen po ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'phrin las rgya mtsho dpal bzang po'i bar du gser sbyangs cod pan mdzes pa'i sdom btson rgyal po'i tshul 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig gi rnam par rim par byon nas 'gro ba ma bsgral ba rnams pa dang ma grol pa rnams sgrol pa dang dbugs ma byin pa rnams dbugs dbyung bar mdzad pa'i rnam par thar pa bsam brjod kyi yul las 'das shing dus kyi mtha' 'dir yang rang nyid kyi gdul zhing byang phyogs bho ta'i rgyal khams kyi 'gro ba dbu rgong pa ma rungs pa gdul dka' ba rnams brtse chen byams pa'i thugs kyis ma bor bar slar yang skye ba sprul sku'i zla tshes kyi rang zhal gsar du dngom pa mchog gi sprul pa'i @010b sku rin po che nying ring por ma thogs par tshul bstan thos psam sgom gsum gyi mdzad pa mtha' dag dka' ba med par mthar phyin nas gsum ldan sdom brtson rgyal po'i tshul gyis thub bstan yongs rdzogs kyi bdag por bzhengs rgyu'i thog ma'i rten 'brel gyi 'jug sgo dam pa mthon mthing gi lan bu dor nas mtshan snyan gsar ba'i dbyar rnga skal bzang mdongs mtha' dga' ba'i gsos su sgrog pa dang lhan cig zhabs zung mi 'gyur rdo rje'i khri 'phang mthon por bskal a bye bar brtan par bzhugs nas gsan bas ma sgom gsum sogs chos dang srid ki bzhed don mtha' dag gegs med bde blag tu 'grub pa'i smon lam bden tshig gi mtshams sbyor ris su ma chad pa'i 'dus sde rnams kyi zhal 'don dang dad ldan ser skya mchog dman mtha' dag gis ngag 'don du byas chog pa 'di lta bu'i zhig dgos zhes bur rgyal @011a * chol kha gsum gyi 'dzin mar chos srid gser gyi khor los dbang bsgyur zhing gong sa lha mi'i rnam 'dren chen po'i lugs zung gi 'phrin las kyi gtugs dkar dgung du 'degs pa la gzhan dring mi 'jog pa'i rnam dpyod can rgyal tshab thung zhan rje drung ho thog thu chen pos srid du ring ba'i lha rdzas kyis thog drangs bdog pa'i gnang ba skyes gya nom pa dang bcas nan tan chen pos bskul ma mdzad pa drang du blangs te rgyal rigs kyi bandhes nor gling bskal bzang pho brang du 'bru mang zhes sa stag gnam lo'i dka' thub zla ba'i dkar phyogs kyi bzang po gnyis pa de gza' gos sngon can rgyu skar tha skar sbyor bas rlung sbyor chen gzhon dbyangs ai nyi ma sprel 'char ba'i gza' skar 'phrod sbyor phun sum tshogs pa'i phyed yol snga cha'i bdud rtsi thun mtshams kyi thog tu grub par sbyar nas gsol ba shugs drag tu btab pa'o sarba mangga lam dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5778</vol>
<tib>mdo sngags kyi gzhung la slob gnyer byed tshul gyi bslab bya nor bu'i gling du bgrod pa'i lam yig ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@015b (ces mdo sngags kyi gzhung la slob gnyer byed tshul gyi bslab bya nor bu'i gling du bgrod pa'i lam yig ces bya ba 'di ni spyir deng sang @016a * bstan pa snyigs ma'i mthar son pa'i dbang gis nyams len dgos pa'i gtam tsam yang nub thos bsam dgos pa'i gtam tsam yod kyang gang la thos pa bya ba'i yul dang thos pa ji ltar byed pa'i tshul sogs legs par shes pa shin tu bkon par snang bas 'di 'dri zhig 'bri 'dun sngar nas yod pa'i thog nye char dar han pe'i li'i shog nas blo dang ldan pa dge slong dkon mchog rdo rjes bskul ba'i ngor ^btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes thos don rgyud la sbyar ba'i nyams len ma thub kyang bla ma @016b gong ma zhig gi ming tsam la skyabs su ma mchi bar grwa rkyang dkyus ma'i lugs bzhin slob gnyer la sdug rus cung zad bya ba'i rang myong dang dam pa gong ma'i gsung rgyun la brten nas rags rim zhig bris pa'i mtshams su da lta phan par smras kyang go ba dkon par snang bas dgos pa mi 'dug snyam nas bzhag pa'i tshe bstan la gcig tu sman pa'i lhag bsam dang mkhyen rab kyi dbang phyug dam pa dgon pa'i khri thog pa dkon mchog rgyal mtshan pas 'di'i 'phro bskang ste cha tshang ba zhig dgos zhes nan tan gnang ba bzhin @017a * mjug grub par byas pa'i yi ge pa ni dge slong dkon mchog kun dgas bgyis pa 'dis kyang don gnyer can rnams la phan thogs par gyur cig skal ldan thar 'dod rkang drug du ma'i tshogs legs bshad sbrang rtsi'i dpal la rol ba yi tshul 'di dad sogs yon tan mi dman pa'i dge slong blo bzang blo gros zhes bgyi bas mthun rkyen legs sbyar sku 'bum byams gling du dpar du bsgrubs pa'i dge tshogs la brten nas drin can mar gyur 'gro ba ma lus mkhas pa'i bya ba rnam gsum mthar phyin shog </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5778</vol>
<tib>ngag byin brlabs byed tshul tshigs du sdebs pa khyer bde</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces mkhas grub khyung po'i mgur brgyad kyi nang nas sngar ngag la byin gyis ma brlabs pas sngags @003b bzlas pa rnams la nus pa ma byung dpal a'a li k'a li'i gdams pa 'dis sngags mi 'grub snyam pa'i dogs pa med ces gsungs pa'i don gyi man ngag zhal shes brag dkar sngags ram pa aa ti sha sla na bha dras mdzad pa'i don ltar nyams su blangs bde khyad tshigs bcad mdor bsdus su sdebs pa 'di yang dga' ldan brtan bzhugs chos 'khor gling ba'i dge 'dun rnams kyi nyams bzhes dang gzhan yang dag nus 'dod pa mang por phan slang rta tshag pas sbyar ba'o 'di nyams su blangs na sngags kyi nus pa nyams pa'i rgyu lce sha za ba lan tswa sgog tsong la phug za ba me la phu byas pa sogs kyis nus pa 'phrog mi nus par gsungs 'on kyang gdams pa 'di yod pa'i blo rtses de dag la bag med du spyad na dug sman yod pa'i blo rtses dug mang @004a * du 'gam pa dang 'dra bar mi legs pas de ltar yid la bcad par bya'o rwa bod du 'di dang cung 'dra min gyi ngag byin brlabs zhing yod kyang don a'a le k'a li la brten pas dgongs pa gcig par mngon 'dis kyang rang gzhan mang por phan thogs par gyur cig  par 'di kun bde gling du bzhugs "</col>

<col>@021a * bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal ba la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de @021b dag dang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu'i de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do 'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya bai gzungs rdzogs so dge ba 'di yis sangs rgyas myur thob shog  "</col>
</item>

<item>

<vol>5783</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba mchog gi bdag nyid khyab bdag 'khor lo'i mgon po mkhan chen bstan pa'i mnga' bdag bka' 'drin gsum ldan gyi rtsa ba'i bla ma rje btsun blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes dpal bzang po gang de'i sku'i yang srid mchog gi sprul pa'i sku rin po che gdan sa chen po bkra shis lhun por spyan 'dren gyi mi 'gyur rdo rje'i khri 'phang mthon por mnga' 'gsol dang bstun mtshan blo bzang dpal ldan bstan pa'i nyi ma phyogs las rnam rgyal zhes gsol ba dang lhan cig brtan bzhugs smon tshigs 'dod dgu'i 'byung gnas dbang gi rgyal po zhes pa</tib>

<col>@030b (ces dpal ldan lha mo dmag zor ma'i sgo nas rno mthong sgrub tshul 'di yi 'bras bshad dang bcas pa 'di ni gam tu bcags pa'i chos 'khor mkhan tshab gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba ngag dbang dngos grub nas ^thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i sho mo shin tu bsdus pas dpyad dka' pa dang bla ma gong mas mdzad pa 'ga' zhig kha 'thor zhing theng gsum por dgos pas ngos 'dzin dka' bar 'dug @031a * pas theng gcig por bas chog pa'i gsal ba zhig dgos zhes nan gyis bskul ma byung bar brten 'di rigs gsar rtsom la rang bzo'i nyes pa yod nyen chana' spyir btang brtag bsgril sogs byed skabs kyang don bzang ngan skabs 'byed par byed pa'i tshig ci shes bris nas dkon mchog la gsol btab kyi dmod bcol byas te bsgril bas chog pa dang gzhan yang dpe mo 'debs pa lta bus mtshon rang gis brtag bya'i don bzang ngan sogs kyi brda' thams cad tha snyad blos brtags byas pa'i steng bden pa bdar ba'i gang babs byas chog pa 'dun pa bzhin dang der ma zad skabs su babs min dpal ldan lha mor gsol btab kyi rmi ltas brtag par yang legs pa'i tshan ma byung ba bcas thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtshos mdzad pa dang gzhan yang sho mo rgyas bsdus @031b sna tshogs shig 'dug pa nas kha gsal ba rnams kyis gzhi byas gong ma'i zhal rgyun gyis brgyan cing gang yin bltas chog pa lta bu'i kha gsal bar 'god pa 'di ni ^sh'akya'i dge slong lcags ra chos rje ngag dbang dpal ldan thub bstan chos 'khor gling gi bla brang du sbyar bas 'gro kun blang dor gyi nyi ma gsal bas bde skyid kyi padmo rnam par bzhad pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>

<tib>bal yul mchod rten rnam gsum gyis gsol 'debs</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@002b (ces pa 'di ni 'jig rten gyi snang tshul la skyo nas rong phu rdzar rang nyid la bris pa'o smon lam 'di @003a * bzhin spung bde sgom chen bla brang gi dbu zur sprang 'khyams 'gyur med lhun sgrub rgya gar bal yul sogs la gnas mjal skabs chod rten rin po che'i sku bdun nas me pho stag lo zla ba bcu gnyis pa'i tshes bcu nyin zhal shung zhus pa  dge legs 'phel dge'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5785</vol>
<tib>bla ma'i bka' drin cing thugs rje bskul ba'i gsol 'debs byin rlabs 'phreng ba</tib>
<p>1a-4a</p>
<col>@004a * (ces khal kha rje btsun dam pa rdo rje 'chang dngos rje btsun ngago dbango bloo bzango choso kyio nyio mao bstano 'dzino dbango phyugo dpal bzang po'i bka' drin dran cing thugs rje bskul ba'i gsol 'debs byin rlabs 'phreng ba 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes zhal snga nas mkhan po dka' chen dpal ldan bstan 'dzin lags nas bskul ma byung ba bzhin sh'akya'i dge slong bloo bzango 'phrino laso thubo bstano choso kyio nyio mao dge legs rnam rgyal dpal bzang pos gzim chung bka' gdams pho brang du bris pa'o dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5785</vol>
<tib>bstan bsrung tha 'og chos rgyal chen po'i 'phrin bcol bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-3b </p>
<col>@003b (ces bstan bsrung tha 'og chos rgyal chen po'i 'phrin bcol 'di ni ai la gug san hu thog thu aartha siddhi badzra gyis mdzad pa'i bstan bsrung tha 'og chos rgyal gyi gsol mchod mi 'dod gzhom pa'i gnam lcags rdo rje las zur du phyung ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5785</vol>
<tib>bstan srung sprul pa'i chos skyong tha 'og chos rgyal la bsangs gser skyems sogs dbul tshul bdud las rgyal ba'i bzhad sgra ces bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-5b</p>
<col>@005b (ces bstan bsrung sprul pa'i chos skyong tha 'og rgyal chen gyi bsangs gser skyems sogs bya tshul bdud las rgyal ba'i bzhad sgra ces bya ba 'di ni hal ha'i ga-yas ru'i dza sag chos dkon mchog brka shis kyi shog nas grwa rigs zhig gyis rang gi dgon gnas la phan par 'dod pa'i bsam pas bskul ngor ^ btsun gzugs the bo sprul ming ye shes thub bstan rgya mtshos khu re chen mo'i dga' ldan theg chen gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni drung yig pa ye shes bshadd sgrub po</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5785</vol>
<tib>'byung bzhi'i gtor ma gtong tshul le tshan gnyis</tib>
<p>1a-7b</p>
<col>@007a * (smras pa sprul pa'i skyes mchog dam pa rgya gar gyi 'byung bzhi gtor ma'i rten 'brel thabs mkhas kyis 'byung @007b bzhi 'khrugs pa'i nyam thag 'gro ba la bde mdzad bdud rtsi'i char rgyun phab pa bzhin nad rims gdon bgegs mda' char mi bzang pa skyob byed rdo rje'i go cha dag dang mtshungs don bsdus spel legs snying por dril ba yi chog bsgrigs me tog gsar ba'i phreng mdzes 'di bslab gsum ldan pa'i dge slong ri khrod pas lhag bsam dag pas yang yang bskul ba'i ngor mdo rgyud man ngag 'dzin pa'i spong ba pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes byas bkod ) "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5785</vol>
<tib>'byung bzhi'i gtor ma ni"</tib>
<p>7b-13b</p>
<col>@013b (ces pa 'di ni 'byung bzhi'i gtor ma grangs mang gtong dgos byung tshe 'don cha nyung ba'i 'khyer bde ba 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis bskul ba'i ngor snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis 'byung bzhi'i gtor chog 'ga' zhig mthong ba las shes cher pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa'i gtor chog dang mthun par rgyal khab pe'i cing gi bod chos lha khang du grags par bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni rab 'byams smra ba blo bzang nyi ma'o bkra shis sku 'bum byams pa gling du dpar du bsgrubs pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5785</vol>
<tib>'chi ka ma'i sems can la phan thabs bya tshul nyam thag dbugs 'byin zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-29a</p>
<col>@028b (ces 'chi ga ma'i sems can la phan @029a * thabs bya tshul nyams thag dbugs 'byin  zhes bya ba 'di ni deng dus snyigs mar gyur ba'i dbang gis phal ba rnams lta ci 'gro ba mang po'i 'dren par rlom pa 'ga' zhig kyang 'chi ka'i sems can gyi sngas mgor slebs pa na byin rten myang du 'jug pa las phan pa'i thabs gzhan mdzad mi mkhyen pa mang po mthong bas rkyen byas mchog dman thams cad kyis lag tu blang bde ba 'di 'dra zhig bris na 'ga' zhig la phan par 'gyur ba srid snyam nas ku s'a li dharma badzra gyis me tog sdum ra'i bsti gnas su sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni pikshu wa gindra sha sa na wartas bgyis pa'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5785</vol>
<tib>dga' ldan lha brgya'i ma dang 'brel ba'i dmigs brtse ma dngos grub kun 'byung dang dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo rgyal ba ^blo bzang grags pa la gsol ba 'debs pa'i smon tshig bsam pa lhun gyis 'grub pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5786</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba'i gsung rab mtha' dag gi snying po bsdus pa khrid chen bzhi bsnyen sgrub byed tshul gyi rim pa gsal bar bkod pa dngos grub kun 'byung</tib>
<p>1a-91a</p>
<col>@090b (ces khrid chen bzhi'i bsnyen sgrub byed tshul gyi rim pa gsal bar bkod pa dngos grub kun 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni khrid chen bzhi'i skor gyi yig cha dam gong ma rnams kyis mdzad pa mang po zhig yod kyang 'ga' zhig ni ha cang tshig tshogs mang bar 'gyur ba dang kha cig ni ngag 'don sogs gsal bar ma bkod pa dang la la ni ha cang bsdus par 'gyur ba sogs blo dman rnams la phan thogs chung bar snang bas rgyas bstus 'tsham pa re 'di lta bu zhig bsgrigs nus na 'grigs shig snyam du nges pa don gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po sku skye skal bzang ye shes rab rgyas nam bkas bskul ma mdzad pa bshin ri @091a * dwags kyi lte las gla rtsi len pa bzhin du smra ba po gang yin kyang smras pa'i tshig la dgos pa can zhig yod de nyid len pa skyes chen dam pa rnams kyi nyams len yin des snyam du yang bsam pa dang bshes gnyen dam pa'i thugs dgongs la 'di lta bu zhig gis bstan 'gro la than bar 'gyur na cim rung snyam pa'i lhag bsams bzang po rdzogs pa'i rgyur dmigs te ^ bla ma rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa dam pa du ma'i mdzad pa rnams las btus shing chos brgyad kyi bran chung snyoms las pa btsun gzugs galpa bha dra'i ming can zhig gis bris pa'o ) 'dis kyang rgyal bstan rin po che mi nub cing dar zhing rgyas pa dang 'gro ba yongs la phan pa'i rgyur gyur cig  bkra shis pa dang dge legs 'phel legs so</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5787</vol>
<tib>brtan bzhugs gsol 'dod 'jo'i bum bzang bkra shis kun 'khyil</tib>

<item>

<tib>rje btsun sgrol ma sgrub par 'dod pa ni "</tib>

<tib># 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan rin po che sdud pa zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-48a</p>
<col>@047a * 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol @047b tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las phyung ba'i 'phags pa sdud pa tshigs bcad le'ur bcad pa 'di ni slob dpon sengge bzang pos zhu dag mdzad pa'i rgyad pa dang bod dpe dag pa la gtugs nas zha lu lots'a ba dge slong dharma p'a la bhadras slar yang dag par byas pa'o  aom yedharm'a he tu bra bha b'a he tutne sh'anta th'a ga tohya ba dat te sh'anydza yo ni rodha ae wam p'a d'i mah'a shra ma na: ye s'ah'a mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5824</vol>

<item>

<vol>5824</vol>
<tib>bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga</tib>

<col>@016b ces bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga 'di ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa chos kyi grags pa dang blo bzang phun tshogs gnyis kyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes yang yang bskul ba la brten nas sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis grub chen gling gis mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa dang dbang lo chen pos mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa dang sa skya pa'i dge ba'i bshes @017a * gnyen chen po du mas mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa dang mkhas grub chen po mkhan po rin po che sangs rgyas ye shes kyis mdzad bla ma mchod pa dang gzhan yang grub mtha' so so'i bla ma mchog dman du mas mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa mang po zhig mthong zhing brjod bya'i don rnams khong du chud par bar byas te legs pa'i cha thams cad legs par bsdus nas mdo rgyud dam pa'i man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du tshig sbyor sbangs te go bde bar chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun po'i gzims khang rgyal mtshan mthong po'i yang thog tu sbyar ba'o ) "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5824</vol>
<tib>lo ma gyon ma rigs gsum gyi bsgom bzlas rgyun 'khyer mdor bsdus</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003b lo ma gyon ma rigs gsum gyis bsgom bzlas rgyun 'khyer mdor bsdus 'di btsun gzugs dam tshig rdo rjes bris dge bas 'gro kun bde thob shog  aa roksha "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5824</vol>
<tib>me mchod kyi cho ga 'khyer bde bkra shis dpal 'bar zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * (ces me mchod bya tshul mdor bsdus bkra shis dpal 'bar zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi slob ma dpyod ldan dbu mdzad dge slong rdo rje'i ming can nas phyogs 'dir me mchod kyi srol kun tu dar yang mchod thabs yid brtan rung ba zhig mi snang bas kungs sngags 'khyer bde'i chog zhig cis kyang [???] zhes nan du bskul ba ltar tshad thub kyi dam pa gong na'i man ngag gi phyag srol dang sgo bstun te ^dam tshig rdo rjes ga-yar khral tsam du bris pa 'dis sbyar skye 'gro mang po la phan thogs par gyur cig dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>

<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@016b (ces dpal gsang ba'i bdag po'i bka' sdod dkar phyogs skyong ba'i bsrung ma mthu rtsal can dgra lha chen po mched dgu'i gsol mchod dgra las rgyal ba'i ru @017a * mtshon zhes bya ba 'di ni jing gir gnam gyi rigs rgyud stobs 'byor mnga' thang gis mngon par mtho shing bla ma dkon mchog la mi phyed pa'i dad gus dang ldan pa thu sa lag che hung tha'i ji tshe dbang rdo rje lags nas rgyal blon dbangs du ma'i lha gsol gyi don du phan pa'i lhag bsam gyis bskul mnan cher mdzad pa ltar mkhas grub dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bo'i rgyan du 'dzin pa'i rgyal khams pa ^badzra k'irtis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod yangs pa'i slob bu dge tshul bstan 'dzin bzang po'o 'dis kyang dkar phyogs skyong ba'i lha bsrung mthu stobs can rnams kysi rtag tu 'go zhing sdongs grogs mdzad de bstan 'gro yongs la phan pa rgya cher thogs shing bkra shis dge legs phyogs kun tu khyab par byed dus par gyur cig lha rgyal lo 'par 'di sgrol ma'i gandho la ru bzhugs</col>

<col>@009a * ces no min han blo bzang dbang chen dpal 'bar gyi 'khrungs rabs dang 'brel ba'i gsol 'debs zhabs brtan smon tshig 'di ni khal kha nas dad stobs dang ldan pa can jun ching wang bde chen skyabs kyis bskul ba'i ngor ^sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos sbyar ba'o slar yang grwa tshang ga-yas ru dga' ldan chos gling phyogs las rnam rgyal gyi slob dpon dpon gu shri ngag dbang phun tshogs dga' ldan bkra shis dge 'phel gling gi slob dpon blo bzang rab brtan dga' ldan bde ba can gling gi slob dpon @009b rdo rje rgyal mtshan phyag mdzodo rgya mtsho rin chen dge slong blo bzang sbyin pa bcas kyis dbus ga-yon ru dga' ldan chos gling phyogs las rnam rgyal gyis mtshon grwa tshang khag bzhi'i grwa rigs mtha' dag nas bskul ma'i ri mo skyes bcas dang ched gnyer gyi mi sna nga'i ching chos rje blo bzang tshul khrims dang khal kha chi blo bzang tshe ring aer te ni no yon chos rje blo bzang gsang bdag bcas kyis bskul ba'i ngor` sngon du rgyal dbang mchog nas ji ltar stsal bar gzhi brten gsar du brtags bkod pa rnams kyi kha bskongs dang bcas te tshangs pa dang thod can gyis 'phral du smras pa'i yi ge pa ni bkra shis tshe ring gis bgyis pa'o "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5829</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin yang gsang khros pa'i sgrub thabs dngos grub kyi lcags kyu</tib>

<tib>byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i smon lam skal bzang 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba</tib>

<col>@013b (byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i smon lam skal bzang 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba 'di ni sdom brtson chos la 'dun pa gu shri ngag dbang bstan 'phel gyis yang yang nan tan du bskul ba la brten nas chos smra ba ^blo bzang chos kyi nyi mas sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong ngag dbang phun tshogs kyis bgyis pa 'dis kyang byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i nyams len 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig shu bham</col>

<tib>'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa</tib>
<p>1b-357a</p>
<col>@355b rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'akya se na dang dzny'a na siddhi dang zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba ban de dharm'a t'a shri la la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab` slad kyis dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag bod kyi dpal lha btsan po bkra shis lha sde btsan gyis bkas rgya gar gyi mkhan po su bha shi ta dang sgra bsgyur gyi lotstsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos 'grel pa dang mthun par bsgyur slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta chen po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dznya na dang zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos yul dbus kyi 'grel pa la btugs nas bcos shing zhus te gtan la phab yang slad kyis spyid smad snye thang na mo cher pandi ta chen po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dznya na dang lotstsha ba 'brom rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas gnyis kyis brgyad stong pa bshad pa'i dus su che long zhig gtan la phab phyis rwa sgreng gi gtsug lag khang du lotstsha ba 'brom rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis rgya gar gyi mdo gsum la gtugs nas la gnyis @356a * gtan la phab slad kysi yang lotstsha ba de nyid kyis bshad pa mdzad cing phran tshegs kyang gtan la phab dus phyis lotstsha ba chen po sh'akya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis kha che'i dpe dang yul dbus kyi dpe du ma bsags nas gtan la phab slar yang zha lu lotstsha ba rin chen chos skyong bzang pos rgya bod kyi dpe du ma dang bstun nas dag par mdzad pa'i ma phyi dang rgya dpe gnyis dang bod dpe par ma rnams la gtugs te sh'akya'i dge slong mnga' ris rab 'byams pa dpal 'byor rgyal mtshan dang skad gnyis smra ba kun dga' chos bzang gnyis kyis zhu dag mdzad de yar stong shambur par du bsgrubs de la ma phyi mdzad nas bkra shis lhun por pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa rje btsun blo bzang ye shes dpal bzang pos par du brko bar mddzad de la ma phyi byas shing yar shm gyi par la yig nor byung ba dpe phyi ma rnams su bris nor rgyun 'byams su song ba 'ga' yar snang bas brgyad stong pa'i dpe rnying mang po @356b dang bstun zhing slob dpon seng ge bzang pos mdzad pa'i brgyad stong 'grel chen la gtugs nas zhus dag legs par byas yi ge'i sdeb sbyor rnams kyang sum rtags dang bstun nas sh'akya'i dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bkra shis bsam gtan gling du dag par byas pa'o @357a * 'dis kyang sher phyin gyi mdo sde rin po che 'di nyid phyogs kun tu 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig "</col>

<col>@032b (ces dpal ldan 'dod khams dbang phyug dmag zor rgyal mo'i 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i sbyin bsreg gi cho ga dngos grub rin po che'i bang mdzod ces bya ba 'di ni gnas mchog bsod nams kun sdud gling du dpal ri mo dge ldan pa'i bstan pa bstan 'dzin dang bcas pa'i sku'i rim grogs 'di'i las bzhi sbyin bsreg bsgrub dgos pa'i skabs du mar yig cha mang po la ltos mi dgos pa'i tshig gi chog nag 'gros su bkod pa zhig dgos rang gi tsha bo kushr'i dge slong ye shes thogs med dang 'di ga'i byang 'dren grags pa rgyal mtshan @033a * sogs chog pa thun mong nas bskul bas mtshams sbyar ba la brten nas pan thub chen po slob dpon aabhya k'a ra'i gsang ba spyi'i cho ga dang mnyams nyid btsong kha pa chen pos mdzad pa'i dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sbyin bsreg dngos grub rgya mtsho gzhir bzung rgyal dbang yab sras dang rdo rje 'chang lcang skya rin po che'i legs bshad pa rnams kyis kha skang gzhan yang 'di skor gyi yig cha du ma la rtog 'jug byas shing bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis legs par brgyan te ^btsun pa ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan nam rig pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs bsnyan dam tshig rdo rjes dkor zhes pa sa sprul me tog can gyi zla ba'i mar ngo'i rdzogs pa gnyis pa'i dus dge bar ^'jam dbyangs gong ma bdag po chen po'i gser gyi bka' lung gis dge 'phel zhes bsngags pa'i gtsug lag khang gi bla brang bkra shis @033b bsam gtan pho brang du sbyar ba 'dis kyang rgyas pa gnyis pa'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa'i rgyur gyur cig dge'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5838</vol>
<tib>dpal ldan lha mo'i bam bskongs kyi cho ga nyes pa kun sel zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10b</p>
<col>@010a * (zhes dpal ldan lha mo 'dod khams dbang phyug ma'i thugs dam bskang ba dang 'gal rkyen gyi 'tshub lhod sogs zhi ba la mchog du sngags pa srog chags @010b rgyu bskongs dang bam bskongs kyi cho ga nyes pa kun sel zhes bya ba 'di ni sbyir yang snyigs mar sbyor ba'i dbang gi ma mo mkha' 'gro 'khrugs pa'i 'tshub lhongs kyis bskyed pa'i nad gdon shin tu mang ba dang lhag par lo lnga phyir nye bskor du nad rims mi 'dra ba mang du 'ched cing mi shes pa'i lhas mtshan sna tshogs byung ba bsrung ma'i 'khu ldog gi rnam pa yin pa dang bskangs bshags mang du btang na legs pa'i mtshan ma kun rtogs kyi ri mor shar ba bzhin lag len du bstar bskabs btsun gzugs dharma badzra gyis bam bskongs kyi chog lho brag grub chen las kyi rdo rje'i gsung la tshigs phrad cung zad bsgyur cing lag len du gsal bar bgyis te dben gnas bde chen chos gling du klag chog chu 'babs su bkod 'dis kyang mi mthun nyer 'tshe thams cad zhe zhing 'dod khams dbang mo bgyis pas 'phrin las rnam bzhi lhun gyis grub par gyur cig 'di gnyan pas gad thong du bya mi rung gsung pas snod min la gsang shing skabs shes par bya'o mangga lam</col>

<tib>thun drug tu nyams su len tshul 'khyer bde zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>1a-13a</p>
<col>@011a * (ces pa 'di ni rang gi slob ma sde snod 'dzin pa du mas bskul ba dang khyad @011b par nyin zhag phrugs re la thun drug tu 'di lta bu'i nyams len gyi sdom chen po nyams su len pa byung na bod kyi gser chos su grags pa'i zab zab mo rnams kyis cha tsam du'ang bsgrun du med pa'i rgyal ba dgyes pa'i bka' srol du rje yab sras rnams kyis bsngags shing rgyud sde dad mthun pa'i nyams len du chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i blos rtogs pa'i nyer len gyis bskul ba la @012a bsten nas rig pa 'dzin pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<tib>ltun bshags kyi sgo nas 'chi bslu bya tshul</tib>

<col>@005a * (ces pa 'di ni bro 'tshal ba 'ga' zhig la la mo lung du ltung bshags kyi 'chi bslu bab zer ba thos shing de mtshungs 'ga' zhig nas de lta bu zhig dgos tshul byung bar @005b yang brten ltung bshags kyi 'chi bslu'i tha snyad dang chog sngon chad ma grags pas 'di rigs bri ba rang nyid sun 'byen pa'i rgyu las ma 'das kyang byang chub ltung bshags nyid bton pas 'chi ba bslu ba'i thabs su 'gyur mod kyang de'i sgo nas c'hi bslu bya tshul zer ba'i zur zhig yod tshe dad pa'i rjes 'brangs 'ga' zhig de la ched gnyer gyis 'jug pa'i zhor la phyi ma'i don chen sgrub pa'i rkyen du 'byung srid dam snyam pa'i re bas byin brlabs kyi khyad nas cho ga'i byings pan chen thams cad mkheyn pa'i gsung sor bzhag thog bzang spyod kyi 'chi bslu'i cho ga zhig dang sgo bstun pa'i dmigs bsal gyi khyad par cung zad sbyar te btsun gzugs dag gi dbang pos bgyis pa dge legs  'phel</col>
