<tib>phongs pa sel ba'i sgrol ma'i sgo nas bum gter sgrub tshul dngos grub rin chen gter mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-14b</p>
<col>@011b (zhes bsngo ba smon lam dang bkra shis kyis mtha' brgyan par bya'o de lta bu'i rim pas mtshad ma mthong gi bar ci nus su bzlas rjes rten gyi nang dang gtsug lag khang la sogs pag 'du 'jog pa'i gzhir pad+ma 'dab brgyad bris pa'i steng du gnas kahng yul phyogs la sogs pa gang gtso che der zha phyogs @012a * te bzhugs su gsol mdun du mchod gtor bshams pa nas bzung bdag mdun bzlas pa brtan bzhugs kyi bar sngar bshad pa bzhin ji lta ba bzhin tshar gcig byas rjes bzhugs khang gi kha spubs pa sogs byas te rjes kyi chog shis brjod kyi bar god bzhin bya'o de ltar tshul bzhin nyams su blang bas gnas 'dir bar chad kyis mi tshugs shing chos kyi 'byor ba zad mi shis pa 'byung ba dang rje btsun bcom ldan 'das mas rjes su bzung ste @012b mchog thun gyi dngos grub bde blag tu 'grub sogs yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin te spyir rje btsun ma 'di nyid rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rje 'phrin las ma lus pa lhar shar bas snyigs ma'i dus 'dir thugs rje byin brlabs gzhan las myur zhing khyad par du 'phags pa dang dgos su jo bo chen po lha gcig rdo rje gdan du zhabs bskor gnang ba'i tshe jo bo sgrol ma la gsol ba btab pas` sgrol ma zhal dngos su bstan pas khyod kyi rjes 'brangs kho mos skyong zhes zhal gyis @013a * bzhes shing sgrol ma nyer gcig gi gdams la las tshogs dang bcas pa dngos su stsal ba 'di ni nyid shin tu nas khungs btsun zhing byin brlabs che ba dang de dang 'brel ba'i bum gter gyi cho ga 'di nyid kyang spyir 'di rigs kyi yig rnying dam pa gong mas mdzad sogs sngon chad mig lam du ma gyur kyang gtso bor gyur rgyud kyi khungs dang gtugs shing sgos su slob dpon chen po nyi ma spas pa'i lugs kyi sgrol ma nyer gcig @013b dang` jo lugs gnyis lha'i zhal phyag mang nyung tsam ma gtogs don du thugs rgyud gcig pa'i dbang gis phan tshun gcig gis la tshogs la bskang rung ba bla ma dam pa'i gsung rgyun las 'byung ba bzhin kha che'i slob dpon chen po 'di nyid kyis mdzad pa las tshogs nyi shu rtsa drug pa'i nang tshan bum gter gyi cho ga'i rtsa tshig gi brjod don ji bzhin bkral te kha 'geng 'os rnams bshad cho ga'i tshig tshogs dbyings rnams pan chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i @014a * sgrub thabs la gzhi byas dam pa'i man ngag gis brgyan te rang bzos ma bslad par bkod pa yin tshu'i 'di la brten nas rang bzhan gyi don gnyis phun sum tshogs pa sgrub tshul dngos grub rin chen gter mdzod ces bya ba 'di yang rnam dkar gyi yon tan du mas phyug cing thos don nyams len la gzhol ba dka' bcu blo bzang thabs mkhas nas 'di lta bu zhig rtsom dgos zhes bskul ma byung ba'i ngor ^lhag pa'i lha mchog rje btsun bcom @014b ldan 'das ma gang gis rjes su bzung ba'i spobs pa can ^sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug gam ming gzhan gar gyi dbang pos sman ljongs rnam par bkra ba'i ri su la dben gnas dge legs 'phel byang chub gling du sbyra ba'o sarba mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>

<tib>rgyal ba'i bstan bsrungs chen po rnams la las bzhi'i 'phrin las 'chol tshul dngos grub myur 'gugs rdo rje sgra dbyangs ces bya ba</tib>

<col>@008a * (ces pa 'di yang 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i dngos slob 'phrin las nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i spas chen bzhi'i ya gyal 'jam dbyangs chos kyi rje bkra shis dpal ldan pa sogs sku 'phreng du mar rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan phyogs kun tu sgreng bar mdzad pa'i skye dgu'i @008b 'dren pa chen po mtshan yongs su grags pa khal kha rje btsun dam pa blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyug 'jigs med rgya mtsho'i dpal bzang po nas rgyal ba'i bstan bsrung chen po rnams la dus gtor dang rgyun gyi mchod gtor sogs kyi skabs gang 'os su sbyar chog pa'i las bzhi'i 'phrin las 'chol tshul 'di lta bu zhig gyis shig ces bka'i bskul ba gnang ba'i bzhed pa bskong ba'i phyir du rig pa 'dizn pa'i tha shal ba bskal bzang gar gyi dbang po'am ming gzhan blo bzang chos kyi dbang phyug tu 'bod pas bris pa 'dis kyang dam pa mchog de'i 'phrin las phyogs bcur rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5848</vol>
<tib>rgyal po'i gsol mchod dregs pa'i re bskong byed zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-14a</p>
<col>@013b (ces pa 'di ni blo gros kyi 'jug pa mchog tu yangs pa'i dge slong dkon mchog tshul khrims kyis grong chog pa rnams kyi thugs bzhed bskong ba'i slad du bris dgos su bskul bar rten snyigs dus kyi mtha' la sleb pas rgyal po'i gnod pa bdo ba'i dus 'dir 'ga' zhig la phan pa'ang srid dam snyam pas rgyal po'i mdos gzhung sogs @014a * khungs thub rnams kyi don dang mi 'gal bar bsgrigs pa po ni dharma swa mi wa gintra pa tu siddhi ming can no 'dis kyang 'gro ba rnams nga rgyal dang zhe sdang gis bskul ba'i gnod byed kyi 'char sgo sna tshogs las thar bar gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>

<item>

<item>

<item>

<tib>cho 'phrul bstod pa rgya chen tshogs gnyis</tib>

<item>

<vol>5884</vol>

<col>@006a * (ces bsod nams chen po'i dpal gyis mtho ba drung grags pa dpal bzang po sku mched gyi gsung gis bskul zhing gzhung lugs 'bum phrag du ma la blo 'od 'phro ba rigs pa smra ba sh'akya'i dge slong bkra shis dpal ldan gyis dpal ldan 'bras spungs chos kyi sde chen por sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<item>

<vol>5884</vol>
<tib>dza ya pandi ta blo bzang snyan grags dge legs rnam rgyal gyi 'khrungs rabs gsol 'debs brtan</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003a * ces bstan pa'i gsal byed dza ya pandi ta blo bzang snyan grags dge legs rnam rgyal gyi 'khrungs rabs gsol 'debs brtan bzhugs dang bcas pa 'di ni phyag mdzod pa blo bzang dbang rgyal tshog thu da'i ching no yon sbyen pa aer khe nang so bstan 'dzin nom che dge bsgos 'jam dbyangs thon ga lag pi lig thu bstan pa @003b tshe ring hor tsha pi lig thu rnams kyis mdzod btags che ba sman rnying yug mdzod gos ser po yug bsod btags lnga bcas bstabs te khal kha do lu'u kho sho'u gi sbyin bdag grwa rigs tsha mang ngag 'don bgyis chog pa 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ngor sh'akya'i dge slong snyoms las pa blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtshos pho brang po ta la'i gzims chung nyi 'od 'khyil bar sbyar ba'o "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5884</vol>
<tib>gsol 'debs thugs rje myur 'jug ma</tib>
<p>1a-3b</p>
<col>@003a * (zhes pa ltar gyi rang la lung rtogs kyi yon tan gang yang med bzhin du rang la bstod pa ni @003b mkhas pa rnams khrel pa'i rgyur 'dug kyang rang gi slob ma ma mer ken chos rje aer te ni chos rje gnyis dang aa ri lug san yo ga ca ri dad pa dang gtong ba'i rgyan gyis mdzes pa'i aer te ni yel deng hong tah'i ji dang dpon mon [?} no dhar tshe dbang rdo rje rnams kyis ded rnams kyis rgyun du kha ton byas chog pa'i gsol 'debs zhig cis kyang dgos zhes nan tan chen pos bskul ba'i ngo mchog par byin rlabs kyi khyaad kyis tshigs bcad dang po dang mjug gi sho lo ka gsum rgyal dbang mchog gis mdzad pa rnams bcug cing gzhan sho lo ka bcu bdun gsar rtsom gyi tshul du tshig sbyor spangs te go bde bar rab 'byams smra ba sku skye blo bzang 'phrin las ming gzhan rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa chen po'i bka' lung gis dza ya pandi ta khu thug thu zhes 'khor pas dza sbyor gcig gi yun la sbyar ba'i dge bas bdag gzhan sems can thams cad myur du sangs rgyas thob par gyur cig  dge'o</col>

<col>@025b (ces sprul ba'i chos rgyal chen po 'khor dang bcas pa dgyes dgur spyod pa'i 'phrin las 'gag med rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs zhes pa 'di yang sa chen po bde bar skyong ba'i phyag mdzad bsod nams rab brtan gyis tshad la khyer bde ba zhig dgos zhes bskul ba la brten nas bla ma'i las byang thugs sgrub yang snying 'dus pa las bsdus shing gsol mchod kyi rim pa rnams mnga' bdag gter byon gyi 'phrin las don bcu ma dang sgrub bskor la gzhi byas thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtshos gnang ba las legs cha blangs shing tshig sbyor gsar du dgos pa rnams bsgrigs te gnod sbyin chen pos stong grogs tshul bzhin mdzad pa'i za hor gyi rigs las byung ba'i bande ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho @026a * bla med rdo rje rtsal gyis rgyal po chen pos phral du sgrub dgos pa'i mtshan ma byung ba ltar nyin gcig pa grub par bgyis pa'i yi ge pa ni ngag dbang dge legs so</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5885</vol>
<tib>rgyal ba'i bstan srung rgyal chen sde lnga'i gsol mchod kyi cho ga 'phrin las 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@014b (zhes rgyal ba'i bstan srung rgyal chen sde lnga'i gsol mchod kyi cho ga 'phrin las 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba 'di ni bstan 'gro spyi'i don la lhag bsam shin tu che zhing 'phags nor bdun gyis thugs kyi bum bzang legs par bltams pa grub chen pandi ta ho thog thu bla ma ngag dbang blo bzang dge legs rgya mtsho nas gsung nan chen pos bskul ngo dang 'di ga'i bla brang du'ang bskang bshags grangs gsog byed skabs nye @015a * bar mkho ba cas ^drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma 'jam mgon bstan pa'i srog shing rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs bzhed ltar ^btsun pa ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis ^mnyam med ri bo dge ldan pa'i bka' srung rnams kyi gtor chog gi 'gros dang mthun par jo bo byang chub chen po'i pho brang ^gong ma'i lung gis bsod nams kun sdud gling zhes bsngags pa'i gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni nye mkhor ba chi hu la chos rje thon zhabs drung blo bzang ae wam gyis bgyis pa 'dis kyang chos byed rnams kyi 'dod don mtha' dag 'grub pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5885</vol>
<tib>rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi chos skor las bka' bsrung rdo rje legs pa'i gtor chog shin tu 'khyer bde ba</tib>
<p>1a-7a</p>
<col>@006b (skyes mchog rdo rje legs pa'i gtor chog zhes bya ba 'di yang don gnyer ba 'ga' zhig gis 'di lta bu'i cha tshang la khyer bde ba tshigs bcad du sdebs pa zhig dgos zhes nan gyis bskul ngor ku s'a li ^dharma badzra gyis bla ma dam pa'i gsung las btus te shing sprul lha babs @007a * kyi dus chen nyin sbyin pa'i bdag po mi dbang ratna siddhi pho brang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni aananta'o dge'o  'jam dbyangs gong ma rgyal po'i bka' lung gis bkra shis dar rgyas gling zhes mchog tu bsngags pa'i mdo sngags zung ngu 'brel ba'i ngo mtshar pa'i grwa tshang 'dir 'par bsgrun pa'i dge bas chos bsrung dam can rnams rang cug dge 'dun rnams la ga-yel med grogs mdzad de bar chad sel zhing 'phrin las lhun gyis grub par mdzad du gsol mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5886</vol>
<tib>bde mchog la brten pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor snyan brgyud yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@006a * ces rje btsun dam pa rang byung rdo rje la brten pa'i bde mchog gi bla ma'i rnal 'byor snyan brgyud yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs rus phun tshogs pa'i dad ldan blo gsal don gnyer can dge slong lung rtogs kysi bskul zhing rang nyid kyang da mos kysi mtshams byar te bla ma dam pa du ma'i zhabs rdul spyi bos blangs pa'i mthu las chos 'di'i snyan brgyud gdams pa bka' drin du thob pa'i sngags rams pa bstan dar gyis ^aam pan t'a chin wang gi dgon sder sug bris bgyis pa'o chos 'di gnam dang sa las 'ongs pa min dag snang rang shar gsar bshad ma yin na'ang dam pa rgod mas bka' rgya dam bcas pa'i gdams pa rnams las btus pas gsang ba gces "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5886</vol>
<tib>bka' drin bla med rtsa ba'i bla ma nges pa don gyi mkhas pa chen po ngag dbang dpal ldan pa'i mtshan can gyi yon tan brjod pa'i sgo nas bstod pa'i snyan tshig dbyed kyi dpal mo'i glu dbyangs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces bla ma'i thugs rje bskul ba'i gsol 'debs gdung dbyangs byin rlabs myur 'gugs lcags kyu zhes bya ba 'di ni gyi na ba bshad sgrub bstan dar gyis rang gi skyong mtshad sa yi skyo nas dad pas sbyar ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5886</vol>
<tib>bla ma'i rnal 'byor don gnyis lhun grub zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>6a-7a</p>
<col>@007a * zhes rje btsun dam pa sku phreng dang po dang 'brel ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor don gnyis lhun grub ces bya ba 'di ni dad brtson rnam dpyod ldan pa lha btsun lung rtogs kyis bskul ma mdzad pa bzhin khu re chen mo'i grwa rigs sngags rams pa bshad sgrub bstan dar rang nyid kyang dad mos kyis mtshams sbyar te rab tshes lcag 'brug lo'i chu stod zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes bzhi par aam pan t'a chen wang gi dgon sde chen por sug bris su bgyis pa'o mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5886</vol>
<tib>bum bskyed dang mdun bskyed</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5888</vol>
<tib>rje btsun bla ma dam pa mchog sprul rin po che'i sku 'phreng brgyad pa'i brtan bzhugs gsol 'debs 'chi med rdo rje srog shing zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * ces pa 'di yang rje btsun bla ma dam pa mchog sprul rin po che'i sku 'phreng brgyad pa dgung lo so bdun pa'i bsu dang skyel ma'i sku tshe bar chad zhi ba'i phyir du bla ma yi dam la snying nas gsol ba 'debs pas brtan bzhugs gsol 'debs 'chi med rdo rje srog shing zhes bya ba 'di nyid ^mkhan zur ba ngag dbang blo bzang don grub kyis bris pa yi ge pa ni dge bshes blo bzang shes ra kyis bgyi'o bkra shis par gyur cig "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<col>@006b (aarga'i chog bya tshul gsal bar bkod pa go bde blags chog ces bya ba 'di ni gzims khang ser po'i bla ma blo bzang dpal 'byor dang khyung ko'i se'i dge slong bsod rnams bstan pa la sogs pa don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis bskul ba ltar gyi na ba ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis be'i cing gi bod chog lha khang du grags par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni legs bshad du ma la blo gros yangs pa'i dge tshul dpal bzang ngo @007a * 'dis kyang bstan 'gro la phan par gyur cig  dge'o legs s+ho bkra shis par gyur cig mangga lam</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5899</vol>
<tib># bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi rjes gnang cho ga</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@016b (ces 'od dpag med kyi sgrub thabs dang rjes gnang gi cho ga bklags pas don grub ces bya ba 'di ni mang thos mtho sngags rab 'byams smra ba sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yang dang yang du gsung gis bskul ba dang sku'i skye ba gsar du bzhes pa'i sku skyes gzhon nu rnams dang gsar du bla ma mdzad pa rnams la yang @017a * phan 'dod kyi bsam pas kun nas slangs te bka' 'gyur ba rab 'byams smra ba'i sku skye blo bzang 'phrin las ming gzhan rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen po'i bka' lung gis dza ya pandi ta khu thug zhes 'bod pas dngos su 'od dpag med la sbyar na'ang lha'i mngon rtogs sngags sogs bsgyur nas spyi la sbyar chog pa 'di ni 'phags yul du purthi wa zhes 'bod cing mah'a tsi na'i yul du yi yi'u zhes grags la bstod 'grel ba ltar nas sa skyong zhes pa shing bya hor zla lnga pa'i tshes bcwo bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i nyin rdzogs par sug bris su bgyis pa las shog bur bris pa'i yi ge pa ni lo tstsha sogs chos la blo mig yangs pa aer te ni gu shr'i'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig mangga lam</col>
</item>

<p>1a-20a</p>
<col>@019b (ces rgyal ba'i bstan bsrung dgra lha'i @020a * rgyal po chos skyong chen po rgyas po sku lnga'i sgo nas zor las byed tshul dgra bgegs thal bar rlog pa'i gnam lcags rdo rje thoa mda' zhes bya ba 'di ni ^kun mkhyen lnga pa chen po mdzad pa'i rgyal po phyes chas ke tu'i ngag pa'i bsgrigs dgra srog cod pa'i swu gri dang rigs 'dzin pad+ma 'phrin las kyi mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs sprin nag 'khrigs pa las btus bod rbod bsang gsum ni man ngag gnyer bsdus gnam lcags 'bar ba dang mkhan chen bskal bzang rab rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i sku'i rgyal po chen zos gar gyi srin mo drag tu khros pa'i rnam pa can gnod gnod sbyin chen las brten nas 'bod rbad bsang gsum gyi zor las dang 'brel tshul de nyid dgra bgegs kyi srog gcod spu gri rnon po rnams la gzhir byas kha 'gengs dgos pa rnams bla ma dam yi gsungs pa las kha bskang te 'di 'khyer bde ba'i lugs la mi bskyed pa'i lugs gzhung du mi gsal yang` `lha bskyed pa'i lugs yin la'ang gtor sgrub bzhin cho ga gzhung du mi gsal yod kyang zhag spel na byin rlabs che ba dang bstan pa dang dgon gnas ched du dang sems can mang po la phan pa'i re ba bsam kun nas blangs te smyong las pa aa mo gha badzras bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson dang ldan pa dge slong blo bzang phun tshogs so</col>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5899</vol>
<tib>lha mo gtad dkar 'gro bzang ma'i grub chog dang 'brel ba'i mchod gtor bya tshul phyugs ga-yang 'gug byed don yod lcags kyu zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@017a * (zhes lha mo gtad dkar 'gro bzang ma'i grub chog dang 'brel ba'i dus mchod bya tshul phyug ga-yang 'gugs byed don yod lcags kyu'i zhes bya ba 'di ni sgrub thabs rin chen 'byung dang blo bzang 'phrin las dbang pos mdzad pa'i gtad dkar 'gro bzang ma'i gtor chog sogs la gzhir byas ste go sla zhing 'khyer bde bar blo bzang lhun grub ming can gyis sbyar yi ge pa ni dge slong ngag dbang 'byung gnas so 'dis kyang 'gro ba mang po la nges par phan thogs par 'gyur cig</col>
</item>

<tib>rgyal ba kun gyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed kyi rim pa dang po'i man ngag tshigs bcad du sdebs pa man ngag gnad kyi lde mig ces bya ba</tib>

<col>@015b (ces rgyal ba kun gyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das ^'jam dpal gshin rje gshed kyi rim pa ang po'i man ngag tshigs bcad du sdebs pa man ngag gnad kyi lde mig ces bya ba 'di ni da las dbang gi shog nas dge slong aer te ni than dge skos bsod nams bkra shis dang ching so chug thu no mo khang gi gsol dpon che chen thon blo bzang dpal 'byor gnyis kyis bskul ba ltar ^rje rgyal ba gnyis pa yab sras brgyud par bcas pa'i man ngag spyi dang khyad par du ^rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi khyab bdag drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen nges pa don gyi thams cad mkhyen pa bka' drin mtshungs med mtshan brjod par dka' ba ^rje btsun blo bzang bskal bzang rgya mtsho'i zhal gyi bum bzang las stsal ba'i legs bshad chen mo dang dben sa snyan brgyud kyi gdams pa gzhir bzung zhing khyad par bka' drin mtshungs zla ma mchis pa khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo ^rje ngag dbang byams pa rin po che'i zhal lung mchog gis brgyan cing mkhas grub yongs kyi 'khor bsgyur rje lcang skya ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan gyis khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang @016a * chen po rje btsun bzang po bkra shis kyis mdzad pa'i za ma tog lhan thabs las brtsams te man ngag gi sgo 'byed pa'i legs bsgad kyis dgag sgrub chen po mdzad pa'i dgongs pa chen po gnysi kyang gsal bar byas te byad kha pa'i khrod kyi mdo dang gsang sngags zab mo'i bshad sgrub spyod pa'i 'dus pa'i sde chen po dag gi gnas brtan gyi bya ba byed pa ^'jam dpal gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pa ming du thos pa'i dge slong gyi na pa blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyis shangs dga' ldan bde chen rab rgyas gling gi gzims chung nyi 'od 'khyil 'chi med grub pa'i pho brang du sug bris su byas pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5901</vol>
<tib>rje bla ma sman khang pa'i dag snang dmigs brtse ma'i sgo nas char 'bebs sad bsrung pa'i 'khor lo sgrub tshul bcas</tib>

<col>@015a * (ces char 'bebs dang sad bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sgrub tshul ser smad mkhan zur rin po che blo bzang thugs rje'i gsung 'bum du bzhugs pa 'di bzhin rgyas bsdus mtshams zhing bla ma'i man ngag gis rgyan pa sogs gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa bcas da dung 'don chog rnams gzhan nas ba bka' ste phyogs bsgrigs zhig par du 'khor pa byed dgos zhes spangs lung bla ma rin po che rje ngag dbang chos 'dzin dpal bzang pos bka' stsal ba bzhin bla ma'i dgongs pa bskang phyir yongs 'dzin khri zur rin po che nas 'don chog rnams gzhan nas kha bka' ste par gyi mthun brkyen gang dgos stsal ba'i thags rje bla ma sbangs lung rdo rje 'chang de nyid kyi dgongs rdzogs sgrub pa'i 'phros dngul phran bu yod pa rnams kyang mthun brkyen du 'gro bar byas nas par du sgrub ste rwa che'i rgyud khang steng du bzhugs so sarba mangga lam</col>

<item>

<col>@009b (ces pa 'di ni dad brtson blo gros dang ldan pa bsod nams bzang pos lhamchog 'di la bstod pa rgyas pa rje bla ma'i gsung gi bstod sprin rgya mtsho lta bu zhig dgos zhes nan gyis bskul bar brten tshig don gang thad nas de'i phyogs su 'gro ba tsam 'ong ba'i re ba ga la yod kyang mkha' lding dbang pos bgrod pa'i shul du bye'u srtsol ba ltar dam pa'i rjes su kha mig yang bltas pa la gzhan gyis 'phyas gdags pa'i don med cing rang nyid skal ba bzang po'i rten 'brel du @010a * bsams te ^btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes rgyal ba'i lung gis zin pa'i chos grwa chen po bkra shis 'khyil gyi nye 'dabs dben gnas yid dga' chos 'dzin du sug bris bgyis pa las shog bur 'bebs pa po ni bikshu ratna a'ananta'o 'di'ang rang gzhan kun gyi rgyud la gnas lugs rtogs pa'i shes rab khyad par can skye ba'i rgyur gyur cig ) ye shes bde ba'i rdo rje 'jam pa'i dbyangs dbyangs can stong chen yum dang zung 'jug pa'i ngo bo skyabs gsum kun 'dus bla ma la gsol ba 'debs so mchog gi shes rab stsol ('di rje btsun dam pa sku 'phreng gong ma'i gsung ngo</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5907</vol>
<tib>dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya tshul gyi cho ga blo bzang dgongs rgyan shel dkar me long zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-30a</p>
<col>@030a * (ces dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgo nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byed tshul gyi cho ga yab rje rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bzhed srol gsal bar byed pa blo bzang dgongs rgyan shel dkar mi lo bzhes bya ba 'di ni yul byang phyogs kyi mthar skyes pa'i gyi na ba ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang po zhes bgyi bas dben gnas byang chub gling zhes bya bar sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa'i bstan pa phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig </col>

<col>@010b (ces pa 'di ni rnam dpyod kyis mngon par mtho ba'i grogs bzang 'ga' zhig gi thugs bzhed bskang ba'i rkyen byung bar brten ^blo bzang rgyal ba'i mkha' lding dbang pos rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sku gsung thugs kyi nam mkha' la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'dab gshog gis 'dod dgur rol pa'i rjes su @011a * rgyud 'dzin chen po ^gung thang ngang pa'i rgyal pos 'phags mchog 'jam dpal dkar po'i gsang gsum gyi lha lam yangs por gzhan dring mi 'jog pa'i mkhyen rab kyi gshog bzang dal gyis bskyod pa la kha mig yang bltas kyi tshul du byi'u'i gshog rtsal gyis nam 'phang chod mi nus kyang nus tshad dang bstun pa'i 'phung lding gis rang gi don sgrub pa la 'gal ba med pas gzhan gyis 'phyas 'dags pa'i don med cing rang nyid kyang lhag pa'i lha mor ngag gi 'brel ba bzang po zhig 'jog tu re bas kun nas bslangs te sa mtha'i btsun gras wag'indra pa tu siddhas ^ri bo dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bcu drug cha shas yongs su rdzogs pa'i zhal bzang la rgyal phung 'dzom te dga' bas bsu ba byed pa'i 'grub sbyor gyi nyin mor bstod pa gong ma gnyis kyi tshig zung ma brkus par don 'grel du bsdebs pa 'di'ang gzhung lugs rgya mtsho'i tshig don la gtugs pa med par 'jug pa'i ngag dang shes rab kyi snang ba rang gzhan gyi rgyud la 'jug pa'i gnyis kyi tshig zung ma brkus par don 'grel du bsdebs pa 'di'ang gzhung lugs rgya mtsho'i tshig don la gtugs pa med par 'jug pa'i ngag dang shes rab kyi snang ba rang gzhan gyi rgyud la 'jug pa'i rgyur gyur cig sarba dza yantu</col>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5910</vol>
<tib>rje btsun sengge sgra la brten pa'i klu'i sbyin sreg bya tshul bdud rtsi'i mchod sbyin zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-18a</p>
<col>@017a * ces rje btsun sengge sgra dang 'brel ba'i klu'i sbyin sreg bya tshul bdud rtsi'i mchod sbyin zhes bya ba 'di ni dpyod ldan lhag @018b bsam dang ldan pa rten gsum bskrun te 'gro ba rnams la phan bde'i sgo 'byed lha bzo dbang po dge slong thon ci blo bzang 'jam dbyangs dang gzhung lugs lta ba'i blo mig yangs shing dad brtson dang ldan pa dge slong dkon mchog dga' ba gnyis kyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes yang yang au tsugs kyis bskul ba don yod par bya ba'i phyir skyabs mgon rje btsun dam pa rim byon gyi gdan sa mdo sngags rig gnas kyi tshal khu re chen mo ri bo dge rgyas dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling du sa mtha'i btsun gras mkhas grub ming can gyis de skor gyi gzhung du mar dpyad de bsgrigs pa 'dis kyang 'gro ba rnams nyer 'tshe kun las rgyal bar gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<tib>'od zer can ma'i mngon rtogs</tib>

</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5911</vol>
<tib>'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' ba'i gnad kun gsal bar byed pa'i mchan bu sher phyin lam gyi sgron me zhes</tib>
<p>1a-36a</p>
<col>@035a * zhes sher phyin stong phrag brgyad pa dang mngon rtogs rgyan sbyar te don bdun cu'i mchan bu bkod pa 'di ni sher phyin gyi man ngag 'dzin pa sh'akya'i dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis lcags mo phag gi lo cho 'phrul zla ba'i yar tshes la tshe mchog bkra shis bsam gtan gling du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa'i snying po mthar thug 'di nyid nam yang mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cig  de ltar bdag cag gi bla ma nges don gyi mkhas grub chen po de nyid nas bstan pa kho na thugs la bzhag ste ^ rgyal ba'i bstan pa'i snying po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzhung 'di nyid la dpyad pa du ma'i sgo nas zhus dag mdzad cing don bdun cu'i rkang grangs rnams gzhung nyid du bka' mchan mdzad 'dug pa bzhin thar chags su par du bsgrub na mchan bu bskyar nas bri mi dgos pa'i 'jug pa bde ba yong 'dug kyang mdo 'di klog 'don du mdzad pa rnams la dkyus mchan gnyis res 'jog bya dgos kyi gzigs bde min 'dug pa bcas ljags zhus kyi brgyad stong pa zur du par bkod grub pa ltar dang bka' mchan 'di bzhin rkyang ba tsam bkod na mchan bu gar 'gro'i sa mtshams rtogs dka' bas de dag la phan khyad don tshan so so'i mtshams kyi shog grangs kha gsal bkod yod par ma zad don bdun cu so so'i sa mtshams su sprul shad re dang nang gses kyi don tshan rnams la shad rtags 'di 'dra ba re yod pas de thog tu mchan bu gnang tshe ljags zhus mchan sbrags ma nyid dang ji bzhin mthun @035b pas de ltar du mdzad 'tshal lo aom swa sti rab 'byams rgyal ba sraws bcas thams cad las rab mang 'gro la thugs rje ches lhag pa rab mchog rnam 'dren dam pa sh'akya'i gtsor rab tu gus pa'i yid kyis gsol ba 'deb dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi 'gred gcig lam theg gsum dam chos kun gyi snying po'i bcud mkhyen gsum sbyor bzhi'i lam gyi gnad rdzogs pa shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di nyid do sher phyin dgongs don zab cing rgya mtsho'i don dri med ye shes stobs kyi legs phye ba legs bshad gzi 'od 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan 'dis 'gro blo'i rmongs mun ma lus sel bar shog  ji srid lhun po gnas pa de srid du lam bzang 'di yis skal ldan 'gro ba la yang dag lam gyi snang ba ster ba'i phyir 'dzad med chos sbyin dal 'gro'i rgyun 'di spel 'di ltar sgrub la 'brel thogs skye bo kun gnas skabs tshe ring bsam pa'i don kun 'grub theg chen lam gyi nyams len mthar phyin nas bla med byang chub myur du thob gyur cig  tshe dpal mchog thun dngos grub 'du ba'i glingdge 'dun khrims gtsang legs tshogs lhun gyis grub bstan 'gro'i mgon du rje btsun bla ma yi gsar sku'i rgyal mtshan ring min gsal gyur cig  blo bzang rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa'i gnad phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing @036a * rgyas pa dang bstan 'dzin skyes bu sku tshe rgyal mtshan bstan 'gro kun bde skyid ldan pa'i bkra shis shog  ces ngos kyi yongs 'dzin dam pa rje btsun ye shes rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po do nyid la dad ldan rnams kyis bskul ma zhus pa'i bka' 'bum rnams bstan 'gror sman pa'i legs bshad rmad du byung bar song gshis ngas nas khur len gyis byings che bar brkos bgyis zin pa'i 'phros rnams dang ^ rje de nyid nas brgyad stong pa'i yig snying rnams la ljags zhus kyi thog gzhung di dang mngon rtogs rgyan sbyar te don bdun cu'i mchan bu 'dir bar mdzad pa rnams tshe mchog bsam gtan gling du par brkos kyi las gra tshugs pa legs par grub pa'i dge ba bsngo byang 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes dam pa gang de'i sku'i nyi gnas dge slong chos mdzad dge legs rgyal mtshan gyis bskul ma byung ba ltar ^ sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang bstan pa'i dbang phyug 'jam dpal rgya mtshos sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni nye 'khor ba gsol dpon rje drung dge legs rgyal mtshan no ) "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5911</vol>
<tib>sgrol ma nyer gcig gi sgrub thabs las tshogs</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@005b (ces seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma dang sgrol ma nyer gcig gi sgrub thabs mu tig 'phreng ba zhes bya ba 'di ni yul byang @006a * phyogs kyi mthar skyes pa'i sprang btsun snyoms las pa blo bzang ming can gyis byams chen lha khang du bris pa dge legs su gyur cig  mangga lam)"</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5911</vol>
<tib>tshe dpag med dkar po'i sgrub thabs</tib>

<col>@002b (grub chen mi tra dzo ki nas brgyud pa'i tshe dpag med dkar po'i mngon rtogs shin tu bsdus pa 'di ni rigs rus phun sum tshogs pa'i dad ldan so nyid kyi tha'i ji seng gdong mas rgyun 'khyer du 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor ban rgan snyom las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos mtsho bdun gyi lha khang chen mor sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson dge slong bstan 'dzin chos dar ro bkra shis</col>

<col>@004a * ces pa 'di ni sdom brtson chos la 'dun pa'i dpyod ldan aer dhe ni ti yang chi bstan 'dzin rgya mtshos bskul ba'i ngor ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge tshul ngag dbang stobs ldan no 'di'i brgyud pa ni rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang rdo rje rnal 'byor ma slob dpon abhya ka ra shu bha ka ra kupta su tsa ri ka ra kupta ratna rakshi ta go ram shri ratna kirti lo tstsha ba grags rgyal rong pa shes rab seng ge sag ston gzhon nu tshul khrims mkhon shes rab rdo rje mkhan chen rin chen 'phel slob dpon kun dga' bsod nams mkhan chen byang chub seng ge mkhan chen chos kyi 'od zer bla ma bsod nams bzang po chos rje nam mkha' rgyal mtshan rdo rje 'chan mkhyen rab rje kun mkhyen sh'aky'a don grub 'jam dbyangs kun dga' legs grub byams pa kun dga' chos grags 'dren mchog mchog legs rdo rje mkhyen rab bstan 'dzin bzang po mkhyen rab byams pa ngag dbang lhun grub des bdag ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan la'o "</col>

<col>@008b (de ltar thog mtha' bar du dge ba'i smon lam gyi dgongs don gsal bar byed pa legs bshad sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni chas pa bde thang zhabs drung aer dhe ni pandi ta rnam rgyal no min han gyis bka' nan chen pos bskul ba dang do lon nor gyi t'a bla ma ka chen bka' 'gyur ba blo bzang tshul khrims @009a * sogs rang gi nye 'khor ba du mas kyang bskul ba la brten nas ban rgan snyoms las pa ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos rang gi blo gros chung ngu la shar tshod tsam zhig zung gru zi ru sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni chos la 'dun pa'i dpyod ldan dge tshul blo bzang tshe ring ngo 'dis kyang rgyal ba blo bzang grags pa'i bstan pa phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  mangga lam</col>

<p>17b-37a</p>
<col>@036b (ces dpal ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i gdong pa can gtso 'khor gsum gyi bdag mdun bskang bshags bstod bskal bsgral las gtor bzlog dang bcas pa'i rnam bzhag mkha' 'gro'i dgongs rgyan zhes bya ba 'di ni snga sor gzhung lugs du ma la spobs pa mchog tu dge ba rab 'byams smra ba ngag dbang shes rab kyis bskul te har chin thu med kyi sa char gsar rtsom bgyis pa zhig yod kyang der bskral @037a * las kyi rim pa ma tshang bar brten phyis su mdzo dge stod nas don gnyer ba 'ga' zhig gis cha tshang dgos zhes bskul ngor sngam la bsgyur 'god phran bu dang kha sbyor dbye ba'i skor yang kha bskang ste ^btsun pa dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang pos ga-yar khral du sbyar ba dge bar gyur cig </col>

<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5913</vol>
<tib>zhing skyong chen po gnod sbyin kshe tra p'a la'i mngon rtogs bskang bshags bstod bskul dang bcas pa'i rim pa drag po'i rdo rje'i 'brug sgra zhes bya ba bzhugs "</tib>
<p>9b-17b</p>
<col>@017b (ces zhing skyong chen po gnod sbyin kshe tra p'a la'i mngon rtogs bskang bshags bstod bskul dang bcas pa'i rim pa drag po rdo rje'i 'brug sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi ha ldong khang tshan spyi nas bskul ma mdzad pa bzhin 'di'i sgos sgrub dang 'khor bzhi'i sbrags sgrub dang mkhas grub thams cad mkhyen pas mdzad pa'i gtor bshad sogs la zhib tu dpyad te zhwa ser cod pan 'dzin pa ^sh'akya'i dge slong dkon mchog 'jigs med dbang po ye shes brtson 'grus grags pa'i sdes dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi chos grwar sbyar ba'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5914</vol>
<tib>ma ni pa bsam gtan rgya mtsho'i mdzad pa bla ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs s+ho "</tib>
<p>1a-63a</p>
<col>@062b (ces gangs can 'gro ba'i mgon po thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga rnam gzhag rgyas pa bshad pa tshig don gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba 'di ni snga mo nas dad brtson rnam dpyod phun sum tshogs dang ldan pa'i bya btang ba bde ba'i 'byung gnas dang rigs pas smras ba 'phrin las dang blo bzang rgya mtshos sogs rang gi slob ma'i mang po zhig dang khyad par du ri khrod 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dka' bcu pa skal ldan nyi shar dang bde legs rgya mtsho khu dbon dang bkra shis dar rgyas sogs kyis yang yang bskul bar byas kyang sngon chad phyogs 'dir cho ga 'di'i bshad pa mthong thos gang yang med pa'i dbang gis dam pa'i man ngag med par rang bzo'i tshul du gyur na mi rung snyam du dogs nas re zhig btang snyoms su bzhag kyang phyis su mdo smad lho phyogs kyi yul gyi bstan 'gro'i dpung gnyen dam pa khom thog sku skyes rin po che blo bzang dge legs dang sde snod 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dka' bcu rab 'byams du ma dang dang ldan gyi dge slong spongs ba pa mang po zhig gis nan tshig gis @063a * bskul ba'i tshe chos 'di la mchog tu dad pa'i snga phyi'i bskul ba po de rnams kyi gsung bcag ma phod pa dang rang yang chos 'di la dad pa'i kun nas blangs te mdo rgyud mkhas grub dam pa rnams kyi gsung ngag dri ma med pa la brten nas rang gi go tshod tsam zhig srin po zhes pa shing mo yos lo'i sbrab ldan gyi zla ba'i dkar phyogs rgyal ba dang po'i tshes la reb gong stod kyi dpe zhi ba'i gnas mchog dar zhing bde dzom kyi dga' ba'i tshal du dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i rje btsun bla ma dam pa de nyid la cho ga 'di'i bshad lung sogs legs par zhus pa'i bka' 'bangs kyi tha shal du gtogs pa yul re ba gong gi ma ni pa bsam gtan rgya mtsho ming gzhan yi dog ces bya bas legs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dad brtson dan ldan pa'i dge tshul don grub rgya mtsho'o 'dis kyang 'gro kun theg pa mchog gi bshes gnyen dam pas rjes su 'dzin par gyur cig 'di la 'bri 'don byed par 'dod pa'i blo chen rnams la zhu ci 'tshal blo dman bdag 'dra rnams kyis ni tshig bsdebs shin tu dag ngos nas 'tshal skag gur gum la sogs pa'i na bza' 'dzom zhing dbul bzhed na rtsa bshad sa bcad lung khungs mtshan rnam par dbye phyir zhib mo'i blos mtshan dang 'gyur phyag tsam ma gtogs dpe 'di'i 'og mjug thams cad du skag can sa bcad lung khungs ni mtshal can rtsa ba'i 'don cha ni ser chung rtsa ba'i lung dang mtshan ser chen bshad pa'i rgyab rten lung snag brkyang gzhung don bshad pa ru shes par bgyis la lag len mdzod dpe 'di ni snod min dad dbang thob pa rnams la bstan pa'i bya'o dge legs 'phel bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling brgyan du shog dga' ldan phun tshogs gling du bris so dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5917</vol>
<tib>'phags mchog sengge'i sgra lha lnga'i sgrub thabs dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga lag tu blang bde bar bkod pa nyes brgya'i tsha gdung sel ba'i kat'ur zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-30b</p>
<col>@030a * (ces 'phags mchog sengge'i sgra lha lnga'i sgrub thabs dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga lag tu blang bde bar bkod pa nyes brgya'i tsha gdung sel ba'i katp'ur zhes bya ba 'di ni ^ rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi khyab bdag bka' drin mtshungs med dpal ldan bla ma dam pa blo bzang bkra shis dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' stsal dang du blangs te ^ gang gi bka' drin kho nas nye bar 'tsho ba'i ban gzugs no mong hang gi skye sprul ming 'chang su ma ti aa bhya sh'a sa na sya dhwa dzas ^ grub chen mi tra dzo gis mdzad par grags pa'i mngon dkyil nyid gzhir bzung ga-yer shongs @030b sngags rams pa 'jam dbyangs blo gros sogs mkhas grub gong ma du ma'i rigs mthun tshaed thub kyi gzhung sams la gzhigs gtso bo'i rgyal ba khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang chen po'i lam gyi rim pa'i dgongs don dang mi 'gal ba'i phyogs nyid gtso bor bzung ste skabs su gang babs kyi kha skong mtshams sbyar ci rigs pa dang bcas 'jug bde bklags chog gi tshul du nye bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan nye drung dge slong ma ti bi'i ras bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang thub bstan kun gyi snying po 'jam mgon chos kyi rgyal po'i ring lugs dri ma med pa 'di nyid nam yang mi nub cing phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring gnas par gyur cig </col>

<p>1a-16a</p>
<col>@016a * (ces bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo sdon pa grub chen dril bu zhabs lugs lha lnga'i zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bde chen 'od 'bar zhes bya ba 'di ni lam 'di la mos pa'i las kyi rdo rje dge slong bstan 'dzin bzang pos bsnyen pa'i kha skong dang dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod sogs kyi cha lag tu cho ga bsgrigs 'khyer bde ba zhig ces kyang dgos zhes nan tan du bskul zhing blo gsar don gnyer can gzhan dag la'ang nyer mkhor mthong nas ^ dam pa gong ma rnams kyis mdzad pa'i l'u dril gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga du ma la gzhigs te go bde bklag chog gi tshul du mkhas pa'i 'grub pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin las lugs di'i smin grol gyi gdams pa mang du thos pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i tha shal ba ^ dam tshig rdo rjes bsgrigs pa 'dis kyang 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i ring lugs dpal ldan sdom pa'i bshad sgrub kyi bstan pa rin po che 'di nyid phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par byed nus par gyur cig  mah'a su kha siddha mme wa ya tstsha tu dge legs 'phel</col>

<item>

<item>

<col>@014b (ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yab yum gyi sgrub thabs mdor bsdus zung 'jug rnam rol zhes bya ba 'di ni lam 'di la lhag par mos pa'i slob ma 'ga' zhig gis thos bsam gtso bor byed pa'i skabs sogs su rgyun bam sgrub thabs rgyas pa mi lcogs par 'jug pas bskyed rim gyi gnad tshang ba'i nyams len snying por dril ba zhig dgos zhes nan han du bskul ba'i ngor bla ma gong ma dag gi man ngag phyag bzhes la brten nas ^rje bdag nyid chen po'o rdo rje'i gsung mngon rgos zung las ci rigs par bsdus te 'jam dpal zhi khro'i rnal 'byor la mos pas spyod pa'i btsun gzugs ^dam tshig rdo rjes sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni gus ldan dge slong blo bzang nam mkha' rdo rje'o  'dis kyang 'jam mgon bla ma'i mdo sngags kyi bstan pa dri ma med pa 'di dag phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par byed nus par gyur cig dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5920</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum la brten nas rang gzhan gyi don bsgrub tshul dngos grub bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-16a</p>
<col>@015b (ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum gyi bdag mdun gyi rnal 'byor la brten nas rang gzhan gyi don bsgrub tshul dngos grub @016a * bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba di ni las smon dge bas 'brel ba'i yid mthun gyi slob ma gus ldan dge slong rab dga' blo ldan gyis dang gzhan la phan pa'i lhag bsam rnam par ddag pas kun nas bslangs te phan yon che la nyams su blang bde ba'i zab chos zhig dgos zhes nan tan du bskul ba la brten nas tshul 'di lta bu zhig byung na mchog dman kun la phan che bar mthong ste mkhas shing grub pa'i bla ma dam pa du ma'i bka' drin las lha mchog 'di nyid kyi smin grol gyi gdams pa lan mang du thos pa'i btsun gzugs ^ dam tshig rdo rjes rang gi bsti gnas sgrub sde yid dga' chos 'dzin gyi gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan slob bu dge slong dge 'dun dar rgyas so dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<tib>mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu'i gtor chog bsam 'phel dbang gi rgyal po zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-13b</p>
<col>@013b (ces mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu'i gtor chog bsam 'phel dbang gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'di ni don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis bskul ba la brten nas btsun gzugs snyoms las pa dharma badzra gyis skyed tshul yid dga' chos 'phel du shar mar spel ba'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5925</vol>
<tib>myur mdzad ye shes kyi mgon po'i phyag drug pa'i bzlog bsgyur zhes bya ba</tib>

<tib>bcom ldan 'das ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma lha dgu la brten pa'i zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'chi med tshe'i dpal bskyed ces bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5927</vol>
<tib>bcom ldan 'das ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma lha dgu'i cho ga dang 'brel bar 'chi blu bya tshul 'chi bdag ga-yul las rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-8a</p>
<col>@008a * (ces slob dpon dze t'a ri'i zugs kyi rje btsun bcom lddan 'das ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma lha dgu'i cho ga la brten nas 'chi blu ji ltar bya tshul gsal bar bkod pa 'chi bdag ga-yul las rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba 'di ni sbyir dgos don khyad par can la dpag ste rigs mthun gyi man ngag rnams phan tshun rgyas bkab cho ga brgyud dang grub chen dang dam pa tshad ldan ngag gi phyag bzhes yid pa bzhin do gal che ba'i skabs zhig lag len 'di ltar bgyis pas rten 'byung gi legs lam che ba zhig byung bar brten chog sgrigs kyi yi ge 'di lta bu byung na rang gzhan mang po la'ang phan par bsams te bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin kho nas 'tsho ba'i snyom las pa d'irkh'a au sa ma ya badzra k'irtis sngar bkod pa'i rnam rgyal mchod choggi yan lag tu sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan slob bu tshe dang ldan pa bstan 'dzin bzang po'o 'dis kyang bstan 'dzin dam pa rnams kyi zhabs pad brtan cing bstan 'gror sman pa'i bzhed don mtha' dag bgegs med lhun gyis 'grub pa dang skye 'gro mang po la phan bde'i legs tshogs rgya chen po rgyun mi 'chad du 'gyur ba'i rgyur gyur cig </col>

<item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5927</vol>
<tib>dbyangs can dgyes glu'i mchan 'grel snyan ngag kun gyi 'jug sgo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-26b</p>
<col>@026a * (bla ma'i gnas skabs ni bla ma'i bka'i gnas skabs kun gzigs lnga pas mdzad pa'i dbyangs can dgyes glu'i brjod byed tshig gi lung tsam gyi brgyud pa yod kyang brjod bya don gyi rgyud pa rgyun chad pas yid gting nas skyo ste sgo sna tshogs nas thabs gtugs nas dang snyan ngag gis bon tsam tshugs na cim rung snyam du smon pa'i yid kyis bskul te bka' bcu blo bzang bkra shis kyis bris pa'o 'dis kyang bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par 'gyur cig  @026b aom swa sti bod yul aa mdo'i mkhas rnams kyang 'grel pa ma brtsoms lus pa yi shin tu rtogs dka'i gnas 'di la 'grel pa brtsoms pa ngo mtshar ro bstan pa rdzogs ldan nyin dus su ma byung mtha' 'khob mtshan mo ru ngo mtshar nyi ma 'di shar pas mkhas kun dga' ba'i me tog rgyas par bskrun rnam dkar dge tshogs mthus bstan 'dzin dam pa zhabs pad brtan bstan pa'i 'gal rkyen kun zhi nas bstan pa yun ring gnas gyur cig  (ces pa 'di ni pandi ta'i btags ming gis sgro 'dogs pa blo bzang thub bstan nyi mas bris pa'o hal kha ching su tsug thu'i khu ri dge ldan bshad sgrub bstan pa rgyas pa'i gling du par du bsgrubs so</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5927</vol>
<tib>rgya skad glog thabs kyi gzhung don dper brjod dang bcas pa bklags pa gcag pa zhugs so "</tib>
<p>1a-15a</p>
<col>@014b de lta na rgya skad slog pa'i gzhung don dper brjod dang bcas pa 'di ni yi ge pa dge slong kun dga' bde legs kyis bkod pa'o lar ni gzhung 'di gsung @015a * dngos las mthos pa dang spyangs pa dman zhing sngags la ma byang ba sogs la brten gzhung don dber brjod sbyor tshul sogs mtha' dag dgongs pa ji lta ba bzhin dgrol bar nus pa'i re ba cung zad tsam ma mchis kyang sngar gyi dber brjod gyi rten dang dbyangs can brda sprod kyi bshad sbyar mchog tu gsal ba'i dgongs pa sogs la brtags pas 'di tsam gyis kyang rang nyid sngags klog 'don byed pa la phan ches che bar gyur pa bzhin gzhan rnams la yang de lta bur smon pa'i sgo nas yi ger bris la bdag nyid rmongs shing mi shes pa las byung ba'i 'gal 'khrul thams cad bla ma mkhas pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa la mthol zhing bshags nas legs pa mchis so cog kun la phan pa dang bstan pa rin po che dar rgyas yun du gnas pa'i rgyur gyur cig rgya klog gsal byed nyin byed bye ba'i gzi shar ba'i mod la skye dgu thams cad kyi rmongs pa'i mun pa gcig car bsal nas kyang blo gros snang ba phyogs bcur rgyas par shog   sarba mangga lam "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5927</vol>
<tib>rtags kyi 'jug pa'i 'grel pa blo gsar 'jug sgo zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@009a * zhes rtags kyi 'jug pa'i 'grel ba blo gsar 'jug sgo zhes bya ba 'di ni dka' bcu blo bzang bkra shis kyis bris pa'o bstan pa yin ring 'bar gyur cig  dge'o "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5929</vol>
<tib>po ti lnga'i smon lam bzhugs so  "</tib>
<p>2a-2b</p>
<col>@002b (zhes bka' pod rnam lnga'i smon lam 'di ni dga' ldan bshad sgrub dar rgyas gling nas blo ldan mang du thos pa'i dbu mdzad blo bzang dge 'dun gyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor bshes gnyen mkhas pa'i drin gyis bka' pod rnam lngar cung zad syangs pa'i ^sprangs btsun ngag dbang dpal ldan gyis sbyar ba 'dis kyang kun tu dge bar gyur cig  sarba mangga lam chos 'khor gling khams tshan gyi dge slong phur bu skyabs kyis dpar du bzhengs pa'o ) "</col>
</item>

<col>@006b (ces mkhas shing grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po ^ pan chen bsod nams grags pa'i dpal rnam dpyod mchog gi sde'i zhal snga nas kyi rnam thar gsol 'debs dad pa'i rol mtsho rgyas byed ngag gi char sprin zhes bya ba zhes bya ba 'di ni blo gsal kun dga' @007a * chos gling gi grwa rigs rig gnas kun la mkhyen dpyod yangs pa rab 'byams pa ngag dbang thub bstan gyis snyan tshig gi lam nas yang yang bskul zhing rang nyid kyang mchog tu dad pas mtshams sbyar te byang phyogs sa mtha'i btsun chung gyi na ba ^ 'jam dbyangs gong ma'i lung gis khu re mkhan po no min hang du bsngags pa wa g'indra pa tu siddhis ^ bya bral lha dbang rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i rnam thar ji lta ba bzhin du ^ skyabs mgon dam pa'i gdan sa dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling du bsgrigs pa'i shog bur bebs pa po ni dpyod ldan ngag dbang thabs mkhas so 'dis kyang 'jam mgon bstan pa dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig  aom swa sti bsod nams zhing mchog rgyal bstan lha lam du grags pa'i 'od dkar 'phrol zla med pa smra ba'i zla ba pan chen chos kyi rje rnam dpyod mchog gi sde la gus pas 'dud dam pa gang de'i rnam thar gsol 'debs 'di khu re chen mo zhu the khams chan gyi dge bshes ngag dbang shes rab la sogs pas par bskrun dge bas tshe rabs thams cad d bshes gnyen dam pas 'bral med rjes 'dzin shog </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5930</vol>
<tib>rigs pa'i dbang phyug chos kyi grags pa la bstod pa smra ngan pham pa'i rgyal rnga zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-3a</p>
<col>@003a * (ces rigs pa'i dbang phyug dpal ldan chos kyi grags pa la bstod pa smra ngan pham pa'i rgyal rnga zhes bya ba 'di ni sa mtha'i btsun chung gyi na ba blo bzang chos 'dzin gyis sbyar ba'o bla ma nar khams tshan dge bshes go chas dpar du bzhengs pa dge legs 'phel gyur cig dge'o  </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5930</vol>
<tib>rje btsun chos kyi rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i rnam thar gsol 'debs dad pa'i 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-2a</p>
<col>@002a * (ces pa 'di ni ma h'a ma ya khams tshan gyi dge bshes rdo rjes dngul tam lha dang bcas yang yang au tshugs byas pa'i ngor chos rje'i ming 'dzin blo bzang chos 'dzin gyis ga-yar khral tsam du bris pa 'dis kyang tshe rabs 'phreng bar dam pa de nyid kyis dgyes bzhin rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig  dge'o mangga lam</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5930</vol>

<item>

<vol>5931</vol>

<p>1a-24a</p>
<col>@023b (ces byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang dag 'phags kyis zhus pa'i le'u'i gzhung gi gcod mtshams so sor bcad pa mdo don lta ba'i meg 'byed ces bya ba 'di ni mkhas mang blo gsal kun dga' chos gling grwa tshang gi dbu ma 'jug rten gyi 'dzin gwra ni dge phrug pa rnams @024a * gyis le'u 'di nyid la lta rtog mkhan mang du 'dug pas rgyas bsdus 'tsham 'grel pa zhig cis kyang dgos zhes nan tan chen pos dngul gyi dong rtse gcig lhag chu gter rab dkar lha rdzas bcas {???} ngor ^blo dman gyi na pa blo bzang chos 'dzin gyis sbyar ba 'di la ji dkad du rgyal po'i sras grags pa'i bshes gnyen gyis gal te rigs pa lta na blang don dka' ba la bdag 'dra'i blo  'khrul mi srid pa ma yin pas ci ste min na gzhan du gyis zhes pa ltar nor 'khrul gyi tshogs mchis na gzur gnas mkhas pa rnams kyis thugs ma khrel bar brtse ba'i yul tu nye bar dgongs te dag ter mdzad par zhu yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge tshul blo bzang rgyal mtshan no 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa spyi dang khyad par rdze tsong kha pa'i bstan pa dri ma med pa phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa'i rgyur gyur cig  dge legs 'phel dge'o)"</col>

<tib>'phags pa gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa'i mdo sde'i don rgya cher bshad pa thabs mkhas nyams len gter mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-74a</p>
<col>@073a * ces 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po thabs la mkhas pa'i mdo sde'i rgya cher bshad pa thabs mkhas nyams len gter mdzod ces bya ba 'di ni sh'akya'i dge slong blo bzang chos 'dzin gyis rang gi gam 'dug nye 'brel thos bsam la rtson pa'i dge phrug zhig glo bur gsar 'tshes skyas chen btegs skabs phyi ma'i rgyags phyer dmigs te mdo 'di lan 'ga' 'don tshe blo la gang shar sug bris su bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan @073b pa rin po che sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa'i rgyur gyur cig dge'o  aom swa sti man ngag rta ljang bdun gyis nyer drangs te gzhan phan thabs mkhas spyod pa'i go lar rgyu lus can phan bde'i pad tshal bzhad gnyen sh'akya'i lugs bzang ring du rgyal gyur cig gang de'i gsung gsang 'dzin ma las thon pa'i brgyad khri bzhi stong nang sel blta na legs kun rmongs nang brgyas gzir ba'i 'gro rnams la  phan bde'i dpal ster mig gi bdud rtsir bsgrubs dge 'dis 'brel thogs gtso byas ma rgan mgron tshe rabs 'phreng bar dam pa'i mgon gyis bzung tshang la ma nor bstan pa'i grur zhugs te 'jigs rung ti mi'i grong @074a * las myur brgal shog  ces pa 'di ni dad ldan khyim bdag tshe ring don grub kyis rgyu yon sbyor te khu ral chen mo dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling na chos sbyin sgo brgya 'byed pa'i par gyi 'phrul 'khor legs par bzhengs skabs gyi na pa chos ming pas sbyar ba'o bkra shis par gyur cig  "</col>

<item>

<vol>5933</vol>
<tib>mdo rgyud gnad don dril ba'i zla ba'i thig le rmongs pa'i tsha gdung sel ba'i ga bur gyi zegs ma</tib>
<p>1a-28b</p>
<col>@028a * (ces sa lam gyi rnam bzhag nyung du 'di ni dpal ldan byang rgyud gra tshang gi rtsa 'dzin dga' ldan chos 'phel gling gi khri ba bla ma blo bzang chos dbang dga' ldan dar rgyas gling gi khri ba bla ma ngag dbang dngos grub dam chos rab rgyas gling gi khri ba bla ma blo bzang don yod dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling gi khri ba bla ma bstan 'dzin bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan bcas kyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bka' nan brjid phebs las bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gsung gi zegs ma ci nges tho rje yab sras kyi gsung dang sa lam 'ga' re las ci thon tsam du 'bras tre bo bka' 'gyur bla ming bas sug bris bgyis pa'o) ` aom swa sti sku bzhi'i bdag nyid zung 'jug bla ma mchog srid zhi'i 'jigs skyobs bslu med dkon mchog gsum kun nas phyag bgyi rab 'byams mdo rgyud @028b kyi gnad don dril ba'i skal ldan 'jug ngogs mchog tshul 'di chos rje blo bzang mgon rdo rjes 'gro kun byang chub thob phyir par bskrun pa'i dge 'dis 'gro kun thabs mkhas gsang chen du zhugs nas zung 'jug go 'phang myur thob shog  ('di ni rab tshes nang gi lcags mo glang lor ae ge thu'i dgon sde phan bde 'byung gnas dam chos rab rgyas gling du par du 'khod pa dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5933</vol>
<tib>'phags mchog dzam lha rigs lnga gter gyi ga'u la brten nas sgrub tshul phun tshogs char 'bebs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-17a</p>
<col>@017a (ces 'phags mchog dzam lha rigs lnga gter gyi ga'u la brten nas sgrub tshul phun tshogs char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'di ni ^ yab rje blo bzang rgyal mtshan sengge dpal bzang por 'gyid rol sprul pa'i sku 'jam dpal bstan pa'i sgron me sogs kyis lha mchog 'di rnams phyogs gcig tu ga'u la brten nas nor sgrub bya tshul zhig yod na legs tshul yang bskul kyang sa bon lta bu zhig gnang ba bar skabs rkyen dbang gis nub rjes sor slar yang bskul tshe bdag la khyod kyi slar bris na legs tshul gyi bka'i me tog spyi bor 'thor ba ltar 'dren pa gang de'i bka' drin khons rnam pa kun tu 'tsho zhing 'du gsum pa bstan pa rgyal mtshan gyis mngon rtogs phal cher sgrub thabs rin 'byung gzhir bzhag @018a * dzam lha rang rang gi gter sgrub so so nas skyes chen dam pa chen po rnams kyi gsung rdo rje tshig rnams byin rlabs che khyad rang sor bzhag te rang rtsom 'brel med khon ma byas par mgon po gang de'i bzhed pa ji lta bar byas pa'i khur gyis rab byung bcu pa bzhi ba'i lcags phag lo'i cho 'phrul zla ba'i yar tshes brgyad kyi nyin gza' skar phun sum tshogs pa'i dus tshod dge bar mjug grub par byas ste sug bris su bgyis pa las slar yang gnyis kyis bris byed po re skong ljongs kyi rigs sngags 'chang bkrun bzang rdo rjes bgyis pa skyes dgu'i dbul ba'i sdug bsngal sel ba'i rin chen dbang gi rgyal po lta bur gyur cig dza yantu</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5933</vol>
<tib>'phags pa brgyad stong pa'i 'grel chen rgyan snang las btus pa'i nyer mkho mdo don lta ba'i mig 'byed ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-63a</p>
<col>@063a * ces pa 'di ni rig gnas rgya mtsho la mkhyen rab kyi 'jug pa mchog tu yangs pa yongs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po ao thog bka' 'gyur ba bla ma dkon mchog snyan grags kyis 'di lta bu zhig gyis zhes bskul zhing gzhan yang don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis nan tan che ba'i ngor nges pa don gyi mkhas grub chen po rje btsun bla ma blo bzang dar rgyas dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas las 'phags pa brgyad stong pa'i bshad lung legs par mnos pa'i bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba'i gyi na pa dbyangs can dga' ba'i blo gros kyis dpen gnas dge ldan chos sdings su bris pa'o aom swa sti tshul 'di khal kha jo nang be se'i shog dpyod ldan dge slong ngag dbang bstan 'dzin gyis chos sbyin rgya cher spel ba'i lhag bsam gyis mthun rkyen sbyar te par du legs par bsgrubs legs byas 'dis mtshon dus gsum dge ba'i bthus tshe rabs kun tu dal 'byor rten brgyud de dpal ldan bla mas dgyes bzhin rjes bzung nas smin grol lam bzang myur du mthar phyin shog "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5933</vol>
<tib>rab gnas bkra shis snye ma'i zur rgyan dgos 'dod kun ster zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-6a</p>
<col>@005b rab gnas @006a * bkra shis snye ma'i zur rgyan dgos 'dod kun ster zhes bya ba 'di yang rgyud du ma'i dgongs pa ltar rab gnas rgyas pa'i 'don cha 'ba' zhig lhan thabs nag 'gros su rigs sngags 'chang ba'i dge slong 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rjes zin bris su byas pa'o</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5933</vol>
<tib>rab gnas kyi cho ga klags pas don grub dge legs kyi gter chen bkra shis rab rgyas</tib>
<p>1a-24b</p>
<col>@024a * (ces rab gnas kyi cho ga klags pas don grub dge legs kyi gter chen bkra shis rab rgyas 'di yang snga mo nas gsang sngasg rab 'byams smra ba ngag dbang rgyal mtshan sogs don gnyer can mang pos bskul zhing slad nas gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba bstan pa lhun grub kyis byang phyogs hor gyi yul gru chen por bla ma dang chos skyong rin po che'i bka' spyi bor blangs nas bgrod skabs 'di lta bu zhig dogs zhes nan tan chen pos bskul ba la brten nas rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag po kun mkhyen bla ma khri rin po che yab sras gnyis dang rim gnyis kyi rnal 'byor mthar phyin pa gsang chen rgyud sde'i mnga' bdag sri rdo rje 'chang gi phyag len mthong brgyud rgyud sde bzhi dgongs 'grel dang bcas pa'i don mthun par mdor @024b bsdus nyung gsal du mdo sngags mang du thos pa'i dge slong 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i rdo rjes gong ma'i yan dang mtshungs pa'i dpal ri bo dga' 'phel gyi ri byed sbyar ba'i 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig </col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5934</vol>
<tib>bla ma dang 'jam dbyangs zung 'brel gyi bla ma'i rnal 'byor byin rlabs myur 'jug ces bya ba bzhugs "</tib>

<col>@008a * (ces bla ma dang 'jam dbyangs zung 'brel gyi bla ma'i rnal 'byor byin rlabs myur 'jug ces bya ba 'di ni bla ma la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa dge phyogs la brtson pa che zhing sems 'dul ba dang dbang po nye bar zhi ba rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes bskul ba'i ngor sh'akya'i btsun pa su ma ti ma ni pradzny'as dge ldan bshad sgrub bstan pa 'phel ba'i gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dpyod phul du byung ba gu shr'i kun dga' rin chen no 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa dang sems can thams cad rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang myur du thob par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5934</vol>
<tib>dbu ma rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa shes rab ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-25a</p>
<col>@024b dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa shes rab ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i chos mngon par rnam par bzhag pa don dam pa'i de kho na yang dag par ston pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gsal bar byed pa slob dpon bdag nyid chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rjer ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa bla na med pa'i tshul rab tu 'byed pa rab tu dga' ba'i sa bsgrubs nas bde ba can gyi zhing du gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams dang ba'i 'od ces bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas 'od ces bya bar 'gyur bas mdzad pa rdzogs so dbang phyug chen mo'i mnga' bdag rgyal po chen po dpal lha btsan po'i bka' lung gis rgya gar gyi mkhan po theg pa chen po dbu ma pa dzny'a na garbha dang zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa 'di la rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa bdun shloo ka ni bzhi @025a * brgya bzhi bcu rtsa dgu yod bam po ni phyed dang gnyis su byas so slad kyi grong khyer dpe med kyi pandi ta bi dya ha su ma ti'i zhal snga nas dang bod kyi lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma grags kyis 'grel pa dang bstun nas shin tu legs par bcos so  (zhes pa 'di ni bkra shis chos spel grwa tshang gi par du bsgrubs pa'o</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5934</vol>
<tib>dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgo nas sku gsung thugs rten rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga bkra shis 'phel rgyas zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-25a</p>
<col>@024b (ces snyigs dus kyi rgyal ba gnyis pa bu ston rin chen grub kyis mdzad pa'i dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgo nas bde bar gshegs @025a * pa'i sku gsung thugs rten rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga bkra shis dpal 'bar gyi 'don bsgrigs bkra shis 'phel rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni thos bsam gling gi khams tshan dad brtson snying stobs ldan pa dge slong bsod nams tshe ring gis lo re bzhin rab gnas byas srol tshugs pa'i 'don char dmigs te khu ral chen mo dga' ldan bshad sgrub gling gi grwa rig pa chos rje bla zur sngags ram pa blo bzang chos 'dzin gyis sug bris su bgyis pa'o 'dis kyang dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bshad sgrub dri ma med pa phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun rin du gnas pa'i rgyur gyur cig  bkra shis par gyur cig  ` 'dis bskrun rnam dkar rlabs chen mthu stobs kyis ring min dus kyi 'khor lo'i lam bzang brten zung 'jug sku bzhi'i grong du phyin gyur nas mtha' yas 'gro ba de la 'god par shog dpar 'di ni bskul ba po dge slong bsod nams tshe ring gis rgyu yon sbyor te bzhengs pa'o dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5934</vol>
<tib>pha rol tu phyin pa bsdus pa slob dpon dpa' bos mdzad pa</tib>

<item>

<vol>5934</vol>
<tib>'phags pa 'du shes bcu gcig bstan pa'i mdo dang theg pa chen po 'da' ka ye shes kyi mdo gnyis bzhugs * bdag nyid chen po skyes mchog pu to pa'i chig lab ring mo sbo bzhugs so"</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5934</vol>
<tib>rje bla ma rgyan drug mchog gnyis dang bcas pa la phyag mchod 'bul ba'i cho ga lag tu blang bde bar bkod pa byin rlabs nyin byed 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10b</p>
<col>@010a * (ces rje bdag nyid chen po rgyan drug mchog gnyis chos bsrung ye shes kyi mgon po dang bcas pa la phyag mchod gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul lag tu blang bde bar bkod pa byin rlabs nyin byed 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba'i dbang po rdo rams pa blo bzang rab gsal gyis bkra shis pa'i lha rdzas dang bcas nan tan @010b chen pos yang yang bskul ba la brten nas sangs rgyas kun 'dus kyi ngo bo bla ma rdo rje 'chang yab sras rnams kyi bka' drin kho nas nye bar 'tsho ga sh'akya'i rjes 'jug blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtshos chos grwa chen po bkra shis 'khyil gyi rang gshags chos 'byor dga' tshal du bris pa 'dis kyang gser zhun cod pan 'chang pa'i ring lugs phyogs kun tu dar zhing rgyas par byed nus par gyur cig ) aom swa sti thub bstan srog shing mkhas grub rgyu skar phreng dad pa'i yid mtsho mdzes pa'i rtse dga' las bshad sgrub 'khri shing gar gyis brtsen pa'i phyir dpar gyi mchod sbyin lum pi'i tshal du bsgrubs sarba mangga lam "</col>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5935</vol>
<tib>rnam thar sgo gsum gyi rnam par bzhag pa legs bshad rgya mtsho rba rlabs zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@010a * ces rnam thar sgo gsum gyi rnam par bzhag pa legs bshad rgya mtsho'i rwa rlabs zhes bya ba 'di ni snga sor dpal ldan 'bras spungs su don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis bskul ngor cung zad bris pa'i thog thos bsam gling gi gzhung gsar 'dzin gra'i dge 'dun rnams nas 'di lta bu zhig dgos tshul gyi bskul ma byung bar brten kun mkhyen bla ma'i legs bshad bee d'urya dkar po'i gan mdzod gyi kha skongs su dmigs te chos smra ba'i btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron mes rang lo nyer bdun pa la chos grwa chen po bkra shis 'khyil du bris pa 'dis kyang 'jam mgon bstan pa'i snying po phyogs dus kun du rgyas par gyur cig  rigs lam dri med tsha zer gyis 'gro blo'i mun pa kun sel ba mkhas rnam dga' byed rta bdun bdag mchod sbyin sbyar gyi lha lam ngos 'char byed rgyu sbyor dang stobs ldan blo bzang legs ldan la sogs pa'i 'gro kun ma rigs mun pa las rgyal te thar pa'i gro mchog tu ring min stobs bcu'i rgyal ba cher 'khod te 'gro kun sgrol ba la mi pham mgon dang 'jam dbyangs kyi rnam thar bdag gir byed par shog  ces sgo mang gra rigs har chen ja sag gung gi gshogs rab 'byams pa blo bzang legs ldan nas spar gyi sbyar byang dgos tshul ltar ra sgreng aa chi thu no mon han gyis sbyar ba'o bkra shis par gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5935</vol>
<tib>rten 'brel bstod pa legs bshad snying po'i sa bcad gsal ba'i me long zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-10a</p>
<col>@009b ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad kkyi ma 'dis pa'i mdzad bshes chen po ston pa bla na med pa la zab mo rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gsung ba'i sgo nas bstod pa legs par bshad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di ni mang du thos pa'i dge slong blo bzang grags pa'i dpal gyis gangs can khrod kyi gangs ri'i dbang po 'od gung rgyal gyi lha zhol dben gnas lha'i sdings ming gzhan rnam par rgyal ba'i gling zhes bya bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni nam mkha' dpal @010a * zhes bka' stsal ba yin lags so 'di ltar rab 'byams ngag dbang thub bstan gyis bris pa'i dge bas bdag dang 'gro ba kun rten 'brel zab mo'i lam bzang 'tshol ba la 'jam mgon tsong kha pa dang mtshungs par shog 'dis kyang 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa rin po che yun ring du gnas pa'i cha rkyen du gyur cig  "</col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5935</vol>
<tib>sbyor ba'i chos drug gi zin bris blo gros kyi padmo bzhad pa'i nyi ma zhes bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-24a</p>
<col>@024a * ('dir dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bo rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi mnga' bdag bka' drin mtshungs med rdo rje 'chang chen po khri chen rin po che rje btsun blo bzang ye shes bstan pa rab rgyas dpal bzang po'i zhal gyi bum bzang las 'ongs pa'i sbyor ba'i chos drug gi bshad pa rgya mtsho lta bu las rang la skabs thob tu nye bar mkho ba'i man ngag zhal shes 'ga' zhig yul byang phyogs kyi mthar skyes pa'i ^ btsun pa wa g'indra pa tu siddhi'i ming can gyis cung zad zin bris su bkod pa 'dis kyang rgyal bstan spyi dang bye brag 'jam mgon bla ma'i bstan pa rin po che 'di nyid mi nyams shing yar rgyas su 'gro ba dang 'gro ba thams cad kyang phan bde'i snang ba la rtag tu longs spyod pa'i rgyur gyur cig </col>
</item>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>

<tib>sbyor ba'i chos drug gi zin bris blo gros kyi padmo bzhad pa'i nyi ma zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>

<vol>5935</vol>
<tib>srid pa bar do lam khyer gdams ngag reg zig</tib>

<col>@007a * de ltar bar srid sbyong byed bcas kyi go don nyung ngu 'di ni pan chen sh'akya shr'i bh'a dra'i ring lugs 'dzin pa'i slob dpon ngag dbang smin grol gyi gsung gi g-yar ngo bzlog par ma nus pas karma si tu'i mtshan gyi cod pan spyi bos mchod par rlom pa'i dred po bstan pa'i nyin byed kyis rang lo nyer gnyis pa nag pa zla ba'i tshes dge bar sngon gyi slob dpon rnams kyis ji ltar bstan par dbang por byas te rang bzo med par bkod pa yin kyang kun tu rmongs pa shas ches che bas nongs par gyur pa ye shes kyi spyan ldan rnams kyis bkod par bzhes shing 'di las byung ba'i dge rtsa cung zad rnyed na'ang mtha' med kyi ma rgan rnams la sbyin par bya'o slang smras pa gdams ngag rjed byang me khyer 'dra 'di blo mchog nyi mas snang med byas log rtog mun pa sug por bying la lam ston nus pa 'di la dben de phyir 'di byas ngal ba nyid mod 'on kyang kun slong shan ga min pa'i sa bon btal 'dis 'bras bu grub gyur gcig tu ngal ba 'bras bde min shu bha mastu aa nanta pra do bhya: warna sya k'a ra ka bshr'i si ddhim gu nas lan gcig zhus"</col>

<tib>brtan bzhugs gsol 'debs 'dod pa'i re skong 'dod dgu yid bzhin 'jo ba'i bum bzang zhes bya ba</tib>

<item>
<rkts></rkts>
<vol>5937</vol>
<tib>lha mi'i rnam 'dren dam pa ^gong ma rgyal ba'i dbang po thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa chen po'i mchog gi sprul pa'i sku rin po che'i brtag bzhugs gsol 'debs smon lam bden tshig gi mtsham sbyor dang 'dod 'jo'i dpag bsam dbang po zhes bya ba bzhugs so"</tib>
<p>1a-9a</p>
<col>@006b (zhes lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba yongs kyi mgon skyabs dpung gnyen mtshungs zla ma mchis pa gongs rgyal ba'i dbang po thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa chen po'i mchog gi sprul pa'i sku rin po che'i ^zhabs brtan gsol 'debs smon lam bden tshig gi mtshams sbyor dang bcas pa 'dod 'jo'i dpag bsam dbang po zhes bya ba 'di ni ^gong sa lha mi'i rnam 'dren chen po gang nyid nges pa'i don du bskal ba dpag tu med pa'i snga rob nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po'i skur mngon par rdzogs par byang chub zin na'ang 'khor ba'i 'dam rdzub tu byed pa'i 'dod rnams sgrol ba'i slad du gru 'dzin ri bo'i spor dus gsum rgyal ba sras bcas kun gyi thugs rje gcig tu bsdus pa'i rang gzugs rgyal sras lag na padmo'i @007a * sku'i rnam par rol ba las sku dngos kyis gdul bar mi 'os pa'i thos rnams 'dren pa'i slad du zhing khams bye 'phrag brgyar mtshan dpes spras pa'i mchog gi sprul sku nas bya dang ri dwags gdul ba'i phyir re dang de'i rnam par bstan pa'i bzo bo sprul sku'i bar gyi sprul pa'i bkod pa mtha' klas pa rim dang cig car ci rigs par ston par mdzad pa'i mtha' ni kun mkhyen nang phan tshun kho na'i skyod yul las bdag sogs 'ching ba kun ldan so so skye bo rnams kyis cha shas tsam yang brjod nus pa'i go skabs dang bral yang mi mjed 'jig rten gyi zhing 'dir sprul pa'i bkod pa ji snyed cig ston par mdzad pa las 'phags bod gnyis su ji ltar byon pa'i sprul pa'i bkod pa che long tsam zhig bka' gdams bstan pa'i chu mgo dpal aa ti sha yab sras kyi gsang chos glegs bam rin po che las ji ltar gsungs pa dang gzhan mar dam pa'i zhal las rim par brgyud de kun la yongs su grags pa ni 'phags yul nor 'dzin sgeg mo'i lto bar rnam 'dren bzhi pa don kun grub pa'i spyan sngar khye bu snang bar gyur pa nas bzungs chos rgyal dge ba dpal gyi bar du pandi ta grub dbang ku s'a li rgyal po 'jig rten phal ba bya dang ri dwags sogs ci rigs pa'i rnam pas mkhas pa dang grub pa dpung stobs thabs mkhas sna tshogs kyi sgo nas rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'dzin gyong 'phel ba dang skal bar ldan pa'i @007b sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin par mdzad bsil ldan rwa pa dkar pos khor yug tu bskor ba'i sman ljongs 'di 'phags pa nyin gyi gdul zhing dug zigs shing phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas rnams kyis bskul bas mtshams sbyar te thog mar mtsho dbri pa nas bzungs mi'i 'gro ba spel ba'i bar du gzugs sku'i bkod pa dngos su ston pa nas gang zag phal ba'i rgyud dang sa rdo byin gyis rlabs pa'i bar du thugs rje'i 'jug pa cing yang ston par mdzad cing de nas rje bo'i thog ma gnya' khri btsan po nas bzungs mnga' bdag ral ba can gyi bar du sa'i tshangs pa rim dang cig car ci rigs pa'i rnam par bstan nas mnga' 'bangs bde bar skyong ba dang dam pa'i chos kyi dbu bsnyems shing srol btod dar rgyas su mdzad pa dge ba bcu'i khrims bcas shing chab 'babs thams cad chos 'byor bde skyid kyi dpal la sbyor bar mdzad rdo rjes 'brom ston rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas nas pan chen pad+ma badzra gyi bar du dge bsnyen dang rig sngags 'chang ba'i dbang po mkhas grub gnyis ldan rim dang cig car ci rigs pa'i tshul bzungs nas bod yul mun nag gi gling du ma du rgyal bstan gsal ba'i sgron me rgya cher spor bar mdzad cing thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun grub pa dpal bzang po nas bzungs bde chen chos kyi rgyal po yon tan rgya mtsho'i bar du gser sbyangs cod pan 'dzin pa'i ngur smrig 'chang ba par mchad pa'i tshul du byon nas thub bstan rgya mtsho'i yang snying @008a * rgyal ba gnyis pa'i ring lugs kyi rgyal mtshan srid gsum rtse mo'i bar du mthon por sgreng bar mdzad khyad par rigs dang dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i khyab bdag nges pa don gyi thams cad mkhyen pa chen po ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho'i sku'i rnam par bstan nas bcu phrag rig pa'i gzhung lugs dang mdo rgyud spyi bye brag gi tshig don mtha' dag phyogs re tsam ma yin par thub pa'i bstan pa lus yongs su rdzogs pa thos bsam sgom gsum gyis gtan la 'phebs par mdzad pas rgyal ba bu ram shing pa'i ring lugs rtsod pa'i dus 'dir ches cher gsal bar gyur cing dpal lag na rdo rje'i sprul pa mi'i dbang po bstan 'dzin chos kyi rgyal pos gangs ljongs kyi 'gro ba ma lus pa'i rgyal phran bsil bus gtses shing nya mthag pa rnams dbugs phyungs shing rang dbang du byas nas ^gongs lha mi'i rnam 'dren chen po'i zhabs 'og tu tshud pa'i skal bzang la sbyor par mdzad pa brtse chen byams pa'i thugs kyis bdag gir bzhes nas dge ba bcu'i khrims lugs kyi srol nyams pa rnams sor chud par mdzad de chos srid lugs gnyis kyi nyi zla'i snang bas 'jig rten dkar por bsgyur bar mdzad la rdo rjes su'ang thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang rin chen tshangs dbyangs rgya mtsho nas bzungs lha mi'i rnam 'dren chen po ngag dbang blo bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'phrin las rgya mtsho dpal bzang po'i bar du gser sbyangs @008b cod pan mdzes pa'i sdom brtson rgyal po'i tshul 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig gi rnam par rim par byon nas 'gro ba ma bsgral pa rnams bsgral pa dang mgrol ba rnams sgrol ba dang dpugs ma byin pa rnams dpugs 'byung bar mdzad pa'i rnam par thar ba bsam brjod kyi yul las 'das shing dus kyi mtha' 'dir yang rang nyid kyi gdul zhing byang phyogs bho ta'i rgyal khams kyi 'gro ba dmu rgod pa ma rubs pa gdul dka' ba rnams brtse chen byams pa'i thugs kyis mngon par slar yang skye ba sprul sku'i zla tshes kyi rang zhal gsar du dngom pa mchog gi sprul pa'i sku rin po che nyid ring por ma thogs par tshul bstan thos bsam sgom gsum gyi mdzad pa mtha' dag dka' ba med par mthar phyin nas gsum ldan sdom brtson rgyal po'i tshul gyis thub bstan yongs 'rdzogs kyi bdag por bzhengs rgyu'i thog ma'i rten 'brel gyi 'jug sgo dam pa mthon ma thing gi lan bu nga ro nas mtshan snyan gsar ba'i dbyar rnga bskal bzang mdongs mtha'i dga' ba'i gsos su sgrog pa dang lhan cig zhabs zung mi 'gyur rdo rje'i khri 'phang mthon por bskal ba bye bar brtan par bzhugs nas gsan bsam sgom gsum sogs chos dang srid kyi bzhed don mtha' dag gegs med bde blag tu 'grub pa'i smon lam bden tshig gi mtshams sbyor ris su mchad pa'i 'dus sde rnams kyi zhal 'don dang dad ldan ser skya mchog dman mtha' dag gis ngag 'don du byas chog pa 'di lta bu @009a * zhig dgos zhes bur rgyal chol kha gsum gyi 'dzin mar chos srid gser gyi 'khor los dbang bsgyur zhing ^gongs lha mi'i rnam 'dren chen po'i lugs zung gi 'phrin las kyi gdugs dkar dgu 'du 'degs pa la gzhan dring mi 'jog pa'i rnam dpyod can rgyal tshab thung zhan rje drung ho thog thu chen pos srid du ring pa'i lha rdzas kyis thog drangs bdog pa'i gnang bskyes gyi rnom pa dang bcas nan tan chen pos bskul ma mdzad pa dwang du blangs te rgyal rigs kyi bandhes nor gling bskal bzang pho brang du 'bru mang zhes pas stag gnam lo'i dka' thub zla ba'i dkar phyogs kyi bzang po gnyis pa re gza' gos sngon can rgyu skar tha skar sbyor bas rlung sbyor chen gzhon dbyangs aai nyi ma sprel 'char ba'i gza' skar 'phrod sbyor phun sum tshogs pa'i phyed yol snga cha'i bdud rtsi thun mtshams kyi thog tu grub par sbyar nas gsol bshugs drag tu btab pa'o sarba mangga lam dge legs 'phel</col>
</item>

<tib>bla ma mchod pa'i khrid yig gsang ba'i gnad rnam par phye ba snyan rgyud man ngag gi gter mdzod ces bya ba</tib>
<p>1a-221a</p>
<col>@220a * ces bla ma mchod pa'i khrid yig gnad @220b rnam par phye ba snyan rgyud man ngag gi gter mdzod ces bya ba 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba yongs kyi rnam 'dren dam pa rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyis bdag po pan chen thams cad mkhyen rje btsun blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes dpal bzang bos dpen sa snyan rgyud kyi man ngag gi snying po bla ma mchod pa bde stong dbyer med ma'i la khrid yig rgyas pa man ngag gi gnad rnams rnam par phye bzhig gyis shig ces bkas bskul ba la brten nas bka' bzhin sgrub pa mchod pa'i mchog tu bsams bka' lung spyi bos mnas te rje nyid kyi dgyes bzhin rjes su bzung zhing lam bzang 'di la brten nas grub pas mchog brnyes pa'i bla ma dam pa las chos 'di'i snyan gryud kyi man ngag thob pa dge slong ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bla ma dam pa'i man ngag la gzhi byas gdams ngag 'di gang las btus pa'i rtsa ba'i khungs 'dus @221a * pa bshad kyi rgyud dang rgyud dang grub chen gyi gzhung rnams dang rje thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung rnams la zhib tu brtags te yid ches pa'i tshul du thams cad 'dul zhes pa me mo phag gi lo dbyud pa zla ba'i dkar tshes rgyal ba gnyis pa'i nyin bal bod mtshams kyi gnas mang yul skyid grong gi nags khrod bkra shis bsam gtan gling du sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs kun tu dar zhing nam yang mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cig  sarba mangga lam</col>
</item>
